[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde aM bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D343}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pUr+Na pra mu kha a ba dA na sha ti ka/_bod skad du/_gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po dang po/_/
[\[1b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sdom ni/_gang po bzang dang grags ldan ma/_/le lo can dang ded dpon rnams/_/zla ba che ba pad ma dang /_/pany+tsa 
[\[1b.3\]]la dang bdug pa dang /_/rgyal po mjug tu smos pa ste/_/'di ni sde tshan bsdus pa yin/_/ljongs shig tu bram ze gang po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de'i tshe sangs 
[\[1b.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon 
[\[1b.5\]]rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis 
[\[2a.2\]]mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_sangs rgyas gsar du byung ste/_gsung rab kyi snying 
[\[2a.3\]]khu 'thung ba'i dus la bab cing /_lha dang mi man cad la yang dag par rab tu ston pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub mngon 
[\[2a.4\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_ring por ma lon par 'jig rten thams cad du grags pas yongs su gang ngo /_/de nas lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i ljongs na bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin 
[\[2a.5\]]pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas so/_/de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba dang /_bdag 
[\[2a.6\]]nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_gtong ba la sred pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba/_rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/_des re zhig na rab tu byung ba thams cad la mchod sbyin byas nas/_der mu stegs can la sogs pa stong 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]phrag du mas zan zos so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pa btul nas/_de btul bas srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dul bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po'i khab nas gang po'i nye du rnams lhags te/_gang 
[\[2b.2\]]po'i mdun du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan thos nas dga' ba chen po thob par gyur to/_/de nas khang thog tu song nas rgyal po'i khab logs su kha bltas te 'dug nas pus mo 
[\[2b.3\]]gnyis kyi lha nga sa la btsugs te/_me tog kyang gtor/_bdug pa dang chu yang phul nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchod sbyin la gshegs su gsol/_mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sa gzigs su gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas 
[\[2b.4\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du me tog gi khang par gyur te 'dug go/_/bdug pa ni sprin gyi mgo lta bur gyur to/_/chu ni bai dUr+ya'i sdong bu lta bur gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[2b.5\]]bos thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa spyan 'dren 'di ga las mchis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i ljongs na/_bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba 'dug pa der 'o bu cag 'dong dgos 
[\[2b.6\]]kyis dge slong dag chos shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis zhabs 'bring byas nas lho phyogs kyi ri bo'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po'i mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sa dang nye ba zhig tu gshegs nas/_'di snyam du dgongs te ngas bram ze gang po 
[\[2b.7\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis dad par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/_nyag gcig lhung bzed dang chu snod phyag na bsnams nas/_gang po dang nye ba zhig tu gshegs so/_/de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang pos bcom ldan 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba 
[\[3a.2\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shin tu rings par bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol/_bdag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bshos gsol bar ci gnang 
[\[3a.3\]]zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'di'i nang du byin cig_/de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyas g.yog byas pas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs khur ba dang /_
[\[3a.4\]]bshos dang /_'jams dang /_bldag pa dang /_bzhib pa la sogs pas lhung bzed 'gengs par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyid kyi lhung bzed kyi nang nas dge slong stong gi lhung bzed dag gi nang du zas de dag 'pho bar mdzad do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong gi 
[\[3a.5\]]lhung bzed rnams gang bar thugs su chud pa de'i tshe nyid kyi lhung bzed gang bar bstan to/_/de nas dge slong stong lhung bzed gang ba zla ba tshes pa'i dbyibs lta bur 'khod pa bstan to/_/nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong stong gi 
[\[3a.6\]]lhung bzed rnams gang bar gyur to/_/zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/_/de nas cho 'phrul bstan pa des bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po dga' bar gyur nas/_dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs shing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur te/_sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[3a.7\]]kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang 
[\[3b.2\]]las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 
[\[3b.3\]]'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur 
[\[3b.4\]]rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems 
[\[3b.5\]]can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa 
[\[3b.6\]]bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par kyang ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag 
[\[3b.7\]]cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_
[\[4a.2\]]tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams 
[\[4a.3\]]dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che ba rnams dang /_mi gdung ba rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang bdag med 
[\[4a.4\]]pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod 
[\[4a.5\]]par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin du 'brangs te gal te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[4a.6\]]kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 
[\[4a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos 
[\[4b.2\]]kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[4b.3\]]de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po 
[\[4b.4\]]zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra 
[\[4b.5\]]thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the 
[\[4b.6\]]tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[4b.7\]]kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo bram ze che zhing mtho ba 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/_snying rje chen pos 
[\[5a.2\]]yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po bzang zhes bya bar gyur te 
[\[5a.3\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/_gang pos 
[\[5a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sar bshos gsol te/_lhag par yang des dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yang dag par bskyed do/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/
[\[5a.5\]]bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi 
[\[5a.6\]]rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//grags ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams 
[\[5a.7\]]dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_
[\[5b.2\]]sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 
[\[5b.3\]]'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/yangs pa can du mthar gyis bsod snyoms la gshegs nas dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[5b.4\]]dmag dpon seng ge'i mna' ma grags ldan ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod pa des bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan dang dpe byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba dang ldan pa mthong nas shin tu dga' ba thob par gyur to/_/des gyos po la dris pa bdag kyang 'di lta bu'i 
[\[5b.5\]]yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'i thabs 'ga' lta mchis sam/_de nas dmag dpon seng ge 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma bu mo 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa zhig ste/_gal te 'di rkyen dang phrad na ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ro snyam 
[\[5b.6\]]du rig nas smras pa/_bu mo gal te rgyu yang dag par blangs te 'dug na ni khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de nas dmag dpon seng ges grags ldan ma'i dad pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_rin po che mang du byin no/_/de nas grags ldan 
[\[5b.7\]]mas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa phyi de nyin khyim gyi nang du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir gnang ngo /_/de nas bu mo grags ldan mas gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che'i me tog rnams kyang byed du 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bcug_/spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa mang po dag kyang bsags/_zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa yang bshams nas bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[6a.2\]]kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 
[\[6a.3\]]'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas bu mo grags ldan mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis gtor to/_/
[\[6a.4\]]de nas me tog de dag 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/_bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du rin po che'i khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyal mtshan can mgar ba'am/_mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed mi nus pa de 
[\[6a.5\]]lta bur gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas bu mo grags ldan mas lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/_sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du lus thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_
[\[6a.6\]]sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par/_sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_
[\[6a.7\]]yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo grags ldan ma'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe de'i zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa 
[\[6b.2\]]de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_
[\[6b.3\]]ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems 
[\[6b.4\]]can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis 
[\[6b.5\]]sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul 
[\[6b.6\]]pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams 
[\[6b.7\]]dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_
[\[7a.2\]]gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs 
[\[7a.3\]]rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par 
[\[7a.4\]]byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[7a.5\]]ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[7a.6\]]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[7a.7\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_
[\[7b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/
[\[7b.3\]]nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 
[\[7b.4\]]'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa 
[\[7b.5\]]yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de 
[\[7b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo bu mo grags ldan ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo grags ldan ma 
[\[7b.7\]]'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/_snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]byas nas/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur de 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[8a.2\]]de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//le lo can zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas 
[\[8a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding 
[\[8a.4\]]rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas mchod pa byas te lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i 
[\[8a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag 
[\[8a.6\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa 
[\[8a.7\]]las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang /_bu yang med bu mo yang med nas de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te/_bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]pas/_bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_ltas mkhan dang /_mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha 
[\[8b.2\]]la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o/_/'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/_de yang de lta ni ma yin te/_gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/_'khor los 
[\[8b.3\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs 
[\[8b.4\]]pa ste/_gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur na/_'on kyang dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams dang /_ltas mkhan rnams dang /_mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_rtsa lag rnams kyis de la tho btsams nas/_de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang chu lha dang 
[\[8b.5\]]ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /_lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/_'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig 
[\[8b.6\]]skyes pa dang chos 'thun pa pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs te de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/_sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so/_/bud med mkhas pa'i 
[\[8b.7\]]rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags pa yang shes la ma chags pa yang shes pa dang /_dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang /_bu chags pa shes pa dang gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang /_khye'u yang shes 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]la bu mo yang shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na ni lto g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so/_/gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon logs su rten cing gnas so/_/de nas de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa jo bo bdag la sras chags te/_bdag gi rum 
[\[9a.2\]]g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/_khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas/_de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo /_/bdag gi 
[\[9a.3\]]bu rung bar shog shig_/mi rung bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig_/gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog shig_/nor skal la spyod par shog shig_/bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig_/bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang 
[\[9a.4\]]bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/_sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas/_de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/_/des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i 
[\[9a.5\]]phyir/_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/_grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang /_ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang lan tshwa che ba 
[\[9a.6\]]ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te/_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tsha dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba med pa'i zas rnams sten cing /_do shal dang 
[\[9a.7\]]se mo dos lus rnam par bklubs te lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang /_khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang /_des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de btsas pa'i tshe khyim gang gi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur te de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams 
[\[9b.2\]]na re 'di btsas pa na khyim gang gi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dga' byed ces gdags so zhes zer nas de'i ming dga' byed ces btags so/_/de nas khye'u dga' byed pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 
[\[9b.3\]]'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du 
[\[9b.4\]]skyed cher drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes te lo lnga'am drug lon pa de'i tshe/_le lo can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig tu gyur te mal dang stan las kyang ldang mi 'dod do/_/de blo rno zhing gsal bas khyim gyi nang du 'dug bzhin du bstan bcos rnams bslabs so/_/de nas 
[\[9b.5\]]tshong dpon de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis lha mnyes par byas nas/_brgya lam na lan gcig na bu skyes pa de yang le lo can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig tu gyur te mal dang stan las kyang mi ldang na 'di ltar lus tha mal par gyur kyang grum po bzhin du lnga re 'dug pa 'di 'dra ba'i bu lta 
[\[9b.6\]]ci dgos snyam mo/_/tshong dpon de yang rdzogs byed la dga' ste/_des mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug rang gi khyim du bos nas/_gal te khye'u 'dis de dag mthong na rjes bskyed de mal nas ldang ba tsam yang byed srid dam snyam pa dang /_de nas khye'u le lo can gyis ston pa de dag 
[\[9b.7\]]mthong nas mig gis kyang ma bltas na ldang ba'am gus par smra ba'am stan bstabs pa lta ci smos/_de nas tshong dpon des gnas skabs de lta bu mthong nas ches rab tu gdung bar gyur te lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig 
[\[10a.2\]]dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 
[\[10a.3\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las 
[\[10a.4\]]yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[10a.5\]]par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten 
[\[10a.6\]]la gzigs te/_su ni rgud su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho 
[\[10a.7\]]ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa rnams las 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/
[\[10b.2\]]gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u le lo can gyis nga mthong na brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du sems yongs su 'gyur bar 'ong ngo snyam du 
[\[10b.3\]]gzigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa gcad pa dang /_khye'u'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/_de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so 
[\[10b.4\]]bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/_de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur nas/_su'i mthus bdag gi lus rab tu sim par byas snyam ste/_des phan tshun du bltas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 
[\[10b.5\]]tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te khyim de'i nang du gshegs nas khye'u le lo can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas 
[\[10b.6\]]lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' bar gyur te 'phral la rang nyid langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa 
[\[10b.7\]]legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad kyang smras so/_/de nas de'i pha ma dang nang mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba'i gus par sgrim pa mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de nas khye'u le lo can gyis dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]mig dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la le lo'i nyes pa dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon rnam pa du ma bka' stsal nas/_tsan dan gyi dbyug gu zhig kyang de la 
[\[11a.2\]]byin te khye'u dbyug gu 'di rdungs shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas des dbyug gu de brdungs pa dang /_sgra snyan pa thos par gyur la rin po che'i gter sna tshogs kyang mthong ngo /_/de nas de 'di snyam du sems de/_kye ma brtson 'grus rtsom pa la ni khyad par chen po de lta bu yod kyis/_
[\[11a.3\]]bdag gis phyir zhing brtson 'grus brtsam par bya gor ma chag snyam nas des mnyan du yod par dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/_bdag nyid kyis ded dpon bya bar bsgrags nas rgya mtsho chen po la lan drug rgal te gru'i don grub pas rin po che chen po bsdus te/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi 
[\[11a.4\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u le lo can gyi rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 
[\[11a.5\]]'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/
[\[11a.6\]]'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams 
[\[11a.7\]]dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 
[\[11b.2\]]sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams 
[\[11b.3\]]rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 
[\[11b.4\]]'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams 
[\[11b.5\]]dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che 
[\[11b.6\]]rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_/
[\[11b.7\]]nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed 
[\[12a.2\]]na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung 
[\[12a.3\]]ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung 
[\[12a.4\]]ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung 
[\[12a.5\]]ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[12a.6\]]de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/
[\[12a.7\]]mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po 
[\[12b.2\]]dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[12b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khye'u le lo can 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong 
[\[12b.4\]]ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo khye'u le lo can 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/_snying rje 
[\[12b.5\]]chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_
[\[12b.6\]]mthu rtsal dang shin tu ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[12b.7\]]pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_ded dpon zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur 
[\[13a.2\]]sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na 
[\[13a.3\]]bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[13a.4\]]mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon chen po zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du gru bub ste/_phyir 'ongs nas des lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du lha thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs na 'on kyang gru bub ste phyir 'ongs so/_/de nas de mi dga' ba chen po 
[\[13a.5\]]skyes nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis thabs gang gis nor bsdu bar bya ba'i thabs ci yod snyam mo/_/yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni lha thams cad las kyang ches khyad par du 'phags te/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs 
[\[13a.6\]]pa/_thugs rje can bdag nyid chen po chos la gus pa/_skye dgu la mnyes gshin pa yin gyis/_da ni bdag gis 'di la brten te yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs la gru'i don legs par grub ste phyir 'ongs nas/_nor phyed kyis 'di la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/_/des de ltar 
[\[13a.7\]]brtson 'grus byas te/_yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi mthus rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/_rin po che chen po bsdus te bde ba dang nye zho med par bdag gi khyim du phyin to/_/de ngal bso nas snod bzlugs na/_des rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas chags pa 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]chen po skyes te/_bdag gis rin po che 'di lta bu dag dge sbyong gau ta ma la phyed ji ltar sbyin snyam du sems pa la zhugs te ma la bdag gis 'di rnams bdag gi chung ma'i lag tu zho'i bzhi cha gcig tu btsongs la/_bcom ldan 'das la spos dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/
[\[13b.2\]]des zho'i bzhi cha gcig gis a ga ru'i spos nyos nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/de nas shin tu ngo tsha ba bzhin du sgo gang du 'dug nas a ga rus bdugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis bdug pa de steng gi nam mkha' la yang dag par 'phags te 
[\[13b.3\]]mnyan du yod pa thams cad khyab par gyur nas sprin chen po'i mgo ltar 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mdzad do/_/des lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/_bdag gi sems la brgyad bkag 
[\[13b.4\]]nas/_gang bdag gis rin po che'i sgo nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bslu ba 'di ni bdag gi cha ma yin no zhes byas so/_/de nas ded dpon des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos la spyan drangs so/_/de nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas 
[\[13b.5\]]nas rin po che chen po dag gis gtor to/_/de nas rin po che de dag 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_rin po che'i khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa rin 
[\[13b.6\]]po che'i rgyal mtshan can mgar ba'am mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed mi nus pa de lta bur gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas ded dpon des cho 'phrul de mthong nas ched kyis dga' ba skyes te/_sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[13b.7\]]phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma bsgral ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_las gcig nas 
[\[14a.2\]]gcig du brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas/_kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig 
[\[14a.3\]]ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams 
[\[14a.4\]]thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa 
[\[14a.5\]]de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom 
[\[14a.6\]]ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par 
[\[14a.7\]]rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun 
[\[14b.2\]]na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras 
[\[14b.3\]]bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[14b.4\]]gnyis kyang rjod par byed do/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor 
[\[14b.5\]]ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las 
[\[14b.6\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[14b.7\]]dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur 
[\[15a.2\]]ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i 
[\[15a.3\]]gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[15a.4\]]tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/
[\[15a.5\]]sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/
[\[15a.6\]]thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsum mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni 
[\[15a.7\]]khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]kun dga' bo ded dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo ded dpon 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag 
[\[15b.2\]]par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/_snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang 
[\[15b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom 
[\[15b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//zla ba zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha 
[\[15b.5\]]rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[15b.6\]]dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_
[\[15b.7\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas mnyan du yod pa na tha ga pa zla ba zhes bya ba dbul zhing mchog tu dbul ba zhig gnas so/_/de yang las ji tsam zhig byed pa de tsam nyi 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]tshe'i zan rnyed par zad de/_des cung zad kyang gzhag tu med do/_/de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bsod nams ma byas par 'dir 'ongs la/_'dir yang dge ba mi byed pas 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu yang bsod nams 
[\[16a.2\]]kyang ma byas/_dge ba yang ma byas/_'jigs shing skrag pa'i mgon skyabs kyang ma byas par 'gro dgos srid kyis/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la sna 'ga' zhig gis mchod pa bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas des khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi ras btags nas/_des 
[\[16a.3\]]de las ras kyi tshar tshar khyer te srang du zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis 
[\[16a.4\]]legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dga' 
[\[16a.5\]]bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir nyid kyi chos gos ral bar bstan to/_/de nas des ras kyi tshar tshar de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i mod la chos gos drubs par bstan to/_/de nas de rgya cher 
[\[16a.6\]]dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_sbyin pa chung la zhing ni rgya che ste/_/mthu chen khyod nyid thugs su chud par bas/_/sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/_/bdag ni rgya cher grags pa'i sangs rgyas shog_/sbyin pa 'di ni chung ngu 
[\[16a.7\]]lags kyis kyang /_/bdag gi sems ni rab yangs dpag yas te/_/mi dang lha mchog rgyal bas bzhes nas ni/_/sbyin pa chung yang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod ni phyi mar zhi ba mthu che ba/_/rgya chen grags pa mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]rang byung 'jig rten phan pa snying brtser ldan/_/tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tha ga pa zla ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[16b.2\]]ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag byung nas/_kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba 
[\[16b.3\]]yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_
[\[16b.4\]]pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par 
[\[16b.5\]]rnams ni rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems 
[\[16b.6\]]te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_
[\[16b.7\]]sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 
[\[17a.2\]]'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_
[\[17a.3\]]shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 
[\[17a.4\]]sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/
[\[17a.5\]]de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[17a.6\]]las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung 
[\[17a.7\]]ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed 
[\[17b.2\]]na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i 
[\[17b.3\]]gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis 
[\[17b.4\]]pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo 
[\[17b.5\]]yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas 
[\[17b.6\]]rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[17b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo tha ga pa zla ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo tha ga pa zla ba 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/_snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[18a.2\]]bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshar tshar bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 
[\[18a.3\]]'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//che ba zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_
[\[18a.4\]]phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis 
[\[18a.5\]]bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' 
[\[18a.6\]]dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na 
[\[18a.7\]]tshong dpon gyi bu che ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas so/_/de yang khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa shas che ba zhig ste/_rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug la mchod pa byed do/_/de phyis nad tshabs chen po zhig gis thebs te de sman pa dang /_sman dang /_nad g.yog med de shi la thug nas 'di snyam 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]du sems te/_da ni bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i skyabs byed pa'am srog phangs pa sbyin par byed pa sangs rgyas ma yin pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo/_/de nas de ltar bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[18b.2\]]rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_bsrung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_
[\[18b.3\]]zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil 
[\[18b.4\]]shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug 
[\[18b.5\]]dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan 
[\[18b.6\]]pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 
[\[18b.7\]]'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 
[\[19a.2\]]bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs 
[\[19a.3\]]rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu che ba'i gnas skabs de gzigs nas/_'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/_de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so/_/bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms 
[\[19a.4\]]pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/_de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i sgo gang du gshegs nas sgo srungs kyi mis bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs so zhes de la sbran to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu che ba dga' bar 
[\[19a.5\]]gyur te/_dbugs mi phyin pa dbugs phyin par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs nas gdan 
[\[19a.6\]]bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba la bka' stsal pa/_che ba khyod la gnod pa ci zhig yod/_che bas gsol pa/_bdag la lus kyi gnod pa dang /_sems kyi gnod pa mchis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la sems can thams 
[\[19a.7\]]cad la byams pa'i sems kyis gdams ngag bstan te/_'di ni khyod kyi sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po yin no zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/_kye ma lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sman shi ri ka khyer te 'ongs na legs so snyam 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]du dgongs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sman shi ri ka blangs te bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyid kyi phyag tu bzhes nas che ba la byin te/_'di ni khyod kyi lus kyi 
[\[19b.2\]]sdug bsngal tsha ba zhi bar byed pa yin no zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas des lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba thob nas/_bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/_/sems dga' bar gyur nas rgyal po gsal rgyal la bsnyad de/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[19b.3\]]dang bcas pa bshos gsol nas/_'bum ri ba'i na bza' phul te/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so/_/de nas sems la rtas par byas te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su 
[\[19b.4\]]gtong ba 'dis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal pos bdag gsos pa bzhin du/_bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par/_sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs 
[\[19b.5\]]ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum 
[\[19b.6\]]pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin 
[\[19b.7\]]pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 
[\[20a.2\]]'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das sprul 
[\[20a.3\]]pa 'gyed pa mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur 
[\[20a.4\]]to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang 
[\[20a.5\]]yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs 
[\[20a.6\]]pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi 
[\[20a.7\]]gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur 
[\[20b.2\]]zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang 
[\[20b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 
[\[20b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi 
[\[20b.5\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[20b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan 
[\[20b.7\]]gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gis dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub 
[\[21a.2\]]rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po 
[\[21a.3\]]dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 
[\[21a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi bu che ba 'dis nga la 'di lta 
[\[21a.5\]]bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi bu che ba 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag 
[\[21a.6\]]par bsgrubs te/_snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya 
[\[21a.7\]]thub pa zhes bya bar gyur te/_'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]la mngon par bstod do//_//pad ma zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_
[\[21b.2\]]klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[21b.3\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos 
[\[21b.4\]]kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i snga rol na ni/_rgyal po gsal rgyal lha gzhan dag la ni dus gsum du me tog dang /_bdug 
[\[21b.5\]]pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa rnams kyis rjed par byed do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas ni/_gzhon nu lta bu'i mdo'i dpes rgyal po gsal rgyal btul nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/_de'i tshe dga' ba dang yid bde ba 
[\[21b.6\]]skyes nas dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro zhing /_mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byed do/_/de nas re zhig na kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma zhig gis/_me tog pad ma gsar du byung ba zhig khyer te/_
[\[21b.7\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thad du mnyan du yod par song ba dang /_mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen zhig gis mthong nas/_kye mi pha gi pad ma 'o ni 'tshong ngam zhes dris so/_/de na re 'tshong ngo zhes zer ro/_/de nyo 'dod pa las re shig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin der phyin te/_des de las 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]rin nyis sgyur du bskyed nas/_de gnyis phan tshun ltod de 'bum gyur gyi bar du bskyed do/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma 'di snyam du sems te/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni rgod bag can ma yin te/_sems can brtan po yin pas na 'di la ni don zhig yod 
[\[22a.2\]]gor ma chag snyam nas de the tsom skyes te/_mu stegs can la dga' ba'i mi de la dris pa/_khyod kyis su'i don du 'di ltar skyed par byed/_des smras pa/_nga ni bcom ldan 'das sred med kyi bu'i phyir skyed par byed do/_/mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_nga ni bcom ldan 'das
