[\[22a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi don du skyed par byed do/_/kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas smras pa/_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su yin/_de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgyas par bshad do/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas/_mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/_
[\[22a.4\]]khyim bdag nga nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma de khrid de/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/_kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des/_bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum 
[\[22a.5\]]cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des pad 
[\[22a.6\]]ma de bcom ldan 'das la bor ro/_/de nas bor ma thag tu pad ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na 'dug go/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des cho 'phrul de mthong nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal 
[\[22a.7\]]nas thal mo sbyar te/_sems la rtas par byas nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par/_sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang ma grol ba 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig 
[\[22b.2\]]tu brgyud pa dang /_las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas/_
[\[22b.3\]]kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu 
[\[22b.4\]]bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can 
[\[22b.5\]]dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad 
[\[22b.6\]]pa bskyed pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi 
[\[22b.7\]]gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_
[\[23a.2\]]tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams 
[\[23a.3\]]dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su 
[\[23a.4\]]bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/
[\[23a.5\]]skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[23a.6\]]'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 
[\[23a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan 
[\[23b.2\]]thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi 
[\[23b.3\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna 
[\[23b.4\]]tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag ni dam pa'i 
[\[23b.5\]]rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog 
[\[23b.6\]]brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/
[\[23b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma 'dis 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang 
[\[24a.2\]]dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/_snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen 
[\[24a.3\]]po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[24a.4\]]dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//pany+tsa la zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_
[\[24a.5\]]tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa 
[\[24a.6\]]byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan 
[\[24a.7\]]dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe byang phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po lho phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po dang mi 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]'thun par gyur to/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal 
[\[24b.2\]]rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa/_sems can phongs pa rnams la yongs su skyob pa/_phan tshun 'khon pa rnams kyi 'khon byang bar mdzad pa lags na/_byang phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po 'di lho phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal 
[\[24b.3\]]po dang mi 'thun te/_de gnyis phan tshun du skye bo mang po kha 'dog par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gnyis yun ring po nas 'khon byung ba zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas 
[\[24b.4\]]gnang ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i phyi de nyin gyi snga dro sham 
[\[24b.5\]]thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/_bA rA Na sI phyogs kyi ka shi rnams kyi grong rdal ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang bA rA Na sIr byon nas/_bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas re shig na de 
[\[24b.6\]]gnyis kyis/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi yul du gshegs par rig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa sprul nas/_byang phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po skrag cing bred nas des shing rta cig la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[24b.7\]]kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khon 'byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan to/_/des chos de thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/lho phyogs 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal pos kyang /_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du spyan drangs te/_zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas 'bum ri ba'i na bza' yang phul te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 
[\[25a.2\]]dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[25a.3\]]ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lho phyogs kyi pany+tsa la'i rgyal po de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni 
[\[25a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems 
[\[25a.5\]]can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar 
[\[25a.6\]]gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi 
[\[25a.7\]]gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa de 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la 
[\[25b.2\]]sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[25b.3\]]ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od 
[\[25b.4\]]chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya 
[\[25b.5\]]nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung bar brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan 
[\[25b.6\]]la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de 
[\[25b.7\]]nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[26a.2\]]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor 
[\[26a.3\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang 
[\[26a.4\]]chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor 
[\[26a.5\]]ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams 
[\[26a.6\]]kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad 
[\[26a.7\]]ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/
[\[26b.2\]]de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo pany+tsa la'i rgyal po 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/
[\[26b.3\]]kun dga' bo pany+tsa la'i rgyal po 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/_snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[26b.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar gyur te/_'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin 
[\[26b.5\]]par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa 
[\[26b.6\]]brgya pa/_bam po gsum pa/_bdug pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[26b.7\]]rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[27a.2\]]mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon gnyis phan tshun mi 'thun par gyur te/_de gnyis la gcig ni rdzogs byed la dad/_gcig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad 
[\[27a.3\]]do/_/de nas de gnyis phan tshun gtam du bya ba nges par byed de rdzogs byed kyi dge bsnyen na re/_sangs rgyas pas ches rdzogs byed khyad par du 'phags so zhes zer ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen na re bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ches khyad par du 'phags so 
[\[27a.4\]]zhes zer ro/_/de nas de gnyis kyis bdog pa thams cad yal bar bya ba'i skugs kyi gta' bzhag go/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas blon po rnams la de gnyis kyi sbyongs shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas blon po de dag gis yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te da ste 
[\[27a.5\]]zhag bdun na sangs rgyas dang mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen gnyis kyi sbyang bar chad kyis/_su rmad du byung ba lta 'dod pa de dag sheg shig ces byas so/_/de nas zhag bdun lon pa na sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu mi 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa dang /_nam mkha' la lha 'bum phrag du 
[\[27a.6\]]ma 'dus pa'i nang du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/_spos dang me tog phreng thams cad bsdogs pa la/_thog ma kho nar mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen gyis bden pas gsol ba gdab pa byas te/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug mchog 
[\[27a.7\]]yin pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des na me tog 'di dag dang bdug pa 'di dang chu 'di de rnams kyi thad du song shig ces byas so/_/de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la me tog de dag ni sa la lhags so/_/me ni shi'o/_/chu ni sa la thim zhing yongs su zad de yongs su gtugs par gyur 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]to/_/de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis ca co dang ga zha bton te/_skad po che phyung ngo /_/de nas mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen gyis de mthong nas cang mi zer bar 'dug la/_spa gong zhing phrag pa bcums te mig phab nas spobs pa med par gyur te sems khong du chud la 
[\[27b.2\]]lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas 'khums shing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma dga' ches nas dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i mig dang ldan pas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bden pas gsol ba gdab pa bya ste/_
[\[27b.3\]]bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des na/_me tog 'di dag dang bdug pa 'di dang chu 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song shig ces byas so/_/de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la me tog 
[\[27b.4\]]de dag ni ngang pa rgyus pa bzhin du/_nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su kha ltas te song ngo /_/bdug pa ni sprin gyi mgo lta bur gyur to/_/chu ni bai dUr+ya'i sdong bu lta bur gyur to/_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag gis cho 'phrul de mthong nas/_ca 
[\[27b.5\]]co dang ga zha bton te skad chen po phyung nas de dag song ba'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs te dong ngo /_/de nas me tog de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na 'dug go/_/bdug pa dang chu ni spyan snga na 'dug go/_/de nas skye bo phal po che de dag dga' bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[27b.6\]]nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la mdo 'di bka' stsal to/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang /_chos mchog tu gdags pa dang /_dge 
[\[27b.7\]]'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams sems can rkang med rnams sam/_rkang gnyis rnams sam/_rkang bzhi rnams sam/_rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]rnams sam/_gzugs can rnams sam/_gzugs can ma 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]yin pa rnams sam/_'du shes can rnams sam/_'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/_'du shes yod pa yang ma yin 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[28a.2\]]rgyas mchog yin par bstan to/_/sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/_mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa 
[\[28a.3\]]rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang 
[\[28a.4\]]na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to/_/chos la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa yang /_lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/_mi rnams 
[\[28a.5\]]kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/_'dus pa'am/_tshogs sam/_mang po'am/_'khor gang yang rung ste/_
[\[28a.6\]]de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par rig par bstan to/_/dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang /_lha rnams kyi 
[\[28a.7\]]nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/_mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/_bram ze dang khyim bdag 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la dad pa rnyed do/_/kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas phol mig lnga dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig ste/_
[\[28b.2\]]'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang lhung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du rtsad chod nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen des kyang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed do/_/de 
[\[28b.3\]]nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems la skyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba 
[\[28b.4\]]dang /_ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can gyi dge 
[\[28b.5\]]bsnyen de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po 
[\[28b.6\]]dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_
[\[28b.7\]]mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te 
[\[29a.2\]]gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung 
[\[29a.3\]]ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa 
[\[29a.4\]]rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul 
[\[29a.5\]]dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_
[\[29a.6\]]sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa 
[\[29a.7\]]dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 
[\[29b.2\]]'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par 
[\[29b.3\]]bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed 
[\[29b.4\]]na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[29b.5\]]lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[29b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal 
[\[29b.7\]]mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/
[\[30a.2\]]dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi 
[\[30a.3\]]ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[30a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed 
[\[30a.5\]]pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub tu yang dag par bsgrubs te snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs 
[\[30a.6\]]pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi g.yo ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/
[\[30a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//rgyal po zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla 
[\[30b.2\]]mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal 
[\[30b.3\]]zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[30b.4\]]gsal rgyal dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgra gnyis phan tshun mi 'thun par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/_ko sa la'i 
[\[30b.5\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgras dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/_glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/_
[\[30b.6\]]bdag dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs 
[\[30b.7\]]so/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs thams cad phrogs te/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal pham zhing skrag la rdugs te/_rab tu pham zhing rgyab kyis 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]phyogs par gyur nas shing rta gcig pus mnyan du yod par song ste/_lan gsum gyi bar du yang de ltar gyur to/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/
[\[31a.2\]]de nas mnyan du yod pa de na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ji lhar pham zhing skrag la rdugs te rab tu pham zhing rgyab 
[\[31a.3\]]kyis phyogs par gyur nas/_shing rta gcig pus mnyan du yod par song ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po gsal rgyal la/_rgyal bar gyur cig sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod nas smras pa/_lha ci'i slad 
[\[31a.4\]]du thugs ngan mdzad/_lha bdag gis ji tsam gyis na da dung yang lha ji ltar dgyes mgur mdzad par 'gyur ba de tsam gyi gser lha la 'bul bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/_/des de la gser gyi phung po chen po spungs te/_der mi 'dug pas kyang mi 'greng ba mi mthong la/_
[\[31a.5\]]'greng bas kyang 'dug pa mi mthong ba zhig phul lo/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag nyid kyi yul du rtog chen gyi mi kun du bkye ste mi de dag ci zer ba nyon cig ces byas so/_/re zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na/_rgan po gnyis shig phan tshun gtam 
[\[31a.6\]]zer te pad ma'i ze ba zhes bya ba'i g.yul gyi dgra thabs yod de de la mi sdar ma gang yin pa de dag ni g.yul gyi gdod zan du gtong ngo /_/'bring gang yin pa de dag ni bar du gzhog_/mi mchog tu dpa' ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyab tu gzhog go zhes zer ro/_/de nas de dag gis 
[\[31a.7\]]rgyal po la bsnyad de ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/_de bzhin du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/_lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]skyes dgra'i glang po che'i tshogs thams cad kyang phrogs so/_/rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs kyang phrogs so/_/lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang pham zhing skrag la rdugs te rab tu pham zhing rgyab kyis bltas par gyur 
[\[31b.2\]]nas gson por bzung ste/_shing rta gcig la bskyon nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[31b.3\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di ni yun ring po nas bdag gi 'khon zla ma lags par 'khon du 'dzin pa dang /_dgra zla ma lags par dgra bgyid pa lags mod kyi/_'di ni bdag gi grogs po'i bu lags pa'i slad du/_bdag ni 'di 'gum par mi 'tshal te 
[\[31b.4\]]'di gtang bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rgyal po chen po thong shig ces bka' stsal nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_rgyal bar gyur na 'khon pa mang /_/pham par gyur na sdug bsngal gnas/_/rgyal dang pham pa spangs na 
[\[31b.5\]]ni/_/nye bar zhi ste bde bar gnas/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rgyal srid phyir thob pa 'di ni/_tshong dpon 'di'i drin yin gyis bdag gis 'di la ci 'dod pa'i bya dga' sbyin pa'i skabs dbye'o snyam mo/_/de nas ko sa la'i 
[\[31b.6\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshong dpon de la ci 'dod pa'i bya dga' sbyin pa'i skabs phye na/_de na re bdag ci dga' ba'i bya dga' 'tshal gyis bdag zhag bdun gyi bar du ci dga' mgur bgyid pa'i rgyal srid stsol cig ces byas so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag 
[\[31b.7\]]gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/_nga'i rgyal srid zhag bdun gyi bar du tshong dpon la byin no zhes bsgo'o/_/re zhig na tshong dpon des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa zhag bdun gyi bar du gdugs tshod 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]la spyan drangs so/_/yul ka shi dang ko sa la na skye bo'i tshogs ji snyed 'khod pa de dag la yang pho nya btang ste/_zhag bdun gyi bar du khyed khral thud med par ci dga' mgur 'khod cing bde ba la reg par gnas par gyis shig_/'dir yang shog la 
[\[32a.2\]]sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song shig_/nga'i ston mo yang 'tshol la de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur gyis shig ces byas nas/_des zhag bdun gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas so/_/
[\[32a.3\]]mi 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bde ba la btsud do/_/zhag bdun lon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_sems la rtas par byas nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 
[\[32a.4\]]'dis/_bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs 
[\[32a.5\]]su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi 
[\[32a.6\]]tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_
[\[32a.7\]]thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad 
[\[32b.2\]]par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 
[\[32b.3\]]'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/_gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems 
[\[32b.4\]]mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams 
[\[32b.5\]]dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od 
[\[32b.6\]]chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams 
[\[32b.7\]]dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug 
[\[33a.2\]]bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 
[\[33a.3\]]'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni 
[\[33a.4\]]zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag 
[\[33a.5\]]g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang 
[\[33a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[33a.7\]]'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma 
[\[33b.2\]]mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes 
[\[33b.3\]]pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[33b.4\]]bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la 'di lta bu'i 
[\[33b.5\]]bkur sti byas pa dang skye bo phal po che dge ba la btsud pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya 
[\[33b.6\]]ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/_snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par 
[\[33b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_/dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/_sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_mnyan pa dang ni ka ba khrus/_/yams kyi nad dang cho 'phrul 
[\[34a.2\]]dang /_/lo lnga pa dang bstod mchog sbyin/_/ka shi ka dang lha yi zas/_/mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded 
[\[34a.3\]]dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu 
[\[34a.4\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos 
[\[34a.5\]]dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na chu klung khang ldan gyi 'jug ngogs mnyan pa'i grong na bzhugs so/_/de nas mnyan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[34a.6\]]phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas mnyan pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/chos kyi 
[\[34a.7\]]gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas mnyan pa de dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/_chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du bdag cag gi der sang gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_
[\[34b.2\]]gru zam las kyang bsgral bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mnyan pa rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas mnyan pa de dag gis chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par byas te rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni 
[\[34b.3\]]bsgreng /_me tog sna tshogs ni gtor/_spos kyi snod dag gi nang nas ni bdug pa gsol/_zhal zas bzang po ni bshams/_me tog mang po ni sta gon byas so/_/gru zam gyi steng yang me tog gi khang pa dag gis brgyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs 
[\[34b.4\]]tshod bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[34b.5\]]gyis mdun du bdar nas/_mnyan pa'i grong ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas mnyan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig 
[\[34b.6\]]nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol 
[\[34b.7\]]zin te bstsang sder ni gyu/_phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba dag khyer te chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos pas mnyan pa du mas ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis 
[\[35a.2\]]ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha 
[\[35a.3\]]cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'khor de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/_/de nas mnyan pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dge 
[\[35a.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas gru zam las bsgral to/_/dge slong dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa mthong bas sems dga' bar gyur te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gang 
[\[35a.5\]]du mdzad pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags te/_
[\[35a.6\]]des na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/_/dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das nyan par 'tshal lags so/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[35a.7\]]rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shing rta skal ldan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de dgra bcom pa drug khri 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]nyis stong gis zhabs 'bring byas te/_ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang gA'i 'gram du byon nas/_de'i tshe ded dpon zhig 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang gang gA'i klung las 'gron po dag sgrol zhing 'dug go/_/phyogs de na chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa chen po yang yod do/_/de nas 
[\[35b.2\]]ded dpon gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zham ring byas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sems dga' bar gyur te/_sems dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bdag gis thog ma kho nar bcom 
[\[35b.3\]]ldan 'das bsgral bar 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan gyis kyang ded dpon la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ded dpon des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zham ring byas 
[\[35b.4\]]pa 'byor pa chen po dang ldan pas gru zam las bsgral te zhal zas bzang pos kyang tshim par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i 
[\[35b.5\]]dus na/_ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zhabs 'bring byas pa/_gru zam las bsgral ba dang /_zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas pa dang /_smon lam btab pa'i 
[\[35b.6\]]las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po mtha' yas pa nyams su myong la/_da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang /_'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_
[\[35b.7\]]ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas/_brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//ka ba zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho 
[\[36a.2\]]brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla 
[\[36a.3\]]mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' 
[\[36a.4\]]dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ku ru'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las ku ru'i grong khyer du byon te/_ku ru'i skye bo'i tshogs de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar 'gyur bar 
[\[36a.5\]]sems rgya chen po dang ldan pa/_sbyin pa la sred pa sha stag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ngas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dgug go/_/'on kyang de mthong bas 'di rnams kyi dge ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[36a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/_kye ma lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i tshogs kyis g.yog byas pas/_tsan dan sa mchog pa'i ka ba khyer te/_'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs nas/_dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i tshogs kyis g.yog 
[\[36a.7\]]byas pa/_gang na las thams cad pa dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_grul bum du mas g.yog byas pa dag lhags te tsan dan sa mchog pa'i ka ba khyer te 'ongs nas/_ha ha zhes ca co dang ga zha bton te skad chen po phyung nas/_bcom 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]ldan 'das kyi phyir tsan dan sa mchog pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]legs par byas so/_/de nas khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]der lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/_lha'i zhal zas dang /_lha'i gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_lha'i spos dang /_me 
[\[36b.2\]]tog phreng ba dag gis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas so/_/de nas ku ru'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis lha'i 'byor pa de dag mthong ba dang /_mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la dbang po dang bcas 
[\[36b.3\]]pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa las na/_'jig rten na mchog yin pa lta snyam ste/_sems 'dun par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_ku ru'i 
[\[36b.4\]]skye bo'i tshogs rnams khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de la shin tu dga' ba skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de mi snang bar mdzad nas/_mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas ku ru'i mi rnams 
[\[36b.5\]]las kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/
[\[36b.6\]]kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'khor de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_
[\[36b.7\]]chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/_/dge slong rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa mthong bas sems dga' bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gang du mdzad lags/_bcom 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags te/_des na de bzhin 
[\[37a.2\]]gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/_/dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/_bcom ldan 'das nyan par 'tshal lags so/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan 
[\[37a.3\]]pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa dgra bcom pa drug 
[\[37a.4\]]khri nyis stong gis zhabs 'bring byas te/_ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon nas/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zhabs 'bring byas pa 
[\[37a.5\]]ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/_bdag gi yul du byon to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[37a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par 
[\[37a.7\]]btsud do/_/de nas rgyal po de dga' bar gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis na bza' dang 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zla ba gsum gyi bar du bzhugs par ci gnang /_de nas 
[\[37b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pas rgyal po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir tsan dan sa mchog pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byed du bcug go/_/des de la na bza' dang rgyan rnam pa sna 
[\[37b.3\]]tshogs kyis brgyan nas/_me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/_pog phor dag gis ni bdugs te/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas te/_na bza'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs phul nas/_
[\[37b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas yang dag par 
[\[37b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na/_ngas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po mtha' yas pa nyams su myong la da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa na yang 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/_/
[\[37b.6\]]dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par 
[\[37b.7\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_khrus zhes bya ba ni/_sangs 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha 
[\[38a.2\]]ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci 
[\[38a.3\]]dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 
[\[38a.4\]]bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong pa lnga brgya tsam dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las de dag lam stor nas/_bye ltongs shig tu phyin te/_de dag 
[\[38a.5\]]lam gyi ngal bas dkos thag cing rgyags zad la/_nyi ma'i gung la nyi tshan gyis gdungs nas/_nya skam la bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog ste sdug bsngal drag pa dang /_mi bzad pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bas/_gu lang dang /_chu lha dang /_ku 
[\[38a.6\]]be ra dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa lha stong snyed la so sor gsol ba 'debs kyang de las skyob par nus pa med do/_/de'i nang na dge bsnyen sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyus shes pa zhig yod de/_des tshong pa de dag la smras pa/_khyed sangs rgyas la skyabs su song shig_/de nas 
[\[38a.7\]]thams cad kyis skad sdoms te skyabs su song ngo /_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul 
[\[38b.2\]]ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po 
[\[38b.3\]]sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam 
[\[38b.4\]]yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun du rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus 
[\[38b.5\]]gsum mtshan dus gsum du/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_
[\[38b.6\]]su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug 
[\[38b.7\]]la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas re zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa mang po phongs shing nyam nga bar gyur pa gzigs 
[\[39a.2\]]so/_/de nas mig gis cer zhes ltas pa tsam gyi yun gyis dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_phyogs der gshegs so/_/tshong pa de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas 
[\[39a.3\]]pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skad po che phyung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang chen gyi char phab la/_ser bu bsil ba yang btang na legs so snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[39a.4\]]'das kyis dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la/_brgya byin gyis dbang chen gyi char yang phab/_ser bu'i bsil ba yang btang ste des na tshong pa de dag mi skom par gyur la/_tsha bas gdungs pa yang zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong pa de dag sems rtas nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[39a.5\]]'das kyis de dag la lam yang bstan te/_des na mnyan du yod par phyin to/_/de nas de dag ngal bas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to/_/de thos nas kha cig gis 
[\[39a.6\]]ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis 
[\[39a.7\]]ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'khor de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]'bab pa dang dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/_/de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshong pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dgon pa'i shul nas bskyabs pa dang /_dgongs 
[\[39b.2\]]pa bskyed pa'i mod la dbang chen gyi char phab ste/_ser bu bsil ba yang langs pa ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' 
[\[39b.3\]]rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams 
[\[39b.4\]]la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 
[\[39b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[39b.6\]]sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tsan dan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[39b.7\]]sangs rgyas tsan dan ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par btsud do/_/de nas 
[\[40a.2\]]rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_yang dag par 
[\[40a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zla ba gsum gyi bar du bzhugs par ci gnang /_de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis rgyal po de la 
[\[40a.4\]]cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de'i tshe than chen byung nas des chu klung dang khron pa rnams chu chung bar gyur la/_shing rnams kyang me tog dang 'bras bu med par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan la gsol ba btab ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[40a.5\]]'das grong khyer 'di'i nang du rdzing spos chab kyis bltams pa bgyid du stsol bar 'tshal na/_der bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus mdzad par gsol/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus mdzad na/_bdag gi yul 'dir dgung char dbab tu glo ba 
[\[40a.6\]]re lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis/_rgyal po de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des/_blon po rnams la khyed kyis spos chab dang rin po che'i 
[\[40a.7\]]bum pa dag sta gon gyis shig dang /_de dag gis ngas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas rgyal po des blon po'i 'khor dang bcas pas grong khyer de rdo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo med par byas te/_rgyal mtshan 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]dang ba dan ni bsgreng /_/me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/_/spos chab kyis ni chag chag btab/_/bdug pa sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs/_/dbus su ni rdzing byed du bcug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis sems can la phan 
[\[40b.2\]]gdags pa'i phyir khrus ras gsol te/_rdzing bu'i nang du bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po blon po 'khor dang bcas pas/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chus khrus gsol 
[\[40b.3\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan khrus mdzad pa'i mod la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gang gis lo tog thams cad rgyal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char phab bo/_/gzhi de las skye bo phal po che yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[40b.4\]]la dad pa rnyed nas/_spos kyis byugs pa'i mchod rten du ma brtsigs te zhal bsros so/_/der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan la skyabs su song ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de dag gi nang nas nga 'ba' zhig lus so/_/dge 
[\[40b.5\]]slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bsnyen bkur byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas/_brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar 
[\[40b.6\]]bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//yams kyi nad ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po 
[\[40b.7\]]chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[41a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 
[\[41a.3\]]na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul 'dam bu tshal gyi skye bo mang po la mi nad byung ste/_der skye bo phal po che de dag nad kyis dkos thag nas/_gu lang dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa lha stong snyed la/_so sor gsol ba 'debs kyang yams 
[\[41a.4\]]kyi nad de zhi bar ma gyur to/_/de nas yul 'dam bu tshal na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des/_'dam bu'i tshal gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed tshur sheg sangs rgyas la skyabs su song la/_bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs par gsol te/_
[\[41a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas tshegs chung ngus yams kyi nad zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes kyang gsol ba thob shig_/de nas 'dam bu'i tshal gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs la/_phongs 
[\[41a.6\]]shing nyam thag pa 'di las thar bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen 
[\[41a.7\]]po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i 
[\[41b.2\]]sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_
[\[41b.3\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus 
[\[41b.4\]]gsum mtshan dus gsum du/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni 
[\[41b.5\]]ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor 
[\[41b.6\]]bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 
[\[41b.7\]]'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]bsnams nas/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_'dam bu'i tshal du gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer gyi mi de dag thams cad la byams pas 
[\[42a.2\]]khyab par mdzad de/_des na mi ma yin pa rnams dong ste/_yams kyi nad zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bas dga' ba chen po skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la 
[\[42a.3\]]na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams las ci bzhed pa'i skabs phye'o/_/de nas de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas 
[\[42a.4\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag du mas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom 
[\[42a.5\]]pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/grong khyer gyi mi de dag 
[\[42a.6\]]thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sems can 'di dag 'di ltar bcom 
[\[42a.7\]]ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes pas/_phongs pa las thar bar gyur pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing /_bsags pas na nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par 
[\[42b.2\]]mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can 
[\[42b.3\]]dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
