[\[42b.4\]]dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zla ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[42b.5\]]zla ba ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon nas/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba bdag gi yul du byon to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po 
[\[42b.6\]]dang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_
[\[42b.7\]]rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla bas byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par btsud do/_/de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de dga' bar gyur nas stan las langs te/_bla 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[43a.2\]]ldan 'das la bdag gis na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'dir 
[\[43a.3\]]bzhugs par ci gnang /_de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla bas rgyal po de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i grong khyer de na skye bo mang po la mi nad byung ste/_des skye bo phal po che de dag la shin tu gnod par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po des nad 
[\[43a.4\]]zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba la gsol ba btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das yams kyi nad 'di zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabs mdzad par ci gnang zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla bas rgyal 
[\[43a.5\]]po de la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po song la nga'i chos gos snam sbyar 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la thogs la/_bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas/_bdag gi yul skor du chug shig_/'di la dga' ston chen po yang gyis shig_/skye bo phal po che thams cad kyang sangs 
[\[43a.6\]]rgyas rjes su dran pa yang dag par 'dzin du chug shig dang /_des na khyed bde legs su 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal pos kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du thams cad de kho na bzhin du byas nas de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas skye bo'i 
[\[43a.7\]]tshogs de dag dga' bar gyur te/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba de la mchod pa chen po byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na/_ngas 'khor ba na lha dang mir skye ba 'thob par 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong la/_da ltar yang nga de'i rgyu las 
[\[43b.2\]]byung ba'i 'byor pa dang ldan par gyur te/_des na ngas ci bsams pa dang /_ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin du grub par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod 
[\[43b.3\]]pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[43b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//cho 'phrul zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams 
[\[43b.5\]]dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa 
[\[43b.6\]]byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_
[\[43b.7\]]gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe lhas byin gyis gcugs byas te/_rgyal po ma 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]skyes dgras pha chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po bsad nas/_rang nyid rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe/_su ma dad pa de dag ni mthu dang ldan par gyur to/_/dad pa can rnams ni mthu chung bar gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na blon po rgan po ma dad pa/_bcom 
[\[44a.2\]]ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sdang ba zhig yod pa des bram ze rnams la mchod sbyin byas te/_der bram ze 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas/_de dag gis su yang dge sbyong gau ta ma la bltar mi 'gro bar nang khrims bcas so/_/de nas bram ze rnams kyis khrims bcas te/_
[\[44a.3\]]'dus shing 'thun la/_kun tu dga' nas srang gi dbus su rig byed las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du/_brgya byin la gsol ba btab ste/_rus pa med ma'i skyes bu gshegs su gsol/_gshegs su gsol zhes byas so/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[44a.4\]]ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa srung ba gcig dang ldan pa/_
[\[44a.5\]]gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[44a.6\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro 
[\[44a.7\]]ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du 
[\[44b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni 
[\[44b.3\]]ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 
[\[44b.4\]]gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu 
[\[44b.5\]]srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa las/_thar pa'i skal ba can du gyur pa/_btsal 
[\[44b.6\]]bar bya ba rnyed pa/_mya ngan 'das pa la nang du bltas pa/_'khor ba las phyi rol tu bltas pa/_de dag gzigs nas da ltar mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pas/_nga'i bstan pa la sdang bar gyur te/_ngas 'di dag gdul ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o snyam du dgongs 
[\[44b.7\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin gyi cha lugs su sprul te/_mchod sbyin gyi 'dun khang de lha'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzad de/_der gshegs so/_/de nas bram ze de dag dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs nas dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur te/_skad bsdams 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]nas smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin gyi cha lugs su bzhugs pa gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[45a.2\]]po'i khab kyi grong khyer kun tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin mchod sbyin la gshegs so zhes de skad kyi sgra yang grags par gyur te/_de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze rnams dad par gyur pa mkhyen nas/_brgya byin gyi cha 
[\[45a.3\]]lugs mi snang bar mdzad de/_sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs su zhugs nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas bram ze drug khri nyis stong gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun 
[\[45a.4\]]du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/srog chags 'bum phrag du mas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed do/_/de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bram ze 'di rnams 
[\[45a.5\]]'di ltar bcom ldan 'das dang mjal nas/_bden pa mthong bar gyur pa dang /_srog chags 'bum phrag du mas dga' ba chen po thob par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs 
[\[45a.6\]]gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags pas na/_ngas las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las 
[\[45a.7\]]byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_de 
[\[45b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang 
[\[45b.3\]]po 'dul zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon to/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de yang mu stegs can gyi dbang du gyur to/_/de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang 
[\[45b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul bdag gi yul du gshegs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul ga la ba der song ste 
[\[45b.5\]]phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[45b.6\]]rgyas dbang po 'dul gyis byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la btsud do/_/de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[45b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]gsos dang /_sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'dir bzhugs par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[46a.2\]]khyod kyi yul na dge slong glo bur du 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dag gi gnas su rung ba'i gtsug lag khang 'ga' lta yod dam/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das da ltar ma mchis kyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das bzhes su gsol dang /_bdag gis dge slong 
[\[46a.3\]]glo bur du 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dag gi gnas su rung ba'i gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste/_ra ba dang rta babs dang skar khung dang sgo gang ni bcas/_keg 
[\[46a.4\]]tse dang zla ba tshes pa dang lan kan gyis ni brgyan/_gding ba dang ni ldan/_rdzing bus ni kun tu gang /_shing ljon pa me tog dang /_'bras bu dang ldan pa mang pos ni bskor ba zhig byas so/_/byas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/_/
[\[46a.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la cho 'phrul chen po mdzad par gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas rgyal pos gsol ba btab nas/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul gyis/_sangs rgyas phal po che'i rnam par rol pa'i cho 'phrul chen po 
[\[46a.6\]]bstan te/_des na rgyal po dang blon po dang grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul mi dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur te/_bstan pa srung ba gces par 'dzin par gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang 
[\[46a.7\]]yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul de la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa nyams su myong la/_da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na yang nga'i bstan pa 'di 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]mdzes par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par 
[\[46b.2\]]bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag ya rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//lo lnga pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[46b.3\]]ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_
[\[46b.4\]]nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[46b.5\]]'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal 
[\[46b.6\]]po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe mi blun po lhas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la gnod pa stong snyed byas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu bskyod par yang ma nus pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras 
[\[46b.7\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i khab nas su yang dag sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du mi 'gro ba dang /_kha zas mi sbyin pa'i khrims chos shig_/de ltar byas kyang des khe mi rnyed cing bsnyen bkur mi rnyed pas gdon mi za bar yul gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]de bzhin du byas nas/_de na dge bsnyen bden pa mthong ba 'khod pa de dag ngu ste/_kyi hud 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba/_u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar dkon pa dang phrad kyang /_de bsten kyang ma nus pa las na/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong 
[\[47a.2\]]khyer gyi mi rnams mgon med par gyur to zhes 'dzer to/_/tshig de nyid thor dge slong dag gis thos so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ji skad thos pa bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di 
[\[47a.3\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dus mkhyen gyis khyod snying ma chung shig_/gzhan yang nga'i bstan pa ji srid yod kyi bar du yang /_nyan thos rnams kyi yo byad med par mi 'gyur na/_da ltar lta ci smos/_de'i skabs su lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong 
[\[47a.4\]]ba 'jug ste/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas/_mthong ba'i mod kho na la sbyin bdag dang /_sbyin pa po rnams kyi spro ba bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang /_ma skyes dgra dang lhas byin gyi 
[\[47a.5\]]rgyags shing dregs pa gcad pa dang bdag nyid kyi dad pa bstan pa'i phyir/_rgyal po'i khab ril gyis 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas skad po che phyung ste bdag gis deng phan chad/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/_lha'i na bza' dang /_
[\[47a.6\]]zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 
[\[47a.7\]]'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'di nyid du/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/_lha'i na bza' 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'jig 
[\[47b.2\]]rten na bsod nams 'dod pa mang gis 'di ltar nga la sems dad par byas pa nyid kyis chog go/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_'o na de bzhin gshegs pa'i slad du bdag gis dgung lo lnga'i bar du/_lo lnga pa'i dga' ston sbyar bar 'tshal na/_bcom 
[\[47b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa mang gis 'di ltar nga la sems dad par byas pa nyid kyis chog go/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_'o na dgung lnga'i bar 
[\[47b.4\]]du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi bsod nams kyi stobs mngon du bstan pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phan gdags pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su zhag lnga pa'i dga' ston rgyun mi 'chad par 
[\[47b.5\]]bya ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas 'od ma'i tshal de khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal byed 'dra bar bstan te/_lha'i gdan cha rnams dang /_lha'i rdzing bu rnams 
[\[47b.6\]]dang /_lha'i bdud rtsi'i zhal zas dag kyang bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_lha 'bum phrag 
[\[47b.7\]]du ma'i g.yog dang bcas pas rang gi lag gis tshim par byed cing ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/rnam grangs du mar rang gi lag gis tshim par byas shing ci bzhed pa bstabs te/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin nas bstsang sder ni gyu/_phyag ni bcabs par rig 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]nas/_stan ches dma' ba khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/
[\[48a.2\]]yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'dug pas kyang 'od ma'i tshal na bcom ldan 'das la de lta bur mchod pa byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'gyod pa skyes te dad pa chen po rnyed do/_/rgyal po'i khab na 'khod 
[\[48a.3\]]pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis kyang chos kyi shugs thob nas rgyal po'i thad du dong ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lha rgyags shing bag ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyis kyang lha yul bor te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa las na/_
[\[48a.4\]]rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams sgor pham par 'gyur gyis/_lha khrims de ni bshig na legs lags so zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras khrims de bshig nas/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi grong khyer du dril bsgrags te/_
[\[48a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ci dga' bar gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs nas dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes te/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me 
[\[48a.6\]]tog phreng rnams khyer nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dong ngo /_/de nas lha rnams dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti chen po byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhi de las lha dang mi rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 
[\[48a.7\]]'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas lha dang mi du mas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa mthong nas the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'di lta bu'i dga' ston bgyis pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung 
[\[48b.2\]]la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags pas na/_nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par 
[\[48b.3\]]smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 
[\[48b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[48b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ri bo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de ljongs 
[\[48b.6\]]rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon nas/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de na yams kyi nad byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po des yams kyi nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du gdugs 
[\[48b.7\]]tshod la spyan drangs so/_/zla ba gsum lon nas yams kyi nad de zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po dang grong khyer gyi mi sems dad par gyur pa rnams kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lo lnga pa'i dga' ston byas so/_/'dir gsungs pa/_kun 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]dga' nga ni rgyal gyur nas/_/rin chen ri bo 'od chen la/_/zhi bar 'dod phyir gsol ba btab/_/lo lnga pa yi dga' ston byas/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas yang dag par 
[\[49a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i ri bo de la lo lnga pa'i dga' ston byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_ngas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po nyams su myong la da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na yang nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa yin no/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[49a.3\]]pa'i 'og tu yang nga'i bstan pa la lo lnga pa'i dga' ston brgya phrag du ma byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri 
[\[49a.4\]]mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[49a.5\]]gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po lnga pa/_bstod pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded 
[\[49a.6\]]dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas 
[\[49a.7\]]te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na rol mo mkhan 
[\[49b.2\]]mdza' sde gcig pa lnga brgya tsam 'khod do/_/de'i tshe rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' zhes bya ba zhig gsar du 'ongs pa de'i mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te/_rgyud gcig las skad sna bdun dang khong du 'khyig pa sna nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung bar shes so/_/des grong khyer 
[\[49b.3\]]chen po drug yul po che ma yin par bsgrags te mnyan du yod par phyin nas/_mnyan du yod pa na rol mo mkhan gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'di'i dus ngas shes kyis khyed snying ma chung shig_/de nas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po 
[\[49b.4\]]rab dga' 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po gsal rgyal rol mo la shin tu mkhas zhes de skad grag gis de dang 'gyed par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[49b.5\]]gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po khyod rol mo shin tu mkhyen to zhes bdag gis thos na/_gal te khyod la gnod pa ma mchis na sad par bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de la bsgyangs te smras pa/_kye legs pa nga'i mkhan po rol mo 
[\[49b.6\]]mkhan gyi rgyal po bla na med pa yod de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na bzhugs kyis tshur shog dang der 'dong ngo zhes byas so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam gyis zhabs 'bring byas pa dang /_rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' dang mi 'bum 
[\[49b.7\]]phrag du ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong ngo /_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum 
[\[50a.2\]]la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 
[\[50a.3\]]'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la 
[\[50a.4\]]gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu brgyan pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la 
[\[50a.5\]]dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par 'phags pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_
[\[50a.6\]]su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang 
[\[50a.7\]]bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/
[\[50b.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul ba'i skye bo la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/_kye ma dri za'i bu zur phud lnga pa dri za bdun stong gis bskor bas pi bang gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa khyer te nga'i thad du 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas dgongs 
[\[50b.3\]]pa bskyed pa'i mod la/_dri za'i bu zur phud lnga pa dri za bdun stong gis bskor bas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshul bzhin du mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la pi bang gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa phul lo/_/de nas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab [{]dga'as[,]dgas[}]/_bcom ldan 
[\[50b.4\]]'das kyi spyan sngar pi bang blangs te/_de las rgyud gcig las kyang skad sna bdun dang khong nas 'khyig pa sna nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ba bstan te/_de thos pas rgyal po gsal rgyal dang skye bo phal po che gzhan dag kyang mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[50b.5\]]'das kyis kyang pi bang gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa sbrengs te/_de las rgyud gcig las kyang skad kyi khyad par sna du ma dang khong du 'khyig pa'i sna grangs du ma 'byung ba bstan to/_/de dag kyang stong pa'i rnam pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam par grag go/_/lus 'di yang pi bang 
[\[50b.6\]]dang 'dra bar bstan to/_/skad rnams ni dbang po dang 'dra bar bstan to/_/khong du 'khyig pa rnams ni sems kyi khams dang 'dra bar bstan te/_de thos pas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' dad pa skyes nas pi bang dri gtsang khang du bul te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[50b.7\]]thad du rab tu byung nas des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan 
[\[51a.2\]]sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha 
[\[51a.3\]]rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dad par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang /_
[\[51a.4\]]bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bya bar brtsams so/_/rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po rnams kyang dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag ni las ngan pa byed cing 'dug ste/_dka' bas 'tsho ba yin gyis/_bdag cag gis rgyal po la gsol te/_
[\[51a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer du gshegs par spyan drang gor ma chag snyam mo/_/re zhig na rol mo mkhan de dag gis gnang ba'i lung thob nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer du gshegs par spyan drangs 
[\[51a.6\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rol mo mkhan de dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rol mo mkhan de dag dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi rnams bsdongs nas mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer thams cad rdo dang gseg ma dang /_
[\[51a.7\]]gyo mo med par byas nas spos chab kyis chag chag ni btab/_me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/_bdug pa sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs/_me tog gi bla res ni brgyan to/_/rol mo mkhan de dag gis kyang rang rang gi pi bang khyer te rdza rnga dang gling bu dang rnga zlum dang rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]gis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/zhal zas bzang pos kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa tshim par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 
[\[51b.2\]]chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas/_kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 
[\[51b.3\]]'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar 
[\[51b.4\]]gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba[\u0f72] sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/
[\[51b.5\]]de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 
[\[51b.6\]]'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems 
[\[51b.7\]]can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_
[\[52a.2\]]tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang 
[\[52a.3\]]rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan 
[\[52a.4\]]la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/
[\[52a.5\]]de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 
[\[52a.6\]]'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[52a.7\]]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs 
[\[52b.2\]]rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[52b.3\]]lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/
[\[52b.4\]]de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni 
[\[52b.5\]]rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag 
[\[52b.6\]]gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 
[\[52b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo rol mo mkhan 'di dag gis nga la 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]bkur sti 'di lta bu byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo rol mo mkhan 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis dus ji lta ba bzhin du/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 
[\[53a.2\]]yang dag par bsgrubs nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skad snyan zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas sha stag tu 'gyur te/_sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi sbyin par bya 
[\[53a.3\]]ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis mthu 'di 'dra bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du mdzad lags/_
[\[53a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_nga nyid kyis las 
[\[53a.5\]]byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin 
[\[53a.6\]]par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing 
[\[53a.7\]]dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtogs mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon to/_/de nas rgyal po'i skyed mos 
[\[53b.2\]]tshal dus tshigs thams cad du 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/_skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas rgyal po de la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas gdan bting ba la bzhugs 
[\[53b.3\]]te me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de bud med kyi sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sgrogs pa dag dang skyed mos tshal du song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po de skyed mos tshal de na 'khyam zhing 'gro bas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[53b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtogs mdzad mdzes shing dga' bar mdzad pa/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_thugs mchog tu dul zhing rnam par zhi ba dang ldan pa/_gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal 'bar ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang rgyal po de dga' bar 
[\[53b.5\]]gyur nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrags te/_bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs su gsol to/_/zhal zas bzang po yang gsol nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab 
[\[53b.6\]]bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtogs mdzad de la mchod pa byas pa de nyid kyi rgyus da ltar nga la rol mo mkhan rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i bsnyen bkur 
[\[53b.7\]]byas so/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong dag 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mchog sbyin zhes bya ba ni/_sangs 
[\[54a.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_
[\[54a.3\]]lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 
[\[54a.4\]]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[54a.5\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas mnyan du yod pa na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa las dri ma can la gnas pa zhig yod de/_de rgyal po'i mis bzung nas 
[\[54a.6\]]rgyal po la phul lo/_/de nas de nyes pa byed byed pa'i phyir rgyal pos gshed ma la gtad do/_/de nas de rgyal po'i mi gos sngon po bgos pa/_mtshon cha thogs pa/_ka ra bI ra'i me tog gi phreng ba mgul na thogs pa rnams kyis lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi 
[\[54a.7\]]mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su 'o dod bos nas grong khyer gyi lho sgor khrid do/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_
[\[54b.2\]]bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 
[\[54b.3\]]'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas 
[\[54b.4\]]pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed 
[\[54b.5\]]pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_
[\[54b.6\]]su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag 
[\[54b.7\]]nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/
[\[55a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de nas mi des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad 
[\[55a.3\]]bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[55a.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dam pa stsal ba'i 'os lags kyis bdag la srog phangs pa stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la/_rgyal po gsal 
[\[55a.5\]]rgyal la 'di skad du rgyal po chen po mi 'di nga la byin cig dang rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes gyis shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ko sa la'i rgyal 
[\[55a.6\]]po gsal rgyal la bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' phrin 'di skad du/_rgyal po chen po mi 'di bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar gyis shig ces byas so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang shin tu 'os par rig nas gnang ste/_de bcom ldan 
[\[55a.7\]]'das kyis rab tu phyung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/_des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam 
[\[55b.2\]]mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_sred pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab 
[\[55b.3\]]kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[55b.4\]]'das kyis dgongs pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan pa/_dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la 
[\[55b.5\]]gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur chu'i 
[\[55b.6\]]khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi 
[\[55b.7\]]las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 
[\[56a.2\]]byung ngo /_/de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de na bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi mthar phyin pa/_rgyal po'i grong na 'dug pa zhig yod do/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[56a.3\]]sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas pho brang 'khor der bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de nas bram ze des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum 
[\[56a.4\]]cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sdong po rtsa ba 
[\[56a.5\]]nas bcad pa bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dam pa stsol ba'i 'os lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni dam pa stsol ba'i 'os lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das gang du 
[\[56a.6\]]bzhugs su gsol/_de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gang du bzhugs so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bzhugs nas bram ze des tshig 
[\[56a.7\]]brgyas bstod do/_/zhal zas bzang po yang gsol nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/_/gzhi de las rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]de'i dus na bram zer gyur pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan la mchod pa byas pa de'i rgyus na/_ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa nyams su myong la/_da ltar yang ngas ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag 
[\[56b.2\]]thams cad 'grub pa yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te 
[\[56b.3\]]gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//ka shi ka'i gos 
[\[56b.4\]]zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_
[\[56b.5\]]gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[56b.6\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_
[\[56b.7\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po g.yog 'khor mi 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pas bden pa mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe des phan btags pa la drin 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]bsab par bstan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa lugs su gzhug pa dang /_khyim yangs par bstan pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba gces par bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i pho 
[\[57a.2\]]brang 'khor du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la bsgo ba/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa la me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa gyis shig_/rgyal 
[\[57a.3\]]po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad kyang rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par gyis shig_/me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor la rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sgreng shig_/'od ma'i tshal nas rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi lam thams cad kyang ras kyis khebs par gyis shig 
[\[57a.4\]]ces byas so/_/blon po rnams kyis kyang thams cad nyams su blangs so/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos rang gi lag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng du gdugs rtsibs brgya pa bzung ngo /_/pho brang 'khor gyi mi gzhan dag gis ni dge slong stong gi 
[\[57a.5\]]gdugs thogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul la 'khor yang dul ba dang /_zhi la 'khor yang zhi ba dang /_grol la 'khor yang grol ba dang /_dbugs phyin la 'khor yang dbugs phyin pa dang /_byang la 'khor yang byang ba dang /_dgra bcom par gyur la 
[\[57a.6\]]'khor yang dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral la 'khor yang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_mdzes la 'khor yang mdzes pa ste/_khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_seng 
[\[57a.7\]]ge gcan gzan gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]ba lta bu dang /_sa mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_tshong dpon grong khyer gyi mis bskor ba lta bu dang /_rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 
[\[57b.2\]]bu stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_nyi ma 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis 
[\[57b.3\]]bskor ba lta bu dang /_mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis bskor ba 
[\[57b.4\]]lta bu dang /_tshangs pa tshangs ris kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /_rgya mtsho ltar ltem me 'dug pa dang /_sprin brlan dang ldan pa lta bu dang /_glang po che'i rgyal po rgyags pa med pa lta bur dbang po shin tu dang ba dang /_spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'chal ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[57b.5\]]chos ma 'dres pa du mas brgyan pa'i bcom ldan 'das grong khyer der gshegs te/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sgo'i them pa la bzhag pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos te bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe rmad du byung ba de lta bu dag byung 
[\[57b.6\]]ngo /_/gzhan yang 'di lta ste sgo dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to/_/dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to/_/glang po che rnams kyang skad 'byin to/_/rta rnams kyang skad 'byin to/_/khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to/_/rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs khyim 
[\[57b.7\]]khyim na 'dug pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to/_/long ba rnams kyang mig gis mthong bar gyur to/_/'on pa rnams kyang rna bas thos par gyur to/_/lkugs pa rnams kyang smra shes par gyur to/_/dbang po lhag ma ma tshang ba rnams kyang dbang po tshang ba thob par gyur 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]to/_/chang gis ra ro ba rnams kyang sangs par gyur to/_/dug 'thungs pa rnams kyang dug med par gyur to/_/phan tshun 'khon pa rnams kyang byams pa'i sems thob par gyur to/_/sbrum pa rnams kyang bde bar btsa' bar gyur to/_/bcings 
[\[58a.2\]]pa rnams kyang grol bar gyur to/_/nor med pa rnams kyang nor rnyed par gyur to/_/bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang lha'i me tog gi char 'bebs so/_/de 
[\[58a.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i 'byor pas rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang bdag nyid lag dar te phyi rol gyi sgo khang du zhabs bsil ba'i tsan dan sa mchog pa'i chu thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs 
[\[58a.4\]]bsil to/_/de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas gsol to/_/bshos gsol nas ka shi ka'i na bza' yang phul lo/_/rgyu des na ma ga d+hA'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad par gyur to/_/
[\[58a.5\]]de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis 'di lta bu'i mchod pa brnyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bcom ldan 'das 
[\[58a.6\]]kyis gang du mdzad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags 
[\[58a.7\]]pas na nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs 
[\[58b.2\]]shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[58b.3\]]skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang 
[\[58b.4\]]bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der byon to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas/_bcom ldan 'das yang 
[\[58b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i 
[\[58b.6\]]rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad kyis byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/de nas rgyal po dga' bar gyur nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad rgyal po'i pho brang du spyan 
[\[58b.7\]]drangs nas zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol to/_/'bum ri ba'i na bza' yang phul lo/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten yang kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa brtsigs so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas te/_des na ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa nyams su myong la/_rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[59a.2\]]par gyur pa na yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_
[\[59a.3\]]mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ka[\u0f72]sa de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[59a.4\]]lha'i zhal zas zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams 
[\[59a.5\]]dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_
[\[59a.6\]]lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal po'i 
[\[59a.7\]]khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa/_mu stegs can la dga' ba zhig gnas 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]pa de tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos dad par byas te/_bstan pa la btsud nas bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag de yang rgya chen po la mos pa zhig ste/_des tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la smras pa/_bdag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[59b.2\]]la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal gyis grogs mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos kyang khyim bdag de la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khyim bdag de khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_
[\[59b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa khyim bdag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[59b.4\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[59b.5\]]des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dag bshams so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bskul te/_khyim 
[\[59b.6\]]bdag 'di'i grogs gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa dga' byed kyi tshal du sprul to/_/sa srung gi bu dang rab brtan dang 'dra ba'i glang po che stong phrag mang po dag kyang khrid de 'ongs te/_de dag ni sangs rgyas la 
[\[59b.7\]]sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi steng du gdugs rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa 'dzin to/_/bde sogs la sogs pa lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma yang khrid de 'ongs te/_de dag ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can gyis g.yob par 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]byed do/_/rab dga' dang /_zur phud lnga pa dang /_tum bu ru la sogs pa dri za stong phrag du ma yang khrid de 'ongs te/_de dag ni rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs len par byed do/_/lha'i bdud rtsi'i zhal zas dag kyang sbyar to/_/de nas khyim bdag des 
[\[60a.2\]]lha dang mi'i yo byad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_lus thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_bdag 
[\[60a.3\]]'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs 
[\[60a.4\]]rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad 
[\[60a.5\]]pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms 
[\[60a.6\]]dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song 
[\[60a.7\]]nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa skyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par 
[\[60b.2\]]ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 
[\[60b.3\]]'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams 
[\[60b.4\]]dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge 
[\[60b.5\]]chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du 
[\[60b.6\]]song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni 
[\[60b.7\]]gzhom par gyis/_gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang 
[\[61a.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi 
[\[61a.3\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed 
[\[61a.4\]]na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil tu mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi 
[\[61a.5\]]mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 
[\[61a.6\]]gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su 
[\[61a.7\]]bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/
[\[61b.2\]]gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[61b.3\]]ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_
[\[61b.4\]]bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/_snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar 
[\[61b.5\]]gzhag pa gsum dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i zas sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/skabs 'di ma ga 
[\[61b.6\]]d+hA'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang g.yog 'khor rnams kyis thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag 'dis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[61b.7\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha dang mi'i 'byor pa dag gis mchod pa bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa 'di dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams 
[\[62a.2\]]la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur 
[\[62a.3\]]ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig 
[\[62a.4\]]pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[62a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der byon 
[\[62a.6\]]to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 
[\[62a.7\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/_/de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams la spyan drangs so/_/
[\[62b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos kyang cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' 
[\[62b.3\]]dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs kyang rin po che las byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi dga' ston byas nas der srog chags 'bum phrag 
[\[62b.4\]]du ma dad pa chen po thob ste/_rgyu de dang rkyen des de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po la de lta bu'i 
[\[62b.5\]]mchod pa byas pa des na/_ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa nyams su myong ste/_de nyid kyi rgyus da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na yang nga la tshong dpon dang brgya byin gyis 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par 
[\[62b.6\]]bya ste/_ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[62b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/_sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa bam po drug pa/_sdom ni/_tsan dan dang ni pad ma dang /_/de bzhin 'khor lo mgo bcu pa/_/mdog 'jam dang ni 'od bsil dang /_/mnyan pa dang ni spos ngad ldang /_/dri med gdangs snyan zhes bya ba/_/sde tshan dag tu bstan 
[\[63a.2\]]pa yin/_/tsan dan zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_
[\[63a.3\]]lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[63a.4\]]chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_yul ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing 
[\[63a.5\]]gshegs pa las gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/_/de'i tshe gang gA'i klung gi 'gram nas thag mi ring ba zhig na mchod rten zhig ral du gyur pa rlung dang nyi tshan gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das mchod 
[\[63a.6\]]rten 'di su'i lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rang sangs rgyas tsan dan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste de'i yin no/_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ga las byung lags/_ming ni ci las btags lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[63a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ga las byung ba dang /_ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang 'thab pa 
[\[63b.2\]]zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan pa 'dug go/_/rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/_/de bu med 
[\[63b.3\]]nas bu 'dod de gu lang dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /_lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te 'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_
[\[63b.4\]]gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_chos 'thun pa dang /_rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/_
[\[63b.5\]]gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te gsum gang zhe na/_pha ma gnyis 'dod chags
