[\[63b.6\]]langs te phrad pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la des skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad ma tshad las 
[\[63b.7\]]'das par che ba zhig skyes te/_de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal pos kyang pad ma de legs par srungs shig ces bsgo'o/_/phyis re zhig na nyi ma 'char kar pad ma de kha 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bye nas pad ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba/_sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa/_lus skyes bu 
[\[64a.2\]]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/_de'i kha nas ni pad ma'i dri 'byung la/_lus las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo /_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas kyang 
[\[64a.3\]]rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong nas/_khye'u des mthong ma thag tu rgyal po la smras pa/_yab tshur gshegs bdag ni khyod sras mi mnga' ba'i sras lags so/_/de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs nas smras pa/_
[\[64a.4\]]bu de ni khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin no/_/de nas rgyal po rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas/_pad ma'i snying po las khye'u blangs te lag par bzhag go/_/de nas khye'u des gang dang gang du rkang pa bzhag pa de dang der pad ma dag byung ngo /_de nas de'i ming tsan dan zhes btags so/_/gang gi tshe khye'u 
[\[64a.5\]]tsan dan khad kyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha bdag cag gi grong khyer 'dir dus ston byung na lha sras tsan dan btang ba'i rigs so/_/'on kyang bdag cag dang lhan cig tu dus ston myong bar 'gyur la gnas thams cad kyang pad mas brgyan 
[\[64a.6\]]par 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa de ltar bya'o/_/de nas tsan dan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_blon po'i bu rnams kyis g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/_rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed cing grong khyer gyi dus ston myong bar bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyi rol du 
[\[64a.7\]]byung ngo /_/de nas de der 'gro ba na gom pa re re la pad ma blta na sdug cing yid 'phrog pa dag byung ste/_de dag la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis phog ma thag tu rnyis shing skams so/_/de nas sems can dag pa bsam pa dge ba sngon sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed bskyed pa des de mthong nas 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]tshul bzhin yid la byed pa skyes te/_ji ltar pad ma 'di dag skyes pa'i mod la ni mdzes par 'dug la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdungs pas ni/_rnyis shing skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lus 'di yang de dang 'dra'o snyam mo/_/de de ltar sems shing 'jal la nye bar rtog pa na/_byang chub 
[\[64b.2\]]kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/_des skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang na/_'dug bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas re zhig na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de la gos tshon can dag phul te de dag bgos nas/_
[\[64b.3\]]nam mkha' la 'phags te cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/_de mthong bas rgyal po dang blon po dang grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang bcas par dga' ba chen po thob ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bskyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[64b.4\]]rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ni de las byung ste/_ming yang de las btags so/_/dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rang sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis las gang dag bgyis shing bsags na/_des de'i lus kyang dri bda' la dbang po lnga yang rno bar 
[\[64b.5\]]gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des der dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la spos chu'i dbang bskur ba yang phul/_me tog dag kyang btags te/_der rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam yang 
[\[64b.6\]]bsgoms so/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mo bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar 
[\[64b.7\]]bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//pad ma zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[65a.2\]]chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po 
[\[65a.3\]]dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[65a.4\]]yul dbus na 'khod pa rnams kyi lugs kyis na/_kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma rnams kyis pad ma dag blangs te srang du song zhing 'tshong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/
[\[65a.5\]]bud med cig kyang khye'u zhig pang na thogs te srang du song ba las khye'u des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 
[\[65a.6\]]'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te blo thor du lag pa brkyang nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma las pad ma blangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bor ro/_/de nas pad ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te steng gi 
[\[65a.7\]]nam mkha' la 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la gzhes na ni sdod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad ma ra ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od zer dag bkye nas/_des mnyan du yod par ril gyis snang bar byas so/_/rgyu des na rgyal po dang blon po dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]rnams dad par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung 
[\[65b.2\]]nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_
[\[65b.3\]]chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar 
[\[65b.4\]]gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan 
[\[65b.5\]]du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung 
[\[65b.6\]]ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du 
[\[65b.7\]]bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_
[\[66a.2\]]dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba 
[\[66a.3\]]dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 
[\[66a.4\]]'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong ga[\u0f74]ma gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi 
[\[66a.5\]]phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung 
[\[66a.6\]]ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston 
[\[66a.7\]]par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 
[\[66b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 
[\[66b.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/
[\[66b.4\]]yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo 
[\[66b.5\]]yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas 
[\[66b.6\]]rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[66b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dad pa skyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la pad ma 'thor ba mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_bskal pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas rang sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems 
[\[67a.2\]]dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de 
[\[67a.3\]]dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_
[\[67a.4\]]ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[67a.5\]]gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_
[\[67a.6\]]sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab nas ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas/_de'i chung ma lang tsho la bab pa de/_khyim thab la 
[\[67a.7\]]gdung zhing yongs su yi chad la smre sngags 'don kyang de'i khyim thab ma 'ongs nas/_des sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te dam bcas pa/_gal te bdag gi khyim thab myur du 'ongs na bdag gis khyod la gser gyi 'khor lo dbul lo zhes byas so/_/de nas de'i khyim thab rgya mtsho 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]chen po'i nang nas myur du phyir 'khor te nye zho med par bde bar 'ongs so/_/de nas des gser gyi 'khor lo byed du bcug ste/_de bran mo'i tshogs kyis bskor bas 'khor lo dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog khyer te lha khang du chas so/_/de'i skabs su sangs 
[\[67b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang 
[\[67b.3\]]ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 
[\[67b.4\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las 
[\[67b.5\]]yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis 
[\[67b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas 
[\[67b.7\]]kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_
[\[68a.2\]]su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams 
[\[68a.3\]]kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_bu mo des nga mthong na rang byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro snyam du gzigs so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[68a.4\]]ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku 
[\[68a.5\]]skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[68a.6\]]mthong ba'i mod la dga' ba thob ste/_bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi 'khor lo dor bar byas so/_/de nas bran mos bkag ste 'di sred med kyi bu ma yin no zhes byas so/_/'on kyang de bkag bzhin du dad pa drag pos yid 'dun par gyur pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[68a.7\]]kyi steng du gser gyi 'khor lo bor ro/_/spos dang bdug pa dang me tog kyang phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_
[\[68b.2\]]mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni 
[\[68b.3\]]bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on 
[\[68b.4\]]te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma 
[\[68b.5\]]byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden 
[\[68b.6\]]pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul 
[\[68b.7\]]dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba 
[\[69a.2\]]dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 
[\[69a.3\]]'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid 
[\[69a.4\]]kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar 
[\[69a.5\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par 
[\[69a.6\]]bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[69a.7\]]lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[69b.2\]]thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang 
[\[69b.3\]]bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge slong 
[\[69b.4\]]rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang 
[\[69b.5\]]gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[69b.6\]]rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la gser gyi 'khor lo bor ba mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong 
[\[69b.7\]]ba 'dis/_bskal pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_lha dang mi'i bde ba nyams su myong nas rang sangs rgyas 'khor lo bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]bslab par bya ste sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[70a.2\]]mngon par bstod do//_//mgo bcu pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_
[\[70a.3\]]klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[70a.4\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams 
[\[70a.5\]]brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_yul ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas mchod rten rnying pa rlung dang nyi tshan gyis bshig pa zhig 'dug pa de mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[70a.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa mchod rten 'di su'i lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa'i yin no/_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung lags/_
[\[70a.7\]]ming ni ci las btags lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa gang las byung ba dang ming ci las btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo 
[\[70b.2\]]legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug go/_/rgyal 
[\[70b.3\]]po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhig ste chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/_/de nas rgyal po de/_bu med nas bu 'dod de gu lang dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /_lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te 
[\[70b.4\]]'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_chos 'thun pa dang /_rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig 
[\[70b.5\]]rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/_gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur 
[\[70b.6\]]ba'i rigs so/_/ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar gyur te gsum gang zhe na/_pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 
[\[70b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/_de'i skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos gang ba/_'gram ngang pa dang ngur pa dang zal mo la sogs pa bya sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad ma tshad las 'das par che ba zhig blo tol du skyes te/_de nyin gcig bzhin du cher skye la kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal pos kyang pad ma de legs par srungs 
[\[71a.2\]]shig ces bsgo'o/_/phyis re zhig na nyi ma 'char kar pad ma de kha bye nas pad ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba/_
[\[71a.3\]]sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa/_lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas 
[\[71a.4\]]rgyal pos thos nas blon po dang btsun mo dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du dong ste/_pad ma'i snying po la de lta bur mdzes shing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas 
[\[71a.5\]]khye'u de blangs te bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas rang gi pho brang du khyer nas/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang mtshan mkhan dag la bsnyad de/_zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_mgo bcu pa zhes ming btags so/_/de nas khye'u mgo bcu 
[\[71a.6\]]pa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par 
[\[71a.7\]]bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/khye'u de yang dad pa dang ldan la bsam pa bzang zhing dge ba/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]zhig ste/_des yab rgyal sa na 'dug na/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dag byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khye'u de mi dga' nas yab la gsol pa/_yab bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad 
[\[71b.2\]]du gsol zhes byas so/_/yab kyis kyang gnang ste de skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos tshon can bgos te/_yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas des lung mnos pa med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du 
[\[71b.3\]]gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas nas/_nam mkha' la 'phags te yab la cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/_/de nas yab kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangs so/_/de nas de lus thogs pas yongs su skyo nas cho 'phrul rnam 
[\[71b.4\]]pa sna tshogs bstan te/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par song ste de'i mchod rten 'di yin no/_/de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pas las gang 
[\[71b.5\]]dag bgyis na ma'i mngal du ma skyes te/_pad ma las skyes lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mgo bcu pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i 
[\[71b.6\]]las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_mgo bcu pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_
[\[71b.7\]]me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang 
[\[72a.2\]]zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[72a.3\]]sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de/_rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/_
[\[72a.4\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/ded dpon zhig kyang pad ma khyer te srang du zhugs so/_/de nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu 
[\[72a.5\]]rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu pad ma de bcom ldan 'das 
[\[72a.6\]]kyi steng du bor te/_bor ma thag tu pad ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la gzhes na ni sdod do/_/de nas re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis ded dpon de rang byang 
[\[72a.7\]]chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang /_de'i skabs su de'i chung ma bu btsa' zhing 'dug ste skad ngan 'don nas/_des bran mo la de ci zhig ces dris so/_/des kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do/_/de nas ded dpon de mi dga' bar 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]gyur nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag nam yang 'khor ba na ma'i mngal du skye bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/_ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa de yin te/_
[\[72b.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du nam yang ma'i mngal du ma skyes la/_srid pa tha ma la yang de'i 'byor pa de 'dra bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos rnams la bkur 
[\[72b.3\]]sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mdog 'jam zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[72b.4\]]la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 
[\[72b.5\]]'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[72b.6\]]'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' 
[\[72b.7\]]ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba nor dang yo byad mang ba bdag dbang ba mang ba/_mdza' bo dang blon po dang nye du dang rgan rabs mang ba zhig yod de/_khyim bdag de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa zhig go/_/de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can smig rgyu dang 'dra ba/_mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_ther zug pa ma 
[\[73a.2\]]yin pa/_yid brtan du mi rung ba/_'gyur ba'i chos can/_gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/_bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol la zhal zas bzang pos tshim par bya gor ma 
[\[73a.3\]]chag snyam mo/_/de nas des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol ba dang gdugs tshod gsol bar spyan drangs so/_/de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 
[\[73a.4\]]'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus la gshegs so/_/de nas tshong dpon de til mar spos can khyer te bsro khang du song nas bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de nas 
[\[73a.5\]]gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_khrus gsol zin pa de'i tshe khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/
[\[73a.6\]]rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te bstsang sder ni gyu/_phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 
[\[73a.7\]]'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du ma yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas tshong dpon de dad pa rnyed nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te sems la rtas par byas so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[73b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 
[\[73b.3\]]'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a 
[\[73b.4\]]chu zer dang /_ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/
[\[73b.5\]]des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed 
[\[73b.6\]]par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/_gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to 
[\[73b.7\]]snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_
[\[74a.2\]]tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_
[\[74a.3\]]mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam 
[\[74a.4\]]par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[74a.5\]]zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su 
[\[74a.6\]]mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi 
[\[74a.7\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi 
[\[74b.2\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis 
[\[74b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi 
[\[74b.4\]]sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra 
[\[74b.5\]]thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi bla yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gis ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag 
[\[74b.6\]]gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[74b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis rang sangs rgyas mdog 'jam zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la 
[\[75a.2\]]sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' 
[\[75a.3\]]stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po bdun pa/_'od bsil zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon 
[\[75a.4\]]po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 
[\[75a.5\]]'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams 
[\[75a.6\]]chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[75a.7\]]de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]gzhan dag la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/_/de nas de 'di snyam du sems te longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/_glang po che'i rna ba ltar g.yo ba/_mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_ther zug 
[\[75b.2\]]ma yin pa/_yid brtan du mi rung ba/_'gyur ba'i chos can/_gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis bdag gis longs spyod snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/des sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos 
[\[75b.3\]]kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/_khyim yang rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par byas te/_tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab/_spos sna tshogs kyi snod ni bkram/_dri zhim po'i bdug pas ni bdugs/_me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/_
[\[75b.4\]]me tog gi gdan rnams ni bshams so/_/de nas khu ba bsil ba'i btung ba rnams dang /_khur ba dang /_bshos rnams kyang sta gon byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod la bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na bcom 
[\[75b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag 
[\[75b.6\]]de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim 
[\[75b.7\]]par byas te/_ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te bstsang sder ni gyu/_phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/chos kyi gtam 
[\[76a.2\]]rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag de dad pa rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te sems la rtas 
[\[76a.3\]]par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas/_kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/
[\[76a.4\]]kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams 
[\[76a.5\]]dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar 
[\[76a.6\]]gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 
[\[76a.7\]]'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag 
[\[76b.2\]]ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams 
[\[76b.3\]]dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom 
[\[76b.4\]]snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/
[\[76b.5\]]'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[76b.6\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[76b.7\]]sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur 
[\[77a.2\]]ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[77a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te 
[\[77a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad pa gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes 
[\[77a.5\]]spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/
[\[77a.6\]]thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal 
[\[77a.7\]]chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis nga la 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_rang sangs rgyas 'od bsil zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la 
[\[77b.2\]]sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs 
[\[77b.3\]]te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha 
[\[77b.4\]]rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[77b.5\]]lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas 
[\[77b.6\]]pa/_yul ma ga d+hA na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_mnyan pa rnams ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_mnyan pa rnams 
[\[77b.7\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye chu klung 'di las nga sgrol cig_/mnyan pa rnams kyis gsol pa/_gru btsas stsol cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga yang sngon mnyan pa byed byed de ngas dga' bo ni 'dod chags kyi chu klung du lhung 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]ba las bsgral/_sor phreng ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/_bram ze'i bu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa ni nga rgyal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/_steng rgyas 'od srung ni gti mug gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral te 'on kyang ngas gru btsas ma blangs so/_/de skad ces 
[\[78a.2\]]bka' stsal kyang bsgral bar khas ma blangs so/_/de nas mnyan pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang thos/_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de yang mthong nas dad pa skyes te/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[78a.3\]]bsgral bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/de nas dge slong rnams grur zhugs pa dang bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan pa de bas kyang ches sngar pha rol gyi 'gram du zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas mnyan pa des rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas sems dga' bar gyur te zhabs 
[\[78a.4\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_mnyan pa des de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du 
[\[78a.5\]]byas so/_/des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang /_thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag 
[\[78a.6\]]lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis 
[\[78a.7\]]kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang gsol pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang shi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba las/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras 
[\[78b.2\]]bu yod/_/de'i nang nas mnyan pa gcig cig 'gyod pa chen po skyes nas/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni 
[\[78b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang 
[\[78b.4\]]sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa 
[\[78b.5\]]dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/
[\[78b.6\]]de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di 
[\[78b.7\]]nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]'gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams 
[\[79a.2\]]dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung 
[\[79a.3\]]rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag 
[\[79a.4\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/
[\[79a.5\]]gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi 
[\[79a.6\]]bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par 
[\[79a.7\]]bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed 
[\[79b.2\]]na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston 
[\[79b.3\]]par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[79b.4\]]la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/
[\[79b.5\]]sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu 
[\[79b.6\]]mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen 
[\[79b.7\]]nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis nga 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]la sems dga' ba bskyed pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba rgal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 
[\[80a.2\]]sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[80a.3\]]nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams 
[\[80a.4\]]dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[80a.5\]]sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong 
[\[80a.6\]]rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa'i yul mi rnams kyis lugs kyis na phal cher byug pa sna tshogs kyi lus skud par byed do/_/de nas re zhig na 
[\[80a.7\]]khyim bdag gi bu zhig yod pa de'i bran mo dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de'i tsan dan dmar po bdar zhing 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang 
[\[80b.2\]]gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bu mo de dad pa chen po skyes so/_/de nas de dad pa rnyed nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis 'di lta bu'i zhing rnyed kyang dbul ba'i nyes pas bcom ldan 
[\[80b.3\]]'das la bkur sti byed mi nus na bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di 'dra ba ci dgos snyam mo/_/de nas des rang gi srog la yang ma bltas te/_lag pa gnyi ga tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la bskus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i 
[\[80b.4\]]khab kyi grong khyer ril gyis tsan dan gyi dris gang bar mdzad do/_/de nas bu mo des cho 'phrul de mthong nas sems dga' bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas sems la rtas par byas te/_bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs 
[\[80b.5\]]su gtong ba 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po 
[\[80b.6\]]dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_
[\[80b.7\]]mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te 
[\[81a.2\]]gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma 
[\[81a.3\]]byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/_bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa 
[\[81a.4\]]rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang 
[\[81a.5\]]byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams 
[\[81a.6\]]dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/
[\[81a.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston 
[\[81b.2\]]par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar 
[\[81b.3\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 
[\[81b.4\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu 
[\[81b.5\]]lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[81b.6\]]de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/
[\[81b.7\]]mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa 
[\[82a.2\]]dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom 
[\[82a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i 
[\[82a.4\]]bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga 
[\[82a.5\]]la sems dang bar byas pa 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag 
[\[82a.6\]]yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//dri ma med pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon 
[\[82a.7\]]rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi 
[\[82b.2\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma zhig yod de/_des so shing zhig khyer te mnyan du yod par song ngo /_/ltas mkhan 
[\[82b.3\]]zhig kyang sgo ka na 'dug ste/_de na re so shing 'di su za ba de ni zas ro brgya dang ldan pa za bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung mas tshig de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/_so shing 'di gang la byin na de'i rgyus bdag cher bkur bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/
[\[82b.4\]]yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten na bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gro ba 'bras bu yod pa yin gyis/_bdag gis 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam mo/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des so shing 
[\[82b.5\]]de khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[82b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du tshems shing 'di bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas bzhes so/_/bzhes nas kyang de kun 
[\[82b.7\]]dga' ra ba'i srung ma'i mdun du gsol to/_/gsol nas kyang so shing de sa la btsugs so/_/de nas btsugs pa'i mod da kho na'i skad cig la yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i shing n+ya gro d+ha chen po chu zheng gab pa zhig tu gyur te/_de'i grib ma 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas lha dang mi du ma la chos bstan to/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol to/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul gyis sems dad par byas 
[\[83a.2\]]nas/_sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[83a.3\]]rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig 
[\[83a.4\]]nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar 
[\[83a.5\]]gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de 
[\[83a.6\]]dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas 
[\[83a.7\]]kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' 
[\[83b.2\]]ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_
[\[83b.3\]]tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/_mi rtag 
[\[83b.4\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par 
[\[83b.5\]]gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 
[\[83b.6\]]'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar
