[\[83b.7\]]skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur 
[\[84a.2\]]ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[84a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo 
[\[84a.4\]]sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang 
[\[84a.5\]]mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba 
[\[84a.6\]]rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/de 
[\[84a.7\]]ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/_rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]do/_/kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bcu 
[\[84b.2\]]gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te srid pa tha ma dang /_gnas tha ma dang /_lus tha ma dang /_bdag gi ngo bo tha ma la thob pa ni rang sangs rgyas dri ma med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag de 
[\[84b.3\]]bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[84b.4\]]mngon par bstod do//_//gdangs snyan ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_
[\[84b.5\]]gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_
[\[84b.6\]]lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal 
[\[84b.7\]]bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/mdza' sde bo mang po zhig kyang chang gis ra ro zhing myos 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]nas pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rnga zlum rnams dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/_gar byed glu len la me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_par shi ka la sogs pa me tog gi phreng ba mang po yang mgul du 
[\[85a.2\]]btags nas/_gos khyad par du 'phags pa dag bgos te mnyan du yod pa'i phyi rol tu byung ngo /_/de nas mdza' sde bo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 
[\[85a.3\]]'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu de dag chang gis ra ro ba de las sangs par gyur to/_/de nas ra ro ba las sangs nas sems dga' zhing dad par gyur te/_gar 
[\[85a.4\]]dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/ud pa la sngon po rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du gtor te/_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du khang pa brtsegs pa sngon po dang khang pa sngon po dang gdugs sngon po lta bur gyur te 'dug nas/_de 
[\[85a.5\]]dag bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la gzhes na ni sdod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'od sngon po dag bkye ste/_'od de dag gis mnyan du yod pa nor bu an da rnyil gyi mdog 'dra bar 'dug par byas so/_/de nas mdza' sde bo de dag bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te sems la 
[\[85a.6\]]rtas par byas nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'dis bdag cag rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa 
[\[85a.7\]]mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_'dus 'joms dang /_
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ud pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/_
[\[85b.2\]]tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo/_/des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems 
[\[85b.3\]]te/_kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du 
[\[85b.4\]]yang ma skyes mod kyi/_'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/_lha dang 
[\[85b.5\]]mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams 
[\[85b.6\]]dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_tshangs ris rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams 
[\[85b.7\]]dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che rnams dang /_mi che rnams dang /_mi gdung rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]med pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 
[\[86a.2\]]'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal bsal bar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes rjod par byed do/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs 
[\[86a.3\]]te/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed 
[\[86a.4\]]na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis 
[\[86a.5\]]su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung ston 
[\[86a.6\]]par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[86a.7\]]byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can/_/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang 
[\[86b.2\]]mi dgyes spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par/_/pad ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na/_/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 
[\[86b.3\]]'tshal ba rnams/_/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /_/bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol/_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston/_/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston 
[\[86b.4\]]mdzad pa/_/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi 
[\[86b.5\]]mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo mdza' sde bo 'di rnams kyis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/kun dga' bo mdza' sde bo 'di rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa nyi shu'i bar 
[\[86b.6\]]du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_srid pa tha ma dang /_gnas tha ma dang /_lus tha ma dang /_bdag gi ngo bo tha ma thob pa na/_rang sangs rgyas gdangs snyan zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dang bar byas pa 'di yin no/_/dge slong 
[\[86b.7\]]dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams la bkur sti bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/_sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa rdzogs so//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po brgyad pa/_sdom ni/_pad ma dang 
[\[87a.2\]]ni kham re dang /_/chos sa[\u0fb1\u0f7c]nga de bzhin zhi ldan dang /_/gzugs bzang mdza' bo'i bu mo dang /_/ri bong dang ni chos tshol dang /_/mgon med zas sbyin rab bzang ba/_/sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/_/pad ma zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon 
[\[87a.3\]]po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams 
[\[87a.4\]]kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_
[\[87a.5\]]zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas ston kyi dus kyi tshe dge slong dag skya 
[\[87a.6\]]rbab ser po'i nad kyis thebs te lus rid cing lus nyam chung bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni snyun mi mnga' zhing gnod pa med la snyun gyis btab pa med de stobs dang ldan no/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong kha cig ni 
[\[87a.7\]]gdon gyi nad skya rbab ser pos thebs te lus rid cing lus nyam chung bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das ni snyun mi mnga' zhing gnod pa ma mchis te/_stobs dang ldan zhing rang bzhin gyis snyun mi mnga' la/_pho ba'i drod snyoms shing 'ju ba dang ldan pa la gzigs/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis/_sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 
[\[87b.2\]]'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po 
[\[87b.3\]]dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na 
[\[87b.4\]]sI na/_rgyal po pad ma zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa 
[\[87b.5\]]dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba dang /_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa 
[\[87b.6\]]la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa thams cad sbyin pa/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sIr dus dang dus tshigs ma snyoms pa las mi nad chen 
[\[87b.7\]]po byung ste/_sems can phal cher skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab bo/_/de nas rgyal pos de dag mthong nas snying rje skyed de/_bdag gis 'di dag yongs su bskyab par bya zhing gas bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas yul thams cad na sman pa 'khod pa rnams bsdus te/_bsgo nas sems can de dag gi 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]nad kyi gzhi dang gnas dang snga nas gzhi yod pa rtogs nas/_de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyis gas ba dang sman thams cad bsdu bar byas so/_/de nas gsos te/_nor dang sman dang nad g.yog dang ldan par byas kyang yun ring mo zhig lon gyi bar du sems can de dag gso ma 
[\[88a.2\]]nus so/_/de nas rgyal pos sman pa thams cad bkug ste gus par byas nas/_kye ci'i phyir sems can 'di dag gso dka' bar gyur ces smras so/_/de nas sman pa rnams kyis dpyad de yon tan dang nyes pa gros 'thun par gsol pa/_lha dus ma snyoms pa dang khams ma snyoms pa las 
[\[88a.3\]]gyur pa lags pas/_legs par ma rtogs mod kyi lha 'on kyang sman sna gcig mchis te/_nya ro hi ta zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis la/_gal te rnyed na ni des gso bar nus lags so/_/de nas rgyal po nya ro hi ta kun tu tshol ba la zhugs te des tshol ba'i mi mang po bkye nas btsal kyang ma rnyed do/_/de 
[\[88a.4\]]nas de dag gis rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po 'chag tu gshegs pa dang /_nad pa de dag kyang gcig tu 'dus te 'khod nas rgyal po la gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag cag nad 'di las yongs su bskyab cing srog stsal du gsol/_de nas rgyal pos nad pa rnams 
[\[88a.5\]]kyi tshig snying rje rje skad zer zhing /_sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas snying rjes snying bskyod de/_'chi ma 'dzag cing ngu bzhin du phyung nas bsams pa/_bdag gis gzhan sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams zhi bar byed kyang ma nus na bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di lta bu dang rgyal srid kyi dbang 
[\[88a.6\]]phyug 'di 'dra ba ci dgos snyam mo/_/de snyam du bsams nas/_rgyal pos nor phal po che yongs su gtong ba byas te/_bu thu bo rgyal por bcug nas nye du dang skye bo rnams la nyes pa bshags te/_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang blon po rnams la bstod nas/_nad pa sdug pa rnams dbugs phyung ste brtul 
[\[88a.7\]]zhugs yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par blangs nas khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du song ste/_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa rnams gtor nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te smon lam btab pa/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can rnams shin tu phongs 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]par gyur te/_nad kyis yongs su gzir ba mthong nas bdag gis rang gi srog phangs pa yongs su btang ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis bdag chu klung zlog byed 'di'i nang du nya ro hi tar skye bar shog shig ces smras nas khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng nas bdag nyid kyis mchongs so/_/der lhung 
[\[88b.2\]]ba'i mod la shi nas chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du nya bo che ro hi ta zhes bya bar skyes so/_/de nas lha rnams kyis yul thams cad du chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du nya bo che ro hi ta zhes bya ba skyes pa de ni/_nad tshabs po ches gzir nas yun ring du lon pa rnams kyi bdud rtsi dang 'dra'o zhes sgra bsgrags so/_/
[\[88b.3\]]de nas thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po ches lag na mtshon cha thogs nas skon pa khyer te dong nas/_nya de gson por mtshon cha rnon po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sha rnams gcod pa la zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de yang de ltar lus gcod pa na/_sems can de dag la byams pas khyab par byas 
[\[88b.4\]]nas gdong mchi ma dron po 'dzag ste/_des bsams pa bdag gi sha khrag gis sems can 'di dag bde bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/_bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas/_de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rang gi sha khrag gis sems can de dag tshim par byas te/_bla 
[\[88b.5\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang sems ma log go/_/gang gi tshe sems can de dag gi nad de zhi bar gyur pa de'i tshe nya bo che ro hi ta des sgra bsgrags pa/_kye sems can dag khyed nyon cig_/nga ni rgyal po pad ma zhes bya ba de yin te ngas khyed kyi don du rang gi srog yongs 
[\[88b.6\]]su btang nas lus 'di lta bu blangs pa yin gyis/_nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang gang gi tshe nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/_yang khyed nad las gtan du yongs su thar bar bya ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa gzha' gsang 
[\[88b.7\]]gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes byas so/_/de skad thos nas/_skye bo'i tshogs de dag dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis dad pa rnyed de/_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dag gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/_shin tu dka' 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]ba byed pa khyod gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag cag khyod kyi nyan thos su gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[89a.2\]]rgyal po pad ma zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba byas pa des na nga 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bde ba mtha' yas pa nyams su myong bar gyur la/_da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na 
[\[89a.3\]]yang /_pho ba'i drod snyoms shing 'ju ba dang ldan te/_des na ngas zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar zhu bar gyur te/_nga nad med cing gnod pa med la nad med pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya 
[\[89a.4\]]ste/_sems can thams cad la snying rje bsgom par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//kham re zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[89a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam 
[\[89a.6\]]mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes 
[\[89a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gal te ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes pa bzhin du sems can rnams 
[\[89b.2\]]kyis kyang /_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes su zin na ni/_de lta na kham gyi tha ma dang kham gyi mjug lus pa gang yin pa de las kyang gal te yon gnas len pa po rnyed na/_de la ma byin nam/_bgo bsha' ma 
[\[89b.3\]]byas kyi bar du za bar mi byed la/_de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas dkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur ba zhig na ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes pa bzhin du/_sems can rnams kyis kyang 
[\[89b.4\]]sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang mi shes la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang mi shes pas na/_de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa'am bgo bsha' ma byas par za bar byed la/_de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas dkris 
[\[89b.5\]]shing 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bgo bsha' dag gi rnam par smin/_/ji ltar don ces 'gyur ba de/_/drang srong chen pos gsungs pa 
[\[89b.6\]]bzhin/_/sems can rnams kyis shes na ni/_/ma sbyin bar du mi za zhing /_/ser sna can du mi 'gyur la/_/de dag kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems/_/nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur na/_/gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis/_/bsgribs pa rnams kyis ma shes pa/_/de phyir kun tu 'dzin sems 
[\[89b.7\]]kyis/_/rtag tu ma byin za bar byed/_/de dag ser sna skyes nas kyang /_/sems ni kun nas dkris shing 'dug_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/_dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang bka' stsal la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[90a.2\]]pas sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod la/_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang brjod pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/_ngas 'das pa'i dus na slong ba'i phyir bdag za ba'i kham khar 'ongs zin pa las kyang yongs su btang ba de/_legs par rab tu nyon la yid 
[\[90a.3\]]la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos yongs su gang ba dang /_
[\[90a.4\]]rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid 
[\[90a.5\]]bskyangs so/_/rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa thams cad sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par 
[\[90a.6\]]yongs su gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/_/phyis re zhig na mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra bar mu ge chen po byung ngo /_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs mu ge'i dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa bkres shing lkog ma dang 'gram pa zhom pa/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi lus 'dra 
[\[90a.7\]]ba de dag 'dus shing tshogs la gcig tu 'phungs te/_rgyal po'i thad du dong nas rgyal bar gyur cig_/sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod de smras pa/_lha bdag cag mu ge'i 'jigs pa 'di las yongs su skyob cing /_srog stsal du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos mdzod pa la 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]bos te/_kwa ye mdzod pa mdzod na zas dang skom bdag cag dang skye bo'i tshogs 'di rnams kyi chog par yod dam zhes byas so/_/de thos nas mdzod srungs na re brtsis te lha la gsol bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/_/de nas rtsis mkhas pa rnams kyis brtsis na/_'di srid cig gi bar 
[\[90b.2\]]du yul na 'khod pa thams cad ni nyin gcig bzhin kham re re 'tshal la/_rgyal po ni zhal kham gnyis gnyis gsol ba mchis so zhes gsol to/_/de nas rgyal pos skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bos te bsgo ba/_'o na khyed nyin gcig bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang du shog la/_kham re re zos 
[\[90b.3\]]nas dengs shig ces byas so/_/de nas de dag nyin gcig bzhin du lhags te/_mi res kham re zos nas gar dga' bar 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas bram ze gzhan zhig rtsis de'i nang du ma zhen te/_gzhan las gtam thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha rtsis mdzad par yul 
[\[90b.4\]]mi'i nang du bdag gis thos kyis bdag la'ang kham gcig po de stsol cig ces byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos bdag nyid kham gnyis za ba las kham gcig bram ze la byin nas/_kham gcig ni yul mi dang thang mnyam par za bar byed do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la 
[\[90b.5\]]shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma yul bA rA Na sI na/_rgyal po byed pa de ni shin tu dka' ba byed cing 'dug gis de bdag gis bgam par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid bram ze'i cha lugs su sprul te/_gro la bab pa'i tshe/_
[\[90b.6\]]rgyal po'i thad du song nas rgyal bar gyur cig sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod nas smras pa/_lha bdag bkres kyis lha nyid kyi zhal kham gcig po des bdag la phan gdags par gsol/_de nas rgyal pos rang gi srog yongs su gtang bar chad nas/_snying rjes bdag 
[\[90b.7\]]gi kham gcig po de bram ze la byin nas smyung bar 'dug ste/_de lta bu'i tshul gyis zhag drug gi bar du zan bcad do/_/'on kyang skye bo phal po che de dag zan za ba mthong nas mchog tu dga' bar sems so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po de shin tu dka' ba byed pa mthong 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]nas bram ze'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas te/_rang gi gzugs su 'dug nas rgyal po la bstod pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so/_/ma nyes so khyed dka' ba la zhugs pa 'dis bdag dga' bar gyur to/_/skye dgu skyong ba 'di lta bu yod pa las na skye bo'i 
[\[91a.2\]]tshogs 'di dag ni mgon yod pa yin no/_/da sa bon thams cad thob cig ces yul phyogs su bsgo shig dang bdag gis zhag bdun na/_gang gis 'bru rnams rgyal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char dbab par bya'o zhes byas so/_/rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du byed du 
[\[91a.3\]]bcug go/_/brgya byin gyis kyang de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char phab ste/_des na mu ge de bzlog ste lo legs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de 
[\[91a.4\]]ni nga yin de/_ngas de lta bu'i mu ge byung na yang rang gi srog yongs su btang ste de lta bu'i sbyin pa dag byin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste sbyin pa dag sbyin no/_/bsod nams dag bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[91a.5\]]kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//chos skyong zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 
[\[91a.6\]]'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo 
[\[91a.7\]]byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe mi blun po lhas sbyin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i phyir/_glang po che nor skyong yang btang /_dug 
[\[91b.2\]]gi phye mas kyang gtor/_gshed ma'i mi yang bkye ste/_de bcom ldan 'das la yun ring po nas gshed ma dang dgra dang mi mdza' bar gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das ni de la byams pa'i dgongs pa dang phan pa'i dgongs pa dang thugs brtse ba'i dgongs pa nye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/_
[\[91b.3\]]dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lha sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i slad du brtson par bgyid la/_bcom ldan 'das ni 'di la byams pa'i dgongs pa dang phan pa'i dgongs pa dang thugs brtse ba'i dgongs pas nye bar gnas pa 
[\[91b.4\]]la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[91b.5\]]ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/_ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/_'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang 
[\[91b.6\]]bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa na/_na so gzhon pa'i tshe gsod du 'ongs pa na yang /_ngas 'di la sems sdang ba ma byas pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs 
[\[91b.7\]]pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos yongs su gang ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan 
[\[92a.2\]]la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa/_thams cad sbyin pa/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba zhig ste gtong ba chen po la gnas so/_/rgyal po de la btsun mo blo ngan ma zhes bya ba gtum 
[\[92a.3\]]zhing khro la gzu lums can zhig yod de/_bu gcig pa chos skyong zhes bya ba yang blo ngan ma de nyid las btsas so/_/gzhon nu chos skyong de yang dad pa dang ldan la/_dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_
[\[92a.4\]]chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa zhig ste/_de yang bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong na sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no/_/de nas de mkhan po'i thad du song nas byis pa dag dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob bo/_/phyis 
[\[92a.5\]]re zhig na rgyal po dpyid kyi dus kyi tshe/_shing rnams me tog rgyas pa dang /_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du/_btsun mo dam pa dang bcas pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyis zhabs 
[\[92a.6\]]'bring byas te skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ste/_skyed mos tshal de na/_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig rtse ba las btsun mo blo ngan ma phrag dog dang khro bas non te 'khrugs so/_/rgyal pos ni de la skom 'thungs pa'i phyed bskur ba dang /_de 'khrugs pas rgyal po la phrin spring 
[\[92a.7\]]ba gal te bdag khyod kyis 'thungs pa'i phyed 'thung bar gyur na/_bdag bu'i khrag 'thung bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/'dod pa sten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med de/_de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin chos can yin mod kyi/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]pa med par gyur nas/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyis phe'u btab kyang khro ba'i me 'bar te/_de je thur khros nas/_khyed deng la khye'u chos skyong gi mgul ba chod de de la khrag lud cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas khye'u chos skyong byis pa'i grwa khang na 'dug pas thos nas/_ngus te 'di skad 
[\[92b.2\]]du 'khor ba na sems can mi 'thun pa ni tha chad yin te 'di ltar khro ba'i dbang gis rang gi lus las byung ba'i bu yang gsod par byed do zhes smras so/_/de nas khye'u chos skyong rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/_yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba/_yab cig pha'o 
[\[92b.3\]]'tshal la ni bu sdug la bdag gis kyang nongs pa ma bgyis na bdag mi dgum par ci gnang /_rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/_bu sdug gal te khyod kyi mas bzod na ni ngas kyang bzod par bya'o/_/de nas chos skyong ngu zhing ma'i thad du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar 
[\[92b.4\]]te/_yum bzod pa mdzod la bdag gsod du ma stsal cig_/ces smras so/_/de skad du snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la/_gti zhing smra ba'i tshig thos kyang des bzod pa ma byas so/_/de nas gshed ma rnams kyis mtshon rnon pos khye'u chos skyong gi mgul pa 
[\[92b.5\]]bcad de/_btsun mo blo ngan ma la khrag blud na 'on kyang blo ngan ma 'gyod pa yang med do/_/khye'u chos skyong ni pha ma dang gshed ma rnams la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u 
[\[92b.6\]]chos skyong zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/btsun mo blo ngan ma ni lhas byin 'di kho na yin te de'i tshe nga gshed ma'i lag tu song ba na yang 'di la byams pa'i sems bskyed la/_da ltar nga la gsad par brtson pa na yang nga 'di la byams par sems/_phan par sems/_
[\[92b.7\]]snying brtse bar sems so/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//zhi ldan zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_
[\[93a.2\]]ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[93a.3\]]gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman 
[\[93a.4\]]zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na dge slong dag 'dus pa chen po gnyis su gyur te/_gcig ni dbyar zla 
[\[93a.5\]]'bring po la dbyar gnas par dam 'cha'o/_/gcig ni ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nya'i bar du dbyar gnas par dam 'cha' ste/_der dge slong dag lhung bzed rnams kha dog sgyur bar byed chos gos 'khru zhing btso blag byed tshem bu rnams 'drub par byed do/_/de nas re zhig 
[\[93a.6\]]na dge slong zhig chos gos 'drub par 'dod de khab kyi mig tu skud pa gzhug ma nus nas snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra ste/_'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa su yod/_'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa su yod ces zer ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93a.7\]]kyang de dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'chag sa na 'chag cing bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang nas/_gdangs zab cing snyan la zur phyin pa dang bya ka la ping ka'i skad lta bur yid du 'ong ba rnga bo che'i sgra ltar snyan pa'i gsung gis 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong nga ni 'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa'o/_/de nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa thos nas gus par bsgrim pas la gor du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag nas bzung ste rang gi mgo bo la bzhag nas smras pa/_
[\[93b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi phyag 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab bsags na/_'on kyang da dung bcom ldan 'das 'di skad du dge slong nga ni 'jig rten na bsod 
[\[93b.3\]]nams 'dod pa'o zhes gsung ngam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong nga ni bsod nams kyis chog mi shes te/_dge slong ngas ni bsod nams kyi ro myong bas na de'i phyir bsod nams kyis chog mi shes so/_/de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tsom 
[\[93b.4\]]thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams kyis chog mi mkhyen pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[93b.5\]]ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba gti mug dang bral ba/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su grol ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes dang 
[\[93b.6\]]shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa 'di lta bu la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/_'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[93b.7\]]ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba'i tshe/_nga bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams kyis chog mi shes pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_rgyal po'i pho brang zhi ba'i 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]sgra chen zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po zhi ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun 
[\[94a.2\]]dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la/_dge zhing bsam pa 
[\[94a.3\]]bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa thams cad sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/_/de nas 
[\[94a.4\]]de nang par sngar langs te mchod sbyin gyi 'dun khang du song nas zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin par byed do/_/skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin par byed/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos sbyin par byed cing /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig 
[\[94a.5\]]dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru rnams yongs su gtong bar byed do/_/'on kyang da bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams kyis chog mi shes so/_/de btsun mo'i 'khor du song nas btsun mo'i 'khor la zas dang skom sbyin par byed do/_/bu rnams dang /_blon po rnams dang /_dpa' 
[\[94a.6\]]bo dang /_ru mchog dang grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang /_yul mi rnams la zas dang skom sbyin par byed do/_/de nas rgyal po zhi ldan 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis mi rnams ni tshim par byas na srog chags phra mo rnams lus pa de dag ci zhig gis tshim par bya snyam mo/_/des bdog pa 
[\[94a.7\]]thams cad yongs su btang bas gos ya gcig tsam gyon par zad de lus nyi tshe las par gyur nas bsams pa/_srog chags phra mo rnams la ni rang gi lus sbyin par bya'o snyam mo/_/des lus bzhogs nas gang na sha sbrang dang sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]la sogs pa yod pa der lus bor te 'dug 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]nas bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du khrag gis tshim par byas so/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste de 'di snyam du sems te/_ci rgyal po zhi ldan 'di sems can rnams kyi don du 'di ltar byed dam/_'on te snying rjes byed cig gu snyam nas 
[\[94b.2\]]bdag gis 'di bgam par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bya rgod stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro lta bu dang snag tsa'i mdog can lta bur bdag nyid sprul te/_rgyal po zhi ldan gyi thad du song nas mchus mig bru bar gzas na yang rgyal po de skrag par ni ma gyur gyi/_byams pa'i mig chen pos 
[\[94b.3\]]bya rgod de la bltas nas smras pa/_bu nga'i lus las gang 'dod pa las ci dga' mgur gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dga' bar gyur te/_bram ze'i cha lugs su sprul nas rgyal po zhi ldan gyi mdun du bgreng ste smras pa/_rgyal po legs kyis khyod kyi 
[\[94b.4\]]mig gnyis nga la byin cig rgyal pos smras pa/_kye bram ze nga'i lus 'di la 'gog pa su yang med kyis ci 'dod pa khyer cig ces byas so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lhag par dga' bar gyur nas bram ze'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas te/_rang gi gzugs su 'dug nas rgyal 
[\[94b.5\]]po la spro ba bskyed de smras pa/_kye rgyal po legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi blo shin tu nges sa khyod kyi smon lam bskyod du med do/_/sems can rnams la khyod kyi snying rje chen po'i rgyun 'bab par gyur to/_/khyod 'jigs par bya ba'i chos rnams la 'di ltar 'jigs pa med pa 
[\[94b.6\]]las na khyod ring po mi thogs par brtson pa 'dis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zhi 
[\[94b.7\]]ldan du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_de'i tshe yang nga bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa rnams kyis chog ma shes na da ltar lta ci smos/_dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste sbyin pa dag sbyin no/_/bsod nams dag bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gzugs bzang zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po 
[\[95a.2\]]rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis 
[\[95a.3\]]bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_
[\[95a.4\]]zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[95a.5\]]nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog bshad do/_/'khor brgya phrag du mas kyang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das la chos ro dang ldan no cog mnyan pa de'i tshe dge slong dag the 
[\[95a.6\]]tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sems can 'di rnams chos rin po che'i snod du yang gyur te/_gus par mnyan par sems pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin 
[\[95a.7\]]gshegs pas ji ltar gus pa bskyed de chos mnyan pa dang bzung ba de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po gzugs bzang zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de de'i ring la 'byor pa 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang 
[\[95b.2\]]ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_
[\[95b.3\]]skye dgu la byams pa/_thams cad sbyin pa/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/_/de nas rgyal po de la btsun mo mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying 
[\[95b.4\]]lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig yod do/_/bu gcig pa mdzes ldan zhes bya ba sdug cing phongs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/_bzod pa dang ldan pa/_mi 'thun pa med pa zhig kyang yod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po gzugs bzang chos 'dod par gyur nas des blon po thams 
[\[95b.5\]]cad bsogs te smras pa/_yul gyi gtso bo dag nga chos 'dod kyis nga'i chos tshol cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas blon po de dag gis thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/_rgyal po chen po chos ni dkon te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na gdod chos 'byung ngo zhes gda'o/_/de nas rgyal pos gser 'bum 
[\[95b.6\]]yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/_yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas nga'i yul na chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gser 'bum yod pa'i snod 'di sbyin no/_/bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur zhing bstod par bya'o zhes kyang byas so/_/de nas yun ring po zhig lon kyang chos smra ba 
[\[95b.7\]]su yang mi snang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po chos kyi phyir gdung zhing yi chad do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/_des rgyal po chos kyi phyir phongs shing 'dug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rgyal po gzugs bzang bgam par bya'o snyam mo/_/
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]de nas bdag nyid gnod sbyin rkang lag dang mig mi sdug pa zhig tu sprul nas/_rgyal po 'khor du ma'i nang na 'dug pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci khyod chos 'dod ce na/_ngas khyod la chos bstan to/_/de nas rgyal pos chos kyi sgra thos pas dga' zhing mchog 
[\[96a.2\]]tu dga' ba skyes nas gnod sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba pa chos smros shig ngas mnyan par bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/_kye ma rgyal po chen po bde zhing 'khod pa ni chos smra bar byed kyi nga ni bkres kyis je zan byin cig_/de nas rgyal pos de thos nas/_zho shas 
[\[96a.3\]]'tsho ba rnams la 'di'i bza' ba dang bca' ba'i rnam pa dag 'on cig ces bsgo'o/_/gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/_nga ni 'phral la bsad pa'i sha dang khrag za zhing 'thung ba yin gyis bu gcig pa mdzes ldan 'di nga la byin cig_/de nas rgyal pos de thos nas mchog tu mi dga' bar 
[\[96a.4\]]gyur te/_brgya lam na lan cig deng lta zhig chos kyi sgra dang phrad na de yang rin thang gdab tu med pas nyo dgos so snyam mo/_/de nas gzhon nu mdzes ldan gyis de thos nas yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/_lha bzod pa mdzad de lha'i dgongs pa rdzogs par mdzad la 
[\[96a.5\]]bdag gsang ba pa'i zas su stsal bar gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos bu gcig pa sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba bzod pa dang ldan pa mi 'thun pa med pa de chos kyi don du gnod sbyin la byin no/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 
[\[96a.6\]]kyis rgyal po dang 'khor rnams la khye'u'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams so sor bcad cing bcad cing zos pa dang khrag kyang 'thungs par bstan to/_/rgyal po des mthong na chos 'dod pa'i phyir mi dga' bar ma gyur to/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po la smras pa/_rgyal po nga ma 
[\[96a.7\]]'grangs kyis yang byin cig ces byas so/_/rgyal pos de la snying du sdug pa'i chung ma yang byin no/_/de nas de yang thabs de kho na ltar zos par bstan to/_/de nas yang rgyal po la smras pa/_kye rgyal po nga da dung ma 'grangs so/_/de nas rgyal pos gnod sbyin la smras pa/_bu ngas 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]bu gcig pa dang sdug pa'i chung ma yang byin zin na yang ci 'dod/_gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/_rang gi lus nga la byin cig dang des na nga 'grangs par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te rang gi lus khyod la byin na ngas ji ltar chos mnyan gyis/_sngar nga la chos je ston dang 
[\[96b.2\]]ngas chos thos pa'i 'og tu rang gi lus yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes byas so/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po dam gyi 'og tu bcug nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du chos bstan pa/_sdug pa dag las mya ngan skye/_/sdug pa dag las 'jigs pa skye/_/'jigs pa dag 
[\[96b.3\]]las rnam grol rnams/_/mya ngan med na ga la 'jigs/_/de nas rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos ma thag tu yid rab tu sim par gyur te/_dbang po dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas gnod sbyin la smras pa/_gnod sbyin nga'i lus 'di ji dga' bar gyis shig ces byas so/_/
[\[96b.4\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo bar rig nas/_gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mi snang bar byas te/_rang gi gzugs su 'dug nas dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i mig dang ldan pas lag pa ya 
[\[96b.5\]]gcig gis ni bu bzung ya gcig gis ni chung ma bzung nas rgyal po spro ba bskyed de smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi go cha brtan gyis brtson pa 'dis ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[96b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/khyod kyi sdug pa'i mi dang phrad pa yang 'di yin no zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka bdag gi chos kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[96b.7\]]pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzugs bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/gzhon nu mdzes ldan ni kun dga' bo yin no/_/mdzes ldan ma ni grags 'dzin ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe yang ngas chos kyi phyir gnyen sdug 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]pa yongs su gtong ba dang rang gi srog yongs su gtong ba byas na da ltar lta ci smos/_dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_chos la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/chos la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas 
[\[97a.2\]]nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs 
[\[97a.3\]]pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po dgu pa/_mdza' bo'i bu mo zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu 
[\[97a.4\]]rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[97a.5\]]lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas 
[\[97a.6\]]pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang legs par mchod pa byed 
[\[97a.7\]]pa dang legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni tshangs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas tshangs pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang legs 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]par mchod pa byed pa dang legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni slob dpon dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas slob dpon dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo 
[\[97b.2\]]byed pa dang legs par mchod pa byed pa dang legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[97b.3\]]dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang legs par mchod pa byed pa dang legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni me dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas me dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[97b.4\]]phyir ro/_/dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang legs par mchod pa byed pa dang legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni lha dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas lha 
[\[97b.5\]]dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/pha ma gnyis ni tshangs pa ste/_/de bzhin dang po'i slob dpon yin/_/bu yi kun sbyin 'os gyur pa/_/
[\[97b.6\]]mi yang yin la lha yang yin/_/de phyir de gnyis phyag gi gnas/_/dril ba dang ni khrus rnams dang /_/rkang pa dag kyang bkru ba dang /_/yang na zas dang skom rnams dang /_/gos dang mal cha stan rnams kyis/_/mkhas pa dag gis bkur sti bya/_/pha ma dag la bkur byas pa/_/
[\[97b.7\]]des na mkhas pa de dag ni/_/'dir yang smad par mi 'gyur la/_/shi na'ang mtho ris dga' bar 'gyur/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/_dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha ma la sri zhu che ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_
[\[98a.2\]]skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/_ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes 
[\[98a.3\]]zin pa na/_pha ma la sri zhu che ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/_'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug 
[\[98a.4\]]bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba'i tshe ma la gnod pa chung ngu byas pas kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur la/_bkur sti chung ngu byas pas kyang bde ba chen po myong bar gyur pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_
[\[98a.5\]]ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na ded dpon mdza' bo zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam 
[\[98a.6\]]pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las bu dag byung yang shi bar gyur te/_de lag pa la rko ma tshugs bcas nas bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu yang med bu 
[\[98a.7\]]mo yang med pas bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas de la kha cig gis gdams ngag bstan pa/_gal te khyod kyi bu byung bar gyur na de la bu mo'i ming thogs shig dang de ltar byas na 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]de yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dang lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te 'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal 
[\[98b.2\]]gyi lha dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang /_chos 'thun pa pa dang /_rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/_'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye 
[\[98b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/_gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa 
[\[98b.4\]]las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te gsum gang zhe na pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 
[\[98b.5\]]'dug la/_sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos nas de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so/_/bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags pa yang shes la/_ma chags pa yang shes 
[\[98b.6\]]pa dang /_dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang /_bu chags pa yang shes pa dang /_gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang /_khye'u yang shes la bu mo yang shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na ni lto g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so/_/gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon 
[\[98b.7\]]logs su rten cing gnas so/_/de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa jo bo bdag la sras chags te/_bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/_/de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg lag 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo /_/bdag gi bu rung bar gyur cig_/mi rung bar ma gyur cig_/gsos na bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig_/gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog 
[\[99a.2\]]shig_/nor skal la spyod par shog shig_/bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig_/bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste sbyin pa dag byin la/_bsod nams dag byas nas/_de gnyis gang dang gang du 
[\[99a.3\]]skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/_/de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir/_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_tsha ba'i tshe tsha 
[\[99a.4\]]ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang /_ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang 
[\[99a.5\]]bska ba ma yin pa rnams te kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis brten cing /_do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par bklubs te/_lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang 
[\[99a.6\]]khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang /_des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/_/de nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha 
[\[99a.7\]]dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba/_sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/_de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]par byed de/_nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di mdza' bo'i bu yin la bu mo'ang yin pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming ni mdza' bo'i bu mo zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u mdza' bo'i bu mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma 
[\[99b.2\]]gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur 
[\[99b.3\]]to/_/de'i pha ni rgya mtsho chen por song nas de nyid du shi'o/_/de nas gang gi tshe mdza' bo'i bu mo cher skyes pa de'i tshe ma la smras pa/_yum bdag gi pha sngon las ji lta bu zhig gis 'tsho bar gyur/_bdag gis kyang de'i rjes su de dang 'dra bar bgyi 'tshal lo/_/de nas mas bsams 
[\[99b.4\]]pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di la rgya mtsho chen po'i tshong pa byed byed do zhes byas na ni/_'di yang brgya la rgya mtsho chen por song nas de nyid du 'chi bar 'ong ngo snyam nas smras pa/_bu khyod kyi pha ni sngon yul tshong pa byed byed kyis khyod kyang 'dod na yul tshong pa gyis shig ces byas so/_/
[\[99b.5\]]de nas des yul tshong pa'i las byas na dang po'i nyin par kAr ShA pa Na bzhi rnyed de/_de ma la byin nas yum 'dis dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa mdzod cig ces byas so/_/de nas re zhig na gzhan zhig na re khyod kyi pha spos kyi tshong 
[\[99b.6\]]pa byed byed do zhes byas pa dang /_des yul tshong pa'i las btang ste spos kyi tshong byas so/_/de nas kAr ShA pa Na brgyad rnyed de/_de dag kyang des ma la byin no/_/de nas re zhig na gzhan zhig na re khyod kyi pha gser dngul gyi tshong pa byed byed do zhes byas pa dang /_des 
[\[99b.7\]]spos 'tshong ba btang ste/_gser dang dngul gyi tshong byas so/_/de nas dang po'i nyin par kAr ShA pa Na bcu drug rnyed de/_de dag kyang des ma la byin no/_/de nas phyi de nyin par kAr ShA pa Na sum cu rtsa gnyis rnyed de de dag kyang des ma la byin no/_/de nas re zhig na gser 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]dngul gyi tshong pa phrag dog gi rang bzhin can dag gis khye'u de gnas thams cad kyi nyo tshong gi rgyus shes par rig nas smras pa/_mdza' bo'i bu mo khyod kyi pha ni rgya mtsho chen po'i tshong pa byed byed na/_ci khyod la chos ma yin pa'i 'tsho ba 'di ci dgos khyod sus 
[\[100a.2\]]sems can ngan pa'i nyo tshong gi las byed du bcug ces byas so/_/de nas de gser dngul gyi tshong pa'i tshig gis bskul nas ma'i thad du song ste smras pa/_yum bdag gi pha sngon rgya mtsho chen po'i tshong pa byed byed ces de skad grags pas/_bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mchi 
[\[100a.3\]]'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig_/mas smras pa bu gcig de ni bden mod kyi/_'on kyang khyod byis pa yin la bu gcig pa yang yin gyis nga bor te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du ma 'gro shig_/de nas de mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen phrag dog gi rang bzhin can dag gis brid pas ldog tu 
[\[100a.4\]]ma btub nas/_des ma'i tshig ma mnyan te grong khyer bA rA Na sIr dril bsgrags nas/_kye bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i tshong pa rnams khyed nyon cig_/ded dpon mdza' bo'i bu mo rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gro bar chad kyis khyed kyi nang nas ded dpon mdza' bo'i bu mo dang lhan cig tu sho 
[\[100a.5\]]gam mi dgos pa dang la gcan gyi btsas mi dgos pa dang gru btsas mi dgos par rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gro 'dod pa de dag rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong sta gon gyis shig ces byas nas dge mtshan dang bkra shis dang bde legs su 'gyur ba rnams byas te/_g.yog 
[\[100a.6\]]'khor tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig chas te/_shing rta dang /_khur dang /_sgye dang /_skon pa dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong bskyas so/_/de'i ma ni snying byams pas ci bya gtol med nas mchi ma 'dzag cing ngu bzhin phyung ste rkang pa 
[\[100a.7\]]la 'jus nas bu gcig nga bor te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du ma 'gro shig ces byas so/_/de ltar snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smre ba'i skad phyung yang des brtul te ma'i mgo bo la rdog pas bsnun nas 'gron po rnams dang chas so/_/de nas mas smras pa/_
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]bu khyod kyis las 'di'i rnam par smin pa myong bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas re zhig na des grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_yul po che de dag mthong nas/_rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin to/_/de nas des kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyas gru 
[\[100b.2\]]nyos nas zho shas 'tsho ba rnam pa lnga ste gru pa dang /_chu 'phyag pa dang /_mnyan pa dang /_byi'u zul mkhan dang /_ru skya 'dzin pa rnams kyang khrid de lan gsum dril bsgrags nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na gru de nya'i rigs chu srin ma ka ras ma rung 
[\[100b.3\]]bar byas te bub par byas so/_/de nas mdza' bo'i bu mos spang leb gcig la zin nas skam la phyin to/_/de nas skam la song song nas thag ring po zhig nas grong khyer longs spyod byed ces bya ba mthong nas/_de de'i logs su song ba dang re zhig na de'i nang nas lha'i bu mo 
[\[100b.4\]]gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa bzhi zhig byung nas/_de dag na re mdza' bo'i bu mo tshur spyon khyod byon pa legs so/_/'di dag ni bdag cag gi zas gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_skom gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_gos gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_gzims khang lags 
[\[100b.5\]]te/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba lags kyis tshur spyon dang longs spyad par bgyi'o zhes zer nas/_de de dag dang lhan cig tu lo du mar dga' ba myong ste/_'di ltar de ni bsod 
[\[100b.6\]]nams byed byed pa dang dge ba byed byed pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de'i lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba las 'gror mi ster nas/_de lho phyogs kyi lam der 'gror mi ster ba dang lhag par yang der 'gro 'dod par gyur nas re zhig na yang lho phyogs 
[\[100b.7\]]su song ba dang grong khyer rtag tu myos zhes bya ba mthong ste de de'i sgor phyin pa dang re zhig na de'i nang nas kyang lha'i bu mo ches gzugs bzang zhing ches blta na sdug la ches mdzes pa brgyad byung nas de dag na re mdza' bo'i bu mo tshur spyon khyod byon pa legs so/_/'di dag ni bdag 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]cag gi zas gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_skom gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_gos gzhag pa'i khang pa dang gzims khang lags te/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba 
[\[101a.2\]]lags kyis tshur spyon dang longs spyad par bgyi'o zhes zer nas/_de de dag dang lhan cig tu lo du mar dga' ba myong ste/_'di ltar de ni bsod nams byed byed pa dang dge ba byed byed pa dang rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de'i yang lho phyogs kyi lam du song 
[\[101a.3\]]ba las 'gror mi ster nas/_de lho phyogs kyi lam der 'gror mi ster ba dang lhag par yang der 'gro 'dod par gyur nas re zhig na yang lho phyogs su song ba dang grong khyer dga' byed ces bya ba mthong ste/_de de'i sgor phyin pa dang re zhig na de'i nang nas kyang lha'i bu mo ches gzugs bzang 
[\[101a.4\]]zhing blta na sdug la ches mdzes pa bcu drug byung nas de dag na re mdza' bo'i bu mo tshur spyon khyod byon pa legs so/_/'di dag ni bdag cag gi zas gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_skom gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_gos gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_gzims khang lags te/_nor bu dang /_
[\[101a.5\]]mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba lags kyis tshur spyon dang longs spyad par bgyi'o/_/zhes zer nas/_de de dag dang lhan cig tu lo du mar dga' ba myong ste/_'di ltar de ni bsod nams byed byed 
[\[101a.6\]]pa dang dge ba byed byed pa dang rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de'i yang lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba las 'gror mi ster nas de lho phyogs kyi lam der 'gror mi ster ba dang lhag par yang de 'gro 'dod par gyur nas/_re zhig na yang lho phyogs su song ba 
[\[101a.7\]]dang khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshangs pa'i bla ma zhes bya ba mthong ste/_de de'i sgor phyin pa dang re zhig na de'i nang nas kyang lha'i bu mo ches gzugs bzang zhing ches blta na sdug la ches mdzes pa sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste/_de dag na re mdza' bo'i bu mo tshur spyon khyod byon pa legs so/_/'di dag 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]ni bdag cag gi zas gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_skom gzhag pa'i khang pa dang /_gos gzhag pa'i khang pa dang gzims khang lags te/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dngul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[101b.2\]]gang ba lags kyis tshur spyon dang longs spyad par bgyi'o zhes zer nas/_de dag dang lhan cig tu lo du mar dga' ba myong ste/_'di ltar de ni bsod nams byed byed pa dang dge ba byed byed pa dang rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de'i yang lho phyogs su song ba 
[\[101b.3\]]las 'gror mi ster nas/_de lho phyogs kyi lam der 'gror mi ster ba dang /_lhag par yang der 'gro 'dod de ji tsam du lho phyogs su song ba de tsam du de'i 'dod pa skye'o/_/re zhig na yang lho phyogs su song ba dang lcags kyi mkhar zhig mthong ste/_de de'i nang du song ba dang nang 
[\[101b.4\]]du song ma thag tu de'i sgo bcad do/_/de nas de bas kyang nang du song ba dang de'i sgo yang bcad do/_/de bas kyang nang du song ba dang re zhig na mi bo che zhig mthong na/_de'i mgo bo la lcags kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa 
[\[101b.5\]]zhig 'khor zhing 'dug la de'i mgo bo las rnag khrag ci 'dzag pa rnams de'i zas su za'o/_/de nas mdza' bo'i bu mos mi de la dris pa/_kwa'i mi khyod su yin/_de na re nga ni ma la gnod pa byed byed pa yin no/_/zhes zer ro/_/mi des smras ma thag tu mdza' bo'i bu mos las de 
[\[101b.6\]]dran nas nga yang ma la gnod pa byed byed pa yin pa snyam gyis/_nga yang las de kho nas 'dir khrid pa lta snyam mo/_/de nas de'i skabs su nam mkha' las sgra byung ste/_bcings pa gang yin pa de dag ni grol bar gyur to/_/grol ba gang yin pa de dag ni bcings so zhes zer te de skad zer 
[\[101b.7\]]ma thag tu mi de'i mgo bo la 'khor lo mi snang bar gyur nas mdza' bo'i bu mo'i mgo bo la byung ngo /_/de nas mi des mdza' bo'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyis dkos thag pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyed ni longs byed rtag tu myos/_/dga' byed tshangs pa'i bla ma yi/_/
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]las ni thal nas kyang /_/ci yi phyir na 'di ru 'ongs/_/mdza' bo'i bu mos smras pa/_bdag ni longs byed rtag tu myos/_/dga' byed tshangs pa'i bla ma yi/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]las ni thal nas kyang /_/'dod chen gyis ni 'dir 'ongs so/_/las 
[\[102a.2\]]kyis ring du khrid par byed/_/ring po nas kyang las kyis khrid/_/gang du las kyi rnam par smin/_/der ni las kyis khrid par byed/_/las kyi rnam smin gang zhig gis/_/bdag gi srog ni gcod byed pa/_/kun tu 'bar zhing rab 'bar ba'i/_/'khor lo mgo la 'khor bar gyur/_/
[\[102a.3\]]mi des smras pa/_khyod kyis rab tu sdang sems kyis/_/ma cig dka' ba byed byed pa'i/_/mgo bor rdog pas bsnun pas na/_/de yi las kyi 'bras bu yin/_/mdza' bo'i bu mos smras pa/_lo grangs stong phrag du yi bar/_/bdag gi srog ni gcod byed pa/_/kun tu 'bar zhing 
[\[102a.4\]]rab 'bar ba'i/_/'khor lo mgo la 'khor bar 'gyur/_/mi des smras pa/_lo ni stong phrag drug cu dang /_/brgya phrag drug cu'i bar srid du/_/lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba ni/_/khyod kyi mgo la 'khor bar 'gyur/_/mdza' bo'i bu mos smras pa/_kye gzhan yang 'dir 'ong ba 
[\[102a.5\]]'ga' lta yod dam/_mi des smras pa/_su 'di lta bu'i las byed byed pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas mdza' bo'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas sems can rnams la snying rje bskyed de/_mi de la smras pa/_kye nga ni sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'khor lo 'di mgo bo'i steng 
[\[102a.6\]]du 'dzin par 'dod kyis/_'di lta bu'i las byed byed pa gzhan su yang 'dir 'ong bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/de skad ces smras ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' mdza' bo'i bu mo'i 'khor lo de/_mgo bo las gyen du 'phags nas ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' 
[\[102a.7\]]la 'dug go/_/de ni shi nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' bo'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_ngas nyo tshong byas nas ma la kAr ShA pa Na phul ba'i las 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]de'i rnam par smin pas ni grong khyer chen po bzhir bde ba chen po myong ngo /_/ngas ma la gnod pa chung ngu byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste pha ma la bkur sti bya'o/_/gnod pa mi bya'o/_/
[\[102b.2\]]'on kyang mdza' bo'i bu mo so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i tshe nyes pa de dag lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/_de nyid du lha'i bur gyur pa'i yon tan gang yin pa de lta bu ni thob par 'gyur ro zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag bu'i pha ma gnyis 
[\[102b.3\]]ni dka' ba byed byed pa dang skom ldud pa dang gso ba dang skyed pa dang nu ma snun pa dang 'dzam bu'i gling bkra ba ston pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te bus pha ma gnyis phrag pa g.yas g.yon du bzhag ste/_lo brgya'i bar du khyer ram/_yang na sa chen po 'di nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_
[\[102b.4\]]bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_g.yas su 'khyil ba dang /_de lta bu dag gis bkang ba'i dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug kyang /_de tsam gyis ni bus pha ma gnyis la drin sobs pa 
[\[102b.5\]]'am/_phan gdags par mi 'gyur gyi/_gang gi pha ma de gnyis dad pa med pa las dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la 'dzud pa dang /_'dul ba dang /_gnas par byed pa dang /_'jog par byed pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa las tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ser 
[\[102b.6\]]sna can las gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_shes rab 'chal pa las shes rab phun sum tshogs pa la 'dzud pa dang /_'dul ba dang gnas par byed pa dang /_'jog par byed pa de tsam gyis na/_bus pha ma gnyis la drin bsabs pa'am phan btags par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[102b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//ri bong zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis 
[\[103a.2\]]bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_
[\[103a.3\]]zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong 
[\[103a.4\]]dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/
[\[103a.5\]]de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u zhig btsas nas de bskyed bsrings te cher gyur to/_/de'i pha ni nor yang zad par gyur longs spyod kyang zad par gyur to/_/de yang mdza' bo dang /_
[\[103a.6\]]nye du dang rtsa lag gi 'dab che ba zhig ste/_bu de dus dus su nye du rnams kyi thad du gtong ngo /_/de nas de nye du de dag gis ci nas de dag kyang phyir zhing mdza' bar gyur pa de lta bur bzhen to/_/phyis re zhig na de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[103a.7\]]'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun tu bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]nas kyang dga' bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/_de thos pas 'khor ba la nyes 
[\[103b.2\]]par lta ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar 'gyur te/_pha ma gnyis kyis gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas nye du de dag dang lhan cig tu 'du zhing gnas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyim pa dang 'du ba las 
[\[103b.3\]]bzlog nas dgon par gnas pa la 'dzud par mdzad na de der mi dga'o/_/de nas de bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum gyi bar du khyim pa dang 'du ba las bzlog par mdzad de/_bu khyim pa dang 'du ba 'di ni nyes pa du ma dang ldan te/_mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang /_
