[\[103b.4\]]phangs pa dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /_chags par 'gyur ba dang /_tsher ma dang 'dra ba dang /_rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang /_snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang /_lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /_lus kyis shes par bya ba'i 
[\[103b.5\]]reg bya rnams dang /_sdug pa dang /_phangs pa dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /_chags par 'gyur ba dang /_tsher ma dang 'dra ba dag yod do zhes gsungs so/_/gang du gnas bcas na/_dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dgon pa'i 
[\[103b.6\]]yon tan dag kyang rnam grangs du mar bsngags so/_/de nas re zhig na rigs kyi bu des dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas dgon par gnas pa la yang rtag tu brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan 
[\[103b.7\]]par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob 
[\[104a.2\]]pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas des sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran la bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu dka' ba spyod pa yang mthong nas/_
[\[104a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste gus pa dang bcas pas bstod cing ri mo byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu 'di lan gsum gyi bar du grong nas 
[\[104a.4\]]bzlog ste/_dgon pa'i gnas la btsud pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_
[\[104a.5\]]na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu 'di lan gsum 
[\[104a.6\]]gyi bar du grong nas bzlog ste/_dgon pa'i gnas la btsud pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/_'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan 
[\[104a.7\]]dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba'i tshe yang ngas rang gi srog yongs su btang nas/_rigs kyi bu 'di grong nas bzlog ste dgon pa'i gnas la btsud pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri'i sul chu 'bab cing me tog dang 'bras bu dang rdo gu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig na drang srong dka' thub drag po spyod pa zas su 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dang chus 'tsho ba/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi g.yang gzhi dang /_shing shun gyon pa me'i sbyin sreg 
[\[104b.2\]]byed pa zhig 'dug go/_/drang srong de'i mdza' bo yang ri bong mi'i skad shes pa zhig yod de/_de nyin gcig bzhin du drang srong gi thad du dus gsum du 'gro'o/_/der song nas gus par smra ba byas te/_gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par dga' bar byas nas de gnyis phyir zhing mdza' 
[\[104b.3\]]bar gyur te pha spad dang 'dra bar 'dug go/_/phyis re zhig na than chen byung nas des chu klung dang khron pa rnams chu chung bar gyur la shing rnams kyang me tog dang 'bras bu med par gyur to/_/de nas drang srong de gnas de na bza' ba med pas mi dga' nas des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi g.yang gzhi dang shing 
[\[104b.4\]]shun rnams kyang brtul to/_/de nas ri bong des de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas drang srong chen po gar bzhud ces dris so/_/drang srong na re da ni grong du 'gro ste der btsos pa'i slongs mos 'tsho bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas des drang srong gi tshig thos nas gdung bar gyur te pha dang bral ba tsam du 
[\[104b.5\]]bsams nas/_drang srong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_bdag mi dor bar gsol/_gcig tu na khyim gyi gnas ni nyes pa du mas gang la dgon pa'i gnas ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes byas so/_/de skad lan du ma byas kyang de ldog tu ma btub bo/_/
[\[104b.6\]]de nas ri bong gis smras pa/_gal te mi 'gror mi rung na yang deng tsam gzhes la/_sang gar dgyes par bzhud cig ces byas so/_/de nas drang srong de 'di snyam du sems te/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa 'di dag ni sdug cing sogs pa la sred pas na/_'dis ni bdag deng kha zas 
[\[104b.7\]]sna 'ga' zhig la g.yar 'dren par 'dod gor ma chag snyam ste des de la khas blangs so/_/de nas nyin par gyi bya ba byas zin te/_dro la bab pa na ri bong 'ongs nas drang srong de la bskor ba byas te bzod pa gsol ba/_drang srong chen po gang bdag gis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pas bya mi 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]bya mi shes nas khyod la cung zad nongs pa ci mchis pa bdag la khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces smras nas/_tsham tshom med par me'i nang du mchongs so/_/de nas drang srong de mi dga' bar gyur nas ngu bzhin phyung nas bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du la 
[\[105a.2\]]gor du blangs nas bu 'di ci byed ces byas so/_/ri bong na re drang srong chen po dgon pa'i gnas la dga' bas bdag gi sha gsol la zhag gcig gi bar du 'tsho bar mdzod cig_/nga gcig tu na/_nags khung dag tu skyes pa'i ri bong la/_sran sde'u til dang 'bras rnams ci ma 
[\[105a.3\]]mchis/_/bdag gi lus 'di zhugs la sgrol mdzod la/_/gsol te deng tsam dka' thub tshal du bzhugs/_/de nas drang srong des ri bong gi tshig thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te/_smras pa/_gal te de lta na khyod snying du sdug pa dang dgon pa snying du sdug pa'i phyir 'di nyid du srog 
[\[105a.4\]]bor yang sla'i grong du ni bdag mi 'gro'o zhes byas so/_/de nas ri bong gis tshig de thos nas sems dga' bar gyur te nam mkha' la gyen du bltas nas gsol ba btab ste/_bdag ni dgon par song nas kyang /_/dben pa la ni yid dga' na/_/de yi bden pa'i tshig gis na/_/
[\[105a.5\]]dbang chen char ni 'bab par shog_/ces kyang smras so/_/de skad ces smras ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i mthus dbang chen gyi gnas kun tu g.yos so/_/lha rnams ni 'og tu shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/_ci las gyur snyam pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin par 
[\[105a.6\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas re zhig na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas mal der dbang chen gyi char phab nas phyir yang rtswa dang /_gel pa dang /_sman dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/de nas drang srong des dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri bong la brten nas/_
[\[105a.7\]]de na gnas bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas drang srong des ri bong la smras pa/_kye ri bong dka' ba byed pa dang brtson pa dang snying rje ba'i rang bzhin 'dis ci zhig bsgrub par sems des smras pa/_'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas drang srong 
[\[105b.2\]]des tshig de thos nas ri bong la smras pa/_gang gi tshe khyod sangs rgyas su gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang dran par gyis shig_/ri bong gis smras pa de ltar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na ri bong du gyur pa gang yin 
[\[105b.3\]]pa de ni nga yin no/_/drang srong ni rigs kyi bu 'di kho na nyid yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_dge ba'i grogs po dang /_dge ba'i rten dang gnas par bya'i/_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_sdig pa'i 
[\[105b.4\]]rten dang gnas par mi bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dir bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na/_sems la 'di 
[\[105b.5\]]lta bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa byung ste/_'di lta ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_dge ba'i grogs po dang /_dge ba'i rten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i byed lags kyi sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma lags so snyam bgyid do/_/
[\[105b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_dge ba'i grogs po dang /_dge ba'i rten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed yin gyi/_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma yin no/_/
[\[105b.7\]]zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_dge ba'i grogs po dang /_dge ba'i rten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ril po dang ma 'dres pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su byang ba yin gyi/_sdig pa'i 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]bshes gnyen dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba'i chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rga 
[\[106a.2\]]ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can rnams rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i 
[\[106a.3\]]chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de bas na rnam grangs 'di kho nas khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_dge ba'i grogs po dang /_dge ba'i rten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ril po dang ma 'dres pa 
[\[106a.4\]]dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su byang ba yin gyi/_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma yin no zhes kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces 
[\[106a.5\]]bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//chos tshol zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi 
[\[106a.6\]]rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_
[\[106a.7\]]mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni lugs kyis 
[\[106b.2\]]nang par sngar langs te/_bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir song nas rang gis lag dar te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'phyag par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la brel ba zhig byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can bsod nams 
[\[106b.3\]]'dod pa rnams la bsod nams kyi gnas bstan pa'i phyir nyid kyis phyag dar te phyags ma bsnams nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'phyag par mdzad do/_/nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_nam gru la sogs pas kyang 
[\[106b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das mthong nas phyag dar byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phyags nas 'dun khang du gshegs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas 
[\[106b.5\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lnga po 'di dag ni phyag dar byas pa'i phan yon yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bdag nyid sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_lha rnams mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[106b.6\]]mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang /_lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba'o/_/de nas mgon med zas sbyin yang phyogs der phyin nas des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dag dang thabs cig tu phyag dar te/_rgyal 
[\[106b.7\]]bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phyags so zhes de skad thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dag dang thabs cig tu phyag dar de phyag dar mdzad pa de'i steng du bdag ji ltar 'gro snyam mo/_/de nas mgon med zas sbyin shin tu 'dzem zhing ngo tsha dang ldan pa'i 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]sems kyis de kho na'i gnas na sdod do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 'di su zhig ces smras so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa mgon med zas sbyin lags 
[\[107a.2\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das la shin tu 'dzem zhing ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dag dang thabs cig tu phyag dar te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phyag dar mdzad pas de'i steng du sug pas brdzis te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi bar mi 'tshal 
[\[107a.3\]]lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos la gus la/_dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bla ma ni chos yin pas na/_sangs rgyas kyi bka' kha ton gyis la nang du shog shig_/de nas mgon med zas 
[\[107a.4\]]sbyin tshigs su bcad de brjod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/
[\[107a.5\]]yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[107a.6\]]'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos la zhe sa skyes shing gus pa skyes te/_chos kyi bsngags pa 'ba' zhig gsung ba ngo mtshar lags so/_/
[\[107a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/_ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa'i tshe chos la zhe sa skyes shing gus pa skyes te/_chos kyi bsngags pa 'ba' zhig brjod pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba 
[\[107b.2\]]ci yod/_'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma 
[\[107b.3\]]grol ba'i tshe yang ngas chos kyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su gtong ba byas pa de/_legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_
[\[107b.4\]]rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 
[\[107b.5\]]'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/_bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu 
[\[107b.6\]]la byams pa/_thams cad sbyin pa/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba/_chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/_/de nas de phyi zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa 
[\[107b.7\]]las phyi zhig na btsun mo de la bu chags nas legs par gsungs pa mnyan par bya'o snyam du yid la 'dod pa skyes te des rgyal po la gsol to/_/rgyal pos kyang ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste/_smras na de dag gis kyang lha sems can de'i mthu lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]rgyal po des legs par gsungs pa smra ba btsal ba'i phyir/_gser bye ba thogs te grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bskor na 'on kyang legs par gsungs pa de ma rnyed nas/_re zhig na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang bu 
[\[108a.2\]]byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_mdog bzang ba gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba/_sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig 
[\[108a.3\]]btsas so/_/de btsas pa'i tshe btsas ston byas nas khye'u'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_blon po rnams na re khye'u 'di ma btsas bzhin du legs par gsungs pa tshol bas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming legs par gsungs pa tshol ba zhes bya'o zhes 
[\[108a.4\]]zer nas/_de'i ming legs par gsungs pa tshol ba zhes btags so/_/de nas khye'u legs par gsungs pa tshol ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_ma 
[\[108a.5\]]ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yang legs par gsungs pa btsal te 
[\[108a.6\]]ma rnyed do/_/de nas de pha shi ba'i 'og tu rgyal por bcug nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_yul gyi gtso bo dag nga la legs par gsungs pa dgos kyis/_nga'i legs par gsungs pa tshol cig ces byas so/_/de nas blon po de dag gis legs par gsungs pa btsal 
[\[108a.7\]]ba'i phyir/_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du gser bye ba bstan kyang legs par gsungs pa ma rnyed do/_/de nas de dag gis rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po de legs par gsungs pa nyan 'dod pa'i phyir gdungs shing yi chad do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/_des rgyal po legs par gsungs pa thos pas phongs pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis rgyal po bgam par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs rkang lag dang mig mi sdug pa zhig tu bsgyur nas rgyal 
[\[108b.2\]]po'i mdun du tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_legs spyod chos ni spyad par bya/_/nyes par spyod pa de mi bya/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/chos spyod bde la rten par 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po ya mtshan du gyur nas mdangs phyung ste gnod sbyin la smras pa/_gsang ba pa tshigs su 
[\[108b.3\]]bcad pa de bdag gis mnyan gyis gsungs gsungs/_de nas gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po la smras pa/_gal te bdag ji skad mchi ba bzhin du khyod kyis mdzad na ni/_de'i 'og tu bdag gis kyang bka' ci stsal pa bzhin du bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag la bka' stsal pa ci 
[\[108b.4\]]mchis/_gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/_nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du me dong du seng ldeng gi shing gis me spar nas/_gal te der bdag nyid kyis mchong spyod na ni de'i 'og tu khyod la bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa yang bzlas par bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos de skad ces thos nas sems dga' 
[\[108b.5\]]bar gyur te gnod sbyin de la smras pa de ltar bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal pos gnod sbyin dam gyi 'og tu bcug nas yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/_deng nas zhag bdun na rgyal po legs par gsungs pa mnyan pa'i phyir me dong du bdag nyid mchong bar chad kyis/_khyed kyi nang nas 
[\[108b.6\]]gang rmad du byung ba mthong 'dod pa de dag 'dir shog cig ces byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /_rmad du byung ba blta ba'i phyir mi 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa dang /_nam mkha' la lha 'bum phrag du ma 'dus 
[\[108b.7\]]te 'khod pa'i nang du gnod sbyin de nam mkha' la 'phags nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal pos bu thu bo rgyal por dbang bskur nas blon po rnams dang grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang yul gyi mi rnams 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]la nyes pa bshags te/_skye bo'i tshogs rnams dbugs phyung nas me dong gi drung du song ste tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/nga ni chos phyir me 'bar nyi ma khrag mdog 'dra ba'i mdag ma'i dong /_/shas cher 'jigs byed nang du mchong bar sems nges srog phyir 
[\[109a.2\]]'jigs pa med/_/me dong 'di ni bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis rdzing bu rab bzang ba/_/tsan dan 'dam gyis bsgos pa'i chu bsil pad mas gang bar 'gyur yang dag_/byang chub sems dpas de skad ces smras nas me dong de'i nang du mchongs so/_/mchongs ma thag tu 
[\[109a.3\]]de'i me dong de rdzing bu zhig tu gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba de mthong nas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mi snang bar byas te/_rang gi gzugs su 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_legs spyod chos ni spyad par bya/_/
[\[109a.4\]]nyes par spyod pa de mi bya/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/chos spyod bde la rten par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas tshigs su bcad pa de yid la bzung nas gser gyi glegs bam la bris te/_'dzam bu'i gling thog thag tu grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal 
[\[109a.5\]]po'i pho brang 'khor kun tu bskor to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas legs par gsungs pa mnyan pa'i phyir/_rang gi srog yongs su btang na da ltar 
[\[109a.6\]]lta ci smos/_dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_chos la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/chos la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas/_brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar 
[\[109a.7\]]bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen 
[\[109b.2\]]po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams 
[\[109b.3\]]chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[109b.4\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de nas re zhig na mthar gyis gshegs te lam po cher zhugs pa dang /_bram ze zhig kyang lam po che der 
[\[109b.5\]]'ongs so/_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_/rin po che'i 
[\[109b.6\]]ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang shin tu yun ring du brtags nas sa la ri mo bris te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_kye gau ta ma bdag la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya tsam ma stsal gyi bar du khyod kyis ri mo 'di mi 'da' bar gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[109b.7\]]kyis las chud mi za bar bstan pa dang /_ma byin par len pa las bzlog pa'i phyir sgo skyes btsugs pa bzhin du gzhes so/_/de nas mnyan du yod pa thog thag tu bcom ldan 'das lam po cher bram ze zhig gis kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya'i phyir 'gror mi ster ro zhes de skad du gtam grag 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]par gyur to/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos ma thag tu blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis stsal gyis bcom 
[\[110a.2\]]ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de dag ni khyod kyis sbyin par bya ba ma yin gyi/_de dag ni gzhan zhig gis sbyin dgos so/_/de bzhin du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bla drang srong sbyin dang gna' mi dang brgya 
[\[110a.3\]]byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams dang /_rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pas kyang gser dngul khyer te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song na de dag la yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag ni khyed kyis kyang sbyin par bya ba ma yin no zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas re zhig na khyim bdag 
[\[110a.4\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/_gser gyi gzhong pa gser dngul gyis bkang ba'i steng du kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'di bzhes su gsol zhes byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag 'di 
[\[110a.5\]]dag ni khyed kyis sbyin par bya ba yin gyis bram ze la byin cig_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gser gyi gzhong pa gang ba de bram ze la byin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[110a.6\]]'das bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang gshegs su ma ster nas/_mgon med zas sbyin gyis kAr ShA pa Na stsal ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das ci srid cig nas 'di'i bu lon chags lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod 
[\[110a.7\]]dam/_btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/_/dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he 
[\[110b.2\]]dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/de'i phyi zhig na de'i bu rab rgyal tshab byed pa de'i dpyid kyi dus kyi tshe/_shing rnams me tog rgyas shing ngang pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri 
[\[110b.3\]]skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na/_blon po'i bu rnams kyis g.yog byas te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de'i grogs po blon po'i bu zhig yod pa de rgyan po byed pa'i mi gzhan zhig dang lhan cig tu cho los rtses pa las 
[\[110b.4\]]blon po'i bu de mi des kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyas pham par byas nas/_rgyal po'i bus kyang de'i gnya' byas pa las de mthu dang ldan te/_nga ni rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas ma byin no/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin 
[\[110b.5\]]no/_/blon po'i bu ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yin no/_/rgyan po byed pa ni bram ze 'di kho na yin te/_ngas gnya' byas pa las nga ni rgyal po'i bu yin no snyam nas rgyan po byed pa de la kAr ShA pa Na ma byin pa des na nga 'khor ba na longs spyod kyis phongs pa mtha' yas pa 
[\[110b.6\]]myong la da ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang 'dis bu lon bdas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba 
[\[110b.7\]]rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya'o/_/ma byin par len pa spang ba la yang 'bad par bya ste/_ci nas de lta bu'i nyes par mi 'gyur bar dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi 
[\[111a.2\]]rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po bcu pa/_rab bzang zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug 
[\[111a.3\]]po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_
[\[111a.4\]]bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal 
[\[111a.5\]]zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer ku shi na gyad kyi nyen kor shing sa la zung gi tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba kho na'i dus 
[\[111a.6\]]kyi tshe/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni do nub nam phyed na phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/_shing sa la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims 
[\[111a.7\]]khri shoms la/_sngas byang phyogs su ston cig_/de nas btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas/_sa la zung gi bar du gzims khri bshams te sngas byang phyogs su bstan nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims khri 
[\[111b.2\]]sa la zung gi bar du bshams te/_sngas byang phyogs su bstan lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gzims khri ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas glo g.yas phyogs kyis gzims te/_zhabs gshibs nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang ldan zhing 
[\[111b.3\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig thugs la dgongs so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer ku shi na kun tu rgyu rab bzang zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/_de rgas te rnyis shing 'khogs la skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa dang grong khyer ku shi na 'khod pa'i gyad yul pa rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_
[\[111b.4\]]bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te dgra bcom par 'dzin to/_/de nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis dge sbyong gau ta ma do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes thos nas de 'di snyam 
[\[111b.5\]]du sems te/_bdag chos rnams la som nyi yang yod/_the tsom yang yod la/_gau ta ma des bdag gi som nya de bsal bar nus pa'i re ba yang bdag la yod do snyam nas/_thos ma thag tu grong khyer ku shir song ste sA la zung ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe tshe dang 
[\[111b.6\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi thang gi 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug pa kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis mthong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyang nas mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang 
[\[111b.7\]]mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dres nas phyogs gcig tu sdod do/_/phyogs gcig tu bsdad nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]kye kun dga' bo dge sbyong gau ta ma do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis thos te bdag chos rnams la som nyi yang mchis te/_the tsom yang mchis la/_gau 
[\[112a.2\]]ta ma des bdag gi som nyi de bsal bar nus pa'i re ba yang bdag la mchis na/_kun dga' bo gal te khyod la yang gnod pa ma mchis la gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs 'byed pa lta na bdag nang du mchis te phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_
[\[112a.3\]]rab bzang bcom ldan 'das sku mnyel te bde bar gshegs pa sku 'o brgyal gyis rab bzang thong la bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ma byed cig_/lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye kun dga' 
[\[112a.4\]]bo dge sbyong gau ta ma do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis thos te bdag chos rnams la som nyi yang mchis the tsom yang mchis la/_gau ta ma des bdag gi som nyi de bsal bar 
[\[112a.5\]]nus pa'i re ba yang bdag la mchis na/_kun dga' bo gal te khyod la yang gnod pa ma mchis la gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs 'byed pa lta na bdag nang du mchis te phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[112a.6\]]kun tu rgyu rab bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rab bzang bcom ldan 'das sku mnyel te bde bar gshegs pa sku 'o brgyal gyis/_rab bzang thong la bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ma byed cig ces byas kyang kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad 
[\[112a.7\]]ces smras so/_/kye kun dga' bo gna'i kun tu rgyu rgas shing 'khogs pa'i sde tshan gyi slob dpon chen po dag las bdag gis thos na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/_brgya lam brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar zad de/_
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog dang 'dra'o zhes grags la/_gau ta ma de yang do nub nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur na/_bdag chos rnams la som nyi yang mchis the tsom yang mchis la/_gau ta ma des 
[\[112b.2\]]bdag gi som nyi de bsal bar nus pa'i re ba yang bdag la mchis na kun dga' bo gal te khyod la yang gnod pa ma mchis la/_gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs 'byed pa lta na bdag nang du mchis te phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[112b.3\]]bos kun tu rgyu rab bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rab bzang bcom ldan 'das sku mnyel te bde bar gshegs pa sku 'o brgyal gyis rab bzang thong la/_bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ma byed cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang skabs su 
[\[112b.4\]]gtam glengs pa de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas gsan to/_/gsan nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de skad ma zer bar kun tu rgyu rab bzang ma dgag par nang du thong la ci dang 
[\[112b.5\]]ci 'dod pa 'drir chug cig_/'di ni nga'i gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag dang skabs su gtam gleng ba'i tha ma yin no/_/'di lta ste kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di ni nga'i mngon sum gyi nyan thos rnams la dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig ces bya ba'i tha ma yang yin no/_/de 
[\[112b.6\]]nas kun tu rgyu rab bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yi rangs nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang 
[\[112b.7\]]dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dres nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la kun tu rgyu rab bzang gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma 'jig rten na mu stegs can gyi gnas tha dad pa 'di 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]lta ste/_'od srung rdzogs byed dang /_kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /_smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_thub med skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu dang 'di rnams rang rang gi dam bcas pa rtogs pa 
[\[113a.2\]]lags sam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_nga ni lo grangs nyi shu dgu lon na/_/dge ba gang yin tshol phyir rab tu byung /_/rab bzang nga ni rab tu byung nas kyang /_/de yi phyin cad lo ni lnga bcu gcig_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin rkang 
[\[113a.3\]]pa reg pa rnams/_/ngas ni rtse gcig sems kyis rab tu bsgoms/_/rigs pa'i chos kyi phyogs tsam smra ba yang /_/'di las phyi rol dge sbyong gzhan la'ang med/_/rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa de la ni dge sbyong dang po yang 
[\[113a.4\]]med do/_/de la ni dge sbyong gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa yang med do/_/rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod pa de la ni dge sbyong dang po yang yod do/_/dge sbyong gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa yang yod do/_/rab bzang 
[\[113a.5\]]chos 'dul ba 'di la ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod pas na/_dge sbyong dang po yang 'di la yod do/_/gnyis pa yang 'di la yod do/_/gsum pa yang 'di la yod do/_/bzhi pa yang 'di la yod do/_/'di las phyi rol pa la ni dge sbyong dang bram ze med la/_phas 
[\[113a.6\]]kyi rgol ba dag ni dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze rnams kyis stong ste/_nga ni 'dir 'khor gyi nang du de skad ces yang dag par seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun tu rgyu rab bzang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes te/_kun tu rgyu 
[\[113a.7\]]rab bzang gis chos mthong /_chos rnyed/_chos rtogs/_chos kyi gting slebs/_som nyi las rgal the tsom las rgal nas/_ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyis bkri ba med de/_chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo slob dpon chen pos/_slob dpon chen po'i nye gnas kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de ni btsun 
[\[113b.2\]]pa kun dga' bos rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/gcig tu na bdag gis kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[113b.3\]]'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur bar 'tshal lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[113b.4\]]kun tu rgyu rab bzang la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong tshur shog_/tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig_/de nas de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rab tu byung bar gyur te bsnyen par rdzogs pa yang de yin la dge slong gi dngos po yang de yin no/_/de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de 
[\[113b.5\]]gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/_bag yod cing brtun la bcum nas gnas te gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos tshon can bgos te/_yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa'i tshangs par spyod pa bla na med pa'i 
[\[113b.6\]]mthar thug pa de tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te khong du chud la bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad zin to/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so snyam du kun shes par gyur nas/_tshe 
[\[113b.7\]]dang ldan pa de dgra bcom par gyur te sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang dgra bcom pa thob ste/_rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong bar bya 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_de bas ches sngar bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/_der tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang ches sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das so/_/gang gi 
[\[114a.2\]]tshe bcom ldan 'das gzims mal gyi tha mar bzhugs te gnad la gnod pa'i tshor ba myong zhing gnad rnams 'chad la tshigs rnams 'bye ba na/_rab bzang dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag pa dang /_grong khyer ku shi'i gyad yul ba mang po chos la btsud pa de'i tshe dge slong dag the tsom 
[\[114a.3\]]skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'di bcom ldan 'das gnad rnams 'chad cing tshigs rnams 'bye ba na/_'khor ba'i 'gug las bkrol te gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya 
[\[114a.4\]]ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 
[\[114a.5\]]'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba'i tshe/_ngas kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'khor ba'i 'gug las bkrol nas/_gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa 'di lta la ngo 
[\[114a.6\]]mtshar che ba ci yod/_'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 
[\[114a.7\]]las yongs su ma grol ba na bya mi bya mi shes pa'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i tshe yang ngas rang gi srog yongs su btang ste/_kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang grong khyer ku shi'i gyad yul pa rnams 'jigs pa las 'jigs pa med pa la bkod pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_ri'i sul zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu'i gtso bo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa zhig 'dug pa las/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu de rngon pas bya ra byas nas rgyal 
[\[114b.2\]]po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang chas te/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu de dag thams cad khongs su bcug go/_/de nas khyu'i gtso bo de 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag gis 'di rnams dam bsrungs na ni deng du 'di dag gtan med par 'ong ngo 
[\[114b.3\]]snyam mo/_/de nas khyu'i gtso bos kho ra khor yug tu bltas te/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs 'di dag phyogs gang logs nas thar bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/des ri'i sul de na chu klung 'bab pa zhig mthong ste/_chu klung de yang shugs drag cing drag tu khyer bar byed pa zhig yin 
[\[114b.4\]]la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag kyang nyam chung ba sha stag go/_/de nas khyu'i gtso bo de tsham tshom med par chu klung de'i nang du zhugs te dbus su sdod nas/_khyed tshur shog la 'gram 'di nas mchongs te/_nga'i rgyab tu rkang lag gi stegs chos la pha rol gyi 'gram du song shig dang thabs des 
[\[114b.5\]]na khyed thar bar mthong gi de ltar ma byas na ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes skad kyis bos so/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag gis de bzhin du byas so/_/de nas de'i rgyab tu rmig pa btsugs pas pags pa rdol nas/_sha dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa'i lhag ma tsam zhig lus par zad 
[\[114b.6\]]de/_'on kyang de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag la snying rje btud pas brtson pa ma btang ngo /_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]thams cad rgal ba[\u0f72] 'og tu 'dir ma rgal ba 'ga' lta med grang snyam ste/_phyir bltas na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu gcig da dung ma rgal ba mthong ngo /_/de nas khyu'i gtso bo de 
[\[114b.7\]]gnad rnams 'chad cing tshigs rnams 'bye ba na/_srog phangs pa la ma bltas te 'gram du byung nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu rgyab tu zhon te/_chu klung bsgral nas 'gram du bzhag ste/_de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs de dag rgal zin par mthong nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/_ji 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]ltar bdag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'di rnams dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu 'di srog phangs pa bskyabs te phangs pa las skyabs byas pa de bzhin du/_bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[115a.2\]]pa na yang 'khor ba'i 'gug las thar bar byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu'i gtso bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams ni grong khyer 
[\[115a.3\]]ku shi'i gyad yul ba 'di rnams yin no/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phru gu de ni rab bzang 'di kho na yin no/_/de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rab bzang gis las ci dag bgyis na des mngon 
[\[115a.4\]]sum gyi nyan thos rnams kyi tha mar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rab bzang nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas 
[\[115a.5\]]shing bsags pas na/_rab bzang gis las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_
[\[115a.6\]]rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/
[\[115a.7\]]tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/_skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags drang srong 
[\[115b.2\]]smra ba na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dpon po mya ngan med ces bya ba thar pa 'dod pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung nas/_de thar pa la rang dbang yod pa tsam du 'dzin te brtson 'grus ma 
[\[115b.3\]]byas so/_/re zhig na yun ring mo zhig lon pa'i 'og tu mya ngan med kyis ljongs su dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du 
[\[115b.4\]]gzims mal gyi tha mar bzhugs so/_/dge slong mya ngan med kyang /_shing mya ngan 'tshang gi drung na nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs so/_/de nas shing mya ngan 'tshang de la gnas pa'i lha des bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[115b.5\]]'da'o zhes thos nas ngu zhing 'dug ste/_de ngu ba'i mchi ma zags pa mya ngan med kyi lus la bab bo/_/de nas mya ngan med kyis gyen du bltas nas/_lha ngu ba de la smras pa/_lha ci'i phyir ngu /_lhas smras pa/_do nub nam phyed na/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[115b.6\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/de nas mya ngan med kyis lha'i tshig thos nas gnad du phog pa bzhin du yed ces byas te/_de yang snying rje rje skad du ngus so/_/de nas lhas dris pa khyod ci'i phyir ngu /_mya ngan med kyis smras pa/_nye du dang bral ba dang 
[\[115b.7\]]mkhan po dang bral ba'i phyir te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni bdag gi zhang po yin pas bdag bsod nyams su 'dug 'dug ste brtson 'grus ma byas so/_/da ni de lam [{]rings [,]ring [}]la bdag ni sa so'i skye bor lus te/_lam rings pas bdag gis khyad par 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]thob par mi nus so/_/lhas smras pa/_gal te bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du khyod bkri na ci khyad par thob par nus sam/_mya ngan med kyis smras pa/_'di ltar bdag gi yid la/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu khyad par thob 
[\[116a.2\]]par 'gyur ro snyam byed do/_/de nas lhas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/_mya ngan med bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du khyer te/_des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gang thos pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[116a.3\]]du byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_thog ma kho nar tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/
[\[116a.4\]]de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong nas dga' ba skyed de/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dis khyad par ci thob pa thams cad ni bdag las bstan pa yin gyis bdag kyang 'di bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[116a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de/_gzims mal gyi tha mar zhugs pa na 
[\[116a.6\]]bdag kyang de'i mngon sum gyi nyan thos kyi tha mar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi snga rol tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i 
[\[116a.7\]]dus na lhar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i grogs po dang dge ba'i rten dang gnas par bya'i sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i rten 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]dang gnas par mi bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dir bdag gcig pu dben par mchis nas/_nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na sems 
[\[116b.2\]]la 'di lta bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa byung ste/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i grogs po dang dge ba'i rten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed lags kyi/_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma lags so snyam 
[\[116b.3\]]bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyed 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i grogs po dang dge ba'i rten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed yin gyi/_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i rten ni de 
[\[116b.4\]]lta ma yin no zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i grogs po dang dge ba'i rten 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa ril po dang ma 'dres pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su dag pa dang yongs su byang ba yin gyi/_
[\[116b.5\]]sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/_sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba'i chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba dang sems 
[\[116b.6\]]can rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can rnams skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba 
[\[116b.7\]]dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de bas na rnam grangs 'di kho nas khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang dge ba'i grogs po dang dge ba'i rten 'di ni 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]tshangs par spyod pa ril po dang ma 'dres pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su dag pa dang yongs su byang ba yin gyi/_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po dang sdig pa'i rten ni de lta ma yin no zhes kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar bslab 
[\[117a.2\]]par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa ste byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i 
[\[117a.3\]]rabs rnams rdzogs so//_//sdom ni/_bu ram gnas dang kha zas dang /_/chu dang phyi sa'i snod rnams dang /_/maud gal bu dang chu smad dang /_/dmus long dang ni tshong dpon dang /_/bu rnams dang ni phyis khung /_/sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/_/bu ram 'tshir 
[\[117a.4\]]ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_
[\[117a.5\]]lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[117a.6\]]'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal 
[\[117a.7\]]po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis 'di ltar dam bcas te/_
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas/_sems can gcig tsam yang thar bar ma byas kyi bar du zan mi bza'o zhes byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa de gnyis dus dus su res 'ga' ni sems can dmyal bar rgyu zhing 'gro'o/_/res 'ga' 
[\[117b.2\]]ni dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu zhing 'gro'o/_/res 'ga' ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu zhing 'gro ste de gnyis kyis der sems can gnod pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa rnams kyi skad ngan thos nas rgyu ba las slar 'khor te/_'khor bzhi po rnams la rjod par byed do/_/de dag gis kyang thos nas 
[\[117b.3\]]skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de gnyis kyis de la bstan nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos ston par byed de/_des na sems can du mas thos nas khyad par thob par 'gyur ba dang /_chos thos pa dang gtam bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/_/phyis re zhig na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[117b.4\]]chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_rang gi skras yog pa/_'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi 
[\[117b.5\]]bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang /_bshang gci ga la yod pa der 'khor la de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo /_/de nas gnas brtan des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de la dris pa/_kye khyod kyis las ci zhig byas na/_des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag pa 
[\[117b.6\]]mi bzad pa tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis smras pa/_nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang /_des khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi 
[\[117b.7\]]bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/_'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba/_tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/_der bcom 
[\[118a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu tshur shog_/khyod 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod da gdod ga las 'ongs/_maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las 
[\[118a.3\]]slar mchis te/_der bdag gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_rang gi skras yog pa/_phyi sa bzhin dri nga ba mchog tu dri nga ba mi sdug pa mchog tu mi sdug pa zas su phyi sa 'tshal la de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong lags so/_/yang gsol pa/_lus 
[\[118a.4\]]chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/_/mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug_/rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bar mchis/_/mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid/_/de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/_/rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/_/thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/_/
[\[118a.5\]]ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid/_/bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/_/dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen/_/nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong /_/de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/_/rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/_/des na sdug 
[\[118a.6\]]bsngal 'di 'dra ba/_/'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/_/de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/_btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/_/maud gal 
[\[118a.7\]]gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa de'i bu ram shing btsir ba'i gnas grwa lnga brgya yod de/_de dag tu de'i bu ram shing 'tshir bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying 
[\[118b.2\]]brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste re zhig na/_rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa la snying brtse ba bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba zhig byung nas/_de snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos 
[\[118b.3\]]te/_lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/btsun pa de yang nad khong skem gyis thebs te/_de la sman pas bu ram shing gi khu ba phan par bstan nas tshong dpon chen po de'i thad du song ngo /_/tshong dpon gyis kyang rang sangs rgyas lus kyang mdzes la/_
[\[118b.4\]]sems kyang mdzes pa de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshong dpon gyis smras pa/_'phags pa ci bzhed/_rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag bu ram shing gi khu ba 'dod do/_de nas khyim bdag des tshal za zhig la 'phags pa la bu ram shing gi khu ba phul cig ces 
[\[118b.5\]]bsgo nas khyim bdag de ni don zhig la phyi rol tu chas so/_/de nas mi de gzhan gyi rdzas la ser sna skyes nas/_gal te bdag gis 'di la bu ram shing gi khu ba sbyin du zin na phyis kyang 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/_mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba gsum gyi g.yang sar 
[\[118b.6\]]gzhol ba/_thams cad kyis 'dod par bya ba'i 'gro ba gnyis bor ba/_'phags pa'i lam rnams thag bsrings pa des sdig pa'i sems bskyed nas/_rang sangs rgyas de la smras pa/_dge slong lhung bzed tshur byin cig dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba sbyin no zhes 
[\[118b.7\]]byas so/_/nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste/_sdug cing phongs pa la snying brtse bas mi de la ngas phan gdags par bya'o snyam nas lhung bzed de byin no/_/de nas spyod pa ngan cing snying la snying rje med 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]pa des de blangs te lkog cig tu song nas gcin gyis bkang ste/_steng du bu ram shing gi khu ba'i dbu bas bkab nas/_rang sangs rgyas de la phul ba dang /_des tshor nas des bsams pa nyon mongs 'dis sdig pa chen po zhig byas kyis med do snyam ste/_de 
[\[119a.2\]]phyogs gcig tu song nas pho ste song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na tshal zar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'di yin te/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar 
[\[119a.3\]]gyur la da ltar yang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ba yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu de bas na/_ci nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/_/maud gal gyi bu de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams 
[\[119a.4\]]ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu de bas na/_
[\[119a.5\]]las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[119a.6\]]maud gal gyi bu chen po dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//kha zas zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po 
[\[119a.7\]]rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[119b.2\]]'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[119b.3\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po nyin par gnas pa'i phyir/_shing zhig gi drung du 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo zhig gi sgra thos te nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing /_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi 
[\[119b.4\]]bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste/_kha zas slong zhing grogs mo dag bdag bkres so/_/grogs mo dag bdag skom mo zhes zer ba thos so/_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de mthong nas dris pa/_khyod kyis las ci zhig byas na/_
[\[119b.5\]]des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal dag myong zhing 'dug_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mos smras pa/_nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang /_des khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen 
[\[119b.6\]]po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/_'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar 
[\[119b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu tshur shog_/khyod 'ongs pa legs so/_khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/_maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/_der bdag gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo 
[\[120a.2\]]lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_rang gi skras yog pa/_gcer bar mchis shing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang /_mi bzad pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so/_/yang gsol pa/_/lus chen ri bo mthon 
[\[120a.3\]]po 'dra ba la/_/mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug_/rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bar mchis/_/mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid/_/de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/_/rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/_/thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/_/ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid/_/
[\[120a.4\]]bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/_/dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen/_/nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong /_/de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/_/rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/_/des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/_/'jigs su rung ba myong bar 
[\[120a.5\]]gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/_/de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/_btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/_/maud gal gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/
[\[120a.6\]]maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha 
[\[120a.7\]]lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas grong khyer bA rA Na sI de na khyim bdag cig gi chung ma ser sna can 'jungs 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/_khwa la'ang gtor ma mi ster na slong ba gzhan dag lta la smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod de/_de dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkres pa dag mthong na sems kyis sdang bar byed do/_/re zhig na bsod snyoms pa zhig de'i khyim du 'ongs 
[\[120b.2\]]nas/_des de mthong na/_ser sna skyes te/_sems kyang sdang bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag gis 'di la bkur sti byas na ni/_'di phyis kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas sdig can des tshe phyi ma'i mi sdug pa khyad du bsad nas/_dge slong de nang du bos te sgo 
[\[120b.3\]]bcad nas smyung du bcug go/_/mang du yang spyos te/_dge slong khyod la bkur sti ma yin pa byas pa 'di yin gyis/_phyin cad khyim 'dir ma 'ong shig ces byas so/_/de nas de ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes te/_de lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong 
[\[120b.4\]]ngo /_/maud gal gyi bu de bas na ci nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de'i nyes pa gang yin pa de lta bu dag mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spong ba la brtson par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am 
[\[120b.5\]]ci dang lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//chu zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong 
[\[120b.6\]]dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[120b.7\]]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu zhing song ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la rang gi skras yog pa/_lto ni ri tsam la kha 
[\[121a.2\]]ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la skom gyis gdungs te/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang 
[\[121a.3\]]khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe/_de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de la smras pa/_kye khyod kyis sdig pa ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 
[\[121a.4\]]'dug_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa ston par 'gyur te/_de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[121a.5\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/_'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams 
[\[121a.6\]]mi g.yo bar/_bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog_/'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen 
[\[121a.7\]]po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu tshur shog_/khyod 'ongs pa legs so khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/_maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/_der bdag gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo sdong po me reg 'dra la rang gi skras yog 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]pa/_lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/_tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la skom gyis gdungs te/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ba dang des mthong ba tsam 
[\[121b.2\]]gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa zhig mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no/_/de'i las kyi rnam 
[\[121b.3\]]pa nyan par 'dod dam/_btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/_/maud gal gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[121b.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/
[\[121b.5\]]de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs pa na/_der dge slong zhig lam du zhugs nas de skom gyis gdungs te/_khron pa'i drung du song nas de na bu mo zhig bum pa chus bkang ste 'dug pa la dge slong des smras pa/_che zhe bdag ni skom gyis gdungs 
[\[121b.6\]]kyis chu byin cig ces byas na yo byad la kun tu 'dzin pa de ser sna skyes nas/_dge slong de la smras pa/_dge slong bdag gi bum pa 'gribs su 'ong gis/_gal te khyod shi na yang chu mi sbyin no zhes byas so/_/de nas dge slong de skom gyis gdungs bzhin du re thag chad nas song ngo /_/de nas bu mo 
[\[121b.7\]]de ser sna kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/_mang du byas pa de lta bus shi nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes te/_de lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong zhing 'dug go/_/maud gal gyi bu de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ser sna spang bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bya'o zhes maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[122a.2\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_phyi sa'i snod ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_
[\[122a.3\]]tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[122a.4\]]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[122a.5\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas te/_
[\[122a.6\]]zan zos nas zas phyis len pa spangs te lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzegs te/_nyin par gnas pa'i phyir shing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo sdong 
[\[122a.7\]]dum me reg 'dra la gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/_lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]tshor ba myong ba phyi sa bzhin du dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba zas su phyi sa za la de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo la dris pa/_khyod kyis sngon sdig pa ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu myong zhing 
[\[122b.2\]]'dug_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bdag ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang de khyed la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/_de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur 
[\[122b.3\]]ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/_'khor brgya phrag du 
[\[122b.4\]]ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang 
[\[122b.5\]]ldan pa maud gal gyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu tshur shog_/khyod 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/_maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du rgyu zhing mchi mchi ba las der bdag gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la/_
[\[122b.6\]]gcer bur mchis shing rang gi skras yog pa/_lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la shin tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba 
[\[122b.7\]]myong ba dang des mthong ba tsam gyis chu klung dang khron pa rnams skam par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi tshe char 'bab pa de'i tshe de'i steng du me stag 'phro ba'i mdag ma'i char 'bab pa dang /_phyi sa bzhin du dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga ba zas su phyi sa 'tshal la/_de yang bde blag tu mi rnyed pa zhig mthong 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]lags so/_/yang gsol pa/_nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par byed/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong /_/gang na phyi sa'i gnas yod pa/_/der ni sdug bzhin rgyug par bgyid/_/phyi sa bza' 'am btung snyam na/_/de yang bde blag rnyed mi 'gyur/_/de yis 
[\[123a.2\]]mi yi 'jig rten du/_/sdig pa rab 'jigs ci bgyis na/_/des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/_/'jigs su rung ba nyams su myong /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de ni sdig pa byed byed pa yin no/_/de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/_
[\[123a.3\]]btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/_/maud gal gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa la snying brtse ba bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba 
[\[123a.4\]]zhig yod la/_de yang na dbu can zhig ste bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/re zhig na de la sman pas 'thun pa'i zas bstan nas de tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa ga la ba der song ba dang /_tshong dpon des kyang mthong nas dris pa/_'phags pa khyod ci bzhed/_des smras pa/_'thun 
[\[123a.5\]]pa'i kha zas 'dod do/_/de nas tshong dpon des 'phags pa la kha zas 'thun pa phul cig ces mna' ma la bsgo'o/_/de nas de'i mna' ma ser sna skyes te/_gal te bdag gis deng 'di la kha zas sbyin du zin na sang yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_phyogs gcig tu song ste lhung 
[\[123a.6\]]bzed phyi sas bkang nas steng 'bras can gyis bkab ste rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma dgongs kyi bar du shes pa'i mthong ba mi 'jug ste des blangs so/_/blangs nas tshor te/_'di dri nga ba las na 'dis phyi sas bkang gor ma chag go 
[\[123a.7\]]snyam mo/_/de nas bdag nyid chen po des de ga zhig tu bor nas song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi mna' mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo 'di yin te/_des sdig pa'i las de lta bu 
[\[123b\]]
