[\[123b.1\]]byas nas/_de phyin cad rtag tu sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skyes te rtag tu zas su phyi sa za bar gyur to/_/maud gal gyi bu de bas na ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/_ci nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba 
[\[123b.2\]]de ltar maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[123b.3\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//maud gal gyi bu zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon 
[\[123b.4\]]rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[123b.5\]]sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos 
[\[123b.6\]]dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi ni pha rol 'od ma'i tshal gyi tshu rol/_de'i bar skabs na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la 
[\[123b.7\]]gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/_lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba lnga brgya khwa khyus lding ba bzhin du nam mkha' la 'khor te gang du yang 'dug sa mi rnyed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la 
[\[124a.2\]]song ba dang des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag mthong ngo /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag gcig tu 'dril nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du dong ste phyin nas/_snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing 
[\[124a.3\]]smra bar tshig 'thun par smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu bdag cag ni rgyal po'i khab tu tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyur te/_bdag cag ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams la kun tu 'dzin par gyur nas/_bdag cag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/_gzhan dag sbyin pa byed 
[\[124a.4\]]pa la yang bgegs byas so/_/sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la yang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi tshig lta bus mang du spyos te khyed ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes pa bzhin du gzhan gyi khyim phyi nyug pa'o zhes byas so/_/des na bdag cag shi ba'i 'og tu 'di lta bu'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes so/_/btsun pa maud gal 
[\[124a.5\]]gyi bu chen po de bas na bdag cag gi nye du rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa de dag la/_bdag cag gi las kyi rnam pa shes par mdzod la dad pa dris te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas/_bdag cag gi slad du yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol 
[\[124a.6\]]cig_/'on kyang bdag cag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas nas thar kyang srid do zhes gsungs shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus de dag gi nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris 
[\[124a.7\]]nas phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs so/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la yang sbran te/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyang der shog shig ces byas so/_/de dag gi nye du rnams 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]la yang khyed kyang shog shig dang /_nye du'i mchod ston byed pa der [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu nyid mchod ston gyi zhal ta byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas nam langs nas zhal zas bshams te/_gdugs tshod 
[\[124b.2\]]la bab na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag mi snang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i mig gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag bsams na yul ma ga d+hA thog thag na yang mi snang la/_mthar gyis gling bzhi'i bar du bltas na yang de na yang mi snang ngo /_/de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes 
[\[124b.3\]]mthong ba 'jug pa de srid du bltas kyang de na yang mi snang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams mi gda' lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[124b.4\]]stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu thong la khyod mi dgar ma byed cig_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag yod de/_de dag tu las kyi rlung gis 'phangs mod kyi/_'on kyang maud gal gyi bu deng de bzhin gshegs 
[\[124b.5\]]pa'i stobs la ltos shig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mngon par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang bstan gyis gaN+DI rdungs shig_/de nas gaN+DI brdungs pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nye du rnams 
[\[124b.6\]]dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mthong bar 'dod pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang ltad mo la lhags te 'dus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag 
[\[124b.7\]]cag gi phyir nye du rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/_
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang /_/de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]phyi bzhin song /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten rab 'jigs las/_/de dag myur du thar gyur cig_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos 
[\[125a.2\]]bstan te/_de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas ser sna'i dri ma spangs te bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/_shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i 
[\[125a.3\]]bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos/_gang du skyes/_las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes pa dang /_bcom 
[\[125a.4\]]ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag zhag lon te gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag cag zhag ma lon par 
[\[125a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/_/de nas sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_
[\[125a.6\]]spr-i ka la la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_
[\[125a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob bo/_/de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa bzhin du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/der bcom 
[\[125b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po dag lha'i nang du bkod nas de dag kyang mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/_de dag la ngas chos bstan nas de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de mthong bar 
[\[125b.3\]]'gyur ba rnyed nas dong ba de ni/_/khyod kyis zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te legs so legs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de dag gi nye du rnams la yang shes par byas te/_de dag gis thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/_
[\[125b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas bkur sti byas so/_/maud gal gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ci nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag gi nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[125b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//chu smad ces bya ba ni/_
[\[125b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma 
[\[125b.7\]]yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 
[\[126a.2\]]'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i 
[\[126a.3\]]nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u zhig btsas nas de 
[\[126a.4\]]btsas pa'i btsas ston byas te/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_de nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rgyu skar chu smad la btsas pas na de'i phyir ming chu smad ces gdags so zhes zer nas de'i ming chu smad ces btags so/_/de nas khye'u chu smad bskyed 
[\[126a.5\]]bsrings te cher skyes nas/_de'i pha shi ba dang rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to/_/de nas des tshong 'dus bkram nas nyo 'tshong byed cing nyo 'tshong gis 'tsho bar byed pa las de nyin gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/_de bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang dam pa'i 
[\[126a.6\]]chos thos pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur nas de rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes te/_des ma la gsol ba btab pa/_yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig_/de nas de'i mas smras pa/_bu khyod ni bu gcig 
[\[126a.7\]]pa yin gyis bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar rab tu ma byung shig_/bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bya ba byos shig ces zer ro/_/chu smad des kyang ci rnyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/_yum 'dis dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces byas 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]so/_/de'i ma de ni brkam chags can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa zhig ste kAr ShA pa Na de dag sbas nas/_dge slong dang bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgya zhing khyed ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes pa bzhin du khyim phyi nyug cing slong ngo zhes zer ro/_/
[\[126b.2\]]bu de la yang slu bar byed de/_bdag gis nyin gcig bzhin du dge slong 'di snyed 'di snyed cig la zan byin no zhes zer ro/_/phyis re zhig na de shi ba dang de [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes nas bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed do/_/sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas 
[\[126b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[126b.4\]]'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra 
[\[126b.5\]]ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas 
[\[126b.6\]]pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur nas/_des chu klung gang gA'i 'gram du lo ma'i spyil po byas te bsam gtan byed do/_/de'i ma [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa de yang sdong dum me reg 'dra la gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skras yog pa/_lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi 
[\[126b.7\]]mig tsam ste/_'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar nas/_tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/_tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyi thad du song nas re zhig na chu smad kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de mthong nas dris pa/_'di kho na 'dra ba khyod su zhig_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mos smras pa/_bu gcig gang 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]las btsas pa yi/_/byams pa'i ma ni bdag yin te/_/zas dang skom dang bral ba yi/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes/_/bdag ni shi ba'i dus 'das nas/_/lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon te/_/chu yi bag kyang ma mthong na/_/kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong /_/'bras bur ldan 
[\[127a.2\]]pa'i shing rnams kyi/_/drung song de dag 'bras med 'gyur/_/gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang /_/de dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur/_/btsun pa'i shing drung bde ba lags/_/khyod kyi snod nang chu yang bsil/_/bkren pa bdag la thugs rje skyed/_/skom gyis gdungs kyis chab stsol 
[\[127a.3\]]cig_/de nas chu smad kyis ma la smras pa/_yum khyod mir gyur pa'i tshe bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mos smras pa/_bu gcig bdag ni ser snas non pas sbyin pa dag kyang ma byin bsod nams dag kyang ma byas te/_nor rnyed pa de dag 
[\[127a.4\]]thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbas so/_/bu gcig de bas na dad pa dris la bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig_/'on kyang bdag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas nas thar yang srid do/_/chu smad kyis 
[\[127a.5\]]smras pa/_de ltar bgyi yis khyod kyang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug shig_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mos smras pa/_bu gcig bdag ni gcer bur 'dug pas ngo tsha ste ngos mi thub bo/_/chu smad kyis smras pa/_yum khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa de'i tshe ngo mi tsha nad ltar 'bras bu myong ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo 
[\[127a.6\]]tsha/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mos smras pa/_'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o/_/de nas chu smad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs nas/_gdugs tshod la bab pa na sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi 
[\[127a.7\]]dge 'dun dag kyang 'dus/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de yang gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug ste/_srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa rnams kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de mthong ngo /_/de dag gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de'i lus mi sdug pa mthong nas shin tu skyo ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs gdon par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas sbyin 
[\[127b.2\]]pa'i rabs gsungs pa/_sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang /_/de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]phyi bzhin song /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten rab 'jigs las/_/de ni myur du thar gyur cig_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las brten nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de 
[\[127b.3\]]dang skye bo mang po la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_srog chags 'bum phrag du mas de thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de yang sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul 
[\[127b.4\]]chen mor skyes par shes so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/_yum da ni mthu yod kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang bdag gyis shig_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen mos smras pa/_bu gcig bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba med de mi nus so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad 
[\[127b.5\]]kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/_chags pa'i mun pas mig ni rab bsgribs te/_/khyod kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi/_/khyod kyi rus bu chen po sha med pa/_/rus pa pags pa skyi rnams da dung 'dug_/ces byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis 
[\[127b.6\]]lan mang du spyos nas smras pa dang /_de'i 'og tu de las ras zung cig thob bo/_/de nas chu smad kyis dge 'dun la phul te/_gang gis dge 'dun las ras zung cig nyos pa'i dge slong des gos kyi gdang la bzhag go/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de mtshan mo 'ongs nas brkus so/_/de nas dge 
[\[127b.7\]]slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas chu smad song ste [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo spyos nas phyir bkug ste byin no/_/de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong de las brkus nas/_tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang /_dge slong des kyang de gshegs nas/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la glan to/_/de nas des phyin chad ma brkus so/_/de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser snas mtho 'tsham par byed pa mthong nas/_ci nas kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ser sna spang ba la 
[\[128a.2\]]brtson par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[128a.3\]]bstod do//_//dmus long zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod 
[\[128a.4\]]sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[128a.5\]]mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 
[\[128a.6\]]'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/_lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la 
[\[128a.7\]]song ngo /_/mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul du rgyu zhing song ba las/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la dmus long du 'dug pa rang gi 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]skras yog pa lto ni ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor nas phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing bcad cing za ba dang /_de gnad la bab ste dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/_sdug bsngal 
[\[128b.2\]]drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed mi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa/_sring mo khyod kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[128b.3\]]mos smras pa/_nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/_de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed bcom 
[\[128b.4\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te 'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las 
[\[128b.5\]]chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs sa zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[128b.6\]]dga' byed tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/_dga' byed kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/_der bdag gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo sdong dum me reg 'dra la dmus long du mchis pa rang gi skras yog pa/_lto ni 
[\[128b.7\]]ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/_dur khrod bzhin du dri nga ba khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor nas phyogs kun nas sha bkum zhing bkum zhing 'tshal ba dang /_de gnad la bab ste dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/_sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags so/_/yang gsol pa/_lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la/_/mchu dang lkog ma skam zhing shin tu sdug_/rang gi skras ni gdong yog gcer bar mchis/_/mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu rid/_/de ltar gcer bu skras yog pa/_/
[\[129a.2\]]rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin/_/thod pa thogs shing mi bzad la/_/ngu zhing kun tu rgyug par bgyid/_/bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis/_/dub cing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen/_/nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong /_/de yis mi yi 
[\[129a.3\]]'jig rten du/_/rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/_/des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/_/'jigs su rung ba myong bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' byed [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/_/de'i las kyi rnam par 
[\[129a.4\]]smin pa nyan par 'dod dam/_btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/_/dga' byed 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin 
[\[129a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya 
[\[129a.6\]]ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas grong khyer bA rA Na sI de na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/_des chos thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan 
[\[129a.7\]]du lta bar gyur te/_des pha ma la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas/_de de na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las re zhig na des bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab pa'i 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]gzhi la lhod par byas so/_/de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do/_/de nas des sbyin bdag khyim bdag rnams dad pas nges par 'bul ba'ang gcod du bcug_/slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod/_dge 
[\[129b.2\]]slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag mthong na yang mig btsums te 'dug go/_/dga' byed ji snyam du sems/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo 'di yin te/_des gtsug lag khang la ser sna byas pa des ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes so/_/des nar 
[\[129b.3\]]ma bcad pa des ni khwa dang bya rgod dang khyi dang wa rnams kyis bskor to/_/des slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pas ni de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to/_/dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to/_/
[\[129b.4\]]dga' byed de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[129b.5\]]dga' byed de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste dga' byed khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na srog chags sa yas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/
[\[129b.6\]]der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas/_ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[129b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams 
[\[130a.2\]]dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[130a.3\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan 
[\[130a.4\]]thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i 
[\[130a.5\]]nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/_de phyi zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_
[\[130a.6\]]'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_
[\[130a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kun la grags pa dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]gyur te/_gos dang zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad gsos dang /_sman zong rnams rnyed par gyur to/_/des yongs su bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cog gsog par byed de des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas so/_/de nas ser sna kun 
[\[130b.2\]]tu sten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des na rang gi yo byad la lhag par zhen bzhin du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes so/_/de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gaN+DI mjug med pa brdungs nas rus bu phyir phyung ngo /_/de nas de'i rus bu la rus 
[\[130b.3\]]bu'i mchod pa byas nas phyir gtsug lag khang du lhags so/_/de nas gnas khang gi sgo phye ste/_chos gos dang lhung bzed g.yar snga 'grim pa la zhugs pa dang /_re zhig na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rkang lag dang mig mi sdug la lus mchog tu 'jigs pa chos gos dang lhung bzed 
[\[130b.4\]]'dzin cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo /_/de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas dge slong dag mi dga' bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de la phan gdags pa dang slob ma'i tshogs rnams skyo bskyed pa dang ser sna'i rnam par smin pa 
[\[130b.5\]]mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te gnas der gshegs so/_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan 
[\[130b.6\]]pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes te 
[\[130b.7\]]ngo tsha bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur zab pa dang /_rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de spyos te bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid phung ba'i phyir chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/_des na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes pa yin gyis 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]da yang nga la sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/_/'di las kyang shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes re/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]des chos gos dang lhung bzed dge 'dun la phul nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[131a.2\]]'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi phyir yon gyi rabs gsungs pa/_sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang /_/de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]phyi bzhin song /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten rab 'jigs las/_/de ni myur du thar gyur 
[\[131a.3\]]cig_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/_shi nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen po rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu sna tshogs 
[\[131a.4\]]kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_'od ma'i tshal 
[\[131a.5\]]bya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos 
[\[131a.6\]]nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo /_/de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pa de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas the tsom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[131a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po'am 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de shi nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes te/_de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bstan te de dga' ba skyes nas song ngo /_/dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong 
[\[131b.2\]]dpon las [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa de'i nyes pa de lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding 
[\[131b.3\]]dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//bu zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po 
[\[131b.4\]]rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po 
[\[131b.5\]]rnams kyis/_bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[131b.6\]]bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/
[\[131b.7\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/_lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhag ste/_yi 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]dgas kyi yul du rgyu zhing song ba dang /_des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i nye 'khor du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo gshin rje'i sring mo 'dra ba la/_lus khrag gis bsgos pa/_dur khrod na 'dug bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba/_nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug 
[\[132a.2\]]bsngal myong la/_bu la byams pa yod bzhin du de bkres pas nyen nas de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo /_/de nas gnas brtan 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la dris pa khyod kyis sngon las ci zhig byas na/_des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[132a.3\]]mos smras pa/_nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang /_de khyed la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/_de thos nas sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[132a.4\]]pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston te/_'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang 
[\[132a.5\]]po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed do/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba snyan par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa legs so zhes gsung ba sngar 'dzum pa yin te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang 
[\[132a.6\]]ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/_'dam bu sbyin gyi bu tshur shog khyod 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod da gzod ga las 'ongs/_'dam bu sbyin gyi bus gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du mchi mchi ba las slar mchis te/_der 
[\[132a.7\]]bdag gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo gshin rje'i sring mo 'dra ba la/_lus khrag gis bsgos pa/_dur khrod na gnas pa bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba zhig mthong lags so/_/yang gsol pa/_bdag ni nyin bzhin bu lnga btsa'/_/mtshan yang de bzhin lnga btsa' ste/_/btsas 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]nas de dag zos na yang /_/'grangs par mi 'gyur zhes mchi na/_/de yis mi yi 'jig rten du/_/rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/_/des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba/_/'jigs su rung ba myong bar gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dam bu sbyin gyi bu 
[\[132b.2\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no/_/de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/_btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/_/'dam bu sbyin gyi bu 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/'dam bu sbyin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 
[\[132b.3\]]dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon phyug cing /_nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig 
[\[132b.4\]]tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med de de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/_bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams 
[\[132b.5\]]cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro/_/snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas bud med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dang lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/_'di lta ste 
[\[132b.6\]]kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang chos 'thun pa pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/_'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab 
[\[132b.7\]]pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/_gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/ye ni gnas 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za 'ongs pa ste/_gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_
[\[133a.2\]]des lha mnyes par byas kyang bu yang ma byung bu mo yang ma byung nas de'i blo 'di lta bu dag skyes te/_ma la bdag gis chun ma zhig blangs na/_brgya la bu yod par 'gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' 
[\[133a.3\]]mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/_de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas khyim thab la sbran pa/_jo bo bdag la sras chags te bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/_khye'ur 'byung bar nges kyis 
[\[133a.4\]]dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/_/de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg_/lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/_/bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo /_/bdag gi bu rung bar shog cig_/mi rung bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi bya ba dag byed 
[\[133a.5\]]par shog cig_/gsos pa'i lan phyir gas bar shog cig_/nor skal la spyod par shog cig_/bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog cig_/bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/_sbyin pa dag byin la bsod 
[\[133a.6\]]nams dag byas nas/_de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/_/de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/_grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i 
[\[133a.7\]]yo byad rnams dang /_tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang /_ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang lan tsha che ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tsha dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing /_do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par bklubs te/_lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du/_khri'i steng nas khri'i 
[\[133b.2\]]steng dang khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang /_des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/_/de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gces par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te bsams pa/_gal te 'di las bu btsas par 
[\[133b.3\]]gyur na ni bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/_ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos snyam mo/_'dod pa las yongs su bsten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci yang med de/_mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha ltas pa des yid rton du bcug nas/_gang 'thungs pa 
[\[133b.4\]]tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'phyil bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin no/_/de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma snga ma de zhal lce la bkug ste/_khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug nas mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin te des bdag gi bu 'phyil to 
[\[133b.5\]]zhes byas so/_/de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du mna' bor te/_gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin par gyur na bdag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mor gyur te/_bu byung ngo cog za bar shog cig ces so/_/'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems/_tshong dpon gyi chung 
[\[133b.6\]]mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de yin te/_des sngon phrag dog byas pa des na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mor skyes so/_/des [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]byas te mna' bor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing za bar gyur to/_/'dam bu sbyin gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis 
[\[133b.7\]]ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson par bya ste/_ci nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu dang /_lha dang /_lha ma 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa bam po bcu gnyis pa/_phyis 
[\[134a.2\]]khung zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma 
[\[134a.3\]]yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_
[\[134a.4\]]lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na spre'u 
[\[134a.5\]]rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs zhig gi nang na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]zas su skyugs pa za ba/_bor ba za ba ngar snabs dang gcin gyis 'tsho ba rnag dang khrag dang phyi sa za ba mi bzad pa rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal 
[\[134a.6\]]ba lnga brgya gnas so/_/yang smras pa/_skyugs pa za zhing bor ba za/_/ngar snabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang /_/rnag khrag dang ni phyi sa za/_/mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug_/yangs pa can de na bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang 
[\[134a.7\]]lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to/_/de nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/_de dag na re 'di ni lto na khye'u 'dug pa de'i mthu yin no zhes zer ro/_/
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]re zhig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u mdog ngan zhing blta na mi sdug la byad ngan pa lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig btsas so/_/de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi byams pa'i dbang gis sbrel bas pha ma gnyis kyis gsos so/_/de mi gtsang ba'i gnas 
[\[134b.2\]]rnams 'ba' zhig tu dga' la phyag dar gyi phung po dang phyis khung du skra 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'dzud nas de'i ming phyis khung phyis khung zhes bya bar gyur to/_/re zhig na de phan tshun du 'khyam pa las 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams 
[\[134b.3\]]su dga' ba las na 'di ni gor ma chag par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis bdag gis 'di rab tu dbyung ngo snyam mo/_/des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam zhing 'dug la legs pa byed pa la yang gnas so/_/de nas de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi 
[\[134b.4\]]dgas lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to/_/phyis re zhig na khye'u phyis khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du song ngo /_/
[\[134b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma 
[\[134b.6\]]stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phongs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyed cis phongs/_
[\[134b.7\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni skom lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste/_des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lnga brgya po de dag tshim par mdzad do/_/de nas de dag bcom 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam 
[\[135a.2\]]mo/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]las shi 'phos pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag zhag lon te gzod 
[\[135a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/_/de nas sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos 
[\[135a.4\]]brgyan pa/_nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man da ra rnams kyis thu ba 
[\[135a.5\]]bkang ste/_khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams 
[\[135a.6\]]kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du 
[\[135a.7\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]pa de nyid kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/de nas khye'u phyis khung grong khyer gyi 'obs su 'ongs pa dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag ma mthong ngo /_/de nas tshol ba la zhugs te de de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do/_/
[\[135b.2\]]de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la 
[\[135b.3\]]zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi 
[\[135b.4\]]las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par 
[\[135b.5\]]spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis 
[\[135b.6\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du 
[\[135b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_
[\[136a.2\]]su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus 
[\[136a.3\]]rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyis khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs 
[\[136a.4\]]kyis zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /_re zhig na mthar gyis bsod snyoms bskor te/_srang du gshegs na phyis khung yang phan tshun 'khor 'khor te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'greng ngo /_/
[\[136a.5\]]de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun 
[\[136a.6\]]nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de'i mod la des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas so/_/de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bdag cag lta bu yang legs 
[\[136a.7\]]par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba mchis te/_chud par 'gyur na bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba mkhyen pas de shin tu skal ba dang ldan par thugs 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]su chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu ni bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/_spyod 
[\[136b.2\]]lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas/_lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur pa/_lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/_/de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs 
[\[136b.3\]]pas gos bgos nas/_/mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/_des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa 
[\[136b.4\]]thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas 
[\[136b.5\]]gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags 
[\[136b.6\]]pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin na yang ngan pa la dga' bar gyur nas/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[136b.7\]]dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_nga'i dge slong phyis khung 'di ni nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ngan ngon la mos pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag_/the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gnas brtan phyis 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]khung gis las ci bgyis na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag phyis khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za 
[\[137a.2\]]bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_phyis khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams 
[\[137a.3\]]dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang 
[\[137a.4\]]chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa 
[\[137a.5\]]dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan zhes bya ba na rten 
[\[137a.6\]]cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang der khyim bdag cig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/_der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so/_/gtsug lag khang de na so so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/_de yang 
[\[137a.7\]]gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste dge slong gsar du 'ong ba rnams mthong na tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de/_zhul zhul por 'dug cing 'khrug pa skyed par byed do/_/dge slong gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gud du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/_shas cher dga' 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing smra bar byed do/_/phyis re zhig na ga zhig gi yul nas dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongs so/_/gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de yang phyir mi 'ong ba yin te/_des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin par shes so/_/de nas dga' ba skyes te phyi de nyin dge 
[\[137b.2\]]slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs so/_/dge slong gzhi ba de ni de na med pa las re zhig na phyi de nyin cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul/_bshos kyang bshams pa las dge slong gzhi ba de yang 'ongs te/_de yang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar 
[\[137b.3\]]song nas/_gtsug lag khang gi bdag po khyed [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]byung ste/_dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas de phrag dog skyes nas/_des sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/_dge slong khyed ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang 
[\[137b.4\]]sla'i sbyin bdag 'di lta bu bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so/_/de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs pa 'di las ches mi bzad pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas cang mi zer bar dang du blangs so/_/re zhig na tshogs par gyur te dro la bab pa na dge 
[\[137b.5\]]slong gzhi ba des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i sems bskyed do zhes zer ba thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so/_/de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_'phags pa bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po smras pa de bzod par gsol lo zhes byas so/_/
[\[137b.6\]]de nas dgra bcom pa des de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/_/de nas lhag par yang 'gyod pa skyes te/_de nas de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing bshags te shad kyis sbyangs so/_/'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i 
[\[137b.7\]]ye shes bskyed ni ma nus so/_/de nas re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa dang des smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig_/
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]bdag gis bklag pa dang /_kha ton byas pa dang sbyin pa dang sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par shog cig ces 
[\[138a.2\]]byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhi bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyis khung 'di nyid yin te/_des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur te/_
[\[138a.3\]]las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe yang /_'di ltar dri nga zhing mchog tu dri nga bar gyur la mi gtsang ba dang snyag snyig la dga' bar gyur to/_/des kha ton byas pa dang /_phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la 
[\[138a.4\]]mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab 
[\[138a.5\]]par bya ste/_ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_phyis khung so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_dge slong khyod kyis de 
[\[138a.6\]]ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/rtogs 
[\[138a.7\]]pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so//_//sdom ni/_sbrul nag dang ni zla ba dang /_/sA la dang ni dpal ldan ma/_/gos dang ne tso pho nya dang /_/ma he dang ni gso sbyong dang /_/ngang pa tha mar brjod pa yin/_/sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am 
[\[138b.2\]]ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[138b.3\]]'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[138b.4\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/_de yang ser sna can 'jungs pa/_yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/_khwa la 
[\[138b.5\]]yang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/_des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa dag mthong na sems sdang bar byed do/_/de nas des rang gi skyed mos tshal du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po sbas te bzhag nas/_de de la chags te lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o/_/de shi nas 
[\[138b.6\]]de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas skyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog thag tu yang che ge mo'i skyed mos tshal du song ba de dag thams cad 
[\[138b.7\]]brlag par 'gyur ro zhes sgra grag par gyur to/_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs pa de 'dul nus pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo/_/
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[139a.2\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang 
[\[139a.3\]]dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[139a.4\]]su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbrul gdug pa/_sbrul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/_skye bo mang po brlag par bgyid lags na/_bcom ldan 
[\[139a.5\]]'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[139a.6\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer 
[\[139a.7\]]gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/_de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad snang bar byas so/_/bskal pa stong gi bar du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/_de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sim par 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]gyur to/_/de nas sbrul gdug pa des phan tshun du bltas te su'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur zhig gu snyam pa dang /_/des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes 
[\[139b.2\]]par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems skyed de/_dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/_bcom 
[\[139b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par lhung bar byas so/_/da yang nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so/_/'di nas shi 'phos 
[\[139b.4\]]nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skyes re/_de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa de'i tshe de ngus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/_/da ni nga yis ci byar med/_/mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis/_/
[\[139b.5\]]don med ngus pas ci la phan/_/'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/_/nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs/_/'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul de lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/_'od ma'i 
[\[139b.6\]]tshal du bsnams so/_/de'i skabs su rgyal po dang yul ma ga d+hA'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btul ba thos so/_/de nas sbrul gdug pa des rang gi lus la smad de kha 'tshos nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas/_
[\[139b.7\]]sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi 
[\[140a.2\]]cha ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/_/
[\[140a.3\]]lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar 
[\[140a.4\]]byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 
[\[140a.5\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i 
[\[140a.6\]]tshig tu brjod pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu 
[\[140a.7\]]ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten 
[\[140b.2\]]nas thob/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis/_/thub pa khyed ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/
[\[140b.3\]]de nas do shal 'chang ba dga' gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /_zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar 
[\[140b.4\]]gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i thad du song nas/_rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar 
[\[140b.5\]]byas te/_rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po longs nyal te ci bya/_de nas rgyal po sad de/_'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so/_/de na re bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[140b.6\]]sbrul gdug pa btul te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin te/_bcom ldan 'das la yang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/da bdag gis khyod la bstan gyis khyod song la skyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga ge mo zhig nas gter chen 
[\[140b.7\]]po phyung la bdag gi phyir/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te yon gyi rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangs so/_/de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+hA'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi rnams la bsgo nas skyed mos tshal der song ste gter phyung nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[141a.2\]]'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/_des sbrul gdug par skyes lags/_las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes 
[\[141a.3\]]nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nges shas cher chags pa bskyed de/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa des ni sbrul gdug par skyes so/_/nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni 
[\[141a.4\]]lha'i nang du skyes so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/_skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna spang ba'i phyir brtson par byas te/_ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i 
[\[141a.5\]]nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_de nyid lha'i bur gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/_
[\[141a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//zla ba zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas 
[\[141a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs 
[\[141b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas 
[\[141b.3\]]sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhing pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de 
[\[141b.4\]]zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing /_blta na sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim par byed pa zhig btsas so/_/de yang bram ze des dka' bas rnyed pa yin te/_de la bu dang bu mo gzhan yang med nas de bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas de 
[\[141b.5\]]'jig rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes btags so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong khyer thams cad du brgyud de bskor nas/_bram ze de yang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur te/_'chag pa dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dag 
[\[141b.6\]]gi tshe yang rtag tu legs par bsrung ba lhur byed cing 'dug go/_/bram ze de'i khyim yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nye ba zhig na 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang bsten nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/_sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos 
[\[141b.7\]]nas/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed do/_/de yang tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis/_sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos gang du 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag 
[\[142a.2\]]lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_
[\[142a.3\]]nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 
[\[142a.4\]]tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs 
[\[142a.5\]]su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston te/_de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i 
[\[142a.6\]]tshig lan gsum du brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni 
[\[142a.7\]]bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/bdag ni 
[\[142b.2\]]sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/_
[\[142b.3\]]btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song /_/de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams 
[\[142b.4\]]cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[142b.5\]]nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags 
[\[142b.6\]]sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/_bram ze'i bu gcig pa de tshe thung ste shi nas/_de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/_
[\[142b.7\]]sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/_de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/_ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de'i skabs su bram ze des bu gcig pa sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang /_bzod pa dang ldan pa 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]dang mi 'thun pa med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas pang par bzhag ste kyi hud bu/_kyi hud bu thu bo/_kyi hud bu gcig zhes zer zhing 'bod de/_de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar bcugs kyang bslang ma nus nas de khwa dang /_chun lag dang /_bya rgod dang wa rnams kyis ni bskor/_/bud med 
[\[143a.2\]]skra bshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs/_skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go/_/de nas de'i bu lhar skyes pas pha smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas snying rjes snying bskyod de/_pha'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi cha lugs su sprul nas/_dur khrod kyi 'dab tu dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug 
[\[143a.3\]]go/_/de nas bram ze des drang srong de la dris pa/_kye'i drang srong chen po khyod dka' thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub/_drang srong gis smras pa/_nga ni rgyal srid sgrub ste/_nga'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhis
