[\[143a.4\]]ni mdun nas 'dren te/_shing rta de la yang zhon zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do/_/bram zes smras pa/_gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/_/rgyun du dka' thub spyad byas te/_/dka' thub mchog ni spyad byas kyang /_/gnas de khyod kyis re mi 'thob/_/drang srong gis smras pa/_khyod kyang 
[\[143a.5\]]shi ba'i khog pa mchog tu mnam zhing mi gtsang ba'i ro shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci zhig sgrub/_bram zes smras pa/_sdug pa'i bu gcig pa shi ste de sgrub bo/_/drang srong gis smras pa/_gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bar/_/rgyun du ngu ba'i las byas kyang /_/bu de khyod kyis re mi thob/_/khyod 
[\[143a.6\]]ni ngus kyang ci la phan/_/de nas bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden no snyam nas dad pa skyes so/_/dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces dris so/_/de nas drang srong gis cha lugs de mi snang bar byas nas/_rang gi cha lugs su 'dug ste/_pha la smras pa/_bdag ni khyod kyi bu gcig pa de yin 
[\[143a.7\]]te bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/_khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so/_/yab khyod tshur spyon/_bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhud cig dang /_khyed kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar gyur kyang 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]srid do/_/de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus bu bor nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs 
[\[143b.2\]]par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/_de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/des mtho bar 'gyur ba thob cing rnyed pa thob nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[143b.3\]]'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo /_/de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pha'i mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang bzhag pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[143b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas pha yongs su bskyabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/_'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe yang pha gsad pa la thug pa la lan gsum skyabs byas te/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid 
[\[143b.5\]]la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa zhig yod de/_de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu 'grang ba zhig go/_/de nas re zhig na de'i phas rkun po byas nas/_rgyal 
[\[143b.6\]]pos gshed ma rnams la sod cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas bus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas srog phangs pa byin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa gang yin pa de ni bram 
[\[143b.7\]]ze 'di yin no/_/byi ba byed pa'i bu gang yin pa de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no/_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na des pha dang bu gnyis ka bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la de gnyis ka dge bsnyen du gyur te/_skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir de ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bas na 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang chos thams cad bdag 
[\[144a.2\]]med pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang 
[\[144a.3\]]lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//sA la zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 
[\[144a.4\]]'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_
[\[144a.5\]]ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_/na 
[\[144a.6\]]bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs 
[\[144a.7\]]so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sA la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/_der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas shing sa la'i ma tog blangs te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sa la'i me tog blangs te/_
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/_bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[144b.2\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' ba 
[\[144b.3\]]skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das la sa la'i me tog gis gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/_phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam pa dang /_re zhig na de sa la'i shing la 'dzegs pa las lhung ste shi nas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen 
[\[144b.4\]]bkur byas nas/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes so/_/de nas re zhig na lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan te/_lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo /_/de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na 
[\[144b.5\]]sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing 'dug pa las/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_
[\[144b.6\]]ci phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur/_/'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od byung 'di dag ci las gyur/_/ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/_las rnams gang gi 
[\[144b.7\]]'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/_lha mos smras pa/_mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi/_/mi yi nyi ma nyan thos bcas/_/sA la'i me tog rdul med pa/_/bzang po dag gis legs par gtor/_/las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/_/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes/_/bzhin mdog pad ma zla ba ltar/_/rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing /_/nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/_/de la khyod kyis 
[\[145a.2\]]sa bon btab/_/bzhin mdzes pad ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/_/bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/_/sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/_/gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de 
[\[145a.3\]]la su mi mchod/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos/_gang du skyes/_las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang 
[\[145a.4\]]por skyes pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag ma lon par bcom 
[\[145a.5\]]ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/_lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la 
[\[145a.6\]]sogs pas byugs pa de/_lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo sa la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid de dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[145a.7\]]phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]de thos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya 
[\[145b.2\]]mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang 
[\[145b.3\]]ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song 
[\[145b.4\]]lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya 
[\[145b.5\]]mtsho pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/de nas do shal 
[\[145b.6\]]'phyang ba dga' gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /_zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /_dpa' 
[\[145b.7\]]bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du/_'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te de 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs 
[\[146a.2\]]pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 
[\[146a.3\]]'ongs pa ma yin no/_/bu mo gang gis lam khar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod kyis mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/de ni nga la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de nga'i thad du 'ongs te/_ngas de la 
[\[146a.4\]]chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/_rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor 
[\[146a.5\]]byas/_mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang 
[\[146a.6\]]po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa bam po bcu gsum pa/_dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams 
[\[146a.7\]]dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang 
[\[146b.2\]]gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can 
[\[146b.3\]]snying po rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med 
[\[146b.4\]]pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba 
[\[146b.5\]]de'i tshe btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te/_dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/_shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs 
[\[146b.6\]]dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod na/_skyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dong nas/_der btsun mo'i 'khor gyis rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha bdag cag ni gdugs gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 
[\[146b.7\]]'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo mi thogs na/_lha btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar ci gnang /_'on kyang bdag cag gis de la rgyun du mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bkur sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[147a.2\]]bdag la dbu skra dang sen mo stsal du gsol/_'on tang bdag gis mchis brang 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/_zhal bsro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to/_/de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs 
[\[147a.3\]]can snying po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsros nas/_de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog 
[\[147a.4\]]dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do/_/de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis rbad de/_yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas 
[\[147a.5\]]rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin par bya ba'i chos thams cad bcad da/_su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bkur sti ma byed cig ces khrims kyang bcas so/_/de nas gang gi tshe tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la skabs 'byed pa'i 
[\[147a.6\]]dus la bab pa de'i tshe dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de la su yang phyag dar byed pa'am/_mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dbul ba med do/_/de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa yang mthong /_rgyal po 
[\[147a.7\]]gzugs can snying po yang dran nas/_snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams las 'gribs so zhes 'dzer to/_/de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsdos te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/_dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/_mar me'i phreng ba dngar to/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du byung ste/_snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /_re zhig 
[\[147b.2\]]na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba dngar ba lags so zhes byas so/_/de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces smras na/_de na re bdag gis khyod kyis bka' bcag tu lags 
[\[147b.3\]]kyang bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bka' ma bcag go zhes zer ro/_/de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'phangs te bsad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por 
[\[147b.4\]]skyes so/_/de'i tshe lha mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa dang ldan pa de lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du song ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang 
[\[147b.5\]]lha'i 'od dpag tshad gcig pa mthong nas dris pa/_ci'i phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad ma ud pal lta bur gyur/_/'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur/_/ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog 
[\[147b.6\]]pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur/_/las rnams gang gis 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/_/lha mos smras pa/_'jig rten gsum mgon 'gro ba'i sgron gcig po/_/mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[147b.7\]]mthong /_/smra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba la/_/mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon tu phul/_/zla ba'i 'od zer mdog dang 'dra ba'i 'od/_/mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa skyes/_/'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis/_/ston pa smra ba'i mchog la 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]phyag kyang bgyis/_/las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir/_/bdag ni lhag par mngon tu mdzes/_/bzhin mdog pad ma zla ba ltar/_/rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing /_/nyes pa 
[\[148a.2\]]thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir/_/de la khyod kyis sa bon btab/_/bzhin mdzes pad ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma/_/bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi/_/sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 
[\[148a.3\]]'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba/_/gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes 
[\[148a.4\]]snyam mo/_/de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom 
[\[148a.5\]]ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma 
[\[148a.6\]]dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[148a.7\]]spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan mas 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho 
[\[148b.2\]]bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma 
[\[148b.3\]]bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan 
[\[148b.4\]]pa'i ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/
[\[148b.5\]]bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang 'thob/_/mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras 
[\[148b.6\]]bu yod/_/de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma/_tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /_
[\[148b.7\]]zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /_/dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /_/nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci 
[\[149a.2\]]lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i 
[\[149a.3\]]dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang bsdos te/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i 
[\[149a.4\]]mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba dngar nas/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de/_de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas shi ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/_deng mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/_ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa 
[\[149a.5\]]mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_/ston pa la bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/ston pa la bkur sti byas/_/bla mar byas/_/ri mor byas/_/mchod pa byas nas 
[\[149a.6\]]brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gos zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[149a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen 
[\[149b.2\]]po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[149b.3\]]mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul te/_
[\[149b.4\]]mthar gyis gser srang bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tshe de'i blo skyes pa ma la bdag sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyis/_bdag gis skye bo dbul po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir mnyan 
[\[149b.5\]]du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa bsdus te/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skye bo mang po la yang phan gdags par gyur la/_bsod nams mang po yang bskyed par 
[\[149b.6\]]'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de/_rgyal po la gsol nas/_rgyal pos kyang mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril bsgrags te/_mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi khyed rnams nyon cig_/
[\[149b.7\]]deng nas zhag bdun na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir glang po che la zhon te/_dad pa sdud par 'dod kyis khyed gang gis ji tsam yongs su gtang bar bya ba de yongs su gtang bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/de 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]nas re zhig na zhag bdun lon pa dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin glang po che la zhon te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa sdud pa la zhugs te/_der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed de/_kha cig ni 
[\[150a.2\]]mgul gyi se mo do sbyin par byed/_kha cig ni gdu bu sbyin par byed/_kha cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par byed/_kha cig ni gser gyi phreng ba sbyin par byed/_kha cig ni sor gdub kyi rgyan sbyin par byed/_kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/_kha cig ni gser sbyin 
[\[150a.3\]]par byed/_kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/_kha cig ni tha na zho'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par byed do/_/khyim bdag de yang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir len par byed do/_/de nas re zhig na bud med shin tu dbul mo zhig gis sha thang ste/_zla ba gsum gyis ras yug 
[\[150a.4\]]cig rnyed nas des ras de gyon te srang du zhugs pa dang /_des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dung 'bud cing rnga zlum brdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ongs pa mthong nas des dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa ji ste/_khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste/_gter sa'i 
[\[150a.5\]]'og tu sbas pa rnams kyang mthong na/_ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing skor bar byed ces byas pa dang /_dge bsnyen de na re gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir te gang dag bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag 
[\[150a.6\]]gi don du phan 'dogs par byed de/_ci nas mang po bsdongs te bcom ldan 'das la dbul du 'jug go zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa/_'o na bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin la/_bdag gcig pus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 
[\[150a.7\]]bcas pa bshos gsol ba'i mthu bdag la med kyis/_bdag gis 'di la cung zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug gcig ma gtogs pa gzhan ci yang ma mthong ste/_/des bsams pa gal te bdag 'di 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag gcer bur 'byung gis bdag khang thog tu song la ras dor ro snyam mo/_/de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang gi lus las ras phud de/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi steng du bor ba dang /_khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/_'dis khang 
[\[150b.2\]]thog nas bor ba las na/_'di la nor de las med gor ma chag snyam nas rang gi g.yog rnams la bsgo ba/_khyed dong la ras 'di sus bor ba ltos shig ces byas nas/_de dag gis bltas pa dang re zhig na bu mo de tsog tsog por 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag gis 
[\[150b.3\]]dris pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste bdag gis gos rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro/_/de nas de dag gis khyim bdag 
[\[150b.4\]]mgon med zas sbyin la byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_bu mo de la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to/_/de nas de tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/_skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu 
[\[150b.5\]]dang lha'i bu mo gzhan su la yang med pa de lta bu'i gos dag de la byung ngo /_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas mi las shi 
[\[150b.6\]]'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che 
[\[150b.7\]]sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/_lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa des/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_rgyal 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsam 
[\[151a.2\]]pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom 
[\[151a.3\]]nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams 
[\[151a.4\]]bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen 
[\[151a.5\]]gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_/dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams 
[\[151a.6\]]rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/
[\[151a.7\]]mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /_zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las thar 
[\[151b.2\]]ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo /_/
[\[151b.3\]]mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom 
[\[151b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/_ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud 
[\[151b.5\]]par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/_de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas/_bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_
[\[151b.6\]]sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti bya'i bkur sti med par mi bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[151b.7\]]bstod do//_//ne tso zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[152a.2\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong 
[\[152a.3\]]rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_
[\[152a.4\]]rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang 
[\[152a.5\]]dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/_bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs te/_snying rje che ba/_bdag nyid 
[\[152a.6\]]che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/_/de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smon te/_lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/_rgyal pos 
[\[152a.7\]]smras pa/_ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo /_/ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo /_/da ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/_lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am mi gzigs pa'am mi rtogs pa'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la 
[\[152b.2\]]phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul 
[\[152b.3\]]ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_/chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i 
[\[152b.4\]]seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnams par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi 
[\[152b.5\]]me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/_/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad 
[\[152b.6\]]par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang 
[\[152b.7\]]gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]nor bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par 
[\[153a.2\]]grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can 
[\[153a.3\]]snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir/_dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang /_nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig 
[\[153a.4\]]gnas te/_des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /_/de nas shin tu rings par song ste/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so/_/bdag la phan gdags su 
[\[153a.5\]]gsol/_nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing gang la ne tso gnas pa de'i drung du rtswa'i gdan bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/nyan thos chen po rnams 
[\[153a.6\]]ni shing gzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do/_/de nas ne tsos bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la mi'am/_mi ma yin pa'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sam gcan gzan gnod pa byed du dogs te/_mtshan thog thag nags khrod de na phan tshun skor 
[\[153a.7\]]bar byed do/_/de nas nam langs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pas/_bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci yang ma mchis na bzod pa 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]mdzad du gsol/_/de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes sbran par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ltar gyis shig_/de nas re zhig na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du 
[\[153b.2\]]chas te mthar gyis rgyal po'i thad du phyin to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na bud med 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas ne tso mi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa/_kye rgyal po khyod mkhyen par mdzod 
[\[153b.3\]]cig_/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyis/_lha khyod kyis bshos sta gon mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng nas babs te/_blon po chen po'i 
[\[153b.4\]]tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bshams nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan 
[\[153b.5\]]thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so/_/de nas ne tso de 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni bdag gi yon tan yin no snyam du 
[\[153b.6\]]rig nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i mdun logs su phan tshun du lding ba las khras khyer te bsad do/_/bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed de shi bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/_/
[\[153b.7\]]lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos/_gang du skyes/_las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/_bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das 
[\[154a.2\]]la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas 
[\[154a.3\]]byugs pa des/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man da ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor 
[\[154a.4\]]te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos 
[\[154a.5\]]nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas/_dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang 
[\[154a.6\]]mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal 
[\[154a.7\]]pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyis mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/bdag ni sdug 
[\[154b.2\]]bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/de nas do shal 'phyang 
[\[154b.3\]]ba dga' gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /_zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /_dpa' 
[\[154b.4\]]bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/_de 
[\[154b.5\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i 
[\[154b.6\]]dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 
[\[154b.7\]]'ongs pa ma yin no/_/ne tso gang gis nga nags khrod der nub mo'i dgongs mal la spyan drangs pa de khyod kyis mthong ngam/_dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ne tso de nyid 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa de yin no/_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/_des ne tsor skyes lags/_las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa 
[\[155a.2\]]mthong bar gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las 
[\[155a.3\]]byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 
[\[155a.4\]]'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/
[\[155a.5\]]'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[155a.6\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na de na dge 
[\[155a.7\]]bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas te las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ne tsor skyes so/_/nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/_/des bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 
[\[155b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[155b.3\]]skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//pho nya zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang /_pho 
[\[155b.4\]]brang 'khor kyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis 
[\[155b.5\]]bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams 
[\[155b.6\]]chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par dbyar gnas par 
[\[155b.7\]]dam bcas so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig_/sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/_bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras 
[\[156a.2\]]pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/_mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_lha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam bzhes so zhes thos lags so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[156a.3\]]gsal rgyal dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la sogs pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi dang blon po rnams kyis mi zhig pho nyar bkug ste/_kye mi khyod tshur shog_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la/_der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[156a.4\]]phyag 'tshol la/_bdag cag gi mchid nas/_bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho 'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/_
[\[156a.5\]]'di skad du btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/_bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong bas/_bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal 
[\[156a.6\]]bas skom lags so/_/bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes mchi'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_blon 
[\[156a.7\]]po dang /_pho brang 'khor kyi mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du mnyan te/_rgyal po'i khab tu song nas/_mthar gyis song song ba las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor kyi mi 
[\[156b.2\]]rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/_bde ba la reg par gnas 
[\[156b.3\]]sam zhes mchi'o/_/'di skad du bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/_bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lags so/_/bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/_thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom 
[\[156b.4\]]ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye gal te nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar bya'o/_/de nas pho nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[156b.5\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dad pa stsal lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la 
[\[156b.6\]]cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar zla gsum 'das nas/_chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas zhabs 'bring 'khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod pa logs su chas te gshegs so/_/
[\[156b.7\]]pho nya yang shing rta la zhon te chas so/_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas shing rta las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thugs brtse ba'i slad 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang /_/yang dag stsol la nga gnas nas/_/nyon mongs tsher mas ma snad par/_/sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed/_/pho nyas gsol 
[\[157a.2\]]pa/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang /_bdag la phan gdags pa dang thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcibs su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das pho nya la phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du bzhugs so/_/
[\[157a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bcibs bzhin du mnyan du yod par byon nas pho nyas kyang rgyal po la sbran to/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu nas/_chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan 
[\[157a.4\]]mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod do/_/pho nya de ni tshe thung ste chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/_de shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa 
[\[157a.5\]]gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos/_gang du skyes/_las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo /_/
[\[157a.6\]]de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon pho nyar gyur 
[\[157a.7\]]pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/_lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa/_des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dang pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 
[\[157b.2\]]'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas 
[\[157b.3\]]sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang /_
[\[157b.4\]]mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal 
[\[157b.5\]]pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i 
[\[157b.6\]]ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/bdag ni 
[\[157b.7\]]sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/de nas 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /_zhing pa 
[\[158a.2\]]'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khang 
[\[158a.3\]{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'dug pas snang ba chen po de mthong nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta 
[\[158a.4\]]ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyis/_khyod kyi pho nya de nga la sems dga' bar 
[\[158a.5\]]gyur nas shi ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/_ngas de la chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po de ngo mtshar du gyur nas kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma chos kye ma dge 'dun 
[\[158a.6\]]'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig byas kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_
[\[158a.7\]]stan las langs te song ngo /_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang /_chos mchog tu gdags pa dang /_dge 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/_sems can rkang med rnams sam/_rkang gnyis rnams sam/_rkang bzhi rnams sam/_rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]rnams sam/_gzugs can rnams sam/_gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/_'du 
[\[158b.2\]]shes can rnams sam/_'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/_'du shes yod pa yang ma yin 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to/_/sangs 
[\[158b.3\]]rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/_mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar 
[\[158b.4\]]shes par bya ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/_'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par ston to/_/chos la 
[\[158b.5\]]mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya 
[\[158b.6\]]ste/_'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na tshogs sam/_'dus pa'am/_mang po'am/_'khor gang yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par bstan te/_
[\[158b.7\]]dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/_mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang 
[\[159a.2\]]po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_ma he zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon 
[\[159a.3\]]rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_
[\[159a.4\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha 
[\[159a.5\]]dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang /_nags khrod de na ma he'i khyu chen po dang ma he rdzi lnga brgya 'khod do/_/de nas re 
[\[159a.6\]]zhig na de'i nang na ma he stobs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/_de mi gzhan dag gi dri tshor na phyi bzhin rgyug par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so/_/de nas ma he rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 
[\[159a.7\]]bcas pa thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag gis skad cher bos te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis/_shul 'dir mi gshegs su gsol zhes byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/kye ngas 'dir dus la bab par shes 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]kyis khyed snying ma chung shig_/de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring mo zhig nas mthong ba dang rnga ma ldang du gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun logs su seng ge ral pa can ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sprul te/_
[\[159b.2\]]glo g.yas g.yon du mi chen po lnga sprul to/_/steng du ni lcags kyi pha bong chen po zhig sprul to/_/de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces bldags nas zhum pa'i 
[\[159b.3\]]bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la/_des brda phrad pa'i skad du bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum 
[\[159b.4\]]bstan nas/_tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de de thos nas ngus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/_/da ni nga yis ci byar yod/_/mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis/_/don med ngus pas ci la phan/_/
[\[159b.5\]]'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can/_/nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs/_/'on kyang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de nas ma he ma rungs pa des rang gi lus la dmad de kha 'tshos nas/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags 
[\[159b.6\]]rnams ni me'i drod che bas de skyen par shi ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/_las gang gis skyes snyam 
[\[159b.7\]]mo/_/de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos 
[\[160a.2\]]brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_spr-ika la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man 
[\[160a.3\]]dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i 
[\[160a.4\]]bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom 
[\[160a.5\]]nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho 
[\[160a.6\]]ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis 
[\[160a.7\]]sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/
[\[160b.2\]]skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig 
[\[160b.3\]]rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa 
[\[160b.4\]]de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis snang ba chen po de mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das mdang sum bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis 
[\[160b.5\]]te/_lha'i 'od kyis snang bar bgyis pa de su zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyi ma he de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/_de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bstan te/_
[\[160b.6\]]bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas ma he rdzi de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te ngo mtshar to/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa 'di yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/_bden pa mthong bar gyur na bdag 
[\[160b.7\]]cag gis ci ste khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/_de dag gis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ma 
[\[161a.2\]]her skyes lags las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/_ma he rdzi 'di rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na des ma he rdzir gyur lags/_las gang bgyis pas ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom 
[\[161a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ongs pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_de dag nyid kyis las byas shing 
[\[161a.4\]]bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par 
[\[161a.5\]]mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la 
[\[161a.6\]]bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde 
[\[161a.7\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]so/_/de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs par byed pa na/_dge slong sde snod gsum pa zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang gtan la 'bebs pa'i nang na 'dug go/_/de'i nang na slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag kyang yod de/_de dag sde snod gsum pa la 'dri bar byed la/_des 
[\[161b.2\]]ni lan ma thebs pa dang /_de khros nas ngag gi las rtsub po phyung ste/_nags kyi ma he dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes byas so/_/de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang ma he rdzi dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[161b.3\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de nyid ma he 'di yin no/_/slob ma de dag ni ma he rdzi 'di dag yin te/_las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar ma her skyes so/_/slob ma rnams kyang ma he rdzi lnga brgyar gyur to/_/nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa des 
[\[161b.4\]]ni lhar skyes so/_/dge slong gi dngos po thob ste tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang dgra bcom nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de bas na ngag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/_ci nas ma he dang ma he rdzi rnams kyi nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar 
[\[161b.5\]]mi 'gyur ba dang /_lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon 
[\[161b.6\]]par bstod do//_//bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams 
[\[161b.7\]]dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun 
[\[162a.2\]]gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba 
[\[162a.3\]]zhig yod de/_de chos mnyan pa'i phyir rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o/_/de nas phyis re zhig na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[162a.4\]]chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos 
[\[162a.5\]]nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i 
[\[162a.6\]]rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma 
[\[162a.7\]]bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/_/
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/_/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/_/
[\[162b.2\]]'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs 
[\[162b.3\]]gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /_nad pa nad thams cad 
[\[162b.4\]]las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de'i tshe dge slong dag srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong 
[\[162b.5\]]ngo /_/mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad 
[\[162b.6\]]du mchis lags sam/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/_/lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa nga 
[\[162b.7\]]la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/_rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lha'i bu bsnyen gnas ga las byung lags/_ming 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]ni ci las btags lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas 
[\[163a.2\]]bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[163a.3\]]skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/phyis re zhig na rgyal po kr-i kI bcom ldan 
[\[163a.4\]]'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo /_/de nas re zhig na bram ze gnyis drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ba dang /_de gnyis kyis rgyal po de rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa mthong ngo /_/de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes nas/_
[\[163a.5\]]de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/_kye sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen las ci zhig byas na/_des ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes byas so/_/dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/_gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag par 
[\[163a.6\]]bsrungs pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag chu stod las bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrungs so/_/de na gcig gis ni yongs su dag par bsrungs te/_de 
[\[163a.7\]]nas shi nas rgyal po kr-i kI'i bur skyes te de'i bu'i ming legs skyes zhes btags nas pha shi ba'i 'og tu de rgyal por bcug go/_/cig shos kyis ni bsnyen gnas nyams par byas te de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te/_de'i steng du nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye tshan bab ste 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]des rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed do/_/de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di las gang gi 'bras bu yin/_'di las gang gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin na/_des bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam mo/_/de nas des bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang 
[\[163b.2\]]ldan pa/_bdag gis blangs pa las bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyams su myong la/_gang gis blangs te bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid thob par gyur to snyam mo/_/yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_da yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan 
[\[163b.3\]]lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrung bar bya'o/_/'on kyang bdag klu'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/_rgyal po'i thad du 'ongs te phyin nas/_rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig_/sku tshe ring bar shog cig 
[\[163b.4\]]ces bstod nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyis lha bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa stsal du gsol/_gal te ma stsal na gdon mi 'tshal bar lha'i dbu tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas de 
[\[163b.5\]]nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag ste/_mi dga' la skyi bung zhes byas nas gser 'bum yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/_bdag gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas/_su nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan 
[\[163b.6\]]pa ston pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin no/_/bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas re zhig na shing mkhan gyi bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des/_rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/_sngon bdag gi pha rtag tu ka ba 'di la spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_
[\[163b.7\]]me tog gis mchod pa bgyid na/_'od phyung ste gzigs shig ces byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos zham ring ba rnams la ka ba 'di phyung shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring rnams kyis ka ba de phyung ba dang /_de'i 'og nas bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]pa dang /_dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs bam la bris pa zhig rnyed do/_/de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bris te byin to/_/drang srong smra ba na gnas 
[\[164a.2\]]pa'i drang srong khri nyis stong gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas so/_/klu des kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thang la phyung ste lus bor nas de kha 'tshos te 'dug go/_/de nas de shi ste g.yog 'khor lnga brgya 
[\[164a.3\]]dang bcas te/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/_/dge slong dag bsnyen gnas ni de las byung ste ming yang de las btags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[164a.4\]]mngon par bstod do//_//ngang pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_
