[\[164a.5\]]klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma 
[\[164a.6\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams 
[\[164a.7\]]brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang 
[\[164b.2\]]dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/phyis re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_pany+tsa la'i 
[\[164b.3\]]rgyal pos/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skyes su bskur te/_gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe ngang pa lnga brgya po de dag phul lo/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du 
[\[164b.4\]]btang nas/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/_ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro la/_bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyos ma byin te/_de dag gis 
[\[164b.5\]]zos nas tshim zhing mgu la dbang po brtas te 'khod do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/_'khor bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe/_ngang pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste chos nyan par byed do/_/de nas de dag tshe thung ste/_
[\[164b.6\]]shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_gang nas shi 'phos/_gang du skyes/_las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas ngang pa las shi 'phos 
[\[164b.7\]]pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin 
[\[165a.2\]]po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/_lus gur gum dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra rnams kyis 
[\[165a.3\]]thu ba bkang ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi 
[\[165a.4\]]bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes 
[\[165a.5\]]rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /_rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /_ngan song 
[\[165a.6\]]gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /_bdag cag lha dang mi'i nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen gyi 
[\[165a.7\]]tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/yang smras pa/_nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/_/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/_/bsod nams rab ldan 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]mtho ris 'gro ba phye/_/mya ngan 'das lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob/_/bdag cag de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig_/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/_/bdag cag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/_/mi 
[\[165b.2\]]mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar dga' ba yi/_/thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod/_/de nas do shal 'phyang rnams dga' gyur te/_/btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/dgra 
[\[165b.3\]]thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/lha yi 'jig rten kha bltas lha yul song /_/de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin du 'byor pa 
[\[165b.4\]]gang gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[165b.5\]]bas kyang the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta 
[\[165b.6\]]ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no/_/dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal 
[\[165b.7\]]rgyal gyis/_ngang pa lnga brgya 'dir btang ba khyod kyis mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/_shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/_de dag mdang sum nga'i thad du lhags nas de dag la 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]ngas chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag 
[\[166a.2\]]bgyis na des ngang par skyes lags/_las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' 
[\[166a.3\]]rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa 
[\[166a.4\]]rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched 
[\[166a.5\]]rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang 
[\[166a.6\]]po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[166a.7\]]kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung ba las bslab pa la lhod par byas pa des ni ngang par skyes so/_/nga la 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so/_/bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[166b.2\]]gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs 
[\[166b.3\]]la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[166b.4\]]bstod do/_/gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs so//_//sdom ni/_gser 'od dang ni dri zhim dang /_/byad bzang stobs ldan sdu gu dang /_/pad ma mig dang rnga sgra dang /_/bu dang nyi ma gyad pa 
[\[166b.5\]]dang /_/gser 'od ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams 
[\[166b.6\]]dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[166b.7\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 
[\[167a.2\]]ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 
[\[167a.3\]]lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig btsas te/_de'i gser gyi 'od kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas 
[\[167a.4\]]so/_/de nas pha ma dang sems can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ni ga las 'ongs zhig gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhugs so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 
[\[167a.5\]]'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re 'di btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gser 'od ces gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u gser 
[\[167a.6\]]'od pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan 
[\[167a.7\]]yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang /_dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa zhig go/_/phyis re zhig na/_de byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas myos te grong khyer gyi phyi rol na rtse zhing 'dug go/_/shAkya mang po dag cig kyang shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo /_/de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas 
[\[167b.2\]]dris pa khyod gar 'dong /_de dag gis smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o/_/de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba thos te/_sngon ma thos pa'i ming thos nas spu thams cad zing zhes byas 
[\[167b.3\]]te/_mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chag snyam nas de yang shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /_khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[167b.4\]]sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_
[\[167b.5\]]mthong ma thag tu byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/_des chos de thos pa dang 
[\[167b.6\]]rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na pha ma la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 
[\[167b.7\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/_khye'u gser 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig_/de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod la skra dang kha spu bregs 
[\[168a.2\]]nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/_spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/_lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to/_/'dir smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/_/de ni mgo bregs lus 
[\[168a.3\]]la snam sbyar gyon/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas/_/mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/_des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad 
[\[168a.4\]]pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs 
[\[168a.5\]]nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar 
[\[168a.6\]]gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang 
[\[168a.7\]]gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang dag bgyis na/_des 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang rab tu 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gser 'od nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de 
[\[168b.2\]]dag byas shing bsags pas na/_gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i 
[\[168b.3\]]khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can 
[\[168b.4\]]dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[168b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 
[\[168b.6\]]'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med 
[\[168b.7\]]pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/_mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/_/de nas re zhig na khyim bdag cig mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las mchod rten de las gser gyi me long 
[\[169a.2\]]zhig lhung ba des mthong nas/_des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas/_mchod rten de la btags te/_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par 
[\[169a.3\]]gyur cig_/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u 
[\[169a.4\]]gser 'od 'di yin te/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur byad gzugs kyi khyad par can du gyur to/_/smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/
[\[169a.5\]]dge slong dag de ltar na/_las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/_rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[169a.6\]]'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod 
[\[169a.7\]]kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//dri zhim zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams 
[\[169b.2\]]dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis 
[\[169b.3\]]mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas 
[\[169b.4\]]na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des 
[\[169b.5\]]rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug 
[\[169b.6\]]la mdzes pa zhig mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/_de'i kha nas me tog ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/_lus thams cad las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo /_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags 
[\[169b.7\]]zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_de'i nye du rnams na re 'di'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri byung la/_lus thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri byung bas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u dri zhim pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang 
[\[170a.2\]]ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/_dge zhing bsam pa bzang la bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje can/_bdag nyid che la/_chos 
[\[170a.3\]]'dod pa zhig ste/_gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim zhing dpung rgyan dang mgul pa'i do shal dang gdu bus brgyan te srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe/_tsan dan gyi dri bsung gis grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur te/_skye bo mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tshor nas mchog tu ya 
[\[170a.4\]]mtshan du 'dzin te/_'di skad du/_kye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes zer ro/_/phyis re zhig na khye'u dri zhim n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo /_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan 
[\[170a.5\]]pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba 
[\[170a.6\]]bskyed do/_/dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang 
[\[170a.7\]]bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad 
[\[170b.2\]]snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas 
[\[170b.3\]]gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i 
[\[170b.4\]]rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[170b.5\]]la zhus pa/_btsun pa dri zhim gyis las gang dag bgyis na/_des 'di'i kha nas ni ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/_lus thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dri zhim nyid 
[\[170b.6\]]kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_dri zhim nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong 
[\[170b.7\]]bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/
[\[171a.2\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_
[\[171a.3\]]bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs 
[\[171a.4\]]rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_
[\[171a.5\]]rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/_mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do/_/khyim bdag gcig gis kyang de la dad pa bskyed nas/_
[\[171a.6\]]spos dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/_bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/_bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig_/
[\[171a.7\]]ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]te/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur dri zhim por gyur to/_/smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag 
[\[171b.2\]]de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par 
[\[171b.3\]]smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[171b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_byad bzang zhes bya ba ni/_sangs 
[\[171b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma 
[\[171b.6\]]yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[171b.7\]]lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/_shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam 
[\[172a.2\]]thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de/_rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags 
[\[172a.3\]]nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/_lus byad dpe med la mdog 'jam pa/_lus kyi bdun mtho ba/_che bar grags 
[\[172a.4\]]pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re 'di'i lus dpe med pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byad bzang zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas 
[\[172a.5\]]khye'u byad bzang pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_
[\[172a.6\]]mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge ba bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje can 
[\[172a.7\]]bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig ste/_'jig rten thams cad dang tha na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/des sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag kyang gtsang mar gyur te/_de ltar bsod nams 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]dang ldan zhing che bar grags so/_/phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 
[\[172b.2\]]'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/_/dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[172b.3\]]phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan 
[\[172b.4\]]te/_de thos nas khye'u byad bzang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung 
[\[172b.5\]]ngo /_/des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos 
[\[172b.6\]]can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i 
[\[172b.7\]]sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa byad bzang gis las gang 
[\[173a.2\]]dag bgyis na/_des 'di'i lus 'di lta bur gyur la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag byad bzang nyid kyis/_sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' 
[\[173a.3\]]rgal bzhin du byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na byad bzang nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi 
[\[173a.4\]]rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye 
[\[173a.5\]]mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal 
[\[173a.6\]]pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi 
[\[173a.7\]]rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/_re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la/_sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_
[\[173b.2\]]rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/_der rgyal po gnyen yod gnyen gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang /_blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring 
[\[173b.3\]]byas pas mchod rten gyi dus ston byas so/_/phyis re zhig na nyi ma gcig cig_/mi dbul po zhig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song nas des de la me tog rnyis pa dag dang /_mchod rten rdul gyis yog pa dag mthong ngo /_/de nas des sangs 
[\[173b.4\]]rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/_phyags ma blangs nas mchod rten yang phyags me tog rnyis pa yang bsal to/_/de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa mthong nas/_dga' ba skyes te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_
[\[173b.5\]]smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig_/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom 
[\[173b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_byad bzang 'di yin te/_des mchod rten la phyag dar byas pas na byad gzugs bzang por gyur to/_/smon lam btab pa 
[\[173b.7\]]des ni tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par 
[\[174a.2\]]dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//stobs 
[\[174a.3\]]ldan zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu 
[\[174a.4\]]rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[174a.5\]]gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_
[\[174a.6\]]gdon dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/_longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs 
[\[174a.7\]]shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags 
[\[174b.2\]]zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming stobs ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u stobs ldan pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_
[\[174b.3\]]dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i 
[\[174b.4\]]nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/_bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig go/_/de nas phyis re zhig na/_de shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun 
[\[174b.5\]]dga' ra bar song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' 
[\[174b.6\]]ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/_/dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 
[\[174b.7\]]kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khye'u stobs ldan 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden pa mthong nas/_pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig 
[\[175a.2\]]lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra 
[\[175a.3\]]bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang 
[\[175a.4\]]so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang /_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang /_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas 
[\[175a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa stobs ldan kyis las gang dag bgyis na/_des 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan par gyur la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag stobs ldan nyid kyis/_sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed 
[\[175a.6\]]cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i 
[\[175a.7\]]khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_lus can dag gi 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan 
[\[175b.2\]]pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/_re zhig na yang dag par 
[\[175b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa 
[\[175b.4\]]byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/_mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der skye bo phal po ches glu blangs gar byas pas mchod rten rdul gyis yog par gyur to/_/phyis re zhig na khyim 
[\[175b.5\]]bdag cig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song ba dang des mchod rten gyi 'khor sa rdul gyis yog pa mthong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/_spos kyi lde gu til mar dang sbyar ba phul nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu 
[\[175b.6\]]dag thob par gyur cig_/ston pa 'di lta bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs ldan 'di yin te/_des bcom ldan 
[\[175b.7\]]'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na stobs dang ldan par gyur to/_/smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu 
[\[176a.2\]]nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//sdu gu zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[176a.3\]]la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po 
[\[176a.4\]]rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas 
[\[176a.5\]]dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos 
[\[176a.6\]]kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u 
[\[176a.7\]]gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_che bar grags pa mthong na dga' ba zhig btsas te de btsas pa na/_grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad grags pas rgyas par gyur to/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas ma 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming sdu gu zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u sdu gu pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_
[\[176b.2\]]mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/_
[\[176b.3\]]chos 'dod pa/_gtong ba la sred pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba/_rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/_des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas sdud par byed do/_/de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u sdu gu shing n+ya gro d+hA'i 
[\[176b.4\]]kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun 
[\[176b.5\]]nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/_/dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_
[\[176b.6\]]khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khye'u sdu gus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas 
[\[176b.7\]]pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur 
[\[177a.2\]]pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom 
[\[177a.3\]]skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sdu gus las gang dag bgyis na/_des 'di grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/_rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[177a.4\]]dge slong dag sdu gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_sdu gu nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las 
[\[177a.5\]]byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par 
[\[177a.6\]]smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig 
[\[177a.7\]]pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/_re zhig na 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku 
[\[177b.2\]]gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/_/de nas phyis re zhig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te me tog rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba na/_khyim bdag 
[\[177b.3\]]gcig gis rgyal po la gsol pa/_bdag ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de ltar gyis shig_/de nas khyim bdag de dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/_
[\[177b.4\]]me tog rnam pa sna tshogs sta gon byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog btags te/_der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba skyes nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du 
[\[177b.5\]]sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdu gu 'di yin te/_des skye bo phal po che dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des na/_skye bo phal po che'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyur gyur la/_rgyu de nyid kyis na blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[177b.6\]]sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 
[\[177b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//pad ma'i mig ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_
[\[178a.2\]]ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[178a.3\]]sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams 
[\[178a.4\]]brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i 
[\[178a.5\]]nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug 
[\[178a.6\]]la mdzes pa mig pad ma sngon po 'dra ba/_mgo bo la lha'i nor bu rin po che mthon ka thogs pa zhig btsas te/_des grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nor bu mthon ka'i kha dog can du byas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji 
[\[178a.7\]]skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di mig pad ma dang 'dra bas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad ma'i mig ces gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u pad ma'i mig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du 
[\[178b.2\]]skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang dad pa dang ldan la/_dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_gtong ba la sred pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba/_rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/_
[\[178b.3\]]gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/_de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod cing rjed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na khye'u pad ma'i mig shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[178b.4\]]kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba 
[\[178b.5\]]bskyed do/_/dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud 
[\[178b.6\]]nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khye'u pad ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas te des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang 
[\[178b.7\]]rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/_dge slong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa 
[\[179a.2\]]nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_
[\[179a.3\]]rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na de bsod snyoms 
[\[179a.4\]]la song ba dang /_skye bo phal po ches de la bltas nas ngo mtshar bar gyur to/_/de nas pad ma'i mig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 
[\[179a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na nor bu rin po che med par bya mi nus so/_/de lta mod kyis ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/_ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/_/
[\[179a.6\]]de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa pad ma'i mig gis las gang dag bgyis na/_des 'di che bar grags pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[179a.7\]]pad ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_pad ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams 
[\[179b.2\]]ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 
[\[179b.3\]]dus na/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston 
[\[179b.4\]]pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/_re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me 
[\[179b.5\]]bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad 
[\[179b.6\]]gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/_der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas re zhig na/_ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub ste/_phyir 'ongs nas des de'i nang nas 
[\[179b.7\]]nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po zhig khyer te 'ongs te/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/_nor bu rin po che de bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags nas/_de'i mthus phyogs dang 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]phyogs mtshams thams cad mthon ka'i mdog lta bur 'dug par byas so/_/me tog pad ma dag gis kyang mchod pa byas nas/_smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig_/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig 
[\[180a.2\]]mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pad ma'i mig 'di yin te/_des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la nor bu 
[\[180a.3\]]rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung ngo /_/pad ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni/_mig pad ma sngon po lta bur gyur to/_/smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong 
[\[180a.4\]]dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/_rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren 
[\[180a.5\]]mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[180a.6\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 
[\[180a.7\]]'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims 
[\[180b.2\]]cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa/_yangs shing 
[\[180b.3\]]rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_
[\[180b.4\]]de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa/_bya ka la ping ka ltar skad snyan pa/_rnga sgra ltar gdangs snyan pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 
[\[180b.5\]]'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u rnga sgra pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma 
[\[180b.6\]]gnyis te/_de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing 
[\[180b.7\]]bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_gtong ba la sred pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba/_rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/_gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/_/de nas phyi zhig na khye'u rnga sgra shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]dga' ra bar song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 
[\[181a.2\]]'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/_/dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa 
[\[181a.3\]]dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/_de thos nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon 
[\[181a.4\]]sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/_dge slong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas 
[\[181a.5\]]phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas 
[\[181a.6\]]te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes 
[\[181a.7\]]pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rnga sgras las gang dag bgyis na/_des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan 
[\[181b.2\]]dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na rnga sgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams 
[\[181b.3\]]ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 
[\[181b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[181b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na 
[\[181b.6\]]rten cing bzhugs pa las/_re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[181b.7\]]gnyen yod kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/_der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_de nas re zhig na khyim bdag cig gis rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang mi las rol mo bslabs te/_mchod rten de la phul nas de dag mchod rten de la nyin gcig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag gis bkur sti 
[\[182a.2\]]byed do/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di yin te/_des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/_rgyu de nyid kyis na 
[\[182a.3\]]da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren 
[\[182a.4\]]ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_bcom ldan 
[\[182a.5\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//bu zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi 
[\[182a.6\]]rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_
[\[182a.7\]]lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi 
[\[182b.2\]]bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon te bu btsas na sha snag bu chen po zhig byung ste/_pha ma 
[\[182b.3\]]dang khyim de na gnas pa gzhan dag dang g.yog 'khor dang nye du rnams kyis de mthong nas 'di lta bu btsas pa ci yin zhes mi dga' bar gyur to/_de nas re zhig na khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs te/_lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste 'di ci yin/_su la bsnyad 
[\[182b.4\]]par bya/_shes pa su yod snyam mo de nas de'i blo skyes pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin te/_des mkhyen gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o snyam nas/_de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[182b.5\]]la zhus so/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag khyod ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/sha snag bu de ras bal legs par rmel ba'i nang du chug la zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig kyang dus gsum gsum du lag pas brims te/_'o mas kyang yang dang yang du gtor cig dang 
[\[182b.6\]]de'i 'og tu rdol te/_bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la de dag thams cad tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_de nas khyim bdag des de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/_bsams pa bdag gi bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas des de 
[\[182b.7\]]bzhin du byas pa dang /_zhag bdun lon pa dang sha snag bu de rdol nas bu brgya byung ste/_thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/de nas re zhig na mthar gyis bskyed bsrings 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]nas cher skyes pa dang /_de dag thams cad byad gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs te/_phan tshun 'khyam pa las shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /_de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par 
[\[183a.2\]]brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/_dga' ba bskyed 
[\[183a.3\]]nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba 
[\[183a.4\]]de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/_de thos nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_
[\[183a.5\]]de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[183a.6\]]spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs 
[\[183a.7\]]bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang sa so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gzhon nu brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/_des spun du gyur la tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di rnams kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu 
[\[183b.2\]]tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi 
[\[183b.3\]]rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[183b.4\]]lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig 
[\[183b.5\]]pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/_
[\[183b.6\]]re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/_bcom ldan 
[\[183b.7\]]'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/_der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]de nas re zhig na mdza' sde bo brgya phyi rol tu byung ba dang de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran te/_de dag gis lhan cig tu til mar spos can gyis byugs nas/_me tog dang me tog phreng dang mar me dbul ba dag gis kyang 
[\[184a.2\]]bsnyen bkur byas nas lhan cig tu smon lam btab pa/_bdag cag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der spun du gyur te/_lhan cig tu lto gcig kho na nas 'byung bar gyur cig_/tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang yang dag par 
[\[184a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshan po che 'di dag yin te/_de dag gis lhan cig tu mchod rten de la bkur sti 
[\[184a.4\]]byas pa des na 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/_tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob par gyur to/_/smon lam btab pa des ni gcig tu 'thun par rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu 
[\[184a.5\]]nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren 
[\[184a.6\]]ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[184a.7\]]bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa bam po bcu drug pa/_nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[184b.2\]]gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong 
[\[184b.3\]]rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/_shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_
