[\[184b.4\]]rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_de rtsa zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u 
[\[184b.5\]]gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhig btsas nas/_de las kho ra khor yug tu nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste/_de'i snang bas mtshan mo grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byas so/_/de nas pha 
[\[184b.6\]]ma dang khyim de na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams dang nye du rnams dang ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas/_ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par 
[\[184b.7\]]byed de/_nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du snang bar byas pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u nyi ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma 
[\[185a.2\]]bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams pa/_gtong ba la sred pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba/_rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par 
[\[185a.3\]]dga' ba gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/_/de nas phyis re zhig na/_khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas 
[\[185a.4\]]pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/_/dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal 
[\[185a.5\]]te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas/_khye'u nyi mas 'jig 
[\[185a.6\]]tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha 
[\[185a.7\]]ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan 
[\[185b.2\]]sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus 
[\[185b.3\]]par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing smod la lkog 'phyas byed de/_de 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs nas/_lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag 
[\[185b.4\]]tu 'khyam pa las na/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa'o zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[185b.5\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na med par byar mi nus so/_/de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni 
[\[185b.6\]]mthong la/_ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na/_des 'di che bar 
[\[185b.7\]]grags pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_nyi ma nyid kyis las byas 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[186a.2\]]las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge 
[\[186a.3\]]slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams 
[\[186a.4\]]kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/_re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i 
[\[186a.5\]]lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyang grags 
[\[186a.6\]]gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/_der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa na/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa rnam pa sna 
[\[186a.7\]]tshogs dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do/_/de nas re zhig na mi zhig rgyal po dang rgyan pos rtses nas skugs su nor bu rin po che me shel zhig thob bo/_/de nas de dad pa bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]tshar khab la btags te/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig_/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed 
[\[186b.2\]]par ma gyur cig_/nor bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang spyi bo la thogs bzhin du ma'i lto nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na cho lo la dor sgyu byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/_des bcom ldan 'das 
[\[186b.3\]]rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa dang /_nor bu rin po che btags pa des na/_'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung la rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges 
[\[186b.4\]]par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las 
[\[186b.5\]]gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /_las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 
[\[186b.6\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gyad kyi ba dan zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams 
[\[186b.7\]]dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[187a.2\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig 
[\[187a.3\]]gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa 
[\[187a.4\]]mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/_gang gi tshe khye'u de btsas pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kho ra khor yug nas lha'i ba dan dag bsgrengs so/_/lha'i rol mo'i cha byad dag kyang brdungs so/_/lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma 
[\[187a.5\]]dkar po rnams kyis kyang gtor te/_ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to/_/khyim thams cad du yang de'i phyir ba dan bsgrengs so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re 
[\[187a.6\]]khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig rten thams cad na grags pas rgyas pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u snyan grags pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis 
[\[187a.7\]]te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur te/_de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]ba bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje can/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa zhig go/_/de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[187b.2\]]kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/_/dga' 
[\[187b.3\]]ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de 
[\[187b.4\]]lta bu'i chos bstan to/_/de thos nas khye'u snyan grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste des bden pa mthong nas/_sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing 
[\[187b.5\]]phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_
[\[187b.6\]]rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil 
[\[187b.7\]]du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de yang gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i gos spyod de/_gsol ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung du spyod do/_/gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong spyod de/_
[\[188a.2\]]gsol ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung du spyod do/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dag bgyis na/_des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgrengs nas/_
[\[188a.3\]]'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/_rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag snyan grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung 
[\[188a.4\]]la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par 
[\[188a.5\]]mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi 
[\[188a.6\]]las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[188a.7\]]rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]bzhugs pa las/_re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po gnyen 
[\[188b.2\]]yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/_der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas 
[\[188b.3\]]mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/_mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der gyad 'gyed pa rnams kyis ba dan dag sgreng ngo /_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po'i gyad gcig gis gyad gcig non pa dang /_
[\[188b.4\]]des gyad kyi ba dan thob nas des de blangs te/_srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing /_bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dran par byas te/_ba dan de 
[\[188b.5\]]mchod rten gyi steng gi srog shing la btags nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig_/ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_
[\[188b.6\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na gyad du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni snyan grags 'di yin te/_des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur la/_rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge 
[\[188b.7\]]slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[189a.2\]]nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/_rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ste/_sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa rdzogs so//_//sdom ni/_'od 
[\[189a.3\]]bzang ma dang rab sdug ma/_/dkar mo zla ba ud pa la/_/mdzes ldan ma dang mu tig dang /_/ka tsang ga la ba de byed ma/_/mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan/_/'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_
[\[189a.4\]]pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo 
[\[189a.5\]]byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha 
[\[189a.6\]]dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang 
[\[189a.7\]]la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyan gyis bklubs pa nor bu rin po che mgul na thogs pa zhig btsas te/_de las 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas so/_/de 
[\[189b.2\]]nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byas pas na/_de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so zhes 
[\[189b.3\]]zer ro/_/de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying 
[\[189b.4\]]khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/bu mo de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/_de la slong ba su dang su 'ongs 
[\[189b.5\]]kyang rung ba de dang de dag la mgul nas rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do/_/byin nas kyang yang rgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu rnams dang /_blon po'i bu rnams dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[189b.6\]]de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/_de'i pha lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/_gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas re zhig na bu mo des pha sems khong du chud pa mthong nas/_smras pa/_
[\[189b.7\]]yab ci zhig gis sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_de nas des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas bu mo de na re yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig dang /_da ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam par 'tshal lo zhes zer ro/_/de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]la gsol nas mnyan du yod par dril bsgrags te/_de ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang ma rang nyid khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis khyed kyis bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhon ta chos gos tshon 
[\[190a.2\]]can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don cing srang du zhugs so/_/de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams dang /_blon po'i bu rnams dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta ba de dag la gtam rnam pa sna 
[\[190a.3\]]tshogs kyis shad kyis byang bar bshad de/_bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni mi 'tshal na yong ye bdag 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho nar bas so/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/_de'i thad du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas de dag 
[\[190a.4\]]phyir log go/_/bu mo 'od bzang ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang 
[\[190a.5\]]bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_des bden pa mthong nas mngon 
[\[190a.6\]]par shes pa yang bsgrubs so/_/de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[190a.7\]]bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di la gdul bar bya ba 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]mang po dag des 'dren par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu mo song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig_/de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas byung ste mang po 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang /_der so so nas bsams pa/_
[\[190b.2\]]'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/_de dag gis de bzung bar byas so/_/de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis bsnyags pa dang /_ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/_/so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 
[\[190b.3\]]'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de de nas de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/_sru mar spyon mar spyon khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu dag 
[\[190b.4\]]mngon sum du byas pa las na/_khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so/_/de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma nam mkha' las babs nas skye bo phal po che'i gung la 'dug ste/_gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to/_/de nas 
[\[190b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de des de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/de nas des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil 
[\[190b.6\]]ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_
[\[190b.7\]]nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa 'od bzang gis las gang dag bgyis na/_des 
[\[191a.2\]]gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_mgul pa nas kyang nor bu rin po che byung la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing 
[\[191a.3\]]rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_
[\[191a.4\]]phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 
[\[191a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[191a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen 
[\[191a.7\]]ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/_re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/_rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po 
[\[191b.2\]]gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam pa rgas nas rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs lus las bkrol te mchod rten de la phul lo/_/de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang dgra bcom 
[\[191b.3\]]pa nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/_des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten 
[\[191b.4\]]la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs btags pa des na gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan par gyur te/_/smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag 
[\[191b.5\]]pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 
[\[191b.6\]]las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs 
[\[191b.7\]]te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//rab sdug ma zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[192a.2\]]gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman 
[\[192a.3\]]zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /_bu byung 
[\[192a.4\]]ste bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du rab tu sdug pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 
[\[192a.5\]]'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de yang tshe rabs dran te/_btsas ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yang rung /_/zhing gi khyad 
[\[192a.6\]]par gzhi las 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de phyir mkhas pas bsgrims te 'jig rten du/_dad pas lha mi dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin/_/de nas de'i pha ma dang gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa de thos nas skrag cing dngangs te mi dga' bar gyur la/_skyi bung zhes byas 
[\[192a.7\]]nas smras pa kye ma bu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig go/_/des smras pa/_yum bdag ni sha za mo yang ma lags/_srin mo yang ma lags kyi/_bdag ni bu mo lags te sbyin pa dag sbyin par 'tshal lo/_/de nas de'i mas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bu mo de 'di skad mchi'o/_/
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]zhes bsnyad do/_/de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/_de'i phyir sbyin pa'i rabs gdon du bcug go/_/de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis lo bdun lon pa 
[\[192b.2\]]de'i tshe pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_snying du sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar gyur to/_/re zhig na de'i tshe mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge chen po byung nas/_der 
[\[192b.3\]]srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bza' ba dang btung ba med pas shi'o/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la rab sdug ma la nga na re 'khor bzhi po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang /_zas dang /_
[\[192b.4\]]mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad gsos dang /_sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du song nas smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_
[\[192b.5\]]stan dang /_nad gsos dang /_sman zong rnams phul cig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas rab sdug mas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras so/_/de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par chas so/_/de nas re zhig 
[\[192b.6\]]na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gtam de thos nas shin tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste smras pa/_rab sdug ma gar 'gro/_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byed par bskos so/_/mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[192b.7\]]gyis smras pa/_khyod kyi de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyar gyis khyod kyis bya mi dgos so/_/rab sdug mas smras pa/_gal te yab bden pa mthong ba lags la sa'i 'og thog dag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na/_sbyar ba 'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/_
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]'on kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do/_/de bzhin du dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang /_btsun mo phreng rgyud ma dang /_rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dang /_btsun mo 'khor gyi bla drang srong sbyin dang /_gna' mi dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin 
[\[193a.2\]]gyi ma sa ga dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/_khyod kyis bya mi dgos so zhes byas so/_/de nas nags khung du song nas der mi ma yin pa mi'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o/_/de ltar skabs phye nas kyang /_des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi 
[\[193a.3\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/des zla ba gsum po de nyid kyi skabs su brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 
[\[193a.4\]]'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_
[\[193a.5\]]dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang 
[\[193a.6\]]so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang /_chos 
[\[193a.7\]]gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gshegs so/_/de nas rab sdug mas bcom ldan 'das dang lam du phrad nas 'o brgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol to/_/
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]de nas re zhig na nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyin nas dro la bab na rgyags kyang med nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par gsol to/_/de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste/_tshig tu smras pa/_gal te bsod nams dag 
[\[193b.2\]]gi rnam par smin pa yod ce na/_bdag gi lhung bzed bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas lhas lha'i bdud rtsis bkang ngo /_/de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung 
[\[193b.3\]]bzed rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste dge slong ma rab sdug ma 'di yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_
[\[193b.4\]]the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_skye bo thams cad kyis bkur la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[193b.5\]]sum bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rab sdug ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_rab 
[\[193b.6\]]sdug ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam 
[\[193b.7\]]par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen 
[\[194a.2\]]pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[194a.3\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_mdun du bdar nas bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /_re zhig na tshong dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang bcas te skyed mos 
[\[194a.4\]]tshal du song nas bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag kyang khyer ro/_/de nas re zhig na de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras chan gyi gzeb khyer te jo bo'i phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las bu mo mngag gzhug ma des/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam khar mthong nas 
[\[194a.5\]]de dga' bar gyur te bla skyes pa/_bdag la jo bos lan gnyis su bran mor byar ci yod kyis bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas des gsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang brdeg pa dang bsdos nas 'bras chan gyi gzeb phye ste/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[194a.6\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas so/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi thad du song ba dang /_re zhig na tshong dpon gyis bu mo 'bras chan gyi gzeb de ga re zhes dris so/_/des smras pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[194a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhal zas phul lo zhes byas pa dang /_tshong dpon gyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de nas de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas smras pa bu mo khyod deng phyin cad bran mo las phyung gis song shig_/khyod kyis bdag gnyid kyis log pa na 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]mel tshe byas pa yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas des thal mo sbyar te khyim bdag la gsol pa/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang byin nas/_de jo bos byin pa'i lhung bzed dang chos 
[\[194b.2\]]gos khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la lo dgu stong gi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byas te/_'bras chan dang /_skyo ma dang /_thug pa btung ba dang /_rtag res 'khor dang /_mgron du bod pa dang /_mar me'i phreng 
[\[194b.3\]]ba dang /_chos gos sra brkyang rnams dang /_sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phul te/_smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs te/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos 
[\[194b.4\]]yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo mngag gzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab sdug 
[\[194b.5\]]ma 'di yin te/_des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la zhal zas phul ba des na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to/_/smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong 
[\[194b.6\]]dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur 
[\[194b.7\]]ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /_las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//dkar mo zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi 
[\[195a.2\]]mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri 
[\[195a.3\]]mo byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_
[\[195a.4\]]gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi nang na shAkya snar ma zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_
[\[195a.5\]]yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur 
[\[195a.6\]]spyad kyang /_bu yang med bu mo yang med de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bsams pa bdag gis khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang /_bdag la bu yang med/_bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 
[\[195a.7\]]'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_ltas mkhan dang /_mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o/_/de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pas gu lang dang /_chu lha 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]dang /_ku be ra dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /_lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/_'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_gtor ma 
[\[195b.2\]]len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_chos 'thun pa dang /_rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/_
[\[195b.3\]]gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_pha ma 'dod chags 
[\[195b.4\]]langs te/_phrad pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/_sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 
[\[195b.5\]]'phos te/_de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs nas des khyim thab la sbran to/_/de nas khyim thab kyis smras pa/_bzang mo gal te bu khye'u zhig btsas na ni legs/_de ma yin te bu mo zhig btsas na ni de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrad de gtong ngo /_/de nas re zhig na de zla ba brgyad 
[\[195b.6\]]dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa gos dkar po gyon pa mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas re zhig na shAkya snar mas khyod kyi chung ma la bu byung ste bu mo 
[\[195b.7\]]zhig btsas sa zhes thos pa dang de khros te nang du song ngo /_/de nas de'i chung mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phul lo/_/de nas shAkya snar mas bu mo mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/_de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]de/_nye du rnams na re 'di gos dkar po gyon bzhin du btsas pas na/_de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mor gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo dkar mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse 
[\[196a.2\]]ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/bu mo dkar mo 
[\[196a.3\]]ji tsam du skye ba de tsam du gos de dag kyang skye ste dri ma can du yang mi 'gyur la/_de'i lus la yang dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas gang gi tshe bu mo dkar mo mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po'i bu rnams dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 
[\[196a.4\]]'ong ngo /_/de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas de'i pha lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/_gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas re zhig na bu mo des pha sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa 
[\[196a.5\]]mthong nas/_smras pa/_yab ci zhig gis sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_de nas des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas bu mo na re yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig_/bdag ni 'dod pa la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis/_
[\[196a.6\]]yab kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/de nas re zhig na des pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_gos gang dag gyon te btsas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang bar gyur to/_/de nas des brtson pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_'bad pas 
[\[196a.7\]]phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang 
[\[196b.2\]]mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom 
[\[196b.3\]]thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dkar mos las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang gos dkar po gyon pa dang rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis 
[\[196b.4\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dkar mo nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_dkar mo nyid kyis las byas 
[\[196b.5\]]shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba 
[\[196b.6\]]dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/
[\[196b.7\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/_skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig 
[\[197a.2\]]'dug pa drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ngo /_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_
[\[197a.3\]]rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de la chos bstan nas des dad pa rnyed de/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[197a.4\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul lo/_/de nas mthar gyis pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[197a.5\]]na tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma dkar mo 'di yin te/_des dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brkyang phul ba des na gos dkar po gyon bzhin du btsas so/_/tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/
[\[197a.6\]]dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren 
[\[197a.7\]]mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_zla ba zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams 
[\[197b.2\]]dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_
[\[197b.3\]]lta 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen 
[\[197b.4\]]po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod 
[\[197b.5\]]pa na bram ze phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas so/_/de yang rig byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/_ming gi rnam grangs dang /_shes gsal dang bcas pa dang 
[\[197b.6\]]yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang lnga pa ste gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnams tshig re re nas brda sprod nus pa zhig go/_/de nas de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do/_/de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu 
[\[197b.7\]]rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /_bu byung ste bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_/nye du rnams na re bdag cag gi bu tsha phal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo zla ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma 
[\[198a.2\]]gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis 
[\[198a.3\]]bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas bu mo zla ba mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang /_de mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang /_bya ba la mkhas pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_thos pa 'dzin par gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na de'i pha bram 
[\[198a.4\]]ze'i khye'u rnams la sngags slob pa na des thos pa tsam gyis lobs so/_/thos nas kyang bstan bcos de dag ltag 'og sbyor zhing 'chad nus so/_/de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to/_/mu stegs can dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du de la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs 
[\[198a.5\]]te/_de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs par byed do/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe mnyan du yod par gshegs nas/_mkhas pa rnams dang mkhas par bgrang ba de dag 
[\[198a.6\]]phal cher bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas de dag mi snang nas nang mi rnams la smras pa kye ci'i phyir de bstan bcos shes pa dag mi 'ong /_'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs 
[\[198a.7\]]te/_de dag thams cad de la gzhol bar gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma byung ba thos nas/_de spu thams cad zing zhes byas so/_/de nas bu mo zla bas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo /_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu 
[\[198b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla ba'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 
[\[198b.3\]]chos bstan te/_de thos nas bu mo zla bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i thad du rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 
[\[198b.4\]]'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom 
[\[198b.5\]]pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa 
[\[198b.6\]]dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[198b.7\]]rnams la/_dge slong dag khyed cag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pa gdon par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa/_/de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas so sor 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dge slong ma la tshig re re nas chos kyi lung dbog par mi mdzad de/_gal te khyed las lan cig smras pas 'dzin nus pa 'ga' 
[\[199a.2\]]zhig yod na ni ngas lung dbog go/_/de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas dge slong ma zla ba stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lan cig 
[\[199a.3\]]bka' stsal pas bdag gis gzung bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pas so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par lung dbog pa mdzad nas/_lan cig bka' stsal pas dge 
[\[199a.4\]]slong ma zla bas lobs so/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mang du thos pa rnams dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad 
[\[199a.5\]]gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong ma zla bas las gang dag bgyis shing bsags pa des na phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang thos pa 'dzin par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[199a.6\]]dge slong dag zla ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge 
[\[199a.7\]]slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri 
[\[199b.2\]]thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong 
[\[199b.3\]]khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na bram ze'i bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/des de la lung mnos te bslabs nas kha ton tu byas te phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la 
[\[199b.4\]]mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par byung ba la mkhas pa dang gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas so/_/mthar thug pa'i ye shes ni bskyed ma nus so/_/de mkhan mo gang las rab tu byung ba de ni bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de nas 
[\[199b.5\]]dge slong ma de 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/_ji ltar bdag gis mkhan mo thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/_de bzhin 
[\[199b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bdag thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu ston par gyur cig ces byas so/_/
[\[199b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin te des smon lam btab pa des na thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/des der lung mnos te/_bslabs nas kha ton du byas pa 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 
[\[200a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par 
[\[200a.3\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//ud pa la zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 
[\[200a.4\]]'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod 
[\[200a.5\]]pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan 
[\[200a.6\]]dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang yid 'ong gnyis phrad pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/_der grong 
[\[200a.7\]]khyer chen po drug po thams cad nas skye bo mang po 'du'o/_/de nas re zhig na lho phyogs nas/_zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs pa de'i bu mo ud pa la zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_lang tsho dang nad med pa'i rgyags pas 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]dregs pa zhig yod de/_de gang gi tshe ltad mo ba'i nang du 'ong ba de'i tshe/_ltad mo ba thams cad kyis yid smon byed cing lta bar byed de/_gang so sor rtog pa'i shas chung ba de dag gi'ang yid 'phrog par byed do/_/der gang gi tshe dus ston byung ba de'i tshe rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug kyang 
[\[200b.2\]]'ong ngo /_/de nas bu mo ud pa las skye bo mang po la smras pa/_kye rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na mir gyur pa'i nang na bdag dang byad gzugs kyis mnyam pa'am/_khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu 'ga' lta yod dam/_skye bo mang pos smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa yod do/_/
[\[200b.3\]]ud pa las smras pa/_ci de mi yin nam 'on te lha yin/_skye bo mang pos smras pa/_mi ni yin mod kyi/_de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no/_/de nas tshig de thos nas ud pa la rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo /_/song nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug 
[\[200b.4\]]ste/_gar byed cing glu len la rol mo byed do/_/bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang /_bud med kyi rtags rnams dang /_bud med kyi brda rnams dang /_bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do/_/der dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gang yin pa de dag ni des ci bya gtol med par 
[\[200b.5\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba'i rnams gdul ba dang ud pa la'i byad gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa bsal ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis ud pa la rgas shing 'khogs pa la mgo skya ba dang so rto zhing phyam dgu bo ltar 
[\[200b.6\]]sgur bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/de nas de ltar sprul pa'i mod la ud pa las bdag nyid mi sdug par mthong nas byad gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa de med par gyur to/_/dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams kyang skyo bar gyur to/_/de nas ud pa la 
[\[200b.7\]]rgyags pa med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ci nas rnag can gyi lus 'di las tshegs chung ngus yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis ud pa la dang dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas kha cig gis ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 
[\[201a.2\]]ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[201a.3\]]spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/ud pa la yang dad pa rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil 
[\[201a.4\]]ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam 
[\[201a.5\]]pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba dang /_
[\[201a.6\]]dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/zlos gar mkhan de dag gis kyang skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom 
[\[201a.7\]]thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zlos gar mkhan gyi bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang lang tshos rgyags pa las rga bas skyo bar mdzad nas/_gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dag tu bzhag pa ni ngo mtshar 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde 
[\[201b.2\]]ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/_ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang thob zin pa'i tshe/_bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang /_lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs pa las rga bas skyo bar byas nas/_gzha' gsang gi 
[\[201b.3\]]mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bzhag pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod de/_'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[201b.4\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba na yang ngas bu mo ud pa la rga bas skyo bar byas nas/_brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das 
[\[201b.5\]]pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_
[\[201b.6\]]mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur 
[\[201b.7\]]spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba/_gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba/_sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de nye du rnams na re 'di'i yab yul ka shi'i 
[\[202a.2\]]rgyal po yin la/_'di yang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming ka shi mdzes ldan zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u ka shi mdzes ldan pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_
[\[202a.3\]]rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas gang 
[\[202a.4\]]gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to/_/de nas des rgyal po byed pa na/_nyes pa du ma dang ldan zhing gnod pa du ma'i rtsa ba yin par rig nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo /_/de yang gangs kyi sul zhig na gnas te/_'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_chus 
[\[202a.5\]]'tsho zhing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi g.yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon la me'i sbyin sreg byed do/_/phyis re zhig na 'bras bu dang rtsa ba'i phyir ri'i sul zhig tu song ba dang /_re zhig na der mi 'am ci'i bu mo zhig gis drang srong gzhon nu de mthong nas chags par gyur te/_gar byed cing glu len la rol mo byed do/_/
[\[202a.6\]]bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang /_bud med kyi rtags rnams dang /_bud med kyi brda rnams dang /_bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do/_/de nas re zhig na drang srong ka shi mdzes ldan gyis bu mo de la chos bshad de che zhe khyod rgas te/_khyod kyi nga ro dang po ni snyan cing mnyen la mjug ni ra ra 
[\[202a.7\]]por gyur to zhes byas so/_/de nas des chos de lta bu bstan te/_de thos nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur to/_/de nas de dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa/_gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]ba de'i tshe/_bdag khyod kyi slob mar gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/mi 'am ci'i bu mo de ni ud pa la 'di nyid yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[202b.2\]]'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa btsun pa ud pa las las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur lags/_las gang dag bgyis na des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ud 
[\[202b.3\]]pa la nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_ud pa la nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge 
[\[202b.4\]]slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang las mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_
[\[202b.5\]]skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe 
[\[202b.6\]]lo bzhi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du 
[\[202b.7\]]byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na lho phyogs nas zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs so/_/der gang gi tshe rgyal po mdzes pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/_zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la bsgo ba/_
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]nga'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar gyi gar thabs gyis shig ces byas nas/_de dag gis rgyal po de'i bka' spyi bos mnos te/_lha bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes byas so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar sbyar te legs par sbyangs nas/_rgyal po'i blon po'i tshogs dang 
[\[203a.2\]]bcas pa'i mdun du zlos gar gyi gar thabs byas so/_/de nas der zlos gar mkhan gyi gar gyi slob dpon nyid ni/_sangs rgyas kyi cha lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so/_/zlos gar mkhan gzhan rnams ni dge slong gi cha lugs kyis nang du 'ongs so/_/de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/_
[\[203a.3\]]zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la sogs pa zlos gar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la nor gyi phung po chen po byin no/_/de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_sbyin pa dang /_rab tu sbyin pa dag byin nas yang dag pa'i smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems 
[\[203a.4\]]bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/_bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_zlos gar mkhar gang yin pa de dag ni ud pa la la 
[\[203a.5\]]sogs pa 'di dag yin te/_'di dag gis der smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 
[\[203a.6\]]ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na/_las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la 
[\[203a.7\]]gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci 
[\[203b.2\]]rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[203b.3\]]bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na 
[\[203b.4\]]rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa 
[\[203b.5\]]dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing 
[\[203b.6\]]dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_bu 
[\[203b.7\]]mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di ka shi'i rgyal po'i bu mo yin la byad gzugs kyang bzang bas/_de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming ka shi mdzes ldan ma zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par 
[\[204a.2\]]bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug gis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste/_khyod kyi bu mo btsas zhes bdag gis thos kyis gzhan la 
[\[204a.3\]]ma sbyin par bdag gi bu la byin cig ces spring ngo /_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/_gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams ni bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[204a.4\]]re zhig na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te pha'i thad du song ba dang des pha mya ngan gyis non pa mthong nas dris pa/_yab ci'i slad du mya ngan mdzad/_de nas phas kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad do/_/de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan mas pha la smras pa/_yab nyi 'og
