[\[204a.5\]]gi rgyal po rnams la da ste zhag bdun na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma rang nyid kyi khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis/_khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces pho nya gtang du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug po de rnams 'dus so/_/bu mo ka shi 
[\[204a.6\]]mdzes ldan ma yang shing rta la zhon te chos gos tshon can gyi ba dan bsgreng nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs lag na thogs te rgyal po 'dus pa'i nang du song nas smras pa/_kye nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams gson cig_/bdag ni khyed kyi gzugs dang /_lang tsho dang /_
[\[204a.7\]]rigs dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug la mi sems kyi bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/_bdag ni ras 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs bris pa gang yin pa de'i slob ma lags te/_de'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes byas nas drang 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]srong smra bar song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag 
[\[204b.2\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/_/de nas des kyang de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig 
[\[204b.3\]]lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[204b.4\]]du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa 
[\[204b.5\]]dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis de'i gzugs dang /_
[\[204b.6\]]lang tsho dang /_mdzes pa rjes su dran nas 'dod chags kyi rgyags pas myos te/_rab tu byung bzhin du yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/de nas de dag gis gsol ba btab nas/_ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/_cho 'phrul rnam 
[\[204b.7\]]pa sna tshogs bstan to/_/so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/_de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba mthong nas spu zing zhes byed de/_rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bzod pa gsol te/_sru khyod kyis chos 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]'di lta bu dag mngon sum du byas pa las na/_khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid kyis bzod par mdzod cig ces byas so/_/de nas bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma nam mkha' las babs te/_skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug nas chos de lta bu dag bstan te/_de thos 
[\[205a.2\]]nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob bo/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ka shi mdzes ldan mas las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang rab tu 
[\[205a.3\]]byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ka shi mdzes ldan ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/_dba' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas 
[\[205a.4\]]shing bsags pas na/_ka shi mdzes ldan ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams 
[\[205a.5\]]dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar 
[\[205a.6\]]yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo sum khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang 
[\[205a.7\]]zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser thub ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po'i bu mo de dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsig tu bcug ste/_yo byad thams cad kyis gang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la yang rab tu byung nas 
[\[205b.2\]]lo khri'i bar du byams pa bsgoms so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ka shi mdzes ldan ma 'di yin te/_des gtsug lag khang phul ba des ni gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 
[\[205b.3\]]gi ring la rab tu byung nas lo khri'i bar du byams pa bsgoms pa des ni/_da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar 
[\[205b.4\]]ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 
[\[205b.5\]]'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mu tig ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[205b.6\]]ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_
[\[205b.7\]]mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon 
[\[206a.2\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon rgyal ba zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des 
[\[206a.3\]]rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyis chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes 
[\[206a.4\]]pa mgo bo la mu tig gi phreng ba btags pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu mgo bo la mu tig gi phreng ba byung bas na/_de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 
[\[206a.5\]]mu tig ces gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo mu tig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_
[\[206a.6\]]zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na bu mo mu tig mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang /_de'i mu tig gi phreng ba de phog na phyir zhing byung bar gyur 
[\[206a.7\]]to/_/de nas bu mo des bkren pa dang phongs pa rnams mthong nas longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byed do/_/de nas gang gi tshe bag mar gtang ran par gyur pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu rnams dang /_blon po'i bu rnams dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu mang po rnams de slong du 'ong ngo /_/de nas de'i pha mya ngan 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]gyi khang bur zhugs nas/_lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas bu mo des pha la gsol pa yab ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/_de nas des ji ltar gyur pa 
[\[206b.2\]]thams cad bsnyad do/_/de nas bu mos smras pa/_yab bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang re zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]rab sdug ces bya ba des pha la gsol pa/_
[\[206b.3\]]bdag gi mchis brang du bu mo de bslang bar gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshong dpon rgyal ba la pho nya btang ste/_bu mo mu tig bdag gi bu la byin cig_/de ltar byas pa dang gnyen du yang 'gyur la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang mdza' bor 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[206b.4\]]byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag rgyal gyis bdag gi bu mo la don de bsnyad do/_/des smras pa gal te shed bye ste cher skyes pa na bdag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar dam bcas na ni bdag gi khyim thab tu bgyi'o zhes byas so/_/de nas des de ltar byas 
[\[206b.5\]]nas re zhig na skabs zhig tu gnyi ga khyim nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas de nyid kyis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_
[\[206b.6\]]ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang 
[\[206b.7\]]lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa mu tig gis las gang dag bgyis na/_
[\[207a.2\]]des mu tig gi phreng ba mgo bo la thogs bzhin du btsas la rab tu byung nas kyang /_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mu tig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' 
[\[207a.3\]]rgal bzhin du byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_mu tig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam 
[\[207a.4\]]par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can 
[\[207a.5\]]dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[207a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste de grong khyer 
[\[207a.7\]]bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs pa las nye zho med par gru'i don grub ste phyir 'ongs so/_/de nas des mu tig gi phreng ba mchog tu bzang ba zhig khyer te 'ongs so/_/de'i chung ma yang 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig ste des de'i mgo bo la btags so/_/de nas bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa/_dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig gnas 
[\[207b.2\]]pa de'i blo skyes pa/_ma la bdag gis dad pa bsdus la/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la/_lo lnga pa'i dus ston bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po kr-i kI la gsol te/_bdag gi dad pa bsdus la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi lo lnga pa'i dus ston bgyi bar 'tshal 
[\[207b.3\]]lo zhes byas so/_/rgyal pos kyang de ltar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas khyim bdag de glang po che la zhon te/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na lam po che dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag tu song nas dad pa sdud par byed do/_/de nas re zhig na ded dpon gyi chung mas mu tig gi phreng ba 
[\[207b.4\]]mgo bo las phog nas dad pa sdud pa la phul lo/_/de nas re zhig na ded dpon 'ongs pa dang mu tig gi phreng ba mgo bo las phog par mthong nas/_bzang mo mu tig gi phreng ba ga re zhes dris so/_/de nas des smras pa/_jo bo bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa sdud pa la phul 
[\[207b.5\]]gyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_dad pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas re zhig na ded dpon gyis rin po ches phyir blus nas/_chung ma de nyid la byin na de phyir len du ma btub ste/_bdag gis 'di yongs su btang ba lags so zhes byas so/_/khyim thab kyis smras 
[\[207b.6\]]pa/_bzang mo ngas 'di gser dngul mang pos nyos na ci'i phyir mi 'dod/_de nas bu mo des de blangs nas me tog mang po bsags te/_spos dang me tog phreng la sogs pa yang khyer nas drang srong smra bar song ngo /_/de nas dri'i gtsang khang spos kyis byugs nas/_me tog 
[\[207b.7\]]gis gtor te/_mu tig gi phreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la bor nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi dbu la gnas par gyur to/_/de nas dad pa skyes te smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig_/ston pa 'di kho na lta bu dag 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/_ded dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mu tig 'di yin te/_des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la bkur 
[\[208a.2\]]sti byas pa des na/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang de'i mgo bo la yang mu tig gi phreng ba byung bar gyur to/_/rgyu de nyid kyis na/_da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/_
[\[208a.3\]]rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu 
[\[208a.4\]]nges par gnag pa rnams dang /_las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs 
[\[208a.5\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//ka tsang ga la zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded 
[\[208a.6\]]dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[208a.7\]]gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ka tsang ga la na ka tsang ga la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul ka tsang ga la de na rgan mo ka tsang ga la zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des bum pa thogs te khron pa'i drung du chu 'chur song ba dang /_der 
[\[208b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la rgan mo de la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyis chu phul cig ces gyis shig_/de nas kun dga' bos bsgo nas/_de na re 'phags pa bdag nyid kyis 'tshal te mchi'o zhes zer ro/_/
[\[208b.3\]]de nas re zhig na ka tsang ga las bum pa chus bkang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba dang /_ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 
[\[208b.4\]]'dom gang gis legs par brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de bu la byams pa'i sems skyes te/_nu ma gnyis las kyang 'o ma'i rgyun bab nas des bu bu zhes smras te/_
[\[208b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par byed do/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de bkag pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyod kyis rgan mo 'di ma dag gcig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar/_/rgyun du nga yi mar gyur 
[\[208b.6\]]te/_/nga la bu yi byams pa yis/_/'di ni lus la 'khyud par byed/_/nga yi lus la 'khyud pa las/_/gal te 'di ni bkag gyur na/_/'di ni de'u re 'phral nyid du/_/kha nas khrag dron skyug par 'gyur/_/bu la byams pa 'di mthong nas/_/drin du gzo ba dran gyur te/_/
[\[208b.7\]]snying yang rje zhing snying brtse bas/_/lus la yang ni 'khyud du gzhug_/de nas re zhig na de bu la byams pa rtse zhil nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/_de thos nas ka tsang ga las 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du 
[\[209a.2\]]byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_dka' ba byed pa'i ma la ni/_/bu [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ni gang bya ba/_/sems ni grol bar 'gro 'gyur ba/_/de ni khyod kyis bdag la byas/_/bdag ni khyod kyis rab bsgrims te/_/ngan 'gro dag las phyung nas kyang /_/
[\[209a.3\]]mtho ris thar pa dag la bzhag_/khyad par shin tu chen por spags/_/de nas re zhig na des jo bo la gsol te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi 
[\[209a.4\]]brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 
[\[209a.5\]]'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang 
[\[209a.6\]]dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la mdor 
[\[209a.7\]]lung dbog pa mdzad nas nang du yang dag 'jog las gshegs pa de'i tshe ka tsang ga las dge slong ma rnams la brda sprod par byed do/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mdo sde rnam par 'byed par 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]byed pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong ma ka tsang ga la yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ka tsang ga las las gang dag bgyis na des rgas nas gdod rab tu byung 
[\[209b.2\]]lags/_las gang bgyis na des bran mor gyur lags las gang bgyis na des bcom ldan 'das mngal na gnas pa tha mar 'dzin par ma gyur lags/_de ci'i slad du rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa rnams kyi 
[\[209b.3\]]mchog tu bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ka tsang ga la nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags 
[\[209b.4\]]pas na/_ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung 
[\[209b.5\]]gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang 
[\[209b.6\]]chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na tshe rabs lnga brgyar rgyun chags par 'di nga'i mar gyur te/_gang gi tshe nga rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i tshe 
[\[209b.7\]]'dis nga'i bgegs byas te/_las de'i rnam par smin pas ni rgas nas gdod rab tu byung ngo /_/nga sbyin pa byed pa na 'dis nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byas pa des ni dbul mor gyur to/_/'dis sgyu 'phrul chen mo lta bu'i che bar grags par 'gyur ba'i las de lta bu ma byas pa des ni nga mngal na 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]gnas pa tha ma'i tshe 'dis ma bzung ngo /_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung nas des slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams la bran mo zhes bya ba'i tshig smras te des na bran mor gyur to/_/des der bslabs shing kha don byas pa dang /_
[\[210a.2\]]phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa 
[\[210a.3\]]rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[210a.4\]]'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par 
[\[210a.5\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_bde byed ma zhes bya 
[\[210a.6\]]ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[210a.7\]]rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu 
[\[210b.2\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_rgyal po tshangs pas byin gnyis phan tshun mi 'thun par gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal de'i yul 'dab tu song nas 
[\[210b.3\]]phru ma btab ste 'dug go/_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang dpung yan lag bzhi pa/_glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas chu klung zhig gi 'gram du phru ma btab ste 'dug go/_/de nas re zhig 
[\[210b.4\]]na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de nyid du btsun mo dam pa khrid de/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin yang btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas nyi ma gcig tu ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[210b.5\]]gsal rgyal gyi bu mo yang btsas/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi bu pho yang btsas so/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyi ga'i pho brang 'khor na dga' ba'i rnga rdung bar byed do/_/slong ba rnams la yang sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mi dag la 
[\[210b.6\]]dris te/_tshangs pas byin gyi pho brang 'khor 'dir ci zhig byung na 'di ltar dga' ston byed ces byas nas/_de dag gis kyang rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi bu pho btsas so zhes gsol to/_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang de bzhin du dris nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo btsas sa zhes gsol 
[\[210b.7\]]to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la pho nya btang ste/_khyod kyi bu mo btsas pa'i phyir mchod sbyin byed do zhes bdag gis thos la/_bdag gi yang bu pho btsas kyis/_bu mo de bdag gi bu la byin cig dang /_de ltar byas na gnyen du yang 'gyur la ji 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]srid 'tsho'i bar du yang 'khon med par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangs so/_/de nas de gnyis phan tshun du mdza' bo byas nas bde bar gyur te/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis khye'u btsas pa'i btsas ston byas 
[\[211a.2\]]nas khye'u'i ming bde byed ces btags so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang bu mo btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas bu mo'i ming bde byed ma zhes btags so/_/de nas gnyi ga yang bskyed bsrings te re zhig na mthar gyis cher skyes so/_/de nas khye'u des bu mo de la do shal 
[\[211a.3\]]dang /_se mo do dang /_phreng ba dang /_rna cha dang /_mgul rgyan rnams bskur ro/_/de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/_'dod pa rnams la yang nyes par lta bar gyur to/_/de nas des de dag la dris pa/_skyes 
[\[211a.4\]]'di rnams ga las 'ongs zhes byas pa dang /_'khor rnams kyis kyang gtan tshigs dang bcas te rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas de thos nas yab la gsol pa/_yab bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung 
[\[211a.5\]]bar 'tshal gyis yab kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo gang gi phyir khyod btsas pa na nga bde bar gyur pas na 'di ni ngas bcos su med do/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste/_bu 
[\[211a.6\]]mo 'di ni rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis tshur shog la 'di long shig ces byas so/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis dus btab ste/_da ste zhag bdun na 'ong gis khyod kyis bya ba dang bsham par bya ba gang yin pa de dag gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas bu mo bde 
[\[211a.7\]]byed mas zhag bdun na bag mar len no zhes zer ba'i gtam de thos so/_/de nas bde byed ma 'jigs shing skrag la mi dga' ste skyi bung zhes byas nas khang thog tu song ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su phyogs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo/_/yang 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]smras pa/_drang srong chen po thugs brtse thugs rje gnas pa bsam gtan mdzad/_/'dul mdzad zhi ba'i thugs ldan rab zhi dul ba'i cho ga mkhyen/_/bdag ni mgon po khyod la skyabs su mchis kyis mgon khyod kyis/_/mgon med bdag ni tshul bzhin ngan song dag las 
[\[211b.2\]]dgrol du gsol/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_/'jig rten la phan 
[\[211b.3\]]'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi 
[\[211b.4\]]gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_
[\[211b.5\]]yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa 
[\[211b.6\]]ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun du rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan 
[\[211b.7\]]dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags 
[\[212a.2\]]pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 
[\[212a.3\]]'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde byed ma gdul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs te/_
[\[212a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs te byon nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas bde byed mas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob ste mngon par shes pa yang bsgrubs so/_/de nas bde byed ma 'dod pa'i khams nas 'das te gnyen po thob 
[\[212a.5\]]nas 'jigs pa med pa la gnas par gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na zhag bdun lon te bag ma len pa'i dus la bab pa na/_rgyal po'i bu skye bo brgya phrag du ma dag lhags te mchod sbyin gyi stegs bu'i drung du 'ongs nas/_bram ze mdun na 'don gyis 'bras yos dang /_mar dang /_yungs 
[\[212a.6\]]kar ma grugs pa rnams byin no/_/de nas khye'u dang bu mo gnyis lag pa sbrel bar chad pa dang /_bde byed ma ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa srog chags du mas mthong ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i 
[\[212a.7\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang /_rgyal po'i bu bde byed dang /_gzhan yang sems can ltad mo la lhags pa rnams mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab pa/_bu mo khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu dag mngon sum du byas pa las 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]na/_khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces byas so/_/de nas bde byed ma nam mkha' las babs nas skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug ste/_chos gang thos na srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to/_/de nas 
[\[212b.2\]]bu mo bde byed mas pha la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen po la gtad do/_/de nas de rab tu phyung nas des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par 
[\[212b.3\]]rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags 
[\[212b.4\]]dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_
[\[212b.5\]]srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos 
[\[212b.6\]]kyi dge slong ma shes rab che ba dang /_spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong ma bde byed ma 'di yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bde byed mas las gang dag bgyis 
[\[212b.7\]]na des shes rab che ba dang spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bde byed ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_bde byed ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i 
[\[213a.2\]]khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi 
[\[213a.3\]]las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[213a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong 
[\[213a.5\]]khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na de na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te lo khri nyis stong gi bar du 
[\[213a.6\]]tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob bo/_/de mkhan mo gang las rab tu byung ba de ni bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis shes rab can gyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de nas des smon lam btab pa/_ci ltar bdag gi mkhan mo shes rab can gyi mchog tu 
[\[213a.7\]]bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]bstan pa gang yin pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas shes rab can rnams kyi mchog tu gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma bde byed ma 
[\[213b.2\]]'di yin te/_des sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin pa des na rgyal po phyug po'i rigs su skyes so/_/des lo khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag 
[\[213b.3\]]pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las 
[\[213b.4\]]gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_
[\[213b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mi sdug ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon 
[\[213b.6\]]rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[213b.7\]]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa 
[\[214a.2\]]dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang 
[\[214a.3\]]dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo zhig dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las btsun 
[\[214a.4\]]mo la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_bu mo mi sdug pa'i sna grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/_ming ra s+tha zhes btags so/_/de nas gang gi tshe mthar gyis bag mar gtang ran par gyur pa 
[\[214a.5\]]de'i tshe su la byin na yang de mi sdug ches pas sus kyang ma blangs so/_/de nas re zhig na lho phyogs nas ded dpon gang ga zhes bya ba phyug chen zhig 'ongs so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blo skyes pa/_ded dpon gang ga 'di ni 'di'i skyon gyi rgyus mi shes kyis ngas 'di de la sbyin 
[\[214a.6\]]gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal pos mtshan mo mun sros pa dang gang ga pho nyas bkug nas bu mo de rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te chung mar byin no/_/de nas ra s+tha gang ga la byin nas gang ga ra s+tha gang ga ra s+tha zhes bya ba'i ming byung bar gyur to/_/de nas re zhig nas ded dpon gang 
[\[214a.7\]]gas phyi de nyin par nam langs te bu mo de bltas na mchog tu mi sdug par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skrag par gyur nas rgyal po las bsams te 'dor ma phod nas bdag gi khyim 'ba' zhig tu 'jog go/_/de nas re zhig na ded dpon gang ga dus ston zhig la chas te mdza' sde 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]rnams kyi nang du song ngo /_/mdza' sde rnams kyis kyang nang khrims bcas te/_su chung ma dang bcas te skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu ma song ba de mdza' sde rnams la chad par/_kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya sbyin du gzhug go zhes byas so/_/de nas gang ga bdag gi khyim du 'ongs nas mya ngan 
[\[214b.2\]]gyi khang bur zhugs te lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas de'i blo skyes pa/_ma la bdag gis chad pa 'jal ba ni ches bla'i bdag gis 'di de dag la bstan du ni mi rung ste/_mthong ma thag tu gtam ngan par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam mo/_/de nas gang gas 
[\[214b.3\]]sgo bcad de chad pa kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya khyer nas mdza' sde rnams kyi nang du song ngo /_/de nas bu mo de yid mi bde ba chen po skyes nas bdag 'tsho ba 'di 'dra bas 'tsho ba ci rung gson zhing 'dug na khyim thab kyang sems mi bde la bdag kyang sems mi bdes/_da ni bdag gis bdag gsad pa'i 
[\[214b.4\]]dus la bab bo snyam mo/_/de nas thag pa khyer te khang phugs su 'geg tu song ngo /_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[214b.5\]]thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs 
[\[214b.6\]]par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag 
[\[214b.7\]]pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun du rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 
[\[215a.2\]]'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod 
[\[215a.3\]]pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor 
[\[215a.4\]]bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du 
[\[215a.5\]]ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na bzhugs pas 'od 
[\[215a.6\]]zer gser gyi kha dog can bkye ste/_des khyim de nyi ma stong gi 'od shar ba bzhin du snang bar byas nas rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang der gshegs te mgul ba nas 'gag thag bkrol nas bu mo de dbugs phyung ngo /_/'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i gnas drug 'byung ba yod de/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[215a.7\]]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba dang /_mir skye ba dang /_'phags pa gnas par skye ba dang /_dbang po tshang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang /_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'jig rten du 'byung ba yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dad pa rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol te na bza' yang phul lo/_/de nas 
[\[215b.2\]]bu mo de'i mi sdug pa med par gyur te/_bzang mor gyur nas lha'i bu mo bzhin du khang phugs 'od kyis snang bar byas te 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang slar gshegs so/_/de nas mdza' sde bo rnams kyis blo skyes pa/_gor ma chag par 'di'i chung ma ni mchog tu sdug pa zhig na des phrag 
[\[215b.3\]]dog gi rang bzhin gyis chad pa 'jal ba dang bsdos te de bstan pa ni mi 'dod kyis/_bdag cag gis 'di chang sna mi 'thun pas ra ro bar byas la lde mig rnams blangs te 'di'i khyim du song la chung ma blta'o snyam mo/_/de nas de dag gis de chang gar po sna mi 'thun pas gtu lum par byas nas lde 
[\[215b.4\]]mig rnams khyer te khyim du song nas sgo rnams phye ste bu mo de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur te bsams pa/_gang gas 'di bdag cag la mi bstan pa ni yus so snyam mo/_/de nas de dag phyir log ste gang ga chang gi dbang gis gnyid log cing 'dug pa las bslang nas smras 
[\[215b.5\]]pa/_gang ga khyod kyi chung ma de ltar sdug pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes byas so/_/de nas gang ga lhag par yang mi dga' bar gyur te/_chad pa yang bdag gis gcal la bdag la gtam ngan par yang gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas mi dga' bzhin du bdag gi khyim du 'ongs 
[\[215b.6\]]nas sgo phye ste chung ma la bltas na nags tshal me tog rgyas pa'i nang na nags kyi lha mo 'dug pa bzhin du shin tu mdzes pa mthong nas dris pa/_bzang mo de ci/_ci zhig byas na 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi khyad par can du gyur ces byas so/_/de nas des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad khyim thab la bsnyad de/_de 
[\[215b.7\]]thos nas des kyang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed do/_/de nas re zhig na bu mo des mthar kyis khyim thab la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 
[\[216a.2\]]'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_
[\[216a.3\]]srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus 
[\[216a.4\]]pa/_btsun pa ra s+thas las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs su skyes lags/_las gang dag bgyis na des mi sdug par gyur la/_rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ra s+tha nyid kyis sngon tshe 
[\[216a.5\]]rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_ra s+tha nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas 
[\[216a.6\]]shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 
[\[216a.7\]]rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon gyi chung ma 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]gtum zhing brlang la/_gzu lums can zhig 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_
[\[216b.2\]]de nas re zhig na rang sangs rgyas mi sdug pa zhig de'i khyim du song ba dang /_des mi sdug pa 'di lta bu nga'i khyim du ci 'dod ces mang du spyos brgyad nas khyim nas bskrad do/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas des de la phan gdags pa'i phyir ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la 
[\[216b.3\]]mngon par 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi chung ma 'gyod pa skyes nas de la bzod pa gsol te bshos kyang phul nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis rang sangs rgyas la spyos brgyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa myong bar ma gyur cig_/'di lta 
[\[216b.4\]]bu'i chos dag kyang thob par gyur cig_/'di bas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ra s+tha 'di yin 
[\[216b.5\]]te/_des rang sangs rgyas la bshos phul ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni rgyal po phyug po'i rigs su skyes so/_/mi sdug pa'i tshig smras te khyim nas bskrad pa des ni mi sdug par gyur to/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/_des der bslabs shing 
[\[216b.6\]]kha don du byas pa dang /_phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra 
[\[216b.7\]]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar 
[\[217a.2\]]bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/_sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa rdzogs 
[\[217a.3\]]so//_//sdom ni/_rgya mtsho dang ni sna ma dang /_/lag na gser thogs sde snod gsum/_/grags bshes rdzus te skyes pa dang /_/mdzes ldan dang ni ka pi na/_/bzang ldan dang ni yul 'khor srung /_/sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/_/rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[217a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam 
[\[217a.5\]]mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing 
[\[217a.6\]]shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon 
[\[217a.7\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las re zhig na de'i blo skyes pa bdag ji srid 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]du lang tsho la bab pa de srid du ni nor spel bar bya'o/_/phyis rgas pa'i tshe ni bde bar longs spyad par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas ded dpon de g.yog 'khor tshong pa lnga brgya dang rgya mtsho'i gru nyos nas chung ma dang bcas te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na de'i chung ma la bu 
[\[217b.2\]]chags nas rgya mtsho de nyid kyi nang du bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas ming rgya mtsho zhes btags so/_/de nas re zhig na ded dpon de gru'i don grub nas nye zho med par rgya mtsho chen po nas phyir 'khor 
[\[217b.3\]]to/_/de nas gang gi tshe khye'u rgya mtsho cher skyes pa de'i tshe phas ded dpon du bskos nas g.yog 'khor tshong pa lnga brgya dang rgya mtsho chen por btang ste/_de mthar gyis song song ba las/_grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_
[\[217b.4\]]tshong 'dus rnams mthong nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin te/_kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyas gru'i gla byas te zho shas 'tsho ba rnam pa lnga ste/_gru shol ba dang /_chu 'phyag pa dang /_mnyan pa dang /_bye'u zul mkhan dang /_ru skya 'dzin pa rnams kyang khrid de/_des lan gsum du dril bsgrags 
[\[217b.5\]]nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/_/de nas de dag rgya mtsho chen por song ba dang /_srin po nag po'i rlung gis gru de phu mdar bskor to/_/ded dpon rgya mtsho ni mu stegs can la dga' ste/_de dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas ston pa drug la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs kyang 
[\[217b.6\]]gru de rlung gis ye bskor to/_/de nas re zhig na tshong pa gzhan dag kyang lha stong snyed la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs te/_smras pa/_gu lang chu lha ku be ra dang rlung lha me lha dbang chen dang /_/drang srong sna tshogs lha dang sa la gnas pa'i klu mang de dag la/_/bdag cag dad pa 
[\[217b.7\]]lags kyis bdag cag 'di na 'chi ba'i gnod gyur lags/_/myur du sdug bsngal 'di dag bsal te 'gron po rnams ni bskyab par gsol/_/de nas de dag gis de ltar smre sngags bton kyang skyabs byed pa su yang med do/_/de nas re zhig na dge bsnyen zhig gru de'i nang na 'dug pa des smras 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]pa/_kye ston pa drug dang lha gzhan dag gis kyang khyed la ci byar yang med kyis/_mngon sum du yod pa'i lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la snying nas skyabs su song shig dang /_de khyed kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas ded dpon rgya mtsho la sogs pa tshong pa lnga 
[\[218a.2\]]brgya po rnams kyis skad bsnyams te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su song ngo /_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[218a.3\]]thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par 
[\[218a.4\]]bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng 
[\[218a.5\]]ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug 
[\[218a.6\]]pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis 
[\[218a.7\]]nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang 
[\[218b.2\]]phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_
[\[218b.3\]]rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na bzhugs pas nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od gser gyi kha dog 
[\[218b.4\]]lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas de dag gis tshong pa de dag kun nas snang bar byas so/_/bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/_de dag gis sim par byas nas srin po nag po'i rlung yang bzlog go/_/de nas re zhig na ded dpon rgya mtsho gru'i 
[\[218b.5\]]don grub nas nye zho med par rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas phyir 'khor te/_'chi bas skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis sbyin pa dang /_rab tu sbyin pa dag byin nas nye du'i skye bo rnams dbugs phyung ste/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par 
[\[218b.6\]]byas nas/_tshong pa lnga brgya'i 'khor ril gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba 
[\[218b.7\]]dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags 
[\[219a.2\]]pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[219a.3\]]rgya mtsho la sogs pa tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di dag srog phangs pa stsal te phongs pa las yongs su bskyabs pa dang /_gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar nga 
[\[219a.4\]]'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bral ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs 
[\[219a.5\]]su grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/_ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la dbang thob zin pa'i tshe ngas rgya mtsho la sogs pa tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di dag srog phangs pa byin te phongs pa las yongs su bskyabs pa dang /_gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa/_mya ngan 
[\[219a.6\]]las 'das pa la bkod pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/_'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba 
[\[219a.7\]]dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba'i tshe yang tshong pa 'di dag nyid ngas yongs su bskyabs pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgya mtsho'i 'gram zhig na drang 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_dka' thub drag po spyod pa/_zas su rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za la gos su [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi g.yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon pa/_me'i sbyin sreg byed pa zhig gnas so/_/de yang snying rje can/_bdag nyid che ba/_chos 'dod pa/_skye dgu la byams 
[\[219b.2\]]pa/_phongs par gyur pa rnams la yongs su skyob pa zhig go/_/de nas re zhig na bA rA Na sI'i tshong pa lnga brgya rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gro 'dod par gyur te/_de dag mthar gyis song song nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang /_de dag gis drang srong de mthong nas dad pa skyes te rkang pa la 
[\[219b.3\]]phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag rgya mtsho'i nang du mchis pa las phongs pa 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol zhes byas nas des kyang gnang ste de ltar bya'o zhes byas so/_/de nas 
[\[219b.4\]]tshong pa de dag gis rin po che dag blangs nas 'dzam bu'i gling logs su chas so/_/de nas re zhig na srin po nag po'i rlung gis kun tu bskor ba las drang srong des yongs su bskyabs so/_/de nas gru'i don grub ste nye zho med par phyir 'khor nas drang srong gi thad du phyin te smras pa/_kye drang 
[\[219b.5\]]srong chen po dka' bas 'bad pa dang /_snying rje'i rang bzhin 'dis ci zhig sgrub cing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongs su 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams 
[\[219b.6\]]dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_nam khyod sangs rgyas su gyur pa de'i tshe bdag cag la yang dgongs par gsol/_drang srong gis smras pa de ltar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[219b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/tshong pa de dag ni rgya mtsho la sogs pa 'di dag yin te de'i tshe yang ngas 'di dag yongs su bskyabs so/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]la rab tu byung ste/_der de dag gis dbang po yongs su smin par byas pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig 
[\[220a.2\]]tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /_las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu 
[\[220a.3\]]nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//sna ma zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[220a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam 
[\[220a.5\]]mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing 
[\[220a.6\]]shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[220a.7\]]gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las bu btsas so cog shi'o/_/de'i tshe gnas brtan ma 'gags pa ni khyim der 'drul lo/_/de nas khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/_gnas brtan ma 'gags pa 'di ni bsod 
[\[220b.2\]]nams kyi rnam par smin pas che bar grags pa yin gyis/_gal te bdag gi bu btsas par gyur na 'di'i slob mar dbul lo zhes 'di la je gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo/_/de nas khyim bdag des gnas brtan ma 'gags pa khyim gyi nang du spyan drangs te bshos gsol nas gsol ba btab pa/_
[\[220b.3\]]gnas brtan gal te bdag gi bu btsas te ma gum na gnas brtan gyi slob mar dbul lo zhes byas so/_/gnas brtan ma 'gags pas smras pa/_de ltar dam bcas pa ma brjed par gyis shig_/de nas phyis re zhig na yang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/rtse zhing dga' la dga' 
[\[220b.4\]]mgur spyod pa las/_chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus las dri bsung zhim po byung bar gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_lha'i sna ma'i me tog gi ral chung gyon pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas 
[\[220b.5\]]pa'i btsas ston byas nas sna ma zhes ming gtags so/_/de nas gnas brtan ma 'gags pa khyim gyi nang du bshos la spyan drangs nas khye'u de de la phul lo/_/de nas gnas brtan ma 'gags pas de la chos gos tshon can dag byin te tshe ring bar gyur cig ces legs su smon pa yang byas so/_/de nas 
[\[220b.6\]]gang gi tshe btsas nas lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe pha ma gnyis kyis gnas brtan ma 'gags pa la phul lo/_/gnas brtan ma 'gags pas kyang rab tu byung nas yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid 
[\[220b.7\]]g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang 
[\[221a.2\]]dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de yang dbang po rnon po zhig ste/_gang gi tshe phyag dar khrod kyi gos 
[\[221a.3\]]'drub pa de'i tshe khab lan re 'dzugs pa la rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed do/_/de nas phyis re zhig na gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bsgo ba/_bu cig song la chu klung khang ldan nas chu long shig ces byas so/_/de nas dge tshul pa sna mas bum pa khyer te 
[\[221a.4\]]chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du song ngo /_/de nas khrus byas te bum pa chus bkang nas nam mkha' la song ste ched 'ga' ni bum pa sngon du btang la dge tshul pa sna ma phyi bzhin 'ong ngo /_/ched 'ga' ni dge tshul pa sna ma sngon du 'gro la bum pa phyi bzhin 'ong ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang 
[\[221a.5\]]du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la chos ston te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu dge tshul pa dran pa dang ldan pa/_dbang po shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa/_bum pa chus bkang ste 'ong ba 'di mthong ngam/_
[\[221a.6\]]'dod chags zhe sdang rab spangs shing /_/ma rig pa dang bral nas ni/_/lus kyi tha ma 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni chu chun rab tu mdzes/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du dge tshul pa sna ma bstod cing bsngags pa de'i tshe dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom 
[\[221a.7\]]thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sna ma 'dis las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_lha'i sna ma'i me tog gi ral chud 'tshal bzhin du skyes la/_dbang po rno ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sna ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na sna ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags 
[\[221b.2\]]pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas 
[\[221b.3\]]shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong 
[\[221b.4\]]dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_
[\[221b.5\]]lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen yod na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhig gnas pa de gzhon nu'i tshe nas rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes pa las de rab tu 'byung 
[\[221b.6\]]ma nus nas/_gang gi tshe rgas par gyur pa de'i tshe de 'gyod pa skyes te/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu ma byung ba ni bdag gis ma legs pa byas so snyam mo/_/de nas des dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la sna ma'i me tog btags so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[221b.7\]]sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang bshos gsol te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/_bdag ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/gang gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba der gzhon nu'i tshe nas 'phags pa'i chos rnams rtogs par gyur cig ces byas so/_/gzhan 
[\[222a.2\]]yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/_des der lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 
[\[222a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /_las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_
[\[222a.4\]]las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//lag na gser 
[\[222a.5\]]thogs zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[222a.6\]]rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis 
[\[222a.7\]]mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de la bu 
[\[222b.2\]]yang med/_bu mo yang med pas de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu yang med/_bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khong du chud 
[\[222b.3\]]cing 'dug go/_/de nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_ltas mkhan dang /_mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o/_/'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de 
[\[222b.4\]]yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/_gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum 
[\[222b.5\]]gang zhe na/_pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/_sems can zhig 
[\[222b.6\]]kyang sems can gyi ris gzhan zhig nas shi 'phos nas de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so/_/bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags pa yang shes la ma chags pa yang shes pa dang /_dus kyang shes la 
[\[222b.7\]]zla mtshan yang shes pa dang /_bu chags pa yang shes pa dang /_gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang /_khye'u yang shes la bu mo yang shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na ni lto g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so/_/gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon logs su rten 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]cing gnas so/_/de nas de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa/_jo bo bdag la sras chags te/_bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so/_/de yang dga' ches te ro 
[\[223a.2\]]stod ni bteg_/lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas bdag gis yun rin po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo /_/bdag gi bu rung bar shog shig_/mi rung bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig_/gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog 
[\[223a.3\]]shig/_nor skal la spyod par shog shig_/bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig_/bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/_sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gang du 
[\[223a.4\]]skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/_/de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/_grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo 
[\[223a.5\]]byad rnams dang /_sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang /_ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang lan tsha che ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang 
[\[223a.6\]]bska ba ma yin pa rnams te/_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing do shal dang /_se mo dos lus rnam par bklubs te/_lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du 
[\[223a.7\]]khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang /_khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang /_des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/_/de nas zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]la mdzes pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas de'i lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gser gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byung ste/_gang gi tshe de byung ba de'i tshe yang gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de 
[\[223b.2\]]btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re 'di btsas ma thag tu lag pa gnyis la las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i gser gyi dong tse gnyis byung bas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming lag na gser thogs 
[\[223b.3\]]zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang mar 
[\[223b.4\]]dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/_
[\[223b.5\]]snying rje can zhig ste/_gang gi tshe srang du 'gro ba de'i tshe dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa rnams mthong na lag pa gnyis brkyang nas de la gser dngul gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa'i phung po de dag la ji tsam dgos pa 'byung bar 
[\[223b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to/_de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u lag na gser thogs rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par 
[\[223b.7\]]brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]do/_/dga' ba bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/_slob dpon bdag 
[\[224a.2\]]ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol bar 'tshal lo/_/gnas brtan kun dga' bos smras pa/_bu kAr ShA pa Na dgos so/_/de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar 'greng ste lag pa gnyis 
[\[224a.3\]]brkyang nas gser dngul gyi phung po chen po spungs so/_/de nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dang /_dge slong gzhan dag dang /_gnas brtan kun dga' bos de mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de nas khye'u lag na gser thogs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 
[\[224a.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun la bshos gsol nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur 
[\[224a.5\]]ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khye'u lag na gser thogs kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_bden pa mthong nas des nye du rnams la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byas te/_
