[\[224a.6\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan 
[\[224a.7\]]par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig 
[\[224b.2\]]pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas 
[\[224b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lag na gser thogs kyis las gang dag bgyis na des 'di'i sug pa gnyis las gser gyi dong tse mtshan mas btab pa gnyis byung la/_rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[224b.4\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag lag na gser thogs nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_lag na gser thogs nyid kyis las byas shing 
[\[224b.5\]]bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las 
[\[224b.6\]]dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu 
[\[224b.7\]]nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas yang dag par 
[\[225a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_rgyal po kr-i kIs de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas te rin po che sna bzhi las 
[\[225a.3\]]byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/_'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so/_/mchod rten de'i dus ston byed pa na rgyan po pa zhig gis gser gyi dong tse gnyis mchod rten de'i srog shing la btags so/_/de nas zhabs la phyag 
[\[225a.4\]]'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der lag pa la gser yod pa kho nar gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyan po par gyur pa de ni lag na gser thogs 
[\[225a.5\]]'di yin te/_des mchod rten la gser gyi dong tse gnyis btags pa des na 'di lta bu'i khyad par can du gyur to/_/smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par 
[\[225a.6\]]smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges 
[\[225a.7\]]par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_sde snod gsum pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po 
[\[225b.2\]]rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_
[\[225b.3\]]lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[225b.4\]]ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon 
[\[225b.5\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_
[\[225b.6\]]'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du 
[\[225b.7\]]rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/de nas re zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las btsun mo la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gos su chos gos tshon can 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]gyon la dag sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas skyes ma thag tu dris pa/_ci mnyan du yod pa 'di kho na na bcom ldan 'das dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung dang /_kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos 
[\[226a.2\]]chen po rnams bzhugs sam zhes zer ro/_/de nas de'i ma ya mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas nas smras pa/_bu mnyan du yod pa 'di kho na na bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams bzhugs sa zhes byas so/_/de nas re zhig na don de rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol te khyod 
[\[226a.3\]]kyi sras gos su chos gos tshon can 'tshal ba dge sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas te/_de bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams ga la bzhugs pa yang rmed do zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu de la phan gdags pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 
[\[226a.4\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi 
[\[226a.5\]]dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu pang par blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar brims nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bu 'di btsas ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams dran 
[\[226a.6\]]lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu de la sde snod gsum pa khyod nad med par gyur cig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/_/de nas 
[\[226a.7\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe btsas nas lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe chos gos tshon can de dag nyid gyon bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra 
[\[226b.2\]]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas 
[\[226b.3\]]sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par 
[\[226b.4\]]smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sde snod gsum pas las gang dag bgyis na des chos gos tshon can 'tshal ba dge sbyong gi cha lugs can tshe rabs dran 
[\[226b.5\]]bzhin du btsas te/_rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_
[\[226b.6\]]gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_sde snod gsum pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par 
[\[226b.7\]]smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang 
[\[227a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_
[\[227a.3\]]de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po kr-i kI'i bu drang srong smra bar song ngo /_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po 
[\[227a.4\]]brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so/_/dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal 
[\[227a.5\]]te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu bstan te/_de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes 
[\[227a.6\]]par lta ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po la gsol te/_yab bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod ring po mi thogs par 
[\[227a.7\]]rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur dgos pas 'di ni ngas bcos su med do/_/bus smras pa/_rgyal srid nyes pa mang po dang ldan pa chos kyi dgrar gyur pa bdag la mi 'tshal gyis/_bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu mi 'byung du mi gnang ngo /_/de nas yab kyis ma gnang 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]nas des zhag gcig dang gnyis dang /_gsum nas zhag drug gi bar du kha 'tshos so/_/de nas de'i zla grogs rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol te/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_sras 'di ni rab tu byung na legs kyi de'u re 'dir 'gum na ma legs so/_/de nas 
[\[227b.2\]]rgyal pos gnang nas dam 'char bcug ste/_nam khyod sde snod gsum ma lobs kyi bar du nga dang phrad du ma 'ong cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas re zhig na de yab kyis gnang nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad 
[\[227b.3\]]pas ring po ma lon par sde snod gsum lobs te/_rig pa dang grol bar smra bar chos ston par gyur nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag gis sngon dam bcas pa gnyer dgum gor ma chag snyam nas de yab kyi thad du song ste phrad nas dris pa/_bu cung zad lobs 
[\[227b.4\]]pa lta yod dam/_des smras pa/_sde snod gsum lobs lags so/_/de nas des yab la chos de lta bu bstan te de thos nas rgyal po mgu bar gyur to/_/de nas dga' ba skyes te smras pa/_bu gcig khyod la ci dgos/_des smras pa/_bdag ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi 
[\[227b.5\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs la yo byad drug dbul bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_rgyal po'i pho brang ni rgya ches ci dga' ba gyis shig_/de nas sde snod gsum pas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang bcas te zhal zas bzang pos tshim par 
[\[227b.6\]]byas nas dge slong re re la yang yo byad drug drug phul lo/_/de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag da ltar dka' bas rab tu byung ba thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems 
[\[227b.7\]]bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gos su chos gos tshon can gyon la dge sbyong gi cha lugs 'di dang ldan te tshe rabs dran par gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kr-i kI'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sde snod gsum pa 'di yin te/_rgyu de nyid kyis phyug po'i rigs su skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang tshe rabs dran par gyur to/_/dge slong 
[\[228a.2\]]dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren 
[\[228a.3\]]mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /_las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[228a.4\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//grags bshes zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug 
[\[228a.5\]]po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gdon sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[228a.6\]]chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[228a.7\]]ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ded dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig 
[\[228b.2\]]gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de'i tshe mu ge mi bzad pas gnod pa byung ste slong bas kyang zas mi rnyed do/_/ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang char mi 'bab par bstan pa las re 
[\[228b.3\]]zhig na ded dpon de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas gang gi nyin par khye'u de btsas pa de kho na'i nyin 
[\[228b.4\]]par nas than pa med par gyur to/_/de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa mtha' dag tu rgyas par gyur to/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re 'di'i grags pa kun du rgyas 
[\[228b.5\]]pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming grags bshes zhes gdags sa zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u grags bshes pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de 
[\[228b.6\]]ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe khye'u grags bshes cher skyes pa de'i 
[\[228b.7\]]tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du don zhig la song ngo /_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de dad pa skyes so/_/dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/
[\[229a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/_de thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te pha ma la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste 
[\[229a.3\]]des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_
[\[229a.4\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta 
[\[229a.5\]]bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis 
[\[229a.6\]]mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de'i mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/_des na de la skom pa'i gnod pa med de/_gang gi tshe tsha ba'i dus su dge slong skom pa rnams gung skyems la dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du ba de'i 
[\[229a.7\]]tshe yang de mi 'ong ngo /_/de nas de dang bshes pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dris pa/_ci'i phyir khyod la skom pa'i gnod pa med ces byas so/_/des smras pa/_bdag gi mche ba gnyis las chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ste/_des na bdag la skom pa'i gnod 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]pa med do/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa grags bshes 'dis las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_mche ba gnyis las chab 
[\[229b.2\]]yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung la/_rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag grags bshes nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te 
[\[229b.3\]]dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_grags bshes nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni 
[\[229b.4\]]phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 
[\[229b.5\]]'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la 
[\[229b.6\]]skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 
[\[229b.7\]]zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig dge slong rgan po zhig la rab tu byung ba las/_de yang le lo can zhig ste gzhan la bsnyen bkur byed mi 'dod do/_/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gnas brtan de nyid kyis bsnyen bkur byed par bskos pa dang de bdag ni bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no snyam du rgya cher 'dzin te/_dge slong ches rgan pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur len par byed pas na/_de'i dge 
[\[230a.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnams zad de phyis re zhig na nad kyis btab pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis sman pa'i lung bzhin du sman mar blud nas de mtshan mo skom ste ci bya gtol med nas chu btung snyam ste bdag gi chu snod kyi drung du song na chu med par mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du mkhan po dang /_slob 
[\[230a.3\]]dpon dang /_dge 'dun gyi drung tshang du song na de dag kyang chu med par mthong ngo /_/de nas re zhig na chu klung zlog byed kyi 'gram du song na de yang chu med par gyur te/_de mi dga' bar gyur nas bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams skyo ba skyed pa dang /_dad 
[\[230a.4\]]pas byin pa lci bar bstan pa'i phyir chu klung zlog byed kyi pha rol na shing zhig yod pa la 'dzegs te/_ras zhig der btags nas rang gi las rnams las bsams te las la rten cing 'dug go/_/de nas re zhig na phyi de nyin par nam nangs pa dang gtam de tshangs pa 
[\[230a.5\]]mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bsnyad do/_/de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis skabs de thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te phan tshun du bsnyad do/_/de nas de'i mkhan pos chu byin na de yang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas de mi dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 
[\[230a.6\]]'das 'od srung la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gaN+DI rdungs shig_/ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas khang skyong gis gaN+DI brdungs pa dang /_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dus so/_/grong khyer bA rA Na sI thog thag tu yang 
[\[230a.7\]]gtam de grags te sems can 'bum phrag du ma 'dus so/_/de nas re zhig na de'i mkhan pos gral dpon gyi mdun du 'dug tu bcug nas ril ba spyi blugs chus bkang ste byin nas/_bu chu 'di dge 'dun la brims shig ces byas so/_/de nas 'bras bu mngon 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]sum du mthong ba des skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la dad pa bskyed nas bsam pa drag pos chu de dge 'dun la brims so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas 'jigs 
[\[230b.2\]]pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i phyag gis chu de bzhes te/_nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang blangs na 'on kyang zad par ma gyur to/_/dge 'dun thams cad la brims na yang zad par ma gyur to/_/de nas lha dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul ya mtshan 
[\[230b.3\]]can de mthong nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/_/de'i rgyud la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sor chud par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe nad sos pa de'i tshe des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chus mi brel bar byas te/_lo khri nyis 
[\[230b.4\]]stong gi bar du des dge 'dun la chu brims so/_/de nas phyis re zhig na 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram 
[\[230b.5\]]ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par 
[\[230b.6\]]byed par ma gyur cig_/bdag gi mche ba'i phrag nas kyang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[230b.7\]]grags bshes 'di yin te/_des lo khri nyis stong gi bar du dge 'dun la chu brims te smon lam btab pa des na tshe 'di la mche ba'i phrag nas chu 'byung la/_rgyu de nyid kyis na dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 
[\[231a.2\]]'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[231a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//rdzus te skyes pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_
[\[231a.4\]]pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_
[\[231a.5\]]lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs 
[\[231a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing 
[\[231a.7\]]gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/_sku skrun pa'i yum dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la yang chos ston to/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]chen po ni mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi 
[\[231b.2\]]bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang 
[\[231b.3\]]dag par dga' bar byed do/_/chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan 
[\[231b.4\]]las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis da ltar bcom 
[\[231b.5\]]ldan 'das gang du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]gsan tam/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_kye bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rdo 
[\[231b.6\]]leb snam bu dkar po lta bu'i steng du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes te/_sku skrun pa'i yum dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzhan dag la yang chos ston cing bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la mngon 
[\[231b.7\]]par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te dong ngo /_/de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' 
[\[232a.2\]]bar byed do/_/chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams stan las langs te bla gos 
[\[232a.3\]]phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag cag gis bcom 
[\[232a.4\]]ldan 'das kyi zhal ma mthong nas ring mo zhig lags te/_bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bas skom lags so/_/bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/_gal te btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la gnod pa ma mchis na btsun pa maud gal gyi 
[\[232a.5\]]bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas zhabs la phyag bzhes te gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/_bde ba la reg 
[\[232a.6\]]par gnas sam zhes gsol la 'di skad ces kyang gsungs shig_/btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'khor bzhi po rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal te/_'di skad du btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la ni gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams 
[\[232a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_thad du mchi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ma mchis la/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang thad du mchi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis na thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs su 
[\[232b.2\]]gsol zhes mchi'o zhes mol du gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bar khas blangs par rig nas/_
[\[232b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te dong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'khor bzhi po rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na dper na mi stobs 
[\[232b.4\]]po che'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul na shing gi rgyal po yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung nas thag mi ring 
[\[232b.5\]]ba zhig na rdo leb snam bu dkar po lta bu 'dug pa der son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ni lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 
[\[232b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'dzum dmul te bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis gang ba bzhin du 'di na yang 'khor mang po dang bzhugs so 
[\[232b.7\]]snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di dag la ni rang dbang med de/_gang gi tshe ngas deng 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]shig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe ngas shog shig ces bsams na ni de'i tshe 'ong bar 'gyur te/_sems kyis nga'i bsam pa shes nas 'ong ba dang 'dong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[233a.2\]]chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha'i 'khor thams cad la bltas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[233a.3\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod lags so/_/lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang mchis so/_/chos dang dge 'dun 
[\[233a.4\]]dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa dag kyang mchis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la 'thun par dgongs te tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 
[\[233a.5\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do/_/lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu 
[\[233a.6\]]dag kyang yod do/_/chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang /_tshe dang 
[\[233a.7\]]ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do/_/lha'i 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang yod do/_/chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral na sa 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag 
[\[233b.2\]]kyang yod do/_/de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa la 'thun par bsams te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad 
[\[233b.3\]]ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_kye ma lha'i 'khor sna tshogs 'dus shing 'khod do/_/lha'i 'khor gyi nang na sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa'i lha de lta bu dag kyang 
[\[233b.4\]]yod do/_/chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes pa de lta bu dag kyang yod do/_/de nas lha kha cig stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[233b.5\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes lags so/_/lha gzhan dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[233b.6\]]btsun pa bdag cag ni chos dang dge 'dun dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa dang ldan te lus dang bral nas 'dir skyes lags so/_/de nas der lha brgya phrag du ma dang /_lha stong phrag du ma dang /_lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 
[\[233b.7\]]'das kyi spyan sngar so so'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brda sprod pa byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos lha rnams dong bar rig nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa 
[\[234a.2\]]yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang ldan nam/_mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/_bde ba la reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod dang 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor 
[\[234a.3\]]bzhi po 'khod pa rnams bde bar gyur cig maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/_btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po mchis pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te 'di skad ces kyang mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams 
[\[234a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_thad du mchi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ma mchis la/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la ni gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 
[\[234a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_thad du mchi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du mchi ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu mchis na/_thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i 
[\[234a.6\]]gling du gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu 'o na khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du song la 'khor bzhi po rnams la/_kye bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul 
[\[234a.7\]]nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/_a pad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum ba ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes sbron cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/_dper na mi stobs po che'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas mi snang 
[\[234b.2\]]bar gyur te 'dzam bu'i gling du son par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbran pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa 
[\[234b.3\]]gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/_a pad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum ba ra'i drung du gshegs so zhes byas so/_/de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul nas 'dzam bu'i gling du 
[\[234b.4\]]grong khyer snang ldan gyi 'dab/_a pad dza ra'i nags su shing u dum bA ra'i drung du gshegs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das grong khyer snang ldan du gshegs pa de'i tshe srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dus so/_/de nas der 
[\[234b.5\]]dge slong rdzus te skyes pa zhig byung ste/_des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag bshos la spyan drangs nas/_re zhig na gdugs 
[\[234b.6\]]tshod la bab pa dang sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i gdan dar yug khyim chen pos g.yogs pa dag dang /_lha'i zhal zas bza' ba dang bca' ba dag byung bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pa des bcom ldan 'das lha'i zhal zas kyis tshim par byas te/_
[\[234b.7\]]lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag la yang bkur sti legs par byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]nas de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/_de thos nas dge slong rdzus te skyes pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_
[\[235a.2\]]rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag 
[\[235a.3\]]mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_
[\[235a.4\]]bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rdzus 
[\[235a.5\]]te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na de rdzus te skyes par gyur la/_'dis sems bskyed pa'i mod la ci bsams pa dang /_ci 'tshal ba de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rdzus te 
[\[235a.6\]]skyes pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_rdzus te skyes pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig 
[\[235a.7\]]gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras 
[\[235b.2\]]bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[235b.3\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de 
[\[235b.4\]]nas re zhig na grong med pa dgon pa'i gnas shig na dge slong lnga dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las de'i nang nas dge slong gcig gis dge slong bzhi'i zhal ta byas nas/_de dag gis brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs 
[\[235b.5\]]nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong cig shos kyis ni de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar 'di rnams kyis bdag las brten te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa 
[\[235b.6\]]dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag rab tu byung ste yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis brel bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus 
[\[235b.7\]]te skyes pa 'di yin no/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa rdzus te skyes pas las gang dag bgyis na des rdzus te skyes lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_
[\[236a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe de na tshong dpon zhig gnas pa de'i chung ma bu btsa' ba'i tshe sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen te nyam thag 
[\[236a.3\]]pa'i skad 'byin cing ngu ba dang /_des de'i sgra thos nas mchog tu mi dga' bar gyur te/_mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las de'i blo skyes pa/_ma la bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab 
[\[236a.4\]]tu byung la/_ci nas bdag gis nams kyang mngal du gnas pa nyams su myong bar ma gyur cig ces smon lam gdab gor ma chag snyam ste/_de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas des smon lam btab pa/_dge 
[\[236a.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye bar gyur cig_/nams kyang mngal du gnas pa nyams su myong bar ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i 
[\[236a.6\]]tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rdzus te skyes pa 'di yin te/_smon lam btab pa des na rdzus te skyes par gyur to/_/des der dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de 
[\[236a.7\]]ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par 
[\[236b.2\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_
[\[236b.3\]]blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams 
[\[236b.4\]]dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 
[\[236b.5\]]rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i 
[\[236b.6\]]gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des 
[\[236b.7\]]rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas nas/_de btsas pa'i tshe shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/_de dag gis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thog thag mdzes par 
[\[237a.2\]]byas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re 'di btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas mdzes par byas pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming mdzes pa zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/
[\[237a.3\]]de nas khye'u mdzes pa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_
[\[237a.4\]]mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo /_/de 
[\[237a.5\]]nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 
[\[237a.6\]]'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/_/de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[237a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khye'u mdzes pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol 
[\[237b.2\]]mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs 
[\[237b.3\]]nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil 
[\[237b.4\]]bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams 
[\[237b.5\]]kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa mdzes pas las gang dag bgyis na de gzugs bzang zhing /_blta 
[\[237b.6\]]na sdug la mdzes te/_mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob par gyur la/_'di btsas pa'i tshe yang shin tu rmad du byung ba du ma byung bar gyur te/_de dag gis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas kun tu mdzes par bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[237b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mdzes pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_mdzes pa nyid kyis las byas 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams 
[\[238a.2\]]la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud 
[\[238a.3\]]mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig 
[\[238a.4\]]pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i 
[\[238a.5\]]pho brang grong khyer mdzes ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po mdzes pas de'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs so/_/de nas re zhig na de'i dus ston zhig byung ba'i tshe mdza' sde dag cig mchod rten gyi drung du dong ba las/_de dag gis mchod rten 
[\[238a.6\]]de mthong nas dad pa skyes te me tog btags so/_/de dag gi nang nas mdza' sde bo gcig na re bdag la ni ci yang med kyis/_bdag ni ci yang mi byed do zhes zer nas de mdza' sde de dag gi nang nas phyir byung ba las de 'gyod pa skyes te/_des me tog rnam pa 
[\[238a.7\]]sna tshogs btus nas mchod rten de nyid la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na mdza' sde bo 'gyod pa skyes nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi dbu skra dang sen mo'i 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]mchod rten la me tog 'bul ba gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag mdzes pas ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon zhig gnas pa des rang sangs rgyas nad 
[\[238b.2\]]pa zhig mthong ngo /_/de nas dad pa skyes te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bsod snyoms kyang phul/_gos kyang phul lo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mdzes pa 'di yin no/_/gzhan yang bcom 
[\[238b.3\]]ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la mi dbul po shing thun zhig tu gyur te/_de ri'i sul zhig tu shing thur song ba dang /_des mchod rten zhig mthong na mchod rten de'i 'khor sa na rtswa dag kyang skyes so/_/de nas de dad pa skyes nas des rtswa rnams kyang phyung ste phyags ma thogs 
[\[238b.4\]]nas mchod rten dang mchod rten gyi 'khor sa phyags so/_/de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur cig_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang 
[\[238b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dbul po shing thun du gyur pa gang yin 
[\[238b.6\]]pa de ni mdzes pa 'di nyid yin te/_des mchod rten dang mchod rten gyi 'khor sa phyags pa des na gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to/_/rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong 
[\[238b.7\]]dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par 
[\[239a.2\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu pa/_ka pi na zhes 
[\[239a.3\]]bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod 
[\[239a.4\]]sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[239a.5\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong 
[\[239a.6\]]rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe lho phyogs na rgyal po rtog ldan zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_
[\[239a.7\]]rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so/_/de nas phyis re zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de 
[\[239b.2\]]rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las btsun mo la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas 
[\[239b.3\]]pa'i btsas ston byas nas ka pi na zhes ming btags so/_/de nas khye'u ka pi na pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o 
[\[239b.4\]]ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/gang gi nyin par rgyal po'i bu ka pi na btsas pa de kho na'i 
[\[239b.5\]]nyin par blon po khri brgyad stong gi bu yang btsas te/_thams cad kyang tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/de dag gi ming yang so so'i rkyen rkyen du 'tsham par btags so/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po rtog ldan shi nas de'i 'og tu bu ka pi na rgyal por 
[\[239b.6\]]bcug go/_/blon po'i bu khri brgyad stong po de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po'i blon por bskos so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po ka pi na chen po blon po khri brgyad stong gis zhabs 'bring byas te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song ba dang des mdun logs dang rgyab logs su dpung 
[\[239b.7\]]chen po thams cad bltas nas blon po rnams la dris pa/_kwa'e da ltar nga'i dpung chen po 'di lta bu dag gzhan su la yod ces byas so/_/de nas blon po snyan par smra ba rnams kyis lha su la yang ma mchis so zhes byas so/_/de nas yul dbus nas tshong pa dag cig 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]lho phyogs su song ba de dag gis rgyal po ka pi na chen po la skyes phul lo/_/de nas rgyal pos smras pa/_kye tshong pa dag yul de'i rgyal po su yin/_tshong pa rnams kyis gsol pa/_lha yul kha cig na ni mang po tshogs pa dbang bgyid do/_/yul kha cig 
[\[240a.2\]]na ni rgyal po dbang bgyid do/_/de nas re zhig na rgyal po ka pi na chen pos mnyan du yod pa la sogs pa grong khyer chen po drug tu pho nya btang ste/_gal te khyod 'greng ba la bab pa na yang ma 'dug par myur du sheg shig_/de ltar ma byas na chad pas cher gcod do zhes byas so/_/
[\[240a.3\]]de nas tshig de thos nas grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams 'jigs shing skrag la mi dga' ste skyi bung zhes byas nas 'dus shing tshogs te gros 'thun par byas nas mnyan du yod par lhags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste gtam de bcom ldan 
[\[240a.4\]]'das la rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dbugs phyung ste pho nya de nga'i thad du khug shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas de dag gis pho nya la kho bo cag gi rgyal po'i yang rgyal po yod kyis re zhig de'i spyan sngar mchi shig ces bsgo'o/_/
[\[240a.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pho nya 'ong bar thugs su chud nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal lha'i grong khyer blta na sdug dang 'dra bar rin po che sna bzhir sprul to/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi ni de'i sgo dpon lta bur bkod do/_/glang po che sa srung gi bu lta bu dag dang /_rta sprin 
[\[240a.6\]]gyi shugs can lta bu dag dang /_shing rta dga' byed sgra lta bu dag dang /_mi gnod sbyin mi bzad pa lta bu dag kyang bkod do/_/bcom ldan 'das nyid ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs su sprul to/_/seng ge'i khri 'phang du ta la bdun tsam yod pa 
[\[240a.7\]]yang sprul te/_de la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so/_/de nas pho nyas de lta bur mdzes pa dag mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin yig bris nas pho nya de la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po ka pi na la nga na re phrin yig 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]mthong ba kho na'i tshe gal te khyod 'greng ba la bab na yang ma 'dug par myur du shog shig_/gal te ma 'ongs na nga dpung gi tshogs chen po dang 'ong ngo zhes gyis shig_/de nas pho nya song ste rgyal po ka pi na chen po la phrin yig dang kha than du btab pa de dag thams cad byas 
[\[240b.2\]]so/_/de nas rgyal po ka pi na chen po blon po khri brgyad stong gis zhabs 'bring byas te mthar gyis song song nas mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang /_nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams kyis rgyal po ka pi na chen po bsu nas de dag gis bkur sti chen pos grong khyer du gshegs su 
[\[240b.3\]]gsol te mnyel bso nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'ong bar thugs su chud nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sprul to/_/de nas rgyal po ka pi na chen po rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas mthong ma thag tu de'i gzugs la 
[\[240b.4\]]gzugs kyi rgyags pa dang /_dbang phyug la dbang phyug gi rgyags pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/stobs kyi dregs pa ni da dung yod bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang po'i gzhu 
[\[240b.5\]]khyer te 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kha lo pa'i cha lugs kyis dbang po'i gzhu phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ka pi na chen po la byin na/_de rgyal po ka pi 
[\[240b.6\]]na chen pos bteg par yang ma nus na bdung bar lta ga la nus/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi rnga bo che bdun sprul te nyid kyis gzhu de zla gam bzhin du bdungs nas gnam mda' 'phangs te/_des lcags kyi rnga bo che bdun char thal phyung nas de las sgra byung 
[\[240b.7\]]ba/_nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/_/bag yod spyod par byed pa ni/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]nas/_/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba'i sgra byung nas sgra de yang 'og min gyi lha'i yul man chad du grag go/_/de nas rgyal po ka pi na chen po'i stobs kyi dregs pa de yang med par gyur te de'i blo skyes pa/_e ma de ci zhig snyam mo/_/
[\[241a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ka pi na chen po'i sems kyi rgyu ba thugs su chud nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs mi snang bar mdzad de mdo 'di gsungs so/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 
[\[241a.3\]]stobs bcu dang ldan pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi gnas rgya chen po la dam bcas pa/_tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba/_'khor gyi nang du yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ste/_'di lta ste/_'di yod na 'di 'byung la/_'di 
[\[241a.4\]]skyes pas 'di skye bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg 
[\[241a.5\]]pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[241a.6\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'di med na 'di mi 'byung la/_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 
[\[241a.7\]]'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[241b.2\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag nga'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa/_gsal bar rnam par phye ba/_rgyu ba gcod 
[\[241b.3\]]pa/_lha dang mi man cad la yang dag par legs par bstan pa yin te/_de ltar chos ni legs par gsungs pa/_gsal bar rnam par phye ba/_rgyu ba gcod pa/_lha dang mi man cad la yang dag par legs par bstan pa la ni rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu 
[\[241b.4\]]byung bas ston pa'i bstan pa la brtson par bya ba'i rigs pa kho na'o/_/sbyor bar bya ba'i rigs so/_/bag yod par bya ba'i rigs so/_/lus kyi sha khrag kun skams te/_pags pa dang /_chu ba dang /_rus pa 'bab zhig lus pa ni sla'i/_chos rnams la brtson 
[\[241b.5\]]'grus brtsams pa/_mthu dang ldan pa/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_spro ba dang ldan pa/_mthu rtsal dang ldan pa/_brtson pa mi 'dor bas thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor brtson 'grus gtang bar ni mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_le lo 
[\[241b.6\]]can ni sdug bsngal bzhin du gnas pa ste/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa/_yang srid par skye bar byed pa/_rims nad dang bcas pa/_sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa/_phyi ma la skye ba dang /_rga shir 'gyur ba rnams 
[\[241b.7\]]dang 'dres pa yin te/_de'i ni don chen po yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni bde bar gnas pa ste/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa/_yang srid par skye bar byed pa rims nad dang bcas pa/_sdug bsngal 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]gyi rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa/_phyi ma la skye ba dang rga shir 'gyur ba rnams dang ma 'dres pa yin te/_de'i ni don chen po yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_ston pa yang mngon sum du bzhugs la chos 
[\[242a.2\]]kyang ston te nye bar zhi bar byed pa/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa/_bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab 'di ni snying khu btung bar 'os pa yin no/_/dge slong dag de bas na bdag gi don dang /_
[\[242a.3\]]gzhan gyi don dang /_gnyi ga'i don yang dag par mthong ba rnams kyis ni 'di la so so nas legs par bslab par bya ste/_ji ltar byas na bdag cag rab tu byung ba don yod pa dang /_'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /_bde ba skyed pa dang /_bde ba'i rnam par smin par 
[\[242a.4\]]'gyur la/_gang dag gi gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad gsos dang /_sman zong rnams bdag cag gis longs spyod pa de dag gi bkur sti de dag kyang ji ltar byas na 'bras bu shin tu che ba dang /_phan yon che ba dang /_byin che ba dang /_rgya 
[\[242a.5\]]che bar 'gyur ba zhig gu snyam du dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na rgyal po ka pi na chen po blon po khri brgyad stong gi 'khor dang bcas pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[242a.6\]]'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams 
[\[242a.7\]]cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid 
[\[242b.2\]]pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[242b.3\]]'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ka pi nas las gang dag bgyis na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_blon po khri brgyad stong gi 'khor dang bcas par tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur la/_rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[242b.4\]]sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ka pi na nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas 
[\[242b.5\]]na ka pi na nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi 
[\[242b.6\]]khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar 
[\[242b.7\]]yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 
[\[243a.2\]]'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhig gis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che mang po khyer te 'ongs nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[243a.3\]]dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangs so/_/gtsug lag khang yang brtsigs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul lo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ka pi na 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag 
[\[243a.4\]]ka pi nas ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang 
[\[243a.5\]]mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_
[\[243a.6\]]chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/_/de phyi zhig na blon po khri brgyad stong gis zhabs 'bring byas te/_skyed mos tshal gyi shing rnams me tog rgyas la/_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug 
[\[243a.7\]]dang /_shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du song ba las des skyed mos tshal der rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong nas/_des de la zla ba gsum gyi bar du phan pa'i zas kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang de'i sku 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pas til mar gyis bskus te/_des na 'khor dang bcas pa tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur to/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/_des der dbang po yongs su smin par 
[\[243b.2\]]byas pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig 
[\[243b.3\]]tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la 
[\[243b.4\]]gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//bzang ldan zhes bya ba ni/_sangs 
[\[243b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma 
[\[243b.6\]]yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[243b.7\]]mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu gnyis 
[\[244a.2\]]lon te/_lo bcu gnyis 'das nas grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su byon pa de'i tshe bre bo zas dang /_bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya stong phrag du mas bden pa mthong ste/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni ma gtogs so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sras 
[\[244a.3\]]kyi legs pa de dag mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te de'i blo skyes pa/_gal te bdag gi bu rab tu ma byung du zin na ni 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/_chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba zhig na/_da ni 'di thor tshugs 
[\[244a.4\]]can rab tu byung ba'i g.yog byas pa ni rab tu mi mdzes kyis bdag gis shAkya rnams las khyim re mi re rab tu 'byung du gzhug gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir grong khyer du dril bsgrags so/_/de nas shAkya thams 
[\[244a.5\]]cad 'dus pa'i nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_kye shAkya khyed rnams nyon cig_/gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung du zin na yang khyed kho nas 'di la bsnyen bkur bya dgos na/_da 'di rab tu byung gis shAkya khyim re mi re bsnyen bkur 
[\[244a.6\]]bya ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig ces byas so/_/de nas bzang ldan dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_nam gru dang /_lha sbyin la sogs pa shAkya'i bu lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar chas so/_/de nas de dag gi 'breg mkhan bsnyen bkur byed pa nye bar 'khor des de dag rab 
[\[244a.7\]]tu 'byung ba mthong nas ngus so/_/de nas shAkya rnams kyis nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir ngu zhes dris so/_/de nas des snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra ste/_khyod rab tu byung na da bdag la zas dang gos kyis skyong ba su zhig mchis/_de nas 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/_nye bar 'khor 'o na ras thing shig ces byas so/_/de nas des ras bting nas shAkya rnams kyis lus la thogs pa'i do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_sor gdub 
[\[244b.2\]]rnams phung po chen por spungs te byin no/_/de nas 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor gyis rab tu 'byung ba de dag kyang mthong la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs la yang bltas nas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa skyes te/_shAkya 'di dag ni cho rigs dang /_byad gzugs dang /_lang 
[\[244b.3\]]tsho dang /_'byor pa dang ldan pa yin na/_'on kyang btsun mo rnams dang /_rgyan 'di dag mchil ma bzhin du bor nas rab tu byung na bdag ci yang mi bdog pa zhig gis da rgyan 'di dag khyim du bskur du ci yod de/_'di dag btang la bdag kyang 'di dag gi rjes su 
[\[244b.4\]]rab tu 'byung gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas 'breg mkhan nye bar 'khor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag 
[\[244b.5\]]lta bu yang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba mchis la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom 
[\[244b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu phyung ngo /_/de nas bzang ldan la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgya dge slong gi cha lugs can rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal bar byas pa las de dag gis nye bar 'khor gyi rkang 
[\[244b.7\]]pa ngo shes nas cho rigs dang /_byad gzugs dang /_'byor pa dang ldan pa'i phyir nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal du ma btub nas/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan la bka' stsal pa/_bzang ldan gang gi phyir nga'i bstan pa 'di la ni cho rigs dang /_
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]byad gzugs dang /_lang tsho dang /_dbang phyug dang /_rigs bzhi rnam par dag pa dang sbyar ba med kyis 'di la phyag 'tshol cig_/de nas bzang ldan la sogs pa shAkya lnga brgyas chos nyid btsan par byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad 
[\[245a.2\]]pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag byas so/_/de dag gis rkang pa la phyag byas pa'i mod la sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de nas der tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan gyis brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di 
[\[245a.3\]]nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra 
[\[245a.4\]]bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_
[\[245a.5\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de yang bdag 
[\[245a.6\]]nyid che ba/_sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba zhig ste/_phyi zhig na snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par spyod yul la chas so/_/de nas re zhig na rigs ngan zhig gi khyim du bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/de'i tshe ko 
[\[245a.7\]]sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal glang po che'i gtso bo pad ma dkar po gcig pu zhes bya ba la zhon te/_kha lo pa rgyu ba'i bu ring po dang /_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir chas pa las ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bzang ldan dbang po zhi ba/_yid zhi ba/_sems 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]mchog tu dul zhing nye bar zhi ba dang ldan la phyag dar khrod kyi gos gyon zhing kha zas ngan pa khyer te rigs ngan gyi khyim de nas phyir byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang kha lo pa rgyu ba'i bu ring po la dris pa/_'di dge slong bzang ldan ma yin nam/_kha lo pas smras pa/_lha 
[\[245b.2\]]bka' stsal pa bzhin te de lags so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khams nas brgyal te sa la lhung ngo /_/de nas chus gtor ba dang phyir sangs te sems rtas nas kha lo pa rgyu ba'i bu ring pos bslang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das 
[\[245b.3\]]kyi thad du song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni rmad du byung ba zhig mthong ste/_shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan de phyag dar khrod kyi gos gyon zhing kha zas ngan pa thogs te lha dang mi
