[\[245b.4\]]dad par bgyis pa'i spyod lam shin du zhi bas bsod snyoms blangs te rigs ngan gyi khyim nas slar byung ba de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni shin tu dul bar bgyid pa lags te/_de la bsten na 'di lta bur skyid de bar mchis la bde 
[\[245b.5\]]bas bskyed pa dag kyang 'di ltar tshul dul bar gyur pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po bzang ldan 'di la ni ngo mtshar che ba gzhan yang yod kyis nyon cig_/rgyal po chen po bzang ldan 'di ni dgon pa na gnas 
[\[245b.6\]]sam/_shing drung na gnas sam/_khang stong na gnas kyang rung ste/_kye ma re skyid/_kye ma re skyid/_bdag rab tu ma byung ba tsam na rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang na 'dug ste/_blon po chen po dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi rnams kyis shin tu legs par bsrungs 
[\[245b.7\]]la/_ra ba dang /_'obs dang /_sgo dang /_gcan rnams kyis bskyabs kyang snying gzhan la dogs shing mi dga' la kun la yang khu 'phrig za bzhin te/_gnyid kyang mi 'ong ba las da ni bdag lus dang srog la yang mi lta bas/_gnas gang dang gang du yang bde bar 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]'dug tu yod do zhes dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du rjod par byed do/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bzang ldan gyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan 
[\[246a.2\]]dag tu las gang dag bgyis shing bsags na des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_rgyal po'i rigs phyug por skyes la/_rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[246a.3\]]dge slong dag bzang ldan nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_bzang ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de 
[\[246a.4\]]dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[246a.5\]]las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab 
[\[246a.6\]]pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na sprang po zhig gnas la lus bkres shing nyam chung bas non nas phan tshun du 'khor 'khor ba las bu mo khur ba khyer ba zhig mthong ngo /_/de nas sprang po des 
[\[246a.7\]]khur ba 'dod pa'i phyir bu mo de bsnyags te nan gyis khur ba cig phrogs nas phan tshun du bros so/_/bu mo de yang de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bzhin no/_/de nas sprang po des tsham tshom med par chu klung zlog byed la 'bogs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams mi 'byung ba'i tshe na 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du byung ste/_re zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig sprang po de'i mdun du 'ongs so/_/de nas sprang po des rang 
[\[246b.2\]]sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi ba de mthong nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/_de dga' ba chen pos rang gi sdug bsngal dang bsngos te rang sangs rgyas la khur ba de phul lo/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas des de'i dga' ba rgya chen po bskyed pa'i phyir/_ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab 
[\[246b.3\]]ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/_cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/_/de nas sprang po des lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin du rmad du byung ba de mthong nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_
[\[246b.4\]]bdag gis yon gnas brtul zhugs grub pa la phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der rigs mthon por skye ba dang /_'di lta bu'i chos dag thob 
[\[246b.5\]]par gyur cig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[246b.6\]]sprang por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bzang ldan 'di yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas la khur ba phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni shAkya'i rigs phyug por skyes so/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/_des der lo khri'i bar du tshangs 
[\[246b.7\]]par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_
[\[247a.2\]]las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[247a.3\]]mngon par bstod do//_//yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon 
[\[247a.4\]]rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas 
[\[247a.5\]]te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_
[\[247a.6\]]gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul gsus po che zhes bya ba na gsus po che'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul gsus po che na rgyal po sgra mi snyan zhes bya ba rgyal po 
[\[247a.7\]]byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/_/de nas de'i nu bo'i bu yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_yan 
[\[247b.2\]]lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de gdul ba'i dus la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 
[\[247b.3\]]'bring byas te yul gsus po cher bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /_yul 'khor skyong gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang 
[\[247b.4\]]gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/_/de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te 
[\[247b.5\]]rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_bu khyod pha mas gnang ngam/_yul 'khor skyong gis gsol pa/_btsun pa ma gnang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[247b.6\]]rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni pha mas ma gnang bar rab tu 'byung ba'am/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi mdzad do/_/de nas yul 'khor skyong pha ma'i thad du song ste phyin nas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod de/_bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[247b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid rgyas pa dang /_btsun mo drug khri spangs nas dbu skra bregs te chos gos snam sbyar gsol nas yul gsus po che 'di nyid na bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing bzhugs pa mthong gis/_bdag bcom 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]ldan 'das rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs so/_/de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis ma gnang ngo /_/de nas de zhag gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum nas drug gi bar du kha 'tshos so/_/de 
[\[248a.2\]]nas yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis bu yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig_/khyod ni skyid de bar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/_khyod kyis sdug ma myong 
[\[248a.3\]]ba yin la tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad par dka'o/_/dben par gnas pa ni dka'o/_/gcig pu 'dug pa ni dga' bar bya dka'o/_/dgon pa dang /_nags khung dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas bca' ba ni yid la bsam par yang dkas/_bu 
[\[248a.4\]]yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyad par gyis shig_/sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig_/bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces de skad byas na yang khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi zer ro/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 
[\[248a.5\]]'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis kyis nye du rnams la bskul te/_kye nye du rnams bu yul 'khor skyong slong shig ces byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi nye du rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 
[\[248a.6\]]'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shig_/khyod ni skyid de bar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/_khyod ni sdug ma myong ba yin la tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad par dka'o/_/dben par gnas pa ni dka'o/_/gcig 
[\[248a.7\]]pu 'dug pa ni dga' bar bya dka'o/_/dgon pa dang /_nags khung dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas bca' ba ni yid la bsam par yang dkas/_bu yul 'khor skyong khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyad par gyis shig_/sbyin pa 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]dag kyang byin cig_/bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces de skad byas na yang /_khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi zer ro/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis kyis yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams la bskul te/_kye byis pa 
[\[248b.2\]]dag bu yul 'khor skyong slong shig ces byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des yul 'khor skyong shes par 
[\[248b.3\]]gyis shig_/khyod ni skyid de bar 'dug 'dug pa bde ba 'dod pa yin te/_khyod ni sdug ma myong ba yin la tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad par dka'o/_/dben par gnas pa ni dka'o/_/gcig pu 'dug pa ni dga' bar bya dka'o/_/dgon pa dang /_nags khung 
[\[248b.4\]]dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas bca' ba ni yid la bsam par yang dkas/_des pa yul 'khor skyong khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa rnams kyang longs spyad par gyis shig_/sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig_/bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig ces 
[\[248b.5\]]de skad byas na yang khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong cang mi zer ro/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha ma gnyis la 'di skad ces 
[\[248b.6\]]smras so/_/yab yum gnyis mkhyen par mdzod cig_/des pa yul 'khor skyong gum na ci rung gis yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung du stsol cig dang /_gal te rab tu 'byung ba la dga' bar gyur na ni gson por mchis na ni khyod 
[\[248b.7\]]kyis gzigs par 'gyur grang /_gal te dga' bar ma gyur na ni bu 'gro ba'i sa pha ma ma gtogs pa gzhan ma mchis so/_/pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_byis pa dag gal te bu yul 'khor skyong rab tu byung ba'i 'og tu nged dang phrad du 'ong na ni de 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bzhin du gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi grogs po rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa yul 'khor skyong khyed rab tu 'byung 
[\[249a.2\]]bar ni pha ma gnyis kyis gnang mod kyi/_gal te rab tu byung ba'i 'og tu phrad du 'ong na gdod gnang ngo zhes zer ro/_/yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/_kye phrad par bgyi'o/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong khad kyis lus kyi mthu dang stobs bskyed nas/_
[\[249a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[249a.4\]]bdag ni pha mas gnang lags na bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_
[\[249a.5\]]rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor 
[\[249a.6\]]ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[249a.7\]]sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra 
[\[249b.2\]]ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong yul 'khor skyong 'di yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_
[\[249b.3\]]the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa yul 'khor skyong gis las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa 
[\[249b.4\]]nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong 
[\[249b.5\]]ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_yul 'khor skyong nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam 
[\[249b.6\]]par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 
[\[249b.7\]]'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slon dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lus 'phags 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]kyi rgyal po pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa pha rol gyi dmag tshogs byung ste/_ci bya gtol med nas nags khung du zhugs te/_de nyi ma gung la nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha bas gdungs nas dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te phan tshun 'khor 'khor nas lam 
[\[250a.2\]]yang ma rnyed do/_/sangs [\u0f92\u0fb1]sa rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe na rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_re zhig na rang 
[\[250a.3\]]sangs rgyas shig dgon pa'i lam de na gnas pa des snying rje bskyed nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de la lam yang bstan/_chu'i lteng ka yang bstan nas des rgyal po de 'khor dang bcas pa'i srog phangs pa bskyangs so/_/de nas rgyal po de dad pa skyes nas rang 
[\[250a.4\]]gi grong khyer du khrid de zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya 
[\[250a.5\]]ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_bcom ldan 
[\[250a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag yul 'khor skyong gis ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/_bskal pa bzang po 
[\[250a.7\]]'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po kr-i kI rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor 
[\[250b.2\]]pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams med pa dang /_'bras sA lu 
[\[250b.3\]]dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/_/de nas de'i bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]drang srong smra bar song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa 
[\[250b.4\]]gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 
[\[250b.5\]]'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de la chos bstan te/_de dad pa skyes 
[\[250b.6\]]pas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang mchod rten la gdugs bu chung btags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du 
[\[250b.7\]]sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin no/_/yul 'khor skyong gis ni las gzhan dag kyang byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na bram ze las 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]su rtsa ba rko ba zhig gnas pa de/_re zhig la rtsa ba rkor song ste nags khrod du 'khor 'khor ba las des der rang sangs rgyas nad pa zhig mthong ngo /_/de nas de dad pa skyes te de la bsnyen bkur byas nas gang gi tshe nad sos pa de'i tshe yang bshos 
[\[251a.2\]]gsol te smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[251a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rtsa ba rko ba'i bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin te/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor ba na nams kyang sdug bsngal myong ba med par gyur la da ltar yang 
[\[251a.4\]]rgyal po'i rigs phyug por skyes te/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to/_/rgyu de kho nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges 
[\[251a.5\]]par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams 
[\[251a.6\]]dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[251a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sdom ni/_/rab 'byor dang ni rgan po dang /_/lag pa can dang 'de gus gsos/_/'khor 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]ba dang ni sbed pa dang /_/mi sdug pa dang gang gA pa/_/sen [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang ni yang dag sdug_/sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin/_/rab 'byor ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_
[\[251b.2\]]pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis 
[\[251b.3\]]bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams 
[\[251b.4\]]chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' 
[\[251b.5\]]ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ljongs so sor gdul ba'i skye bo rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams bskos pa de'i tshe/_bsam gtan 
[\[251b.6\]]pa gang yin pa de dag ni ri rab kyi bang rim la bsam gtan lhur byed cing 'khod do/_/de nas re zhig na bya'i rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas klu'i phru gu zhig blangs te/_des de ri rab kyi bang rim gyi steng du phyung nas bza' bar brtsams so/_/de nas 
[\[251b.7\]]klu'i phru gu de 'chi ba'i tshe nyan thos chen po rnams la sems dga' bar byas te shi'o/_/de nas de shi nas mnyan du yod par bram ze 'byor pa zhes bya ba de'i chung ma chen mo'i ltor zhugs nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di'i pha 'byor pa yin pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rab 'byor zhes gdags so zhes 
[\[252a.2\]]zer ro/_/de nas khye'u rab 'byor bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas de sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs dang shugs kyis spro thung ba dang khro ba dang /_zhe gnag pa'i shas che bar gyur te/_de nas pha ma gnyis kyis srid srung las phyung ste/_drang srong gi nang du rab 
[\[252a.3\]]tu phyung nas de yang de na bsam gtan lhur byed par gyur te nags khrod cig na rten cing 'dug go/_/nags khrod de na lha bden pa mthong ba zhig kyang gnas te/_des de la snying rje bskyed nas rigs kyi bu 'di ni khro ba dang zhe gnag pa'i shas che bas khyad par thob par 
[\[252a.4\]]mi 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis 'di bcom ldan 'das la bltar gzhug go snyam mo/_/de nas lha des rab 'byor gyi mdun du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/de nas rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i 'dod pa skyes nas lha 
[\[252a.5\]]de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du khrid do/_/de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma 
[\[252a.6\]]stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de'i sems can rnams la zhe non pa'i sems gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas dga' ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas chos 
[\[252a.7\]]mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]rigs kyi bu rab 'byor gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_bden pa mthong nas de bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa 
[\[252b.2\]]dang /_'bad pas byams pa bsgom pas sems btul nas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can 
[\[252b.3\]]yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i 
[\[252b.4\]]sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi 
[\[252b.5\]]lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis skyes pa bsams pa 
[\[252b.6\]]dang /_des tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du klu las shi 'phos te klu 'ba' zhig tu skyes par mthong ngo /_/de nas de'i blo skyes pa/_bdag gis 'di ltar zhe sdang gi rkyen bsgrubs pa des na bdag tshe rabs lnga brgyar klu 'ba' zhig tu skyes te/_de kho na'i phyir sdug 
[\[252b.7\]]bsngal chen po myong bar gyur gyis/_da ni ci nas bdag la gzhan dag gi zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur zhing de dang ldan pas lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas de 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i lam yang dag par blangs te gnas so/_/de gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/_grong ngam/_yul lam/_ljongs su bsod snyoms kyi phyir gnas par 'dod pa de'i tshe/_thog ma kho nar spyod yul la lta bar byed 
[\[253a.2\]]de/_bdag mthong na tha na grog sbur yan chad su yang sna 'ga' zhig gi phyir sems sdang bar mi 'gyur grang snyam nas des spyod lam de btang ste gzhan du bsgyur nas/_des sems can de dag gi sems dga' bar gyur te/_de dgra bcom pa yin du zin kyang de 
[\[253a.3\]]lta bu'i nyam nga ba myong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi blo skyes pa/_ma la bdag gis da ni skye bo mang po la phan gdags so snyam mo/_/de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' lding lnga brgya sprul te/_de dag mthong nas klu rnams skrag cing dngangs te mi dga' 
[\[253a.4\]]nas phan tshun du ci bya gtol med par gyur to/_/de nas rab 'byor gyis yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yongs su bskyabs so/_/de nas de dag sems dga' bar gyur nas byams pa'i lung phog go/_/de nas yang klu chen po'i gzugs su sprul nas nam mkha' 
[\[253a.5\]]lding lnga brgya gtses te de dag kyang skrag nas byams pa'i lung phog ste/_des de ltar klu dang nam mkha' lding gi rigs lnga brgya lnga brgya btul to/_/de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 
[\[253a.6\]]slong nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_rigs kyi bu rab 'byor 'di yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[253a.7\]]gyis las gang dag bgyis na des nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i mchog tu bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rab 'byor nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_rab 'byor nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams 
[\[253b.2\]]ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_
[\[253b.3\]]skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 
[\[253b.4\]]dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul 
[\[253b.5\]]bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas der 'di rab 
[\[253b.6\]]tu byung ste/_'dis sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin nas lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems bskyed pa dang /_sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag ma 'ongs 
[\[253b.7\]]pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]yin pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa'i mchog tu gyur cig ces byas so/_/las gang dag gis klur skyes zhe na/_nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa dang /_dbang po rnams 'khrul ba dang /_las 
[\[254a.2\]]kyi lam rnams mthar thug par ma byas pa dang /_slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed nas sbrul gdug pa zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod de des na klur skyes so/_/des sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin nas tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs 
[\[254a.3\]]pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa'i mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig 
[\[254a.4\]]tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs 
[\[254a.5\]]la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 
[\[254a.6\]]la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_rgan po zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po 
[\[254a.7\]]rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i 
[\[254b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal 
[\[254b.3\]]bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas 
[\[254b.4\]]pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de de dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas bu ma byung bar re zhig na yang de nyid dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur 
[\[254b.5\]]spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las mngal na bu snga ma de 'dug bzhin du re zhig na ma'i ltor de'i bu snga phyir bcu byung yang bu dang po de ni mngal nyid na 'dug bzhin no/_/de nas re zhig na khyim bdag de'i chung ma de na bar gyur nas de la rtsa ba dang /_
[\[254b.6\]]sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas/_gang gi tshe de shi la thug pa'i nad kyis thebs te 'chir nye ba de'i tshe des khyim thab la smras pa/_jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'di'i 
[\[254b.7\]]nang na bdag gi bu dang po mchis kyis nam bdag gum pa na glo g.yas rol mtshon gyis dral te khye'u dang po nas mchis pa de phyung shig ces de skad smras nas/_bsags pa kun ni tha mar zad/_/mthon po rnams ni tha mar nyil/_/phrad pa rnams ni tha mar 'bral/_/
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]gson po rnams ni tha mar 'chi/_/zhes smras te shi'o/_/de nas de shi nas gos sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag gis khyogs brgyan te bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed bos so/_/rgyal 
[\[255a.2\]]po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog thag tu yang 'di ltar bud med che ge mo zhig la lo 'di snyed cig gi bar du bu mngal na 'dug 'dug ste/_de'i bu gzhan bcu byung yang thog ma'i bu mngal na 'dug pa de ma byung nas/_deng sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis shi ba de'i lta mtshon 
[\[255a.3\]]gyis dral te/_dang po'i khye'u mngal du 'dug pa de dbyung bar 'tshal lo zhes de skad du sgra grag go/_/sgra grag nas kyang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dang rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du ltad mo la 'dus so/_/de nas 
[\[255a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das dur khrod rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis khyed las gang rmad du byung ba lta 'dod pa de dag gshegs shig ces bsgo shig_/
[\[255a.5\]]de nas re zhig na bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams kyis 
[\[255a.6\]]zhabs 'bring byas te bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so/_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das mthong nas go phye'o/_/de nas sman pa 'tsho byed kyis bud med de'i glo g.yas pa dral to/_/de nas khye'u de rang byung nas skra dkar zhing yan lag gnyer 
[\[255a.7\]]mas gang ba/_lus kyi phyogs cha rnams rgan shar gyur pa/_dbang po rnyis pa/_rid de ba/_nyam stobs chung ngu zhig byung ngo /_/de nas byung ma thag tu skye bo'i tshogs de dag la bltas nas tshig tu smras pa/_kye bla ma rnams sam/_bla ma lta bu rnams sam/_pha ma'am/_mkhan 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]po'am/_slob dpon rnams la tshig rtsub po ma zer cig_/ji ltar bdag ma'i ltor pho ba dang long ka gnyis kyi bar du lo drug cu 'dug 'dug pa de lta bu'i nyams myong bar gyur ta re zhes smras nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 
[\[255b.2\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ltar srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can gyis kyang nyams 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur gyis srid par skye ba thams cad kyis chog par gyis shig_/srid par skye ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis chog par gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[255b.3\]]kyis khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/_khye'u khyod rgan po yin nam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgan po lags so/_/khye'u khyod rgan po yin nam/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni rgan po lags so/_/de nas gzhi de las de'i ming rgan po zhes btags so/_/
[\[255b.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/_de thos nas des sems can brgya phrag mang po skyo bar gyur nas khyad par chen po thob bo/_/rgan po de yang lo bcu'i bar du khyim pa'i gnas na 'dug 'dug nas lo bdun cu lon te bcom 
[\[255b.5\]]ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong nyi shu rtsa lnga dang thabs cig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/de nas der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so so skye bor 'dug bzhin du gang gis kyang skabs dbye bar mi bya'o zhes 
[\[255b.6\]]khrims bcas so/_/de nas re zhig na zla ba gsum lon pa dang dge slong nyi shu rtsa bzhis dgra bcom pa nyid thob na rgan po gcig pu so so skye bo'i so na 'dug go/_/de nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis skabs 'byed pa byed pa'i nang du shin tu mang du brgyad bkag nas 
[\[255b.7\]]tshogs kyi nang nas bskrad de btang ngo /_/de nas des mtshon cha blangs te khang phugs su zhugs nas ngu zhing rnam pa du mar smre sngags bton te smras pa/_nags tshal thams cad 'bar gyur te/_/ri rnams ser por gyur zin na/_/'on kyang da dung sdig pa'i sems/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]rnam par grol bar ma gyur to/_/phu chu dag gi sgra yang zhi/_/'bab chu dag kyang bri bzhin du/_/'on kyang da dung sdig pa'i sems/_/rnam par grol bar ma gyur to/_/sgo nga las skyes bya 'di dag_/sgra skad gcam yang chung gyur na/_/'on kyang da 
[\[256a.2\]]dung sdig pa'i sems/_/rnam par grol bar ma gyur to/_/nags tshal 'di dag lo ma ser/_/shing rnams 'dab ma lhags gyur na/_/'on kyang da dung sdig pa'i sems/_/rnam par grol bar ma gyur to/_/lung 'bogs pa yi gnas brtan rnams/_/phyogs phyogs 
[\[256a.3\]]dag tu dong zin na/_/'on kyang da dung sdig pa'i sems/_/rnam par grol bar ma gyur to/_/so so skye bor 'dug bzhin du/_/ston pa'i thad du ji ltar 'gro/_/don med gson pa ci dgos kyis/_/bdag ni mtshon gyis lcebs te btang zhes zer ro/_/de'i skabs su sangs 
[\[256a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa dang 
[\[256a.5\]]ldan pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong la gnas pa/_rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi 
[\[256a.6\]]las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam 
[\[256a.7\]]par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus 
[\[256b.2\]]gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan 
[\[256b.3\]]song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa 
[\[256b.4\]]las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam 
[\[256b.5\]]du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/'dir smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas re zhig na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[256b.6\]]kyis dgongs te rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang de'i thad du gshegs nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas tshe dang ldan pa rgan pos phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_
[\[256b.7\]]rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_
[\[257a.2\]]chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas rgan pos dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas bdag gis kyang gdul bar bya ba 'ga' lta yod dam snyam du bsams pa dang /_
[\[257a.3\]]des tshong pa lnga brgya tsam rgya mtsho'i nang na srin po nag po'i rlung gis bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas sdug bsngal dang phrad pa 'di dag bdag gis sdug bsngal de las yongs su bskyab par bya'o/_/'on tang de dag bdag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas rgan po rdzu 
[\[257a.4\]]'phrul gyis song nas 'jigs pa de las yongs su bskyabs so/_/de nas de dag dad pa skyes te thams cad rab tu byung nas de dag la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/_de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs 
[\[257a.5\]]nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas de dag gi yon tan rnams sus kyang mi shes nas drug sde rnams 'phya bar gyur te/_rgan blun du 'dug la mi lnga brgya dang lhan cig 'khod cing drung du bzhag pas 'di dag kyang de dang 'dra bar dul bar mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dzer 
[\[257a.6\]]to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mnyes gshin pa/_gzhan la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pas/_tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gleng bar 'dod nas/_tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgan po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang 
[\[257a.7\]]ldan pa gnas brtan rgan po dang lhan cig tu mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'dres nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]gnas brtan rgan po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te dris nas dri ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgan po la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig 'dri'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dris shig dang thos nas khyod la bsnyad par bya'o/_/tshe dang 
[\[257b.2\]]ldan pa gnas brtan [\u0f92]na po dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_shing drung na gnas pa dang /_khang stong na gnas pas chos gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_shing drung na gnas pa 
[\[257b.3\]]dang /_khang stong na gnas pas chos gnyis rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya ste/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ngo /_/gnas brtan zhi gnas kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas don gang dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_lhag mthong kun du bsten 
[\[257b.4\]]cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas don gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zhi gnas kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni lhag mthong la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/lhag mthong kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang 
[\[257b.5\]]du byas pas ni zhi gnas la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su bsgoms pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems ni khams kyi sgo nas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas 
[\[257b.6\]]brtan khams rnams gang dag yin/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo spong ba'i khams gang yin pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams gang yin pa dang /_'gog pa'i khams gang yin pa'o/_/gnas brtan gang spangs pa la spong ba'i khams zhes bya/_
[\[257b.7\]]gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya/_gang 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'du byed thams cad spangs pa la spong ba'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'du byed thams cad las 'dod chags 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'du byed thams cad 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gnas brtan rgan pos bshad pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas dge slong 
[\[258a.2\]]lnga brgya po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_dge slong lnga brgya po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_shing drung na gnas pa dang /_khang stong na gnas pas chos gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[258a.3\]]kun dga' bo dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_shing drung na gnas pa dang /_khang stong na gnas pas chos gnyis rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya ste zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dag zhi gnas kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas don 
[\[258a.4\]]gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_lhag mthong kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas don gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zhi gnas kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni lhag mthong la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[258a.5\]]lhag mthong kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni zhi gnas la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su bsgoms pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems ni khams kyi sgo nas rnam par grol bar 'gyur 
[\[258a.6\]]ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khams rnams gang dag yin/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo spong ba'i khams gang yin pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams gang yin pa dang /_'gog pa'i khams gang yin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gang spangs pa la spong ba'i 
[\[258a.7\]]khams zhes bya/_gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya/_gang 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'du byed thams cad spangs pa la spong ba'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'du byed thams cad 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'du byed thams cad 'gags pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong lnga brgya po rnams kyis bshad pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas 
[\[258b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa dge 
[\[258b.3\]]slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_shing drung na gnas pa dang /_khang stong na gnas pas chos gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bgyi/_kun dga' bo dge slong dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_shing drung na gnas pa dang /_khang stong na gnas pas chos gnyis 
[\[258b.4\]]rgyun mi 'chad par yid la bya ste/_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong ngo /_/btsun pa zhi gnas kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas don gang nyams su myong bar 'gyur lags/_lhag mthong kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du bgyis pas don gang nyams 
[\[258b.5\]]su myong bar 'gyur lags/_kun dga' bo zhi gnas kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni lhag mthong la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/lhag mthong kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ni zhi gnas la brten te rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[258b.6\]]kun dga' bo zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su bsgoms pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems ni khams kyi sgo nas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa khams rnams gang dag lags/_kun dga' bo spong ba'i khams gang yin pa dang /_
[\[258b.7\]]'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams gang yin pa dang /_'gog pa'i khams gang yin pa'o/_/btsun pa gang spangs pa la spong ba'i khams zhes bgyi/_gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bgyi/_gang 'gags pa la 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]'gog pa'i khams zhes bgyi/_kun dga' bo 'du byed thams cad spangs pa la spong ba'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'du byed thams cad las 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams zhes bya'o/_/'du byed thams cad 'gags 
[\[259a.2\]]pa la 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa ston pa dang nyan thos rnams 'di lta ste/_tshig gi mchog gis 'di kho na ltar don dang don du 'thun zhing 'dra ba dang /_tshig dang tshig tu 'thun zhing 'dra ba dang /_yi ge dang yi ger 'thun zhing 'dra ba ni ngo mtshar 
[\[259a.3\]]lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa 'dir bdag gnas brtan dge slong rgan po ga la ba der mchis nas/_gnas brtan dge slong rgan po la don 'di nyid tshig 'di rnams dang /_yi ge 'di rnams kyis smras na yang /_de ltar bcom ldan 'das 
[\[259a.4\]]kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa kho na bzhin du des bdag la don 'di nyid tshig 'di rnams dang /_yi ge 'di rnams kyis smras pa'i lan btab ste/_bdag gnas brtan dge slong rgan pos bshad pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/_dge slong lnga brgya po 
[\[259a.5\]]rnams ga la ba der mchis te/_dge slong lnga brgya po rnams la don 'di nyid tshig 'di rnams dang /_yi ge 'di rnams kyis smras na yang /_da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa kho na bzhin du de dag gis kyang bdag la don 'di nyid tshig 'di 
[\[259a.6\]]rnams dang /_yi ge 'di rnams kyis smras pa'i lan btab ste/_btsun pa ston pa dang nyan thos rnams 'di lta ste/_tshig gi mchog gis 'di kho na ltar don dang don du 'thun zhing 'dra ba dang /_tshig dang tshig tu 'thun zhing 'dra ba dang /_yi ge dang yi ger 'thun zhing 'dra 
[\[259a.7\]]ba de ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong rgan po su yin shes sam/_gsol pa btsun pa dge slong rgan po ni dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba lags so/_/dge slong lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang 
[\[259b.2\]]gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag lags so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rgan po dang /_dge slong lnga brgya po 
[\[259b.3\]]de dag glengs shing bsgrags pa de'i tshe dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rgan pos las gang dag bgyis na des lo drug cu'i bar du ma'i lto na mchis par gyur lags/_btsun pa las gang dag 
[\[259b.4\]]bgyis na des yid rtul bar gyur la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgan po nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 
[\[259b.5\]]'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_rgan po nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i 
[\[259b.6\]]khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 
[\[259b.7\]]'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang 
[\[260a.2\]]mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig gnas brtan zhig las rab tu byung ngo /_/gnas brtan de ni dgra 
[\[260a.3\]]bcom pa 'dod chags spangs pa zhig go/_/de nas re zhig na yul der dus ston zhig byung nas dge slong gzhon nu des gnas brtan de bslang ste/_bzhengs la spyod yul gyi grong du bzhud do zhes byas so/_/gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_bu da dung sngas kyis re zhig song 
[\[260a.4\]]la dge ba'i phyogs gyis shig_/lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong gzhon nu des gnas brtan de bslang ste/_bzhengs la spyod yul gyi grong du bzhud ces byas na yang lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du gnas brtan gyis bu da dung sngas kyis song la dge ba'i 
[\[260a.5\]]phyogs gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas dge slong gzhon nu lto 'dun can des ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/_khyod lo drug cu'i bar du yang khyim nas ma byung shig_/nga ni song zin no zhes byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam 
[\[260a.6\]]du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong rgan po 'di yin te/_des dgra bcom pa la sems sdang bar byas nas ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni lo drug cu'i bar du ma'i lta na 'dug 'dug go/_/
[\[260a.7\]]gzhan yang sngon chos la ser sna byas pa des ni shes rab 'chal par gyur to/_dbang po rnams tshegs chen pos yongs su smin par gyur to/_/des der bslabs pa dang /_kha ton byas pa dang /_phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de bas 
[\[260b.2\]]na ngag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/_ci nas rgan po de so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i tshe'i nyes pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya'o/_/de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu ni thob par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[260b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//lag pa can zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams 
[\[260b.4\]]dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye 
[\[260b.5\]]chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[260b.6\]]bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[260b.7\]]gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug 
[\[261a.2\]]la mdzes pa/_mdog bzang ba/_gser gyi kha dog can/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas des rang gi lag pa bzung ste/_'o byed cing mthang la 'jor bar byed la 'khyud par byed de 
[\[261a.3\]]tshig tu smras pa/_kye ma bdag gi lag gu gnyis shin tu yun ring mo zhig nas gdod rnyed do/_/kye ma bdag gi lag gu gnyis shin tu yun ring mo zhig nas gdod rnyed do zhes zer ro/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes 
[\[261a.4\]]ming 'dogs par byed de/_de'i nye du rnams na re 'di btsas ma thag tu lag pa bzung ste 'o byed cing mthang la 'jor la 'khyud par byed pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming lag pa can zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u lag pa can pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis 
[\[261a.5\]]dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad 
[\[261a.6\]]kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe yul der 'jigs pa zhig byung ba de'i tshe skye bo'i tshogs 'jigs par gyur te phan tshun du ci bya gtol med nas rdzas rnams sbed par byed do/_/khye'u 
[\[261a.7\]]lag pa can ni lag pa gnyis sbed par byed de/_skye bo'i tshogs la yang 'di skad du/_kye yon gnas rnams la sems sdang bar ma byed cig_/tshig rtsub po ma zer cig_/kye bdag gi lag gu gnyis shin tu yun ring mo zhig nas gdod rnyed do zhes zer ro/_/de nas 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]phyi zhig na khye'u lag pa can rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma 
[\[261b.2\]]stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas te/_dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 
[\[261b.3\]]'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas lag pa can gyis 
[\[261b.4\]]'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad 
[\[261b.5\]]pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra 
[\[261b.6\]]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas 
[\[261b.7\]]sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i snyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur kyang de bzhin du dge slong rnams la chos ston te/_kye yon gnas rnams la sems sdang bar ma byed cig_/tshig rtsub po ma zer cig_/kye ma bdag gi lag gu gnyis 
[\[262a.2\]]shin tu yun ring mo zhig nas gdod rnyed do zhes zer ro/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lag pa can gyis las gang dag bgyis shing bsags na des dgra bcom pa nyid thob 
[\[262a.3\]]lags na yang de bzhin du kye ma bdag gi lag gu gnyis shin tu yun ring mo zhig nas gdod rnyed do zhes mchi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang dag 'di ni las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba yin no/_/des ci las 
[\[262a.4\]]bsams te de skad zer ba khyed nyan par 'dod dam/_btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lags so/_/dge slong dag lag pa can nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las 
[\[262a.5\]]de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_lag pa can nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i 
[\[262a.6\]]khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus 
[\[262a.7\]]can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 
[\[262b.2\]]zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/re zhig na de na dge slong gnyis shig mdza' zhing 'dug ste/_de'i nang na gcig ni dgra bcom pa yang yin la mang du thos pa yang yin no/_/cig shos 
[\[262b.3\]]ni so so'i skye bo yang yin la thos pa yang nyung ngo /_/de la dgra bcom pa mang du thos pa de ni kun gyis shes pa/_bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_g.yar 
[\[262b.4\]]'dren pa mang du rnyed pa zhig ste/_gang du g.yar drangs pa der des dge slong mdza' bo de phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du khrid do/_/re zhig na nyi ma gcig cig dgra bcom pa de yang g.yar drangs te 'gro bar chad pa las phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong de btsal na ma rnyed do/_/
[\[262b.5\]]de nas de mi snang nas des dge slong gzhan zhig khrid pa dang /_re zhig na der dge slong gzhon nu sems rgod pa dag gis 'di skad ces smras te/_btsun pa dag gzigs dang /_des phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong 'di yang deng ma khrid de gzhan khrid do zhes byas so/_/
[\[262b.6\]]de nas de khros te dgra bcom pa la sems sdang bar byas nas ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/_bdag gis phyin cad de'i lhung bzed bkrus su zin na bdag gi lag pa 'di gnyis med par gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[262b.7\]]ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong mdza' bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni lag pa can 'di yin te/_des dgra bcom pa la sems sdang bar byas te ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar lag pa med par gyur to/_/phyis snying nas 'gyod 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]pa skyes te nyes pa la nyes so zhes 'thol zhing bshags te rnam par phye zhing bsal bar byas pa des ni lag pa thob par gyur to/_/des der bslabs pa dang /_kha ton du byas pa dang /_phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched 
[\[263a.2\]]la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig 
[\[263a.3\]]tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa 
[\[263a.4\]]rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[263a.5\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'de gus gsos zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded 
[\[263a.6\]]dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha 
[\[263a.7\]]dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze phyug cing nor mang 
[\[263b.2\]]la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod 
[\[263b.3\]]do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u mdog ngan pa/_blta na mi sdug pa/_byad ngan pa zhig btsas te/_de btsas ma thag tu de'i ma'i nu ma gnyis la 'o ma med par gyur 
[\[263b.4\]]to/_/re zhig na bram ze des de'i ma ma gzhan zhig bkug na de'i 'o ma yang khye'u de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas med par gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe de'i phyir 'o ma 'byung ba'i thabs sbyar ba thams cad las kyang 'o ma mi 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe de 'de gus gsos nas de'i 
[\[263b.5\]]ming 'de gus gsos 'de gus gsos zhes bya bar btags so/_/de bsod nams chung bar grags shing bsod nams chung ba zhig ste gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe lto gang yang mi rnyed do/_/de nas des dge slong sham thabs legs par gyon pa/_gos legs par 
[\[263b.6\]]bgos pa dag lhung bzed bung ba'i mdog ltar gnag pa thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la 'gro la/_de dag kyang lag pa yang bkang /_lhung bzed kyang bkang ste phyir byung ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung 
[\[263b.7\]]bar 'dod par gyur nas des pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung yang lto gang yang mi rnyed nas de skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_
[\[264a.2\]]dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[264a.3\]]shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas phyis re zhig na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[264a.4\]]kyi dri gtsang khang 'phyag pa la zhugs te/_des de phyags nas sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/de nas des bsod snyoms bzang po mang po dag rnyed de/_des de'i dbang po rnams dang 'byung ba chen po rnams tshim 
[\[264a.5\]]par gyur to/_/de nas de dbang po tshim par gyur nas bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_snyoms par zhugs pa rnams kyis mtshan rangs par 'das par byas so/_/de nas de'i blo skyes pa/_ma la thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig gis bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[264a.6\]]la gsol ba gdab bo snyam mo/_/de nas des dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la gsol ba btab pa/_btsun pa dag bdag ni bsod nams chung ste/_gang gi tshe dri gtsang khang du phyag dar bgyis nas bsod snyoms la mchis pa de'i tshe gdod 'drangs par gyur te/_de bas 
[\[264a.7\]]na bdag la dge 'dun gyis thugs brtse bar mdzod la gzhan sus kyang dri gtsang khang du phyag dar mi mdzad par gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang du sus kyang phyag dar mi bya'o zhes dge 'dun gyis khrims bcas nas des bag yangs su dri gtsang 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]khang phyags pa'i 'og tu mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la 'gro bar byed do/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang 'khor lnga brgya dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbyar gnas par dam bcas nas mnyan du yod par lhags te ston pa la gus pa bskyed nas dri gtsang khang du 
[\[264b.2\]]phyag dar byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'de gus gsos kyis tshor nas des smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod kyis dri gtsang khang du phyag dar byas pa ni bdag gi ltor bsnun par bas so/_/gnas brtan gyis smras pa ci nyes/_'de gus gsos kyis smras pa/_gnas 
[\[264b.3\]]brtan gang gi tshe bdag gis dri gtsang khang du phyag dar ma byas pa de'i tshe bdag gis bsod snyoms mi rnyed do/_/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/_gal te de lta na bdag ga zhig tu g.yar drangs kyis khyod snying ma chung shig dang /_bdag gis der khyod la kha 
[\[264b.4\]]zas sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa'i spyan 'dren 'ongs nas 'de gus gsos kyang de dag dang lhan cig tu chas so/_/de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag de'i sgo dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa de'i tshe 'de gus gsos kyi las kyi rnam 
[\[264b.5\]]par smin pas khyim der thab mo chen po byung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'de gus gsos 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bsod nams chung ba'i phyir thab mo byung ngo snyam mo/_/de nas phyir log ste gtsug lag khang du song nas smyung bar 'dug go/_/de nas phyi de nyin 
[\[264b.6\]]par tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_khyod ci'i phyir ma 'ongs/_des smras pa/_bdag bsod nams chung ba'i phyir der thab mo ji ltar byung ba gnas brtan gyis mi mkhyen tam/_de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus de'i nyin par mdun du bcug ste/_khyim de'i 
[\[264b.7\]]nang du song nas dge 'dun gyi khrod du 'dug na yang /_g.yas g.yos su ni kha zas brims la de la ni 'drim pa'i mis kyang brjed nas de dge 'dun gyi khrod de kho nar lan gnyis su smyung bar gyur to/_/de nas re zhig na gtam de gnas brtan kun dga' bos thos so/_/
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]thos nas kyang 'de gus gsos la smras pa/_'o na khyod rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di nyid du 'dug shig dang bdag gis kha[\u0f7c]da kyi zas khyer te 'ong ngo zhes byas so/_/gnas brtan kun dga' bo ni bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi phung po brgyad khri lobs pa dang 
[\[265a.2\]]dge slong gzhan dag las nyi khri lobs pa de lta bu'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin na/_'de gus gsos kyi las kyi sgrib pas gnas brtan kun dga' bos kyang brjed par gyur te der yang de lan gsum smyung bar gyur to/_/de nas zhag bzhi lon pa'i tshe gnas brtan kun dga' bos 
[\[265a.3\]]bsgrims te bsod snyoms byin na/_de yang phyir 'gro ba'i tshe khyi rnams kyis phrogs te der yang de lan bzhi smyung bar gyur to/_/de nas zhag lnga lon pa'i tshe gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos thos nas 'de gus gsos kyi phyir bsod snyoms blangs nas rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang /_
[\[265a.4\]]'de gus gsos kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi 'dab lcag gis bsnun nas rgya mtsho'i nang du bor te der yang de lan lnga smyung bar gyur to/_/de nas zhag drug lon pa'i tshe gnas brtan shA ri'i bus thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag 
[\[265a.5\]]kho nas 'de gus gsos kyi bsod snyoms blang gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus de'i bsod snyoms blangs nas khyim de nyid du mi snang bar byas te 'de gus gsos kyi gnas khang gi sgor 'ongs so/_/de nas 'de gus gsos kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas 
[\[265a.6\]]sgo de yang brag gis 'khor bar gyur to/_/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul gyis sgo dbye'o snyam nas lhung bzed de sa la bzhag pa dang /_de yang 'de gus gsos kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas thur du dpag tshad brgyad khri'i 'og na gser gyi sa gzhi yod pa'i steng 
[\[265a.7\]]du song nas/_de las kyang gnas brtan shA ri'i bus rdzu 'phrul gyis phyung nas zas de khar gzhug go snyam ste zas de khar bcug na de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas kha de med par phyi la bor bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'de gus gsos la skal ba med par 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]shes nas skyo bar gyur te/_/der yang btsun pa de lan drug smyung bar gyur to/_/de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin par tshe dang ldan pa 'de gus gsos kyis sems can rnams skyo ba bskyed pa dang /_las rnams chud mi za bar bstan pa dang /_las kyi stobs gleng ba'i phyir lhung 
[\[265b.2\]]bzed thal bas bkang ste/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas chu dang bskyos te 'thungs nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas skyo bar gyur 
[\[265b.3\]]te de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas so/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa 'de gus gsos kyis las gang dag bgyis na des dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur kyang zhag drug 
[\[265b.4\]]smyung bar gyur nas zhag bdun pa'i gdugs la phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'de gus gsos nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing 
[\[265b.5\]]rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_'de gus gsos nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas 
[\[265b.6\]]shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams 
[\[265b.7\]]dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]khyer bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag cig gi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba zhig 'dug pa de rgyun mi 'chad par dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa dang /_slong ba rnams la sbyin pa dag byed do/_/phyis de'i 
[\[266a.2\]]khyim thab shi nas re zhig na de'i bu bdag gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to/_/de yang ser sna can/_'jungs pa/_yo byad la kun tu 'dzin pa/_khwa la yang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/_de dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa dang /_slong ba 
[\[266a.3\]]rnams mthong na sems sdang bar byed do/_/de'i ma ni sngon gyi lugs bzhin du dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug cing phongs pa dang /_slong ba rnams la sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do/_/de nas de'i bu ser snas non pa des smras pa/_yum bdag 
[\[266a.4\]]ma dad kyis sbyin pa ma sbyin cig_/des smras pa/_bu gcig khyim 'di na khyim gyi lugs kyis de yin no/_/de nas des logs shig tu zan phog ste bzhag na 'on kyang de zan gyi phyed ni sbyin par byed do/_/phyed ni bdag nyid za'o/_/de nas ser snas non cing khro bas bsgribs pa'i blo 
[\[266a.5\]]can des yang dang yang du bkag ste/_thabs ji lta bus bkag kyang de dgag ma nus nas ma la smras pa/_yum bgyi ba zhig mchis kyis khyim gyi phug tu bzhud cig_/de nas rang bzhin gyis drang ba de khyim gyi phug tu song ngo /_/de nas des sgo bcad de nyi ma gcig zan bcad 
[\[266a.6\]]nas des smras pa/_bu bdag bkres so/_/de nas des tshig rtsub po smras te thal ba 'gom cig ces byas so/_/de nas re zhig na nyam nga zhing mi bde la gnod pa dang phrad pa des snying rje rje skad du khus btab kyang zhag drug gi bar smyung du bcug ste ma btang nas shi'o/_/'on kyang ser 
[\[266a.7\]]snas bsgribs pa de ma dang bral ba la 'gyod pa med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gi bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'de gus gsos 'di yin te/_des ma la gnod pa byas pa'i las de'i 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]rnam par smin pas bskal pa gcig gi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/_/rgyu de kho nas da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas kyang smyung bar gyur te thal ba zos nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/dge slong dag 'de gus gsos kyis ni las gzhan 
[\[266b.2\]]dag kyang byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na bram ze lha la rten pa bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_skye bo thams cad kyis kun du bkur sti bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mo bya ba dang /_mchod 
[\[266b.3\]]cing bkur ba zhig yod do/_/chos nyid kyis na sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_re zhig 
[\[266b.4\]]na rang sangs rgyas gcig cig bA rA Na sI na bsod snyoms la song ba dang /_de der lag pa yang bkang /_lhung bzed kyang bkang ste phyir byung ba bram ze des mthong nas/_de ser sna skyes te lhung bzed bltas tshur khyer shog ces byas so/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ma 
[\[266b.5\]]bsams par shes pa mi 'jug ste btsun pa des bstan to/_/de nas des sa la pho nas rkang pas bsnun to/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas de smyung bar 'dug kyang bram ze de 'gyod pa ma skyes so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de 
[\[266b.6\]]ni 'de gus gsos 'di yin no/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/_des der tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam 
[\[266b.7\]]par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi 
[\[267a.2\]]rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'khor ba zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_
