[\[267a.3\]]ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_
[\[267a.4\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun 
[\[267a.5\]]gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 
[\[267a.6\]]'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu 
[\[267a.7\]]chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/_de btsas ma thag tu khyim gyi mi rnams la bltas nas tshig tu smras pa/_kye ma 'khor ba ni sdug bsngal 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]ba'o/_/'khor ba ni mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'o zhes smras nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re 'di btsas ma thag tu 'khor ba 'khor ba zhes sgrogs pas na de'i 
[\[267b.2\]]phyir khye'u 'di'i ming 'khor ba zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u 'khor ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_
[\[267b.3\]]zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de mthar gyis cher skyes pa dang /_de rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pas skye bo'i tshogs la 
[\[267b.4\]]chos ston te/_kye bla ma rnams dang /_bla ma lta bu rnams dang /_pha ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon rnams la tshig rtsub po ma zer cig_/'khor ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/'khor ba ni mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas phyis re zhig na phan tshun du 'khyam du song 
[\[267b.5\]]song ba las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin nas/_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' 
[\[267b.6\]]ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/_/de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom 
[\[267b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/_de thos nas khye'u 'khor ba 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te pha ma la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs 
[\[268a.2\]]pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas 
[\[268a.3\]]sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/
[\[268a.4\]]de dgra bcom par gyur kyang dge slong rnams la chos ston te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bla ma rnams dang /_bla ma lta bu rnams dang /_pha ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon rnams la tshig rtsub po ma zer cig_/'khor ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/'khor ba ni mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'o zhes zer 
[\[268a.5\]]ro/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa 'khor bas las gang dag bgyis na des tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du ma'i lto nas gum pa'i ro byung la/_rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_
[\[268a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'khor ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_'khor ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags 
[\[268a.7\]]pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong 
[\[268b.2\]]dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba 
[\[268b.3\]]bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig gnas brtan zhig las rab tu byung ngo /_/
[\[268b.4\]]gnas brtan de ni dgra bcom pa 'dod chags spangs pa zhig go/_/de nas re zhig na yul der dus ston zhig byung ngo /_/de nas dge slong gzhon nu des gnas brtan de bslang ste/_bzhengs la spyod yul gyi grong du bzhud do zhes byas so/_/gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_bu da dung sngas kyis re zhig 
[\[268b.5\]]song la dge ba'i phyogs gyis shig_/lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong gzhon nu des gnas brtan de bslang ste bzhengs la spyod yul gyi grong du bzhud ces byas na yang /_lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du gnas brtan gyis/_bu da dung sngas kyis song la dge ba'i phyogs gyis shig ces 
[\[268b.6\]]byas so/_/de nas dge slong gzhon nu lto 'dun can des ngag gi las rtsub pos smras te/_khyod tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du yang gson por khyim nas phyir ma byung shig_/nga ni song zin no zhes byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[268b.7\]]dge slong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin te/_des dgra bcom pa la sems sdang bar byas nas tshig rtsub po smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du ma'i lto nas shi ba'i ro byung nas/_da ltar mir skyes te de dran nas 'khor ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/'khor ba ni 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'o zhes zer ba yin no/_/de 'gyod pa skyes te gnas brtan la nyes pa bshags pa dang tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam 
[\[269a.2\]]par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag 
[\[269a.3\]]pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[269a.4\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/_/bam po nyi shu gnyis pa ste tha ma/_sbed pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho 
[\[269a.5\]]brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_
[\[269a.6\]]ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_
[\[269a.7\]]gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgya skegs kyi rna ba can 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]gyis spyan drangs te/_yul slo ma can gyi skye bo mang po gdul bar bya ba rnams dad par mdzad pa de'i tshe yul slo ma can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun la 'bab ste/_'khod do/_/de'i tshe yul slo ma can na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang 
[\[269b.2\]]la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' 
[\[269b.3\]]mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u zhig btsas nas btsas ma thag tu de'i lus thams cad phol mig gis zhu lub tu khyab par 'dug ste/_gang gi tshe phol mig de dag rdol ba de'i tshe sha snag bu phyil por gyur te/_de'i lus las 
[\[269b.4\]]rnag khrag 'dzag cing dri shin tu mnam pa 'byung ngo /_/de nas de'i phas dbang phyug gi stobs kyi shugs kyis nor dang /_sngags dang /_sman dang /_g.yog dang ldan par bdag nyid kyis gsos na/_'on kyang las kyi stobs kyi shugs thob pas nad de zhi bar ma gyur te lus thams cad de lta bur 
[\[269b.5\]]gyur nas ngo tsha ste gos kyis sbed par byed pas na de'i ming sbed pa zhes btags so/_/de nas re zhig na khye'u sbed pa cher skyes nas de'i grogs po na zla rnams mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer slo ma can du dong dong ba de dag gis de'i pha la smras pa/_yab gal te 'di mnyan du yod par khrid na ni de na sman pa dang /_
[\[269b.6\]]sman la sogs pa mchis te mod pas nad de las gso nus so zhes byas so/_/de nas de'i phas tshig de mnyan nas rin po che mang po dang /_g.yog rnams byin te mnyan du yod par btang nas de mthar gyis grogs po na zla rnams dang mnyan du yod par phyin na de na sman pa dang /_nor dang /_sman dang /_
[\[269b.7\]]g.yog kyang mang du yod mod kyi/_de'i las las skyes pa'i nad de gso ma nus so/_/de nas phyis re zhig na de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/_de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/_/de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 
[\[270a.2\]]'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas nye 
[\[270a.3\]]bar len pa'i phung po lnga nad dang /_phol mig dang /_zug rngu dang /_sdig pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba yin par rtogs te/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol 
[\[270a.4\]]mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/
[\[270a.5\]]dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes 
[\[270a.6\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de'i grogs po na zla de dag kyang skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis rab tu 
[\[270a.7\]]byung nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can ni gang yin/_'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa ni gang yin/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gzugs ni 'jig pa'i chos 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]can yin no/_/de 'gags pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can yin no/_/de 'gags pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can ma 
[\[270b.2\]]yin pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rtag pa yin nam/_'on te mi rtag pa yin/_tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa de ni mi rtag pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam/_'on te sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa de ni 
[\[270b.3\]]sdug bsngal ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ci mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi'o/_/'di ni bdag go/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no snyam du bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur 
[\[270b.4\]]ram/_tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa de ni ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa yin nam/_'on te mi rtag pa yin/_tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa de ni mi rtag pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag mi rtag pa gang 
[\[270b.5\]]yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam/_'on te sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ci mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos 'di snyam du 'di 
[\[270b.6\]]ni bdag gi'o/_/'di ni bdag go/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no snyam du bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ram/_tshe dang ldan pa sbed pa de ni ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de bas na gzugs ci yang rung ba 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'am/_phyi rol lam/_nang ngam/_
[\[270b.7\]]rags pa'am/_cha phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_bzang po'am/_thag ring ba'am/_nye ba yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no snyam du de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]blta bar bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams ci yang rung ba dang /_rnam par shes pa ci yang rung ba 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang ngam/_phyi rol lam/_rags pa'am/_cha phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_
[\[271a.2\]]bzang po'am/_thag ring ba'am/_nye ba yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag ma yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no snyam du de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de ltar 
[\[271a.3\]]lta ba'i thos pa dang ldan pa'i nyan thos ni gzugs las kyang skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las kyang skyo bar 'gyur te/_skyo na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[271a.4\]]rnam par grol ba na bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad zin to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so snyam du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba kho nar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na grogs po na zla de rnams chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med 
[\[271a.5\]]cing dri ma dang bral bas rnam par dag go/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sbed pas las gang dag bgyis na des de'i lus 'di lta bur mi sdug cing nad mang la dri nga bar gyur lags/_las gang dag 
[\[271a.6\]]bgyis na/_des blo rno zhing gsal bar gyur te rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sbed pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_
[\[271a.7\]]gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_sbed pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal 
[\[271b.2\]]pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa de tshong dpon gzhan zhig dang mi mdza' nas des rgyal po la nor mang po phul te gsol ba btab pa/_
[\[271b.3\]]lha tshong dpon 'dis nongs pa bgyis kyis 'di chad pas gcad cing tshar gcad par gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos gnang ste de nyid chad pas gcod du bcug go/_/de nas des bdag gi khyim du bkug nas lcag gis gzhus so/_/de nas lus las khrag byung nas dug drag 
[\[271b.4\]]po'i phye ma mang pos btab ste des de'i lus de sha snag bu bzhin du phyil por 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon de'i grogs po rnams kyis de la ji ltar byas pa thos nas de dag bsdongs te yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis nad de las sos par byas so/_/de nas de skyo bar gyur pa de kho nas 
[\[271b.5\]]khyim nas byung ste rab tu byung nas des slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgoms te rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas de'i sems skyes pa tshong dpon des ni bdag gi rgyud las bsod nams ma yin pa chen po bskyed kyis 
[\[271b.6\]]med na ma la bdag de'i thad du song la skyo ba bskyed par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas de'i mdun du song nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_cho 'phrul [\u0fa3]ma pa sna tshogs bstan to/_/so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed do/_/de sdong po rtsa ba nas 
[\[271b.7\]]bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das de la gsol ba btab pa/_yon gnas chen po mar gshegs/_khyod la bdag gis nongs pa bgyis kyis/_de yang khyod nyid las brten te 'byung bar bgyi'o zhes byas te/_des rang sangs rgyas de la 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]bzod pa gsol nas bshos gsol te na bza' phul nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag khros te khyod la nongs pa bgyis pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig bdag gis bkur sti bgyis pa 'dis ni yon tan 'di lta bu dag bdag gis thob par gyur cig_/
[\[272a.2\]]'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sbed pa 'di yin te las de'i 
[\[272a.3\]]mthus tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du lcag 'og tu shi'o/_/rgyu de kho nas da ltar yang lus 'di 'dra ba thob par gyur to/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la grogs po na zla rnams dang lhan cig tu rab tu byung ste/_der de dag gis tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra 
[\[272a.4\]]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[272a.5\]]'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[272a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//mi sdug pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po 
[\[272a.7\]]rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' 
[\[272b.2\]]dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul b+ha rga zhes bya ba 
[\[272b.3\]]na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/
[\[272b.4\]]de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u mi sdug pa'i sna grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas pha ma gnyis bu la chags te de gsos so/_/de nas gang gi tshe de mthar gyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe mi sdug 
[\[272b.5\]]pa'i phyir pha ma gnyis kyis khyim nas bskrad do/_/de gang dang gang du song ba de dang der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i phyir skye bo mang pos bskrad do/_/de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags rnams kyis kyang de la gzi brjid kyis brnyas par byed na mir gyur pa rnams kyis lta ci smos te/_de grong 
[\[272b.6\]]khyer gyi nang nas bskrad nas skyed mos tshal dung yag cig tu 'dug ste/_des res 'ga' ni 'bras bu dang rtsa ba rnyed na za bar byed do/_/res 'ga' 'bras bu dang rtsa ba ma rnyed na ni rtswa dang /_me tog dang /_lo ma dag gis 'tsho bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi sdug pa gdul 
[\[272b.7\]]ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas nyan thos chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag tshur sheg shig dang mi sdug pa gdul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po rnams kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_skyed mos tshal dung yag ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /_des bcom 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ldan 'das mthong nas ngo tsha ste phan tshun du bros so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar yang 'bros mi nus par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po rnams 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas 'gog pa las bzhengs te 
[\[273a.2\]]bdag nyid mi sdug par sprul to/_/sprul nas kyang kham phor kha zas kyis bkang ba bsnams te mi sdug pa'i thad du gshegs so/_/de nas mi sdug pas mthong ba dang dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/_grogs po chen po ga las 'ongs tshur shog_/bdag cag gnyis lhan cig tu 
[\[273a.3\]]'dug go zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la zas byin te dbang po tshim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi cha lugs su bsgyur to/_/de nas mi sdug pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas gsol pa/_da ni khyod byad gzugs bzang por gyur 
[\[273a.4\]]na las gang gi mthu las gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga la sems dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod de 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas des bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa de dag la sems 
[\[273a.5\]]dga' ba bskyed de/_des na de'i mi sdug pa med par gyur nas bzang por gyur te rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa mi sdug pas 
[\[273a.6\]]las gang dag bgyis na des 'di lta bur mdog ngan cing reg tu mi bzod pa dang mi sdug pa'i sna grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan par gyur la/_rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi sdug pa 
[\[273a.7\]]nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_mi sdug pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_
[\[273b.2\]]khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin 
[\[273b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal zhes bya ba 'jig 
[\[273b.4\]]rten du byung ste/_de phyi zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig na rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal gyis dgongs na/_de'i tshe nye bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dang /_byams pa'o/_/
[\[273b.5\]]de la byams pa ni rang gi rgyud yongs su smin par gyur la gdul bar bya ba rnams yongs su ma smin/_shAkya thub pa ni rang gi rgyud yongs su ma smin la gdul bar bya ba rnams ni yongs su smin par gzigs so/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal gyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[273b.6\]]shAkya thub pa'i rgyud yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gangs kyi ri'i steng du gshegs te rin po che'i brag phug tu zhugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dag gi phyir ri'i rgyal po gangs kyi steng du 
[\[273b.7\]]song ste/_de phan tshun song song ba las yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]ba/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/_de mthong ma thag tu des nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du rkang pa ya gcig gis 'greng ste tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa de lta bu'i sems rtse gcig tu bya ba thob ste/_skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dra'i 
[\[274a.2\]]dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul sa la med/_/'jig rten 'di na'ang yong gis med la rnam thos bu yi pho brang na yang med/_/lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang med la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med/_/ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas pa ma lus 
[\[274a.3\]]bskor kyang ga la yod/_/ces bstod do/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal gyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i rgyud yongs su smin par gzigs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/bram ze dam pa de ring du/_
[\[274a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs la legs bstod pa'i/_/stobs dang brtson 'grus rdzogs pa 'dis/_/bskal pa dgu zhig 'dums par gyur/_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de lha che bar grags pa rnams kyis zhabs 'bring byas te phug de'i nang na bzhugs pa dang phug de'i 
[\[274a.5\]]nang na gnas pa'i lha chung bar grags pa zhig yod pa des phug de'i nang du 'gro ma nus so/_/de nas des mig mi sdug par bsgyur te bcom ldan 'das la bsdigs so/_/des yun ring mo zhig tu bsdigs kyang bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa byed ma nus nas des dad pa rnyed de drang srong 'di 
[\[274a.6\]]ni bzang po zhig ste brtul zhugs grub pa zhig go snyam mo/_/de nas des lus rgyas par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol nas bshos kyang gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i 
[\[274a.7\]]dus na phug de na gnas pa'i lhar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mi sdug pa 'di yin te/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor bar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur la da ltar yang rgyu de kho nas mi sdug par gyur to/_/des phyis sems dga' ba bskyed pa des ni 'di'i mi sdug pa med par 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]gyur te bzang por gyur nas rab tu byung la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang

[\[274b.3\]]dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//gang gA pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams 
[\[274b.4\]]dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci 
[\[274b.5\]]rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[274b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na rten 
[\[274b.7\]]cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med nas de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te bsams pa/_bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang /_bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas 
[\[275a.2\]]bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_ltas mkhan dang /_mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig 
[\[275a.3\]]ces de la bsgo'o/_/de nas de bud med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir lha gu lang dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /_lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/_'di lta ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_
[\[275a.4\]]lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_chos 'thun pa pa dang /_rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs te/_'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro 
[\[275a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/_de yang de lta ni ma yin te/_gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las 
[\[275a.6\]]bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /_ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur 
[\[275a.7\]]byed cing 'dug la sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so/_/bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags pa yang shes la ma chags pa yang shes pa dang /_
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang /_bu chags pa shes pa dang /_gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang /_khye'u yang shes la bu mo yang shes pa ste/_gal te khye'u yin na ni lto g.yas logs su rten cing gnas so/_/gal te bu mo yin na ni lto g.yon logs su 
[\[275b.2\]]rten cing gnas so/_/de nas de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa/_jo bo bdag la sras chags te bdag gi rum g.yas logs su rten cing gnas pa las na khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas/_de yang dga' ches te ro stod ni bteg lag pa 
[\[275b.3\]]g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/_bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo /_/bdag gi bu rung bar gyur cig_/mi rung bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig_/gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog shig_/nor skal la spyod par shog shig/_
[\[275b.4\]]bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig_/bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste/_sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon bsngo bar shog 
[\[275b.5\]]shig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do/_/de nas bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/_grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang /_sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang /_ha 
[\[275b.6\]]cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /_ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te/_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa 
[\[275b.7\]]dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par bklubs te/_lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang /_khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]pa dang /_des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so/_/de nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas/_de btsas 
[\[276a.2\]]pa'i btsas ston byas te de'i ming gang gA pa zhes btags so/_/de nas khye'u gang ga pa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 
[\[276a.3\]]'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de yang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan te/_
[\[276a.4\]]khyim na gnas par mi dga' nas des pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab pa/_yab yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_/de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyi bu gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ma gnang ngo /_/de nas gang gA pa'i blo 
[\[276a.5\]]skyes pa/_mir skye ba 'thob pa ni rnyed par dka' ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba yang rnyed par dka' ba yin/_gzhan du na dbang po phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed par dka' ba yin na/_ma la bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i thabs ci yod 
[\[276a.6\]]snyam mo/_/de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag gis smon lam btab la bdag 'chi bar byas te/_ci nas mir skye ba thob nas shin du myur bar rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/des de ltar bsams nas dug 'thungs na yang ma shi'o/_/me'i nang du mchongs na yang ma shi/_
[\[276a.7\]]brag las mchongs na yang ma shi/_chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du mchongs na der yang ma shi nas de'i blo skyes pa/_bdag 'chi bar bya ba'i thabs gzhan ci yod snyam mo/_/de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la rgyal po ma skyes dgra de ni yong ye gtum zhing brlang la zhe rtsub cing gzu 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]lums can zhig yin gyis/_bdag de'i pho brang du song la mtshan mo khyim phugs gdab bo snyam ste/_de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du song nas nam sros te/_smag la bab pa na khyim 'bigs shing 'dug go/_/de nas srung ma rnams kyis gson por bzung nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra 
[\[276b.2\]]la phul te/_lha mi 'di ni rkun ma/_pho brang sun 'byin pa/_nongs pa bgyid pa lags te/_mtshan mo pho brang du khyim phugs btab lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas rgyal pos nyes pa byed byed pa'i phyir gsad par chad do/_/de nas gshed ma gos sngon po gyon pa/_ka ra bI 
[\[276b.3\]]ra'i me tog gi phreng ba mgul tu thogs pa/_lag na mtshon cha thogs pa rnams kyis khrid de lam po che dang /_srang dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_bsgrags pa'i gnas rnams su 'o dod bos te grong khyer gyi lho sgo nas phyir phyung nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur 
[\[276b.4\]]khrod du khrid do/_/de khrid pa na gshed ma de dag la smras pa/_kye rgyal po'i bka' 'gyur na mi rung gis rings par rab tu drongs shig ces zer ro/_/de nas gshed ma de rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal pos phyir bzlog ste dris pa/_kwa'i mi khyod 
[\[276b.5\]]ci'i phyir srog phangs pa yongs su gtong bar 'dod/_de nas des gtam de rgyas par rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra ka dam pa'i me tog bzhin du spu zing zhes byas te mchi mas brnang zhing ngu ba'i bzhin gyis kye ma 'di ltar 'di rab tu dbyung ba'i phyir srog 
[\[276b.6\]]phangs pa gtong bar 'bad pa las na 'di'i blo'i rgyud ni yongs su smin to/_/'khor ba'i nyes pa ni shin du rtogs so/_/dad pa phun sum tshogs pa ni legs par thob bo zhes dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod do/_/de nas rgyal pos dbugs phyung ste smras pa/_bu gcig 
[\[276b.7\]]nga ni khyod kyi srog la dbang gis da song la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung shig ces byas nas de rgyal pos btang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[277a.2\]]mngon sum du byas so/_/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_
[\[277a.3\]]rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/der bcom 
[\[277a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong dad pas rab tu byung ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_bA rA Na sI'i tshong dpon gyi bu gang ga pa 'di yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad 
[\[277a.5\]]gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gang gA pas las gang dag bgyis na de dag gi rnam par smin pas de'i lus la mes kyang mi tshugs/_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_chus kyang 'chi bar mi 'gyur la/_'dis dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur 
[\[277a.6\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang gA pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_gang gA pa 
[\[277a.7\]]nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs 
[\[277b.2\]]shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rigs ngan dur khrod kyi rdzas la rku ba zhig gnas pa des re zhig na 'gron po dag bcom ste rdzas thob pa dang /_de'i phyi bzhin du mi rgod dag gis 
[\[277b.3\]]bsnyags pa las re zhig na dur khrod kyis phyogs shig tu rang sangs rgyas shig 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa de'i mdun du rigs ngan dur khrod kyi rdzas la rku ba des rdzas de bor nas de nyid du yib bo/_/de nas mi rgod de dag gis rang sangs rgyas mthong nas bong rdo dag gis 
[\[277b.4\]]kyang bsnun/_mtshon gyis kyang btab/_mes kyang bsregs na 'on kyang de 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pas na des chos gos kyi grwa tsam yang bskyod ma nus so/_/de nas gang gi tshe mi rgod de dag ngal bar gyur te phyir dong ba de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas de khad kyis ting nge 
[\[277b.5\]]'dzin las langs so/_/de nas rigs ngan dur khrod kyi rdzas la rku ba des rang sangs rgyas de la bshos gsol nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig_/'di ji ltar gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa de bzhin du bdag kyang gang dang 
[\[277b.6\]]gang du skyes pa de dang der gzhan gyis mi tshugs par shog shig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de ji 
[\[277b.7\]]snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rigs ngan dur khrod kyi rdzas la rku bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gang ga pa 'di yin no/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab tu byung ste/_der 'dis tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[278a.2\]]las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar 
[\[278a.3\]]bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//sen [{]rings [,]ring [}]zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen 
[\[278a.4\]]po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_
[\[278a.5\]]lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[278a.6\]]ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 
[\[278a.7\]]rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe spang spos can gyi grong na bram ze rgyal zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des/_bram ze ma tha ra'i bu mo shA ri zhes bya ba thob nas gang gi tshe shA ri'i ltor shA ri'i bu zhugs pa de'i tshe bud med de ming po sen [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang gzhung gis brgyab na ming po chad pa la thug 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]par byed de/_de nas sen [{]rings kyi [,]ring gi [}]blo skyes pa/_'di'i ltor sems can bsod nams che bar grags pa zhig gis nying mtshams sbyar ba 'dra ste de'i mthu yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis snga nas phyogs 'ga' zhig la brten par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas sen [{]rings [,]ring [}]lho phyogs su song 
[\[278b.2\]]nas bstan bcos mang po bslabs so/_/de nas re zhig na mthar gyis shA ri'i bu btsas te/_des lo bcu drug lon pa dang /_dbang po'i brda sprod pa lobs nas gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar bcad do/_/de nas de mthar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/
[\[278b.3\]]de nas re zhig na kun du rgyu sen [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]mu stegs pa de dag thams cad tsha bos tshar bcad nas da ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma'i slob mar khas blangs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de shas cher chad pa'i 'du shes skyes la/_bstan bcos thams cad la yang mu thug pa med pa'i 'du 
[\[278b.4\]]shes skyes so/_/de nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog ston to/_/shA ri'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[278b.5\]]snga na bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas kun du rgyu sen [{]rings [,]ring [}]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_kun du rgyu sen [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]bcom ldan 'das zla ba tshes pa'i dbyibs lta bur 'khor gyis bskor cing bzhugs te chos ston pa 
[\[278b.6\]]dang shA ri'i bu yang bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma bdag ni thams cad mi 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_me'i cha lugs 
[\[278b.7\]]can gyi bu bdag ni thams cad mi 'dod do zhes lta ba gang yin pa 'di yang khyod mi 'dod dam/_kye gau ta ma bdag ni thams cad mi 'tshal zhes bgyi ba'i lta ba gang lags pa 'di yang bdag mi 'tshal lo/_/me'i cha lugs can gyi bu 'o na ni khyod de ltar shes shing de ltar lta bar gyur 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]na lta ba 'di yang spangs pa dang /_bor ba dang /_bstsal bar 'gyur la/_lta ba gzhan yang nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang /_len pa med pa dang /_'byung ba med par 'gyur ro/_/gau ta ma bdag ni de ltar shes shing de ltar lta bas na lta ba 'di yang spangs 
[\[279a.2\]]pa dang /_bor ba dang /_bstsal bar 'gyur la/_lta ba gzhan yang nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa dang /_'byung ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/me'i cha lugs can gyi bu 'o na ni khyod skye bo mang po dang 'thun par 'gyur zhing mtshungs par 'gyur te/_skye bo mang po yang 
[\[279a.3\]]de ltar lta zhing de skad smra bas na khyod kyang de kho na dang 'dra'o/_/me'i cha lugs can gyi bu dge sbyong ngam bram ze su yang rung ste/_lta ba de nges par spong la lta ba gzhan yang len par mi byed pa de dag ni 'jig rten na nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung zhes bya'o/_/me'i cha lugs can gyi bu lta ba'i 
[\[279a.4\]]gnas ni 'di gsum yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_me'i cha lugs can gyi bu 'di na kha cig ni bdag ni thams cad mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra'o/_/gzhan yang 'di na kha cig ni bdag ni thams cad 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra'o/_/gzhan yang 'di na kha cig 
[\[279a.5\]]ni bdag ni gcig 'dod la gcig ni mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra'o/_/me'i cha lugs can gyi bu de la bdag ni thams cad 'dod do zhes de ltar lta ba gang yin pa'i lta ba 'di ni kun tu 'dod chags par 'gyur gyi kun tu 'dod chags pa med par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu zhe sdang 
[\[279a.6\]]bar 'gyur gyi kun tu zhe sdang ba med par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu gti mug par 'gyur gyi kun tu gti mug pa med par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu sbyor bar 'gyur gyi kun tu 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu 'phel bar 
[\[279a.7\]]'gyur gyi kun tu 'bri bar mi 'gyur te/_mngon par dga' ba dang /_nye bar len pa dang /_lhag par zhen par 'gyur ro/_/me'i cha lugs can gyi bu de la bdag ni thams cad mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta ba gang yin pa'i lta ba de ni kun tu 'dod chags pa med par 'gyur gyi kun tu 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]'dod chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu zhe sdang ba med par 'gyur gyi kun tu zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu gti mug pa med par 'gyur gyi kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur ro/_/'bral bar 'gyur gyi kun tu sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi kun nas nyon 
[\[279b.2\]]mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu 'bri bar 'gyur gyi kun tu 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/_mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /_nye bar len pa med pa dang /_lhag par zhen pa med par 'gyur ro/_/me'i cha lugs can gyi bu de la bdag ni gcig ni 'dod la gcig ni mi 'dod do zhes de 
[\[279b.3\]]ltar lta ba gang yin pa'i lta ba de la re zhig des 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni kun tu 'dod chags par 'gyur gyi kun tu 'dod chags pa med par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu zhe sdang bar 'gyur gyi kun tu zhe sdang ba med par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu gti mug par 'gyur gyi kun tu gti mug pa med 
[\[279b.4\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu sbyor bar 'gyur gyi kun tu 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu 'phel bar 'gyur gyi kun tu 'bri bar mi 'gyur te/_mngon par dga' ba dang /_nye bar len pa dang /_lhag par zhen 
[\[279b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/des mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni kun tu 'dod chags pa med par 'gyur gyi kun tu 'dod chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu zhe sdang ba med par 'gyur gyi kun tu zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu gti mug pa med par 'gyur gyi kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur 
[\[279b.6\]]ro/_/kun tu 'bral bar 'gyur gyi kun tu sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun tu 'bri bar 'gyur gyi kun tu 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/_mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /_nye bar len pa med pa dang /_lhag par 
[\[279b.7\]]zhen pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos ni 'di ltar so sor yang dag par rig par slob par byed de/_gal te bdag thams cad 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na ni bdag ni thams cad mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]yin pa dang /_bdag ni gcig ni 'dod la gcig ni mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa de gnyis dang bdag 'gyed par 'gyur ro/_/'gyed par gyur na rtsod par 'gyur ro/_/rtsod par gyur na rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/_'gyed pa dang 
[\[280a.2\]]bcas pa dang /_rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang bcas par yang dag par mthong nas lta ba de yang spong la lta ba gzhan yang mi len to/_/de ltar na lta ba de yang spong ba dang /_'dor ba dang /_sel bar 'gyur la lta ba gzhan yang nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur 
[\[280a.3\]]nye bar len par mi 'gyur/_'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos ni 'di ltar so sor yang dag par slob par byed de/_gal te bdag thams cad mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na ni bdag ni thams cad 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad 
[\[280a.4\]]smra ba gang yin pa dang /_bdag ni gcig ni 'dod la gcig ni mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa de gnyis dang bdag 'gyed par 'gyur ro/_/'gyed par gyur na rtsod par 'gyur ro/_/rtsod par gyur na rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/_'gyed pa dang 
[\[280a.5\]]bcas pa dang /_rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang bcas par yang dag par mthong nas lta ba de yang spong la lta ba gzhan yang mi len to/_/de ltar na lta ba de yang spong ba dang /_'dor ba dang /_sel bar 'gyur la lta ba gzhan yang nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 
[\[280a.6\]]'gyur/_nye bar len par mi 'gyur/_'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos ni 'di ltar so sor yang dag par slob par byed de/_/gal te bdag gcig ni 'dod la gcig ni mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na ni gcig ni thams cad 
[\[280a.7\]]'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa dang /_bdag ni thams cad mi 'dod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa de gnyis dang bdag 'gyed par 'gyur ro/_/'gyed par gyur na rtsod par 'gyur ro/_/rtsod par gyur na rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/_'gyed 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]pa dang bcas pa dang /_rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang bcas par yang dag par mthong nas lta ba de yang spong la lta ba gzhan yang mi len to/_/de ltar na lta ba de yang spong ba dang /_'dor ba dang /_sel bar 'gyur la lta ba gzhan yang nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 
[\[280b.2\]]'gyur/_nye bar len par mi 'gyur/_'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/me'i cha lugs can gyi bu lus 'di ni gzugs can/_rags pa/_'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyu las byung ba ste/_de la ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyis rgyun mi 'chad par skye ba dang /_'jig par rjes su lta bas gnas 
[\[280b.3\]]par bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_spangs par rjes su lta bas gnas par bya'o/_/'phags pa nyan thos kyis de la rgyun mi 'chad par skye ba dang /_'jig par lta bas gnas na de'i lus la 'dun pa dang /_lus la byams 
[\[280b.4\]]pa dang /_lus la phangs pa dang /_lus la gnas pa dang /_lus la zhen pa dang /_lus la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de la de'i sems zil gyis non cing 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/_/me'i cha lugs can gyi bu tshor ba 'di ni 'di gsum yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_bde ba 
[\[280b.5\]]dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa ste/_thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos ni gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de'i tshe de'i sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gnyis 'gag par 'gyur te/_
[\[280b.6\]]de'i tshe 'phags pa nyan thos kyis bde ba'i tshor ba nyi tshe myong bar 'gyur la/_bde ba'i tshor ba de yang mi rtag pa dang /_'gog pa'i chos can yin no/_/'phags pa nyan thos ni gang gi tshe sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de'i tshe de'i bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba 
[\[280b.7\]]yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gnyis 'gag par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe 'phags pa nyan thos kyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyi tshe myong bar 'gyur la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de yang mi rtag pa dang /_'gog pa'i chos can yin no/_/'phags pa nyan thos ni gang gi tshe sdug bsngal yang ma yin 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba de'i tshe de'i bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gnyis 'gag par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe 'phags pa nyan thos kyis sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba nyi tshe myong bar 'gyur la/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin 
[\[281a.2\]]bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba de yang mi rtag pa dang /_'gog pa'i chos can yin no/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_tshor ba 'di rnams kyi gzhi ni gang yin/_skyed pa ni gang yin/_rigs ni gang yin/_'byung bar byed pa ni gang yin zhe na/_tshor ba 'di rnams kyi gzhi ni reg 
[\[281a.3\]]pa'o/_/skyed pa ni reg pa'o/_/rigs ni reg pa'o/_/'byung bar byed pa ni reg pa ste/_reg pa de dang de skyes na tshor ba de dang de dag skye bar 'gyur la/_reg pa de dang de dag 'gags na tshor ba de dang de dag 'gag par 'gyur/_nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/_bsil bar 'gyur/_
[\[281a.4\]]med par 'gyur ro snyam nas des bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'ga' zhig myong na tshor ba de dag gi skye ba dang /_med par 'gyur ba dang /_nyams pa dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'gyur ba yang dag pa 
[\[281a.5\]]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/des tshor ba de dag gi skye ba dang /_med par 'gyur ba dang /_nyams pa dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas tshor ba skyes so cog la mi rtag par rjes su lta ba dang /_'jig par rjes 
[\[281a.6\]]su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_spang bar rjes su lta bas gnas so/_/de lus dang dus mnyam pa'i tshor ba myong ba na lus dang dus mnyam pa'i tshor ba myong ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/srog dang dus mnyam pa'i tshor ba myong ba na srog 
[\[281a.7\]]dang dus mnyam pa'i tshor ba myong ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_srog gi mthar thug nas lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu de'i tshor ba thams cad ma lus par 'di nyid du 'gag par 'gyur/_ma lus par med pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang gtugs par 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_lus dang bral ba'i tshe bde ba'i tshor ba myong na yang sdug bsngal gyi mtha' ni de kho nar zad do/_/lus dang bral ba'i tshe sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong na yang sdug bsngal gyi mtha' ni de 
[\[281b.2\]]kho nar zad do snyam mo/_/de bde ba'i tshor ba myong na yang mi ldan pa myong gi ldan pa ni ma yin no/_/sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin/_bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong na yang mi ldan pa myong gi ldan pa ni ma yin no/_/mi ldan pa ci dang mi ldan zhe na/_'dod 
[\[281b.3\]]chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang mi ldan no/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams dang /_sdug bsngal dang mi ldan no zhes nga smra'o/_/
[\[281b.4\]]de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bsnyen par rdzogs nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su 'greng ste bsil yab thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yob par byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das ni chos 
[\[281b.5\]]de dang de dag gi myong ba 'ba' zhig brjod par mdzad/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'ba' zhig dang /_'gog pa 'ba' zhig dang /_dor ba 'ba' zhig brjod par mdzad kyis/_ma la bdag kyang chos de dang de dag spong bar rjes su lta bas gnas par bya gor ma chag_/'dod 
[\[281b.6\]]chags dang bral bar rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_dor bar rjes su lta bas gnas par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos de dang de dag la mi rtag par rjes su lta bas gnas pa dang /_'jig par rjes su lta ba dang /_
[\[281b.7\]]'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_dor bar rjes su lta bas gnas nas len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/kun du rgyu sen [{]rings kyang [,]ring yang [}]chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]skyes so/_/de nas kun du rgyu sen [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]chos mthong /_chos thos/_chos rtogs/_chos kyi gting slebs te/_som nyi las rgal/_the tsom las rgal nas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyis bkri ba med la/_ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la 
[\[282a.2\]]mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_
[\[282a.3\]]bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas kun du rgyu sen [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge 
[\[282a.4\]]slong gi dngos po thob bo/_/de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de gcig pu dben pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtun pa dang /_spong ba'i bdag nyid du gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtun pa dang /_spong ba'i bdag nyid du 
[\[282a.5\]]gnas nas rigs kyi bu rnams gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos tshon can bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa'i tshangs par spyod pa bla na med pa'i mthar thug pa de tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon 
[\[282a.6\]]sum du byas te bsgrubs nas nyams su myong ste/_bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad zin to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so snyam du kun shes par gyur nas tshe dang ldan pa de dgra bcom pa sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur 
[\[282a.7\]]to/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gsus po che 'di yin no/_/de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/_
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa gsus po ches las gang dag bgyis na des gzhung gi smra ba chen por gyur la/_rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[282b.2\]]gsus po che nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_gsus po che nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams 
[\[282b.3\]]su myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags 
[\[282b.4\]]pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong 
[\[282b.5\]]dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na sde dpon zhig la sogs pa mi rgod lnga brgya rkun po la chas so/_/re zhig na de dag song song ba dang /_seng ldeng gi nags shig tu phyin nas ded dpon gyis smras pa pad ma lta bu'i mig dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis 'di na 
[\[282b.6\]]gzhan gyi mi 'ga' lta yod dam ltos dang /_des bdag cag gis gnod sbyin la mchod pa gsol te 'dong ngo zhes byas so/_/de nas mi rgod de dag 'khor 'khor te seng ldeng gi nags de na rang sangs rgyas shig 'dug pa de mthong nas bzung ste sde dpon gyi thad du khrid do/_/de nas mi 
[\[282b.7\]]rgod kyi sde dpon gyis sod cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas des de dag la phan gdags pa'i phyir ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/_/de nas mi rgod kyi sde dpon sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa bshags te bshos kyang gsol nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi 
[\[283a.2\]]mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na mi rgod kyi sde dpon du gyur pa de ni gsus po che chen po 'di yin no/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi ring la rab 
[\[283a.3\]]tu byung nas des der lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs te/_des da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las 
[\[283a.4\]]gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /_las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_
[\[283a.5\]]las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod 
[\[283a.6\]]do//_//yang dag sdug ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_blon po chen po rnams dang /_phyug po rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_ded dpon rnams dang /_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_
[\[283a.7\]]gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams brnyes pa/_nyan thos 
[\[283b.2\]]kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer ku shi na gyad kyi nye 'khor shing sa la zung gi tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni do nub 
[\[283b.3\]]nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/_shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims khri shoms la sngas byang phyogs su ston cig_/de nas btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol 
[\[283b.4\]]te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du shing sA la zung gi bar du gzims khri bshams te sngas byang phyogs su bstan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[283b.5\]]'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'greng ngo /_/phyogs gcig tu 'greng nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims khri bshams te sngas byang phyogs su bstan lags so/_/de 
[\[283b.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das gzims khri ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas glo g.yas phyogs kyis gzims te zhabs gshibs te/_zhabs gshibs nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin du ldan zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig thugs la 
[\[283b.7\]]dgongs nas/_der bcom ldan 'das nam phyed na phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag pa de'i mod la sa chen po ni shin tu g.yos/_skar mda' 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]ni ltung /_mtha' nas ni ljib lam lam/_bar snang las ni lha'i rnga sgra dag brdungs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mod la nags kyi shing ljon pa'i mchog shing sA la zung 'dud par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 
[\[284a.2\]]thabs su gzims pa la me tog dag gis gtor to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag pa de'i tshe dge slong zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/sA la'i tshal gyi ljon pa'i mchog_/'di gnyis mdzes par ldan pa ste/_/ston pa mya ngan 
[\[284a.3\]]'das pa la/_/me tog dag gis yongs su gtor/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag pa de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag_/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/_/skyes nas 'gag 
[\[284a.4\]]par 'gyur ba ste/_/de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag pa de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'jig rten 'di na sems can kun/_/lus rnams nges par 'dor bar byed/_/'jig 
[\[284a.5\]]rten 'di na zla med pa'i/_/ston pa po ni 'di 'dra ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs brnyes pa/_/spyan ldan yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_brtan 
[\[284a.6\]]pa'i thugs ldan skyob pa po/_/phyi nang rgyu ba'i dbugs chad de/_/mi g.yo zhi la brten nas kyang /_/spyan ldan yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/_/ston pa gang tshe 'das gyur pa/_/de tshe 'jig pa chen po byung /_/de tshe skyi yang bung zhes byed/_/zhum pa 
[\[284a.7\]]med pa'i thugs kyis ni/_/tshor ba dang du len par mdzad/_/mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar/_/de yi thugs ni rnam par grol/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas zhag bdun lon pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi pur 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]zhu gsal bzhen pa skor bzhin du tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'dren pa rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rin chen sku/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gshegs pa gang yin te/_/nyid kyi sku las byung ba'i me lces bsregs/_/de ni na bza' lnga brgya phrugs kyis dkris/_/na bza' chos gos 
[\[284b.2\]]stong du tshang ba yis/_/sangs rgyas sku ni yongs su dkris par gyur/_/der ni bza' shing nang dang phyi rol gyi/_/rnam pa gnyis ni tshig par yong ma gyur/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa'i tshe grong khyer pa tra li'i bu zhes bya ba na 
[\[284b.3\]]rgyal po mya ngan med rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rnams 
[\[284b.4\]]med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_chos dang ldan pa dang /_chos kyi rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do/_/de nas phyis re zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de rtse zhing dga' la dga' 
[\[284b.5\]]mgur spyod pa las phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_mig bya kun la'i mig 'dra ba zhig btsas so/_/de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad 
[\[284b.6\]]gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_nye du rnams na re 'di btsas ma thag tu mig bya kun la'i mig 'dra bas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming kun la zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u kun la pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 
[\[284b.7\]]'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rgyal po'i pang du blangs te yang dang yang du bltas nas de'i byad gzugs phun sum tshogs pas ngoms par gyur te/_'jig rten na nga'i bu dang byad gzugs mtshungs pa med do zhes zer ro/_/
[\[285a.2\]]de nas de'i tshe yul sa 'dzin na grong me tog khur chen zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na khyim bdag cig gi bu mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/_de btsas pa na rin po che'i rdzing lha'i spos chus gang ba dang /_skyed mos tshal chen po me tog dang 
[\[285a.3\]]'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa 'gro shes pa zhig byung ste/_khye'u de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rdzing dang skyed mos tshal de 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas khye'u de'i ming mdzes ldan zhes btags so/_/de nas re zhig na khye'u de cher skyes pa dang me tog khur chen gyi 
[\[285a.4\]]grong nas tshong pa kha cig don dag cig la yul pa tra li'i bur dong ste/_de dag gis skyes khyer nas rgyal po mya ngan med kyi thad du dong ngo /_/de nas de dag gis rgyal po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te skyes phul nas mdun du 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po mya ngan med kyis de dag la bu 
[\[285a.5\]]kun la bstan te/_kye tshong pa dag khyed 'byam pa na byad gzugs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa 'di lta bu sngan chad gang du yang rung ste res 'ga' mthong ngam zhes dris so/_/de nas tshong pa de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud de rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te gyod mi rma bar gsol nas rgyal 
[\[285a.6\]]po la gsol pa/_lha bdag cag gi yul na khye'u mdzes ldan zhes bgyi ba mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig mchis te/_de btsas pa na rin po che'i rdzing bu lha'i spos chus gang ba dang /_skyed mos tshal chen po me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs 
[\[285a.7\]]pa dang ldan pa 'gro shes pa zhig byung ste/_khye'u de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rdzing dang skyed mos tshal de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po mya ngan med kyis de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te lta 'dod par gyur nas pho nya btang ste/_rgyal po mya ngan 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]med khye'u mdzes ldan blta ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'dod kyis/_khyed kyis bya ba'am bsham pa gang yin pa de gyis shig ces spring ngo /_/de nas skye bo phal po che skrag ste/_gal te rgyal po dmag gi dpung chen po dang 'dir 'ongs su zin na gnod pa chen po zhig tu mi 'gyur ram snyam mo/_/
[\[285b.2\]]de nas khye'u de'i bzhon pa bzang po bshams te skyes su mu tig gi do shal 'bum brdzangs nas rgyal po mya ngan med kyi thad du btang ste/_de mthar gyis song song ba dang /_grong khyer pa tra li'i bur phyin nas mu tig gi do shal 'bum khyer te rgyal po mya ngan med kyi thad du phyin to/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[285b.3\]]po mya ngan med kyis khye'u mdzes ldan gyi byad gzugs mdzes pa dang kha dog rgyas pa dang /_lha'i rdzing bu dang /_skyed mos tshal mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po mya ngan med kyis gnas brtan nye bar srung la ya mtshan du bstan pa'i 
[\[285b.4\]]phyir khye'u mdzes ldan khrid de khyim bya'i kun dga'i ra bar song ngo /_/kun dga'i ra ba de na dgra bcom pa nye bar srung la sogs pa khri brgyad stong gnas so/_/slob pa dang /_so so'i skye bo dge ba ni de'i nyis 'gyur du gnas so/_/de nas des gnas brtan gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[285b.5\]]chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/gnas brtan nye bar srung gis kyang de la chos bstan to/_/khye'u de yang rgyud yongs su smin pa zhig ste/_chos thos nas rab tu 'byung 'dod par gyur te/_des rgyal po mya ngan med la gsol nas gnas brtan nye bar srung gi thad du rab tu byung 
[\[285b.6\]]ste/_des sbyor ba dang bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad snyil ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/_nyon mongs pa 
[\[285b.7\]]thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas 
[\[286a.2\]]su gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po mya ngan med the tsom skyes te gnas brtan nye bar srung la dris pa/_btsun pa mdzes ldan gyis las gang dag bgyis na des byad gzugs 'di lta bu ldan par gyur lags/_las gang dag bgyis na des rin po che'i rdzing lha'i spos chus gang ba dang /_skyed 
[\[286a.3\]]mos tshal chen po me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa 'gro shes pa byung bar gyur lags/_gnas brtan nye bar srung gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po mdzes ldan nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/_gdon 
[\[286a.4\]]mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_mdzes ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams 
[\[286a.5\]]dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa 
[\[286a.6\]]brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/rgyal po chen po sngon gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang /_yul ma ga d+hAr ljongs rgyu zhing dong ste/_chos yang dag par bsdu 
[\[286a.7\]]bar 'dod pa las re zhig na tshong pa dbul po zhig gis dge slong gi dge 'dun phal cher ston pa dang bral ba'i mya ngan gyis non par gyur la 'gro 'gro bas dub cing lus rdul gyis yog par mthong ngo /_/de nas de snying rje skyes nas des 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya cho ga dang ldan pa'i 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]khrus la spyan drangs so/_/de nas des chu dron spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa phul te dge slong rnams kyi lus bkrus te/_chos gos rnams kyang bkrus so/_/kha zas bzang pos kyang tshim par byas nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang blangs te smon lam btab pa/_
[\[286b.2\]]bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa 'di nyid la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong mdzes ldan 'di yin te/_des dge 
[\[286b.3\]]slong dag la cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus byas pa des na 'di 'di lta bur byad gzugs khyad par can du gyur la/_rin po che'i rdzing lha'i spos chus gang ba dang /_skyed mos tshal chen po me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'gro shes pa byung bar gyur to/_/des skyabs su 
[\[286b.4\]]'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa des ni tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/_/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni 
[\[286b.5\]]rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/_/las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/_las gcig tu nges par dkar 
[\[286b.6\]]ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po mya ngan med gnas brtan nye bar srung gis bshad pa la mngon par bstod de/_rjes su yi rangs nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi 
[\[286b.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogs te/_gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de de ba tsan dras bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]{D344}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dz+nyA na ka sU tra bud d+ha a ba dA na/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[287a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das yum gyi don du lha rnams kyi gnas sum cu rtsa gsum na shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs so/_/der lha'i bu zhig la 'chi ba'i snga ltas ngan pa lnga byung ste/_phreng rgyan rnyings pa dang /_gos rnyings pa dang /_lus dri nga bar 
[\[287a.3\]]gyur pa dang /_mchan khung nas rngul 'dzag pa dang /_rang gi stan la dga' ba med par gyur to/_/skye ba yang mthong ste/_yangs pa'i phag gi mngal du skye bar mthong ngo /_/des de mthong nas mya ngan gyis thebs/_smre sngags 'don/_brang rdung zhing ngu la shin tu mong mong por gyur
