[\[287a.4\]]to/_/de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig lha'i bu de ga la ba der song ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas 'jigs sam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu bdag 'chi bas 'jigs so/_/lha'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag lha rnams kyi gnas sum cu rtsa gsum 'dir lha'i bza' ba ni zos/_
[\[287a.5\]]lha'i btung ba ni 'thungs/_lha'i bgo ba ni bgos na/_de nas phyir yangs pa'i phag gi mngal du skye bar mthong ste/_der bdag bshang ba za zhing mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur te/_lha'i bu de lta bas na bdag 'chi bas 'jigs so/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jigs shig_/de 
[\[287a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de yum gyi don du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas 'di na shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/_ci ste lha'i bu khyod kyis bcom 
[\[287a.7\]]ldan 'das de la phyag tshol dang /_bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs te/_des khyod ngan song rnams las grol bar mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su ma btang ba yin no/_/de nas lha'i bu de stan las 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du lan gsum brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[287b.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs su gsol/_bdag ngan song du skye ba rnams las grol bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs 
[\[287b.3\]]su chud nas/_lha'i bu de ga la ba der gshegs te gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas 'jigs sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 'gum pas 'jigs 
[\[287b.4\]]lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_yangs pa'i phag gi mngal mi sdug par skye bar mthong lags te/_der bdag skyes nas bshang ba 'tshal zhing mtshon gyis 'gum par 'gyur lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'gum pas 'jigs lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[287b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jigs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams mi 'gro mi 'ong gi bdag nyid kyi las kyis 'ong zhing 'gro ste/_lha'i bu khyod tshur shog_/sangs rgyas la skyabs su 
[\[287b.6\]]song shig_/chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song shig_/de nas lha'i bu de stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo/_/bdag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas 
[\[287b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig sangs rgyas la ni skyabs song ba/_/de ni ngan 'gror 'dir ni mi 'gro ste/_/lha yi bdag nyid dngos po spangs nas su/_/mi yi bdag nyid dngos po len par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhud nas ring po ma lon par lha'i bu de 'chi ba'i dus byas 
[\[288a.2\]]so/_/dus byas nas de ma thag tu yangs pa der tshong dpon zhig gi chung ma dam pa'i mngal du skyes so/_/de zla ba dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas par gyur to/_/de btsas ma thag tu tshig 
[\[288a.3\]]'di skad ces sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod do/_/de nas de'i tshe pha dang ma 'di snyam du sems te/_khye'u 'di ni sangs rgyas shes/_chos shes dge 'dun shes te/_'di ni shes pa dang ldan no snyam du 'du shes 
[\[288a.4\]]skyes so/_/de nas khye'u shes ldan gang gi tshe lo brgyad lon pa lta bur gyur pa de'i tshe li ts+tsha bI gzhon nu rab tu mang po rnams kyis lhan cig tu mdun du bdar nas skyed mos tshal gyi bzhi mdo nas byung ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yangs pa'i tshal chen po na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[288a.5\]]na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe smad g.yogs dang chos gos gsol/_lhung bzed bsnams te/_yangs par bsod snyoms la phyir gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de mdzes pa nas 'od dang ldan pa'i bar du gyur pa khye'u shes ldan gyis mthong ngo /_/
[\[288a.6\]]mthong nas de bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/sems dga' nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[288a.7\]]tu 'dug nas khye'u shes ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bdag gis sngon gyi tshe dran te/_sdug bsngal rnams las rab bkrol zhing /_/ngan song ltung ba las ni bdag_/'jig rten mgon gyis grol bar mdzad/_/mi mchog thugs ni brtser 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]dgongs te/_/bsod snyoms 'di ni bzhes par mdzod/_/bdag gi gdugs tshod 'di dag ni/_/grol bar mdzad nas deng bzhes la/_/sang ni bdag gi pha ma yi/_/sdum par 'dren pas brtser dgongs te/_/dge slong kun dang thabs cig tu/_/gdugs tshod dag ni gsol bar 
[\[288b.2\]]mdzod/_/bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas khye'u shes ldan gyis gsol pa gnang ngo /_/de nas khye'u shes ldan bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas pha ma ga la ba der song ste/_pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288b.3\]]la bsod snyoms phul lags te/_sang yang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/_/de nas khye'u shes ldan gyi pha ma mgu zhing dga' la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas de'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba ro dang ldan pa zhim pa mang po mngon par bshams 
[\[288b.4\]]nas yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po thams cad phyag dar byas te/_dar gyi lda ldi btags/_pog phor nas spos kyis bdugs/_spos chus chag chag btab/_me tog gis mdzes par bkram ste/_de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dus la bab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[288b.5\]]song ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod la bab ste/_gdugs tshod sbyar lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i snga dro smad g.yogs dang chos gos gsol/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar cing /_dge slong 
[\[288b.6\]]gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/_shes ldan gyi pha ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so/_/de nas khye'u shes ldan bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang gdan la bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang /_bca' ba ro dang 
[\[288b.7\]]ldan pa zhim zhing mang ba dag legs par brims legs par gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar rig nas/_so so so so la ras bcos bu zung dang /_so so la lham zung dag phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das la chos gos sar pa gsum dang /_chags sar pa 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]zung dag gsol to/_/gser gyi me tog dang /_dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor to/_/gang mngon par gtor ba de dag gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi thad kar khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_gru bzhi pa/_gnas 
[\[289a.2\]]bzhi dang ldan pa zhig 'dug par gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa des mthong ngo /_/de nas khye'u shes ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 
[\[289a.3\]]'dra ba mthong nas mgu zhing dga' ba nas/_yid bde ba skyes pa'i bar du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag da ltar gyi bcom 
[\[289a.4\]]ldan 'das bzhin du/_sangs rgyas su gyur cig_/chos ston par yang gyur cig_/dge 'dun yongs su skyong bar yang gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u shes ldan gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud de/_'dzum pa mdzad nas spyi bo'i gtsug gi nang du nub pa'i bar du mdzad 
[\[289a.5\]]pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ste/_don med pa mi mdzad do snyam pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 'di ltar shes ldan gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pas na/_/bskal pa bye ba 
[\[289a.6\]]dgu bcu dag tu log par ltung bar mi 'gyur la/_/de nas de ma thag tu rnam par 'dren par nye bar skye 'gyur te/_/mtshan ni mkhyen gtso rgyal po zhes bya sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rtogs pa brjod pas mkhas rnams yang dag dga' byed cing /_/mi yi 
[\[289a.7\]]mkhas pa gang gis thos na dge ba mang po byed 'gyur te/_/rgya mtsho mthas gtugs dpag med lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas la/_/rab tu dang bas yon rnams phul ba'i 'bras bu chung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_khye'u shes ldan dang /_
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing ha dang /_sarba dz+nyA de ba 
[\[289b.2\]]dang /_/zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D345}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_sU ka ri ka a ba dA na nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_phag mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/_dkon 
[\[289b.3\]]mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lha'i bu'i 
[\[289b.4\]]'chi 'pho'i chos kyi snga ltas rnam pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_gos rnams sngon dri ma mi chags pa las dri ma chags pa dang /_me tog phreng rnams sngon mi rnyings pa las rnyings pa dang /_mchan khung gnyis nas rngul 'byung ba dang /_lus las dri mi zhim pa 'byung ba dang /_lha'i 
[\[289b.5\]]bu'i 'chi 'pho'i chos ni rang gi stan la dga' ba mi 'thob pa'o/_/dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos kyis sa la 'gre ldog ste brang rdung zhing ngu la/_snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/_kyi hud dal gyis 'bab pa/_kyi hud rdzing /_kyi hud rdzing bu/_kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs 
[\[289b.6\]]can gyi tshal/_kyi hud rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal/_kyi hud dga' ba'i tshal/_kyi hud 'dres pa'i tshal/_kyi hud yongs 'du/_kyi hud sdug pa/_kyi hud ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb/_kyi hud lha'i 'dun sa/_kyi hud blta na sdug pa zhes snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don to/_/lha'i dbang po 
[\[289b.7\]]brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de shin tu sa la 'gre ldog cing snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don pa mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang lha'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po khyod ci'i phyir shin tu sa la 'gre ldog cing snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/_kyi hud 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]dal gyis 'bab pa/_kyi hud rdzing /_kyi hud rdzing bu/_kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs can gyi tshal/_kyi hud rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal/_kyi hud dga' ba'i tshal/_kyi hud 'dres pa'i tshal/_kyi hud yongs 'du/_kyi hud sdug pa/_kyi hud ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb/_kyi hud 
[\[290a.2\]]lha'i 'dun sa/_kyi hud blta na sdug pa zhes snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don par byed/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la lha'i bu des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka bdag ni 'dir lha'i bde ba dang bral te zhag bdun na 'di nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 
[\[290a.3\]]phag mo'i mngal du skye bar 'gyur te/_bdag ni der lo mang po zhig tu phyi sa dang gcin 'tshal bar 'gyur bas de'i slad du bdag de skad mchi'o/_/grogs po tshur shog_/khyod rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su song shig_/'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog 
[\[290a.4\]]chos la skyabs su song shig_/tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su song shig_/des 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po bdag ni rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/
[\[290a.5\]]tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas lha'i bu des skyabs gsum bzung ste 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de bltas pa ci lha'i bu de phag mo'i mngal du skyes sam ma skyes zhes 
[\[290a.6\]]bltas na yang ma skyes/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes sam ma skyes zhes bltas na yang ma skyes te/_lha rnams ni chos nyid kyis 'og ma la shes pa dang mthong ba 'jug gi gong ma la ni ma yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin the tsom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[290a.7\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di na lha'i bu zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]byung nas dogs la 'gre ldog cing snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/_kyi hud dal gyis 'bab pa/_kyi hud rdzing /_kyi hud rdzing bu/_kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs can gyi tshal/_kyi hud rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal/_kyi hud dga' ba'i tshal/_kyi hud 'dres pa'i tshal/_kyi hud yongs 'du/_kyi hud 
[\[290b.2\]]sdug pa/_kyi hud ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb/_kyi hud lha'i 'dun sa/_kyi hud blta na sdug pa zhes snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don pa mthong ste/_bdag der mchis nas 'di skad ces bgyis so/_/grogs po khyod ci'i phyir brang rdung zhing ngu la mya ngan byed de/_ngu zhing smre sngags 'don/_des 
[\[290b.3\]]smras pa/_bdag ni 'dir lha'i bde ba dang bral te zhag bdun na 'di nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por phag mo'i mngal du skye bar 'gyur te/_bdag ni der lo mang po zhig tu phyi sa dang gcin 'tshal bar 'gyur bas de'i slad du bdag de skad mchi'o/_/grogs po tshur shog_/khyod rkang 
[\[290b.4\]]gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su song shig_/'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su song shig_/tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su song shig_/de nas lha'i bu de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyis 'jigs shing skrag_/'chi bas 'jigs shing 
[\[290b.5\]]skrag ste/_de 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/grogs po bdag ni 'di ltar rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas lha'i bu des 
[\[290b.6\]]skyabs gsum bzung nas 'chi 'pho'i dus bgyis pa de/_bcom ldan 'das gang du skyes lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka lha'i bu de ni dga' ldan lha'i ris der skyes te/_lha'i 'dod pa thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[290b.7\]]tshim zhing mgu ste/_rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_dbang po tshim nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchi ba/_/de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi ste/_/mi yi lus rnams spangs nas su/_/de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]gang dag chos la skyabs mchi ba/_/de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi ste/_/mi yi lus rnams spangs nas su/_/de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur/_/gang dag dge 'dun skyabs mchi ba/_/de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi ste/_/mi yi lus rnams spangs nas su/_/de dag lha lus thob par 
[\[291a.2\]]'gyur/_/gang dag nyin mtshan rtag par yang /_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_/gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/_/mi de dag gi rnyed pa che/_/gang dag nyin mtshan rtag par yang /_/chos ni rjes su dran pa dang /_/gang dag chos la skyabs mchis pa/_/mi de dag gi rnyed pa che/_/
[\[291a.3\]]gang dag nyin mtshan rtag par yang /_/dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_/gang dag dge 'dun skyabs mchis pa/_/mi de dag gi rnyed pa che/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rjes su 'thun par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin te/_de de 
[\[291a.4\]]bzhin no/_/gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs dong ba/_/de dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/_/mi yi lus rnams spangs nas su/_/de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur/_/gang dag chos la skyabs dong ba/_/de dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/_/mi yi lus rnams spangs nas su/_/de dag lha lus thob par 
[\[291a.5\]]'gyur/_/gang dag dge 'dun skyabs dong ba/_/de dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/_/mi yi lus rnams spangs nas su/_/de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[291a.6\]]phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lag pa thal mo sbyar nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/phag mo'i 
[\[291a.7\]]rtogs pa brjod pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//sarba shu b+haM b+ha ban+tu//_//
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]{D346}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_su ma ga d+hA [#]a ba dA [#]na[#]/_bod skad du/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[291b.2\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas de'i tshe mnyan yod na mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu mo ma ga d+hA bzang mo zhes bya ba [:]dad pa [#]dang ldan pa/_rang bzhin bzang ba/_bsam pa dge ba/_bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa zhig gnas so/_/ji tsam na [#]
[\[291b.3\]]bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na tshong dpon gzhan zhig gnas pa [#]la/_de'i bu khyu mchog byin zhes bya'o/_/de yang gzhan mu stegs pa sten pas gcer bu pa rnams la mngon par dad pa zhig gnas pa dang /_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po rnam 
[\[291b.4\]]par bstan pa de'i tshe mu stegs pa rnams mtha' 'khob [#]tu kun du gnas te/_la la ni grong khyer bzang byed ces bya ba na'o/_/la la ni mud gi [#]ri ka zhes bya ba'i yul na'o/_/la la ni bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na [#]gnas so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na khyu mchog byin de'i bar du 
[\[291b.5\]]khyim ma byas pa dang /_de la gcer bu pa rnams kyis smras pa/_mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu mo ma ga d+hA [#]bzang mo zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_blta [#]na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_skye bo dam pa rnams dang 'dra ba zhig yod do/_/ji srid des thos pa dang bdag nyid gcer bu pa'i cha 
[\[291b.6\]]byad du byas te mnyan yod du song ngo /_/ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du slong ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /_des bu mo de mthong ngo /_/mthong ba'i mod kho na la bu mo de la kun du chags par gyur la/_de der bslangs pa'i tshe zhwa'i [#]nang du blangs so/_/de nas bu 
[\[291b.7\]]mo des log par spyod pa de mthong ba dang /_'di ni shes bzhin med par slongs mo len to zhes[:]bgad do[#]/_/de nas khyu mchog byin de ngo tsha bar gyur pa dang /_bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du song ste pha la smras nas des bu mo de blangs [#]so/_/mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]'das la [#]zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhan du na gang gi tshe ma ga d+hA bzang mo 'di bu ram shing 'phel du song na rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang ji srid cig na khyim bdag mgon med 
[\[292a.2\]]zas sbyin gyis nye du rnams la yang [#]go bar byas nas byin pa dang bu ram shing 'phel du khyer ro/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe khyim de na gcer bu pa rnams zan za ba dang /_de la sgyug mos smras pa/_de ring bdag cag gi khyim na mchod gnas rnams bshos gsol gyis [#]tshur shog_/
[\[292a.3\]]mchod gnas rnams la ltos shig_/ma ga d+hA bzang mos de thos pa dang dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rangs pa dang /_yid bde ba skyes te bsams pa/_nges par btsun pa shA ri'i bu'am/[ :]maud gal [#]gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams byon par gyur to snyam nas de yid rab 
[\[292a.4\]]tu dga' ba dang /_'jigs pa med par song ba dang /_gcer bu nags kyi ma he 'dra ba/_skra [#]rnams btogs [#]pa/_phug ron gyi phru gu 'dra ba'i gcer bu pa [#]rnams mthong ngo /_/mthong ba dang de'i mod la ma ga d+hA bzang mo ngo tsha ste/_de gdong gzhan du bltas pa dang /_de la sgyug mo des smras 
[\[292a.5\]]pa/_bu mo khyod ci'i phyir yi mug par gyur/_des smras pa/_gang 'di lta bu mchod gnas yin na [:]mchod gnas [#]ma yin pa go ji lta bu zhig yod par 'gyur/_de la des [#]smras pa/_bu mo khyod la 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa 'ga' zhig yod dam[:]bu mos smras pa [#]bdag gi pha'i gtsug lag 
[\[292a.6\]]khang rgyal byed kyi tshal na sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i ston pa bzhugs te/_de ni rgyu ba dang /_mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi mchod gnas yin no/_/khyod kyi ston pa de ji [#]'dra ba zhig_/smras pa/_bdag gi ston pa[:]btso ma'i [#]tshogs ltar ser/_/btso ma'i [#]gser ltar shin tu dri ma med/_/tshul khrims rnam [#]dag 
[\[292a.7\]]shes rab shin tu dag_/'jig rten gsum na mnyam med 'gro las 'phags/_/de thos ma thag tu sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/_bu mo nged cag rnams la bcom ldan 'das de sang bstan par nus sam/_ma ga d+hA bzang mos smras pa/_bshos gtsang rnams sbyor cig 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]dang /_sang bcom ldan 'das spyan drang bar bya'o/_/ji [#]tsam na de rnams kyis smras pa/_bshos gtsang rnams sbyar gyis [#]khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das sang spyan drongs shig_/de nas ma ga d+hA bzang mos khang pa'i yang tog [#]gi steng du mngon par 'dzegs [#]nas phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs 
[\[292b.2\]]pa'i phyogs der thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal [#]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran te/_me tog rnams [:]gtor cing [#]spos kyang btul [#]nas gser gyi bum pa'i chus bcom ldan 'das spyan drang ba'i phyir gser gyi bum pa'i chu yang sbrengs so/_/snying rje ba'i tshig 'di skad ces kyang [:]
[\[292b.3\]]smra ste[#]/_bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_bdag [:]ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang [#]'dra bar gyur cing mtha' 'khob na mchis te[#]/_dkon mchog gsum dang bral bar gyur pa la rjes su gzung [#]bar mdzad cing dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa [#]'dir gshegs par mdzad du gsol/_
[\[292b.4\]]yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te/_tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab shin tu dag_/dad ldan snying po nyan thos che rnams kyis/_/mgon med gyur pa bdag la rjes gzung [#]ba'i/_/don mdzad thugs rjes gshegs par mdzad du gsol/_/ji tsam na me tog dang spos dang gser gyi bum [#]pa'i 
[\[292b.5\]]chu'ang nam mkha' la [#]'phags par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang de'i tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor rnam [#]bzhi la chos ston to/_/gser gyi bum pa'i chu de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]spyan sngar bai dUr+ya'i [#]sdong bu bzhin du rnam par gnas so/_/me tog de bcom ldan 'das 
[\[292b.6\]]kyi steng gi nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas so/_/[:]dri ngad [#]spos kyang sprin brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas par gyur to/_/de nas de mthong ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa [#]kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pa 'di ga las mchis/_bcom 
[\[292b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dpag tshad brgya drug cu [#]rtsa gsum na/_bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer yod pa nas 'ongs so/_/kun dga' bo grong khyer de ni mu stegs pa rnams kyis bzung ba yin pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes dge slong 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]rnams la tshul shing brims shig_/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgan pa'i gnas mtha' nas bzung [#]nas tshul shing brims te/_'di skad ces [:]kyang smras so[#]/_/sang bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar bya ste/_grong khyer de ni mu stegs pa rnams kyis yongs 
[\[293a.2\]]su bzung bas khyod [#]cag rnams las gang rdzu 'phrul thob pa des tshul shing long shig[# ]/ji srid cig na rgan pa'i mtha' nas tshul shing len par brtsams so/_/yang de na [#]gnas brtan [:]gang po zhes bya ba [#]yod de de [#]yang rdzu 'phrul ma thob par lag pa brkyang [#]ste tshul shing len par brtsams pa dang /_
[\[293a.3\]]de la tshe dang ldan pa [#]kun dga' bos smras pa[#]/_gnas brtan mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du 'jug pa ma yin gyi/_gzhan du [#]dpag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum na/_bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i gnas yod de/_der 'gro dgos so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_ngas ni thog ma med 
[\[293a.4\]]pa'i dus nas goms pa'i nyon mongs pa [#]ni spangs na/_mu stegs pa rnams dang thun mong du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta zhig [#]dka' ba ji [#]zhig yod nas bskyed par mi bya snyam nas des kyang dus de nyid du rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa dang /_ji srid du tshul shing gnyis pa ma brims [#]pa de srid du des glang 
[\[293a.5\]]po che'i sna 'dra ba'i lag pa brkyang [#]ste tshul shing [#]blangs so/_/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste [#]smras pa/_gang gis [#]rdzu 'phrul gang thob pa des bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du 'gro bar bya'o[#]/_/de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la nam nangs 
[\[293a.6\]]te dge slong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas yang dag par chas so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi yang mnyan yod gang na ba der mngon par [:]blta bar brtsams [#]so/_/ji [#]tsam na bar skabs der kun shes [:]kauN+Di n+ya [#]zhes bya ba [#]rta'i shing rta la zhon te glog 'gyu [#]ba'i snang ba ston cing [:]dal bu [#]dal 
[\[293a.7\]]bus char rab tu 'bebs [#]te/_de lta bu'i rang gi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston cing 'ong ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA bzang mo'i bdag pos de mthong ba dang dris pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/_des smras pa/_'di ni kun shes [:]kauN+Di n+ya [#]zhes bya ba yin te/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]chos kyi [#]'khor lo dang po bskor ba na/_'dis thog mar bdag med pa mngon sum du byas pa de thog mar 'ongs pa 'di yin no/_/bar skabs der gnas brtan 'od srung [#]chen pos brag gi ri chen po shing sna tshogs pa rnam pa brgyas khyab pa bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab pa[#]/_me tog sna tshogs pas [#]yang 
[\[293b.2\]]dag par khebs [#]pa/_g.ya' chu sna tshogs kyis [#]nye bar mdzes par byas pa mngon par sprul te [#]steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo [#]/_/de nas khyim bdag des de mthong nas smras pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni 'od srung chen po zhes bya ba yin te/_
[\[293b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas par [#]smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu [:]gsungs pa ste[#]/_'dis gcig gis ma tshang ba'i glang dor stong bor zhing /_ser skya bzang mo skye bo dge ba rnams dang mtshungs pa dang /_dbyig dang gser mang po mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin [#]spangs nas mngon par 
[\[293b.4\]]byung ste rab tu byung ba de ni 'ong ba 'di yin no/_/bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus seng ge'i shing rta mngon par sprul te/_steng gi nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des de mthong ba dang dris [#]pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo gang seng ge'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston 
[\[293b.5\]]pa de yin nam/[ :]de nas [#]des de la smras pa/_'di ni dge slong [:]shA ri'i [#]bu zhes bya ba yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te/_'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa [#]tsam gyis 'dzam bu'i [#]gling thams cad kyi rtsod par smra ba rnams las rgyal bar gyur [#]to/_/'di 
[\[293b.6\]]ni ston pa gnyis pa/_mchog gnyis pa/_chos kyi sde [#]dpon/_chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su skor ba de ni seng ge'i shing rtas 'ongs pa 'di yin no/_/de'i rjes thogs nyid la tshe dang ldan pa [:]maud gal [#]gyi bu chen pos glang po che sa srung 'dra ba'i glang[:]po'i rgyal po mngon par [#]sprul te/_steng gi nam mkha' la rdzu 
[\[293b.7\]]'phrul gyis 'ong ngo /_/de nas [#]khyim bdag des de mthong nas/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo la dris [#]pa/_gang glang [:]po'i rgyal po [#]sa srung 'dra ba'i glang pos 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de [#]yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni dge slong [:]maud gal [#]gyi bu chen po zhes bya ba yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]#]'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa ste/_'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi [#]rnam par rgyal ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}#]rkang pa'i mthe bos kun du sgul [#]ba dang /_'dis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba de glang po'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no/_/bar 
[\[294a.2\]]skabs der tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi pad ma thams cad gser las byas pa/_bai dUr+ya'i [#]sdong bu can dngul gyi ge sar [#]dang ldan pa [#]mngon par sprul te/_rdzu 'phrul gyis [#]nam mkha' las 'ong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des de mthong ba dang dris pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo 
[\[294a.3\]]'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni dge slong ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa ste[#]/_'di ni bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yongs su bzung bas snod [:]tshos pas [:]gang ba lnga brgya sgo na gnas pa dang /_cung zad 
[\[294a.4\]]bsams pa tsam gyis chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms [#]dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams 'byung ba la spyod pa de pad ma'i shing rtas [:]'ong ba 'di [#]yin no/_/bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa gang pos nam mkha' lding gi shing rta mngon par sprul te/_rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi [#]nam 
[\[294a.5\]]mkha' las 'ong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des dris pa ma ga d+hA bzang mo nam mkha' lding gi shing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de [#]yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni dge slong gang po zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de nam mkha' lding gi shing rtas 'ong 
[\[294a.6\]]ba 'di yin no/_/bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa rta thul spyod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des de la dris pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo gang lhung bzed lag na thogs te spyod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ong ba de khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni dge slong rta thul zhes bya ba yin 
[\[294a.7\]]te/_'di'i spyod lam rab tu zhi bas glang po che smyon pa btul ba dang /_'di'i spyod lam rab tu zhi ba [:]mthong [#]bas 'phags pa shA [#]ri'i bus bden pa mthong bar gyur te/_de mngon par byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa de spyod lam rab 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]tu zhi bas 'ong ba 'di yin no/_/bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis [#]gser gyi ta la'i nags mngon par sprul te/_rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des de la dris pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo gang gser gyi ta la'i nags la rten cing 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi 
[\[294b.2\]]ston pa de yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni dge slong nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi [#]mchog tu bstan [#]pa yin te/_'di la shAkya [#]lnga brgya tsam rab tu byung ba rnams kyis do shal dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /[ :]gser gyi [#]gdugs 
[\[294b.3\]]la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams dang /_gos rnams kyi phung po chen po mdun du bzhag pa dang /_'dis de mthong ba dang skyo ba chen po skyes te/_de dag thams cad mi rtag par shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du 
[\[294b.4\]]byas pa de gser gyi ta la'i nags la rten nas 'ong ba 'di yin no/_/de nas bar [#]skabs der tshe dang ldan pa [:]kA t+yA ya [#]na'i bu chen pos bai dUr+ya'i [#]khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te/_rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las 'ong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag gis dris pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo bai dUr+ya'i khang [#]
[\[294b.5\]]pa brtsegs pa na 'dug ste 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni dge slong [:]kA t+yA ya na'i bu [#]chen po zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde pa dang bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bai dUr+ya'i [#]khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du 'dug nas 'ong ba 'di 
[\[294b.6\]]yin no/_/bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa gsus po ches khyu mchog gi shing rta mngon par sprul nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des [#]dris pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo gang [#]khyu mchog gi shing rta la zhon te 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de [#]yin nam/_des de la 
[\[294b.7\]]smras pa/_'di ni dge slong gsus po che zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa thob pa rnams kyi [#]mchog tu bstan pa de [#]khyu mchog gi shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no/_/bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa srung [#]dbang gi bu ngang pa'i shing rtas steng gi nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]khyim bdag des dris pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo gang ngang pa'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de [#]yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni dge slong srung [#]dbang gi bu zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje la gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de 'di yin te/_'di [#]chu bo [:]gang gA rgal [#]
[\[295a.2\]]bar 'dod pa na dmangs [#]mo 'dug shig [#]ces smras [:]pa dang [#]/_tshig de'i rjes thogs nyid la ri bo brtsegs [#]pa bzhin du gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad du mi 'bab par byed pa de ngang pa'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no/_/bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa rna ba bye ba nyi shu ri nags kyi tshogs la 'chag cing 'dug pa de 
[\[295a.3\]]'chag bzhin du 'ong ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des dris pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo gang nags shing brgya dag gis khyab pa'i nags 'di la 'chag cing 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni dge slong rna [#]can zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus rtsom [#]pa rnams kyi mchog tu 
[\[295a.4\]]bstan pa yin te/_'di skyes pa tsam gyis rna ba bye ba nyi shu ri ba dang bcas par skyes pa dang /_gang gi rkang mthil gyi 'og nas sor bzhi tsam [:]gyi gser gyi [#]spu yang dag par skyes pa dang /_gang 'di dang po'i zan la [:]kAr ShA pa Na [#]lnga brgya zad par byas pa dang /_gang bcom ldan 'das snyung ba dang /[ :]maud gal 
[\[295a.5\]#]gyi bu chen pos bshos gtsang nye bar blangs pa dang /_gang gi dris 'od ma'i tshal thams cad [#]kun du gang ba na[#]/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mnams [#]nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/_gang gi rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa tsam [:]gyis sa [#]'di rab tu g.yos pa dang /_gang zhig rab tu byung nas [:]'chag sar 
[\[295a.6\]#]'chag pa na de'i rkang pa gnyis las khrag byung ba zags [:]pa khwa [#]rnams 'thung ba de 'chag cing 'ong ba 'di yin no/_/bar skabs der tshe dang [#]ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin 'khor los sgyur [#]ba'i cha lugs su [#]mngon par sprul te 'ong ba dang /_de nas khyim bdag des dris pa/_ma ga d+hA bzang mo gang [#]'khor los sgyur 
[\[295a.7\]#]ba'i cha byad kyis 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/_des de la smras pa/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]sras bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]bslab pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te/_'dis yab kyis [#]spangs pa'i dpal ston par byed cing 'khor los sgyur [#]ba'i cha lugs kyis rin po che sna 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]bdun dang ldan pa bu stong gis yongs su bskor te/_gza' [#]dang rgyu skar dang skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i zla ba lta bu dang /_rgyal po'i lam bzung [#]nas 'gro ba [#]mi'i bdag po lta bu dang /_chu bo stong phrag gi chu 'bab pas kun tu 'gengs pa'i rgya mtsho lta bu dang /_'jigs pa dang nad dang mya ngan sel 
[\[295b.2\]]ba'i skye dgu skyong ba chen po lta bu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}#]kyi nang na seng ge lta bu dang /_bya rnams kyi nang na nam mkha' lding lta bu dang /_thams cad sel ba'i nyi ma dang /_gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur [#]ba dang /_chos bzang na mig stong [#]ldan pa chos skyong ba lta bur 'ong ba yin no/_/de bzhin du la la ni 
[\[295b.3\]]'bar bar byed pa dang /_la la ni char 'bebs pa [#]dang /_de bzhin du cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa ston cing 'ong ba yin no/_/la la sa las 'phags pa dang /_/la la nam mkha'i gzhi la gnas/_/la la stan ni sprul byed de/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mthu la ltos/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma rnams yang dag par 
[\[295b.4\]]song ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gang gis 'dzam bu'i [#]gling thams cad gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od kyis gang ba de lta bu'i 'od bkye [#]zhing /_mnyan yod nas brtsams te bu ram shing 'phel gyi bar 'dir [#]'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkye bas gang du'ang [#]mig gis mi mthong ba med pas 
[\[295b.5\]]thams cad kyis mthong bar [:]gyur to[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang nam mkha' la gshegs pa dang /_lag na rdo rje ni snam logs nas 'greng [#]ngo /_/gnas gtsang ma pa rnams ni steng nas so/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams ni 'og nas so/_/g.yon logs nas ni brgya byin no/_/g.yas nas ni tshangs pa'o/_/de 
[\[295b.6\]]bzhin du gtsug phud [#]lnga pa dang /_shin tu dga' [#]dang mig sbyin la sogs pa [#]dri za rnams pi bang [#]dang gling bu dang rnga dang rdza rnga la [#]sogs pa rol [#]mo'i bye brag snyan pa rnams rdung [#]zhing /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng [#]ba rnams kyang 'thor [#]zhing 'byor pa chen pos gshegs te/_bar skabs 
[\[295b.7\]]der bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]srog chags stong phrag bdun cu [#]rtsa bdun bden pa la thog mar rab tu bkod par [#]mdzad nas de'i 'og tu bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du gshegs te/_grong khyer de na yang sgo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}#]brgyad yod pa dang /_der bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}#]brgyad [#]sprul par mdzad nas sgo 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]re re zhing [:]sangs rgyas [#]snang bar gyur pa nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA bzang mo'i khyim du gshegs so/_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ste/_de rnams [#]khros nas de'i khyim bshig [#]par brtsams so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer 
[\[296a.2\]]de thams cad shel [#]gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te/_gang khyim thams cad du'ang [#]sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par mthong bar mdzad do/_/ji srid [#]bu ram shing 'phel du ma ga d+hA bzang mo la sogs pa'i srog chags [#]brgya stong du ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang dri dang /_phreng [#]ba dang /_
[\[296a.3\]]spos rnams kyis mchod pa [#]byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma ga d+hA bzang mo la sogs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po de rnams la gang zhig thos na ma ga d+hA bzang mo la sogs pa'i srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyis bden pa [:]mngon du [#]mthong ba thob par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad cing /_
[\[296a.4\]]'khor de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la bab [#]pa dang /_dge 'dun la 'bab [#]par gyur to/_/yang dge slong rnams the tsom [#]skyes te/_the tsom [#]thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji srid du [#]ma ga d+hA bzang mo mchis nas srog chags brgya 
[\[296a.5\]]stong du ma mtho ris [#]dang thar pa la gzhol bar gyur pa dang /_'dis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da lta [#]'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_'das pa'i dus na 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi 
[\[296a.6\]]khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen [#]pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_yang dus [#]de'i tshe grong khyer [:]bA 
[\[296a.7\]]rA Na sI [#]na rgyal po kr-i kI [#]zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i bu mo gser gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/_de'i ming yang gser [:]phreng can [#]zhes bya bar btags so/_/ji srid cig na bu mo de cher skyes par gyur pa dang na zla gzhon nu ma lnga brgya thams cad [#]kyang gzhon nu mas bskor cing thabs cig [#]tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur [#]byed de/_de la dad pa yang dag par thob pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung [#]la ji srid 'tsho'i [#]bar du chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed do/_/yang dus de'i tshe rgyal po [:]kr-i kIs [#]
[\[296b.2\]]mtshan gcig la rmi [#]lam bcu rmis te/_des smras pa/_glang po che'i rgyal po skar khung [#]nas byung ba na mjug [#]ma phra mo thogs pa dang /_skom [#]pa'i phyi nas khron pa snyegs par rmi ba [#]dang /_phye bre gang dang mu tig bre gang tshong byed pa dang /_tsan dan dang shing rin mnyam [#]par byed pa dang /_kun dga' ra ba me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[296b.3\]]ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phrogs pa dang /_glang po che [#]phru gus spos kyi glang po 'jigs par byed pa dang /_spre'u [#]mi gtsang bas gos pas gzhan la skud pa dang /_spre'u [#]rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang /_ras gcig mi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}#]brgyad kyis dras [#]kyang ma ral ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po gcig tu 'dus nas 'thab pa dang /_rtsod 
[\[296b.4\]]pa dang g.yul 'gyed pa dang mtshang [#]'dru bar gyur pas 'jigs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po de sad pa dang 'jigs shing skrag la [#]skyo bas nga'i [:]'tsho ba'i srog gi [#]bar chad du gyur pa'am[#]/_rgyal srid las nyams par mi 'gyur ram snyam ste/_des bram ze rmi ltas [#]kyi mtshan ma ston shes pa rnams bsdus nas de rnams la rmi lam de rnams 
[\[296b.5\]]smras so/_/de rnams kyang gser phreng [#]can la zhe sdang ba yin pas de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha khyed [#]la thams cad kyi nang na thugs su byon pa de'i snying dang me la sbyin sreg [#]gi mchod sbyin mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po de yi mug pas bsams [#]pa/_thams cad kyi nang na nga la sdug pa ni nga'i gser phreng [#]can yin no/_/gser phreng [#]can gyis de 
[\[296b.6\]]thos pa dang /_de yang mkhas pa yin pas rgyal po de'i gan du song ste phyin nas smras pa/_lha nyi ma shar na sgron ma [#]me'i 'od dgos pa ci mchis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'di drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}#]rgyu ba na bzhugs te der gshegs la zhus shig dang /_bcom ldan 'das des khyed la [:]ji ltar lung [#]
[\[296b.7\]]bstan pa de bzhin du khyed kyis [:]zung shig[# ]/de nas rgyal po [:]kr-i kIs [#]grong khyer [:]bA rA Na sIr [#]nga deng bcom ldan 'das de'i drung [#]du 'gro'o zhes dril chen po bsgrags nas de 'khor brgya stong du ma dang /_gser phreng [#]can de dang thabs cig [#]tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]bos phyag [:]byas te chos mnyan [#]pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/ji srid cig na rgyal po [:]kr-i kI [#]stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba [#]der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir [:]dgung gcig [#]la bdag gis rmi lam bcu khums 
[\[297a.2\]]pa/_glang po che skar khung nas byung ba na/_de'i mjug [#]ma thogs pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]rmi lam de'i 'bras bu 'dir bdag la lung bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig_/khyod kyi yul 'khor nyams par mi 'gyur la/_srog gi bar chad du 
[\[297a.3\]]yang mi 'gyur gyis[#]/_rgyal po chen po gzhan du na ma 'ongs pa'i tshe skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ste/_de'i phyi ma'i dus na nyan thos rnams lus ma bsdams pa/_sems ma bsdams pa/[ :]tshul khrims ma bsdams pa/[# ]shes rab ma bsdams pa [#]'byung bar 
[\[297a.4\]]'gyur te/_de rnams gnyen gyi tshogs spangs nas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de nas [#]gtsug lag khang rnams su khyim gyi 'du shes 'jog pas chags par 'gyur te/_glang po che skar khung nas byung ba na de'i mjug [#]ma thogs pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/rgyal po [:]chen po [#]khyod kyis skom pa'i phyi nas khron pa [:]snyegs par [#]rmi lam du 
[\[297a.5\]]mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de rnams gtsug lag khang gi nang na lhan cig gnas pa rnams la chos ston par 'gyur yang de rnams nyan [#]par 'dod par mi byed cing yid la mi 'jog ste/_de'i snga ltas ni 'di yin no/_/rgyal po [:]chen po [#]khyod kyis phye bre [#]gang dang mu tig bre gang tshong byed par [#]rmi lam du [:]mthong ba [#]gang yin pa de ni de 
[\[297a.6\]]nyid kyi nyan thos rnams te/_gang bza' ba tsam gyi don du dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams yang dag par ston par [#]'byung bar 'gyur te de'i snga ltas ni 'di yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis tsan dan dang shing mnyam por tshong byed par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi nyan thos 
[\[297a.7\]]rnams mu stegs kyi [#]tshig gang yin pa rnams bzung nas sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang [:]snyoms pa [#]'byung bar 'gyur te de'i snga ltas ni 'di [#]yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kun dga' ra ba [:]'bras bu [#]phun sum tshogs pa ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phrogs par [#]rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa [:]de ni [#]de nyid 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]kyi nyan thos lus ma bsdams pa/_sems ma bsdams pa/_tshul khrims ma bsdams pa/_shes rab ma bsdams pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de rnams dge 'dun rnams kyi me tog gi [#]mchog dang /_'bras bu'i mchog rnams 'tsho ba'i phyir dge 'dun las [#]bcad nas khyim pa rnams la ster bar 'gyur 
[\[297b.2\]]te/_de'i snga ltas [:]ni 'di [#]yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis glang po [#]phru gus spos kyi glang po [#]'jigs par byed par [#]rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa 'di [#]ni de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams tshul khrims 'chal ba/_sdig pa'i chos can de rnams gang dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i chos can rnams 
[\[297b.3\]]zil gyis gnon par byed par 'gyur te de'i snga ltas [#]yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'u mi gtsang bas gos pas gzhan la skud par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa 'di ni de nyid kyi nyan thos [#]tshul khrims 'chal ba/_sdig pa'i chos can rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de rnams kyis tshul khrims 
[\[297b.4\]]dang ldan pa rnams la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur te de'i snga ltas [#]yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'u rgyal por [#]dbang bskur bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni dus de'i tshe rmongs pa rnams rgyal por dbang bskur bar 'gyur te [#]de'i snga [#]ltas yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ras gcig mi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}#]brgyad 
[\[297b.5\]]kyis dras [#]kyang ma ral bar rmi lam du [#]mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi bstan pa sde [{]bcwa [,]bco [}#]brgyad du gyes par gyur kyang rnam par grol ba'i ras ni ral bar [:]bya bar mi nus [#]te de'i snga ltas yin no/_/rgyal po chen po [:]khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po [#]gcig tu 'dus nas 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang g.yul 'gyed 
[\[297b.6\]]pa dang /_mtshang 'dru bar rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi bstan pa rtsod pas nub par 'gyur te de'i snga ltas yin no/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar mi bzad pa rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang bcom ldan 'das yang dag 
[\[297b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la'ang [#]rgyal po [:]kr-i kI [#]dang /_gser phreng [#]can gyis thar pa'i cha dang 'thun [#]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa yin no/_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe na gser phreng [#]can gang yin pa de ni ma ga d+hA bzang mo 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe [:]yang 'dis [#]
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/_da ltar yang 'di 'ongs nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so/_/yang dge slong rnams the tsom [#]skyes nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gser [:]phreng can gyis las [#]ci zhig bgyis na [#]gser gyi phreng [#]ba btags par skyes/_bcom 
[\[298a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las byas pa yod de/_sngon byung ba na [#]zhing pa gzhan zhig gi chung mar gyur te[#]/_rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i me tog rnams kyi [#]phreng ba byas nas btags te/_las de'i rnam par smin pas gser gyi phreng 
[\[298a.3\]]ba btags [#]par skyes so/_/de bas na dge slong dag las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin te/_'dren [#]ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa [#]ni 'dren [#]ma'o/_/dge slong dag 
[\[298a.4\]]de bas na las [#]gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren [#]ma rnams ni [#]spangs la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la mngon par brtson par bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams [#]bcom 
[\[298a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/ma ga d+hA bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so[#]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra [#]dang /_zhu [#]chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur te[#]/_sgra sgyur gyi lots+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin 
[\[298a.6\]]chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa[#]//_//[#]
